comments: Crashing and stuck in a loop. Asked for verification although was already verified. Had to do it hundreds of times for it to finally accept, but now it's asking for a password reset, but I log in through Facebook so it's automatic, tried changing Facebook password too....nope! Still not allowing me in! Have emailed the one given on this page and no response.

Crashes a lot, Closes all the time and cannot receive messages unless you delete app and download again. Update: I keep getting red flagged and keep getting asked to verify over and over again even though I had several times. This is so stupid. Update again: they won't let me come back in! Saying I need to change passwords but they won't let me! Horrible site. I'm deleting forever and telling others to never use this site.

Extremely disappointed with this app. For whatever I have been flagged twice in a week. Third time within a month. I have already proved I'm one hundred percent real but this time I am trying to verify no matter what I do it's not letting me. I don't want to lose my account because I have many people I talk with. Ridiculous. The biometric is stupid and should be updated.

I was having a great time on the app. I've had it for a few years now and have gotten a few good dates off of it. Now the verification process won't let me back into my account though. I've been asked to verify twice in one week. The most recent time I was verified by picture then it asked me to change my password. Problem is I signed up with Facebook and therefore do not use a password to log in. I emailed a few times trying to resolve this issue and still am locked out.

Crashes constantly when microphone or camera permissions are denied. Randomly opens these video feeds in the corner of the screen, not sure if they're some kind of ad or someone's live stream since there's no explanation for them, but not fond of them randomly opening like that if they are live feeds, especially if it is opening up my camera and mic when it does it, but again, there's no explanation, so I've just been closing them.

title: Agar.io
description:
Play online with players around the world as you try to become the biggest cell of them all!

Control your tiny cell and eat other players to grow larger! But watch out: players bigger than you will be trying to make you their lunch. Survive and eat long enough to become the biggest cell in the game! 

With new controls developed especially for touchscreens, agar.io offers the same addictive gameplay that millions have already enjoyed on PC. Play online in free-for-all action and use splitting, shrinking and dodging tactics to catch other players - or avoid them! Use a variety of special secret skins with the right username!

Become a beta tester: http://goo.gl/cGmbd8

comments: The controls are terrible, you constantly get spawned next to bigger players, and the battle royal mode doesnt even work. It loads for a second and takes you straight back to the main page. Waste of time. Also, every button you press will probably popup an add, 6 things you have to close out of, and then another add. I get you need money, but you dont have to annoy me about it.

Fun game but too many ads and popups about the VIP. If you're lucky you won't spawn next to 3 other massive players, and if you're lucky the game picks up your inputs quick enough so you don't get eaten in 1 second. The game lags constantly no matter what Internet speed which means there's a big chance you'll drift off right into someone else. Ads after every 2 matches is too much to make it enjoyable. You might as well just restart the app after every single match.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD, this game is terrible now and is just getting milked. Constant ads to buy things, servers are laggy even on 220mbps internet which is a pretty good speed, server matching is terrible because it will throw you into servers where some of the people are half the size of the map and one move will kill everyone making you go back to the menu and see more ads. Just terrible at this point and mony hungry

Evreything is fun amazing and great. Great mobile port for agar only problem is if ur unlucky you will load up classic mode and spawn right next to a freaking giant and your screwed at that point its i little frutrating. Controls need some tweking i can never stand still. I rate this a honest 4 stars didint quite make that 5 becuse of the thing i talked about id toatlly recommend it however ig you have a laptop or a pc i think you should play it on that instead untill said issues are resuled

I cant express how much i love this came however a few days ago i bought a really cool skin which wad 3900 coins, i loved it but when i went on to play today the skin had disappeared and now i dont have it. I dont even have the coins back. Over all iys a really cool gameüôÇ

title: Ink Inc. - Tattoo Drawing
description:
Are you ready to experience your inner rebel? Ever wonder what it is like to get a tattoo? Now you can experience it all without feeling the pain! Fill in hundreds of different tats for your customers. Try to get the picture as close as possible for them and don‚Äôt mess up!. Get ready to feel the satisfaction of watching your art become real tattoos! Relax and use your precision to point and aim the needle to fill in the shapes. So many satisfying vibrations! Fun and easy to pick up but don‚Äôt miss an ink... Will you be the first one to tattoo them all?

Hundreds of objects for you to carefully size up, outline, and ink your customers. The final results will leave you feeling satisfied! 
 
 Game Features:

1.       Simple but addicting mechanics
Feel the satisfaction without the pain? The pictures are there for you. All you need to do is fill in the ink. Take your time and relax, it‚Äôs the simple.

2.       Run your own Tattoo Shop
Keep the customers coming. Whether its a heart, a zombie, or a skull, there are so many tattoo designs for you to stencil.

3.        Don‚Äôt go over the lines!!
Challenging shapes will test your precision. Can you beat each level in one hit?

4.        Feel the experience
Feel every needle tap with the best haptics experience there is.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Whether you like tattoos or just want to draw some shapes, Ink Inc. will take you there. This is the best and most rewarding tattoo simulation game there is. Good luck putting down Ink Inc!

Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

Follow us to get news and updates on our other Award Winning titles;
https://lionstudios.cc/
Facebook.com/LionStudios.cc
Instagram.com/LionStudioscc
Twitter.com/LionStudiosCC
Youtube.com/c/LionStudiosCC

comments: Super fun game! I constantly keep looking for new updates because of how addicting it is! Though one thing I would improve is there are some pictures that no matter what I do, I can't get 3 stars. It always comes up as 2 1/2 even if it looks good. Other than that, I love it! This is a fun, interesting, enjoyable, artistic, and creative game! I like picking techniques to use for each tattoo. I am finding this game to be somewhat addictive as well. One of my friends plays too, so sometimes I also send her screenshots of what I make. The different tatoos are interesting and make me laugh!

I would be giving it 5 stars except for 1 VERY ANOYING thing.. Its bad enough when you get bombarded by ads from a game but what really upsets me the most is with NO warning at all an add will start right in the middle of you drawing or filling in a spot and when the ad finishes and comes back to the game the gun goes haywire and messes up the whole picture and you have to start all over or also in the middle of drawing or filling the settings menu will keep popping up and doing the same thing.

Very nice app/game, I thoroughly loved it. Very nice graphics, controls and as the levels were increasing the drawings were getting harder and harder to play. I love the game however I got 2 stars out first cause there's a glitch that we put it right and it puts an angry face. Second cause when I sometimes start the game it's normal but then when i click things it doesn't bring me to the ink tattoo tasks. Please fix those bugs

title: Chime - Mobile Banking
description:
Welcome to banking made awesome. 

Chime is mobile and online banking with no hidden fees: get your paycheck up to 2 days early* with direct deposit, have fee-free overdraft when you‚Äôre in a pinch, grow your savings automatically, and manage your finances like a boss using the highly-rated Chime mobile banking app.

When you bank with Chime, you get a Visa¬Æ Debit Card, a Spending Account, and an optional Savings Account to help you save money. 

Applying for an account is free, takes less than 2 minutes and it won‚Äôt affect your credit score!

Here‚Äôs what our members love most about Chime:
‚Ä¢ Get your paycheck up to 2 days early* with direct deposit
‚Ä¢ Fee-free overdraft.** We‚Äôll spot you on debit card purchases with no overdraft fees. 
‚Ä¢ No hidden fees: no monthly fees, no overdraft fees, no foreign transaction fees, no minimum balance requirements 
‚Ä¢ Over 38,000 fee-free ATMs with Moneypass and Visa Plus Alliance
‚Ä¢ Real-time transaction notifications
‚Ä¢ Daily balance alerts
‚Ä¢ Block your card instantly in-app
‚Ä¢ Grow your savings automatically with our Savings Account
‚Ä¢ Send money instantly with Pay Friends to other Chime members. 
‚Ä¢ Deposit checks using Mobile Check Deposit for eligible members.^ 
‚Ä¢ Apple Pay‚Ñ¢ / Google Pay‚Ñ¢ for when you forget your wallet
‚Ä¢ Move money between your other bank accounts
‚Ä¢ EMV chip card security
‚Ä¢ Friendly and responsive customer support

With the Chime mobile banking app, you can stay in control of your money. Track your spending, link your other bank accounts, and save money.

How to switch banks:
‚Ä¢ Step 1: Open Your Account: Download the app and sign up. Once approved, we‚Äôll send you your Chime card within two weeks!
‚Ä¢ Step 2: Fund Your Account: Set up a direct deposit with your employer or payer to have funds deposited to your Chime account every payday. You can also connect other bank accounts and transfer funds from your existing bank account.
‚Ä¢ Step 3: Update Bill Payments: Activate your card when it arrives, add it to Apple Pay, and set up recurring bill payments with your Chime card number or with your Chime Spending Account and routing numbers.

‚Ä®For more information please visit www.chime.com.

***Learn how we collect and use your information by visiting our Privacy Policy at https://www.chimebank.com/policies/chime/privacy-policy/.***

Banking services provided by, and debit card issued by, The Bancorp Bank, or Stride Bank, N.A., Members FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Debit card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

*Early access to direct deposit funds depends on the timing of payer‚Äôs submission of deposits. We generally post such deposits on the day they are received which may be up to 2 days earlier than the payer‚Äôs scheduled payment date.
**Chime SpotMe is an optional, no fee service that requires that you receive $500 in direct deposit a month to qualify to overdraw your account up to $20 on debit card purchases. Chime, in its sole discretion, may allow you to withdraw your account up to $100 or more based on your Chime Account history, direct deposit history and amount, spending activity and other risk-based factors. Your Limit will be displayed to you within the Chime mobile app. You will receive notice of any changes to your Limit. Your Limit may be increased or lowered at any time by Chime.
^Not all new or existing customers are eligible to use Mobile Deposit. There are qualifications and enrollment requirements for participation in Mobile Deposit, and we reserve the right to change the qualification and enrollment requirements in our sole discretion at any time without prior notice. We may require you to upload a picture of your driver‚Äôs license or other identifying documents prior to using Mobile Deposit. Eligibility requirements can be found online after you have signed into your Spending Account.

recentChanges: Happy Halloween! If you're not out trick or treating, you can have fun reading up on our latest release notes. Instead of leaving you with some tricks, we're leaving a few treats in the form of bug fixes.
comments: amazing bank. love the instant notifications and easy direct deposits. very simple to use. Update: 10/20 Go with a real bank. This bank enjoys doing random maintenance on all accounts. Completely disabling your account for DAYS at a time. So far my account has been disabled for 2 days. There's plenty of money in my account, I just can't use any of it. Dropped to 3 stars simply because it's a free bank account. That's the only good thing about Chime. Its free. They just control your money.

My experience with Chime overall has been a great one. Instead of getting paid on Fridays, I get paid on Wednesdays every week via direct deposit. Two days early! Chime also offers the SpotMe feature, which is basically overdraft protection with no fees. Another cool feature for this being a virtual bank, is you have the option to set up a Secured Credit Builder Card with no pre-set credit limit, up to $10,000. I'm on the waitlist right now, but from what I read, it sounds very helpful!

More honest review today, today marks the third time in two months that time bank has frozen, has had technical difficulties and has no one available to up to talk to customers for hours on end. Now yes time is convenient, but there are other cards like it on the market. Which I am now starting to look into, as well as brick and mortar building type banks because unfortunately I can't let this keep happening especially not during the holiday season.

I have had this mobile banking app for over 6 years and haven't had any problems but recently their have been outages causing the app to be unavailable and my money unusable! I'm extremely furious that they can't keep their app working properly so I can use MY MONEY! Currently waiting for the app to be available so I can take my money and go to another bank! This is outrageous and you get no compensation for the late payments or overall difficulty of not being able to use YOUR MONEY!

I would be rating this higher, but for some reason I am not being shown a history of my purchases on the app. My girlfriend doesn't seem to be having this issue, only me. I have double checked to ensure that I have the most recent update, which I do. I cannot determine the cause for this. Any advice or assistance would be appreciated. The 'support bot' has not been any help at all. Thanks.

title: Block! Hexa Puzzle‚Ñ¢
description:
üî∑üî∂Block! Hexa Puzzleüî∑üî∂
The perfect game to build your spatial intelligence and geometric skills!

Your puzzle skills will be put to the test with this new angle on the classic dissection puzzle game! Our unique hexagonal pieces will stretch your mind in ways you never imagined in this addictive puzzle game. Enjoy the satisfaction of pieces fitting neatly in place, filling the board with a burst of color! With each block that fills the gaps, your ability will grow ‚Äì but so will the challenges! 

Are you ready to push your limits??

HOW TO PLAY
‚Ä¢ Arrange the blocks to fit them all in the grid frame.
‚Ä¢ Hexa blocks can‚Äôt be rotated.
‚Ä¢ Collect block pieces to level up!
‚Ä¢ Be careful of the blockades.
‚Ä¢ No time limits!

SPECIAL FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Simple gameplay you can master in seconds, but be warned! Levels can get tricky!
‚Ä¢ Thousands of unique levels to get your brain going all day long! What a BRAIN stretch!
‚Ä¢ Don't forget to get your daily rewards & earn even more with SPECIAL QUESTS!
‚Ä¢ Stunning, colorful graphics & themes for pure entertainment & excitement!
‚Ä¢ Perfect brain-teaser & perfect for small pockets of time 
‚Ä¢ Play stress-free! Your game will automatically save.

NOTES
‚Ä¢ Block! Hexa Puzzle‚Ñ¢ contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.

comments: Game is quite good but so many ads! I got to level 17 and uninstalled, only because after every two levels you are being forced to watch an ad. Considering that the first levels are very easy and only take 2-3 seconds to solve each of them, basically after 10-15 seconds of playing you have to watch 30-35 seconds ads, and you can't skip or go back to the home menu, unless you quit the game. I understand that it is a free game and you rely on ads for your income, but man! Let us play a little bit!

I'm getting use to it and I really do love the game that I will keep playing it. You better fix the bug in this game I get to playing then it comes up with a white circle that goes around and I half to turn my Phone off to star it again so please fix it. Thankyou
An absolute fun puzzle game!This game is one of the best puzzle games I've ever played,plus I don't have to worry about ads because i could just turn off my wifi on my tablet!Absolutely love it!

I got hooked as soon as I started playing! I love the style, the puzzles are progressively more challenging but in a gradual way. I wish the developers spent more time optimizing the game for modern screens, the hole-punch cutout on my screen makes the game render with a large black bar instead of a simple fill around the hole. Also, since I've paid for an ad-free experience, I would expect the notification in the corner to watch an ad go away, but they're still there
more ad than game. continual ads. ads on the screen when you play, ads between each puzzle, ads, ads, ads. neat concept, but experience is ruining by continual ads EVERYWHERE.

title: Files by Google: Clean up space on your phone
description:
Files by Google is a file management app that helps you:
‚ú® Free up space with cleaning recommendations
üîç Find files faster with search and simple browsing
‚ÜîÔ∏è Share files offline with others, fast and without data
‚òÅÔ∏è Back up files to the cloud to save you space on device

FREE UP MORE SPACE
In just a few taps, you can free up space more quickly and easily than ever: Delete old photos and memes from chat apps, remove duplicate files, erase unused apps, clear your cache and more.

CHECK YOUR STORAGE
Use Files to see how much free space is left on your phone and SD card. Easily transfer files to an SD card to free up your phone‚Äôs storage, right from the app. Or use the integrated file cleaner to get more space on the phone.

BE IN CONTROL
You will always know what you‚Äôre deleting, we don‚Äôt hide behind complicated terms and phrases. Select only what you want to remove and keep the rest. It‚Äôs your photos, your videos, your files so you are in charge.

BOOST PHONE PERFORMANCE
Use Files to keep enough of memory, so that your phone keeps on running smooth. Regularly, you get a prompt to remove junk or temporary files which helps you get more storage immediately.

SMART RECOMMENDATIONS
Get helpful suggestions of files to erase before you run out of space. The recommendation from Files app get smarter the more you use it.

FIND FILES FASTER
Save time looking for photos, videos, and documents on your phone. Files uses filters rather than folders so your stuff is organized more intuitively. Files by Google is the file manager and storage browser that helps you find what you‚Äôre looking for fast.

EASILY MANAGE FILES
Search for your files or simply navigate to them through categories and filters. View, delete, move, rename or share any files. Sort them by file size to understand what‚Äôs taking space. Browse all the GIFs your have. Find and share that video you downloaded last week. All of this with few taps.

SHARE FILES OFFLINE
Share your pictures, videos, documents, or apps with others nearby who also have the app. With fast speed up to 480 Mbps, it‚Äôs fast, free, and it works without the internet, so it doesn‚Äôt cost mobile data. Just pair up your phone with anyone nearby who has Files app.

ENCRYPTED FILE SHARING
Files‚Äôs offline file sharing is secured with WPA2 encryption, providing a more secure file transfer. Files app uses Bluetooth to set up encrypted and direct fast wifi connection, so that you can transfer app APK or large files in seconds, send videos or pictures to your friends. Safe and secure.

BACKUP FILES TO THE CLOUD
If you want to keep a file forever, select it from the Files menu and back it up to Google Drive or any other cloud storage app. Save them forever without taking space in your phone.

BACKUP FILES TO THE SD CARD
If you run out of storage on your phone, simply transfer large files or videos to your SD card if you have one. With a few clicks, you can clean up your phone and fully use the SD card. That leaves your internal storage free and your phone faster.

EFFICIENT, EFFECTIVE STORAGE MANAGEMENT
Files app takes less than 10MB of storage on your phone. And there‚Äôs no malware or bloatware to affect your phone‚Äôs performance.

THREE-IN-ONE TOOL APP
While taking very little storage on your device, Files does three things in one:
1) Free up space - Clean junk files and cache, boost your mobile phone or tablet as you clean up the phone memory and optimize your smartphone performance.
2) Find files fast - Browse your storage and find everything fast without being expert in file management.
3) Share files - Send pictures, share videos, transfer large files or app apks. All of this with super fast speed with rate up to 480 Mbps over an encrypted direct wifi network.

recentChanges:
- Improvements to audio player for enhanced background audio playback.
- Files grouping for easier browsing experience.
- Screenshot cleaning to help detect and delete old screenshots.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: This app can clean junk files and find duplicate files, so they can be deleted (cleaned). It also can find any large files that are taking up allot of space, then you can select the large files that you don't want to keep, so they can be removed. I've only used this app a few times, so if there are any other features that I overlooked, then I probably haven't encountered them yet.

Earlier I requested to reduce the text size and you did it. Thanks a lot, now it is looking very good. I have one more suggestion/request. It shows, for example in my phone, out of "64 GB", 20 GB used. But in 64 GB some space are reserved, as we know, so it is quite difficult for me to analyze what actual space I used out of the free space. It should show something like out of 43 GB free space that has been given to user, I have used 20 GB. I hope you understand what I am trying to say.

I love that this app finds your duplicate files, however there is not enough information provided. What does the little white tag in the corner of the photo mean? After you click delete a message asks-do you want to delete all versions of downloaded files? (4) What? Why? I selected more than 4 photos. Which ones are these? Did I select all versions? Then, NO. But your only choice is yes (recommended) or cancel which goes back to the previous screen, thereby blocking the delete function. SCARY!

Like many of the Google apps, this one is both helpful and annoying. It is helpful to have an app that makes it easier to clean up my phone and get rid of unneeded files to free up space. On the other hand, it's annoying that it always wants to delete my downloaded pictures, music, etc., that I really want to keep on my phone.

I have always loved Google files. A lot of times you think you have cleared out a lot of junk. But then you think to see what files may say. And you are surprised to see that you missed some. Great gift you get even more free space. THANK YOU again Google! Edited, I just got a new phone and files was one of the first appt I downloaded. It is still a must have.ü§ó Edit. 10/26/20 I just wanted to repeat everything I said already. Especially for my Lenovo Chromebook Duet Google Files is the best.

title: Pill Reminder & Medication Tracker - Medisafe
description:
Get the free ‚ÄúMUST HAVE‚Äù award-winning pill reminder and medication tracker ranked #1 by pharmacists, physicians and patients. Join the millions of people using Medisafe who are taking control of their medication management with our free app - stay on track and never miss another med.

üíä Features
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder and alarm for all medication needs
‚Ä¢ Drug-to-drug interaction checker
‚Ä¢ Family and caregiver support via ‚ÄúMedfriend‚Äù functionality
‚Ä¢ Medicine tracker
‚Ä¢ Refill reminders
‚Ä¢ Dr appointment manager and calendar
‚Ä¢ Support for complex dose schedules 
‚Ä¢ Add ‚Äúas needed‚Äù medications, vitamins and supplements
‚Ä¢ Full selection of OTC and RX medications
‚Ä¢ Daily, weekly & monthly med reporting with logbook to share with your doctor
‚Ä¢ Track health measurements for various medical conditions (diabetes, hypertension, cancer, anxiety, depression, HIV, multiple sclerosis, MS, Crohn‚Äôs, lymphoma, myeloma and leukemia) e.g. weight, blood pressure, blood sugar levels
‚Ä¢ Android Wear enabled
‚Ä¢ Customizable reminders and time settings (i.e weekend mode so you can sleep in)
‚Ä¢ Automatic time zone detection
‚Ä¢ Easily customize your pill reminder notifications. 

‚ù§Ô∏è A Health Tracker Built for You
Medisafe doesn‚Äôt just remind you to take your meds. As a medication management platform, Medisafe is a comprehensive tool that compiles all of your medical and health information in one place: pill and medicine reminders, drug-to-drug interactions, refill alerts, doctor appointments, and health journal with 20+ trackable health measurements


üîíPrivacy
‚Ä¢ Medisafe is available for free and no registration is required
‚Ä¢ We comply with strict privacy laws (HIPAA and GDPR compliant) to safeguard medical information


‚úÖ App Permission Information
Read Your Contacts - used if you choose to add a doctor or Medfriend. The app never stores your address book content and it doesn‚Äôt access your address book without asking you first. 
Find Accounts on the Device - Medisafe uses push notifications to Medfriends to let those with permission know if the main user has forgotten to take medication.


üîé Additional Information
Frequently Asked Questions: http://bit.ly/2yZt1Bh
Terms of Use: http://bit.ly/2Cpoz0n
Privacy Policy: http://bit.ly/2Cmpb7d
Validation by 3rd Party Independent Studies:

descriptionHTML:
Get the free ‚ÄúMUST HAVE‚Äù award-winning pill reminder and medication tracker ranked #1 by pharmacists, physicians and patients. Join the millions of people using Medisafe who are taking control of their medication management with our free app - stay on track and never miss another med.

üíä Features
‚Ä¢ Pill reminder and alarm for all medication needs
‚Ä¢ Drug-to-drug interaction checker

‚Ä¢ Medicine tracker
‚Ä¢ Refill reminders

‚Ä¢ Full selection of OTC and RX medications
‚Ä¢ Daily, weekly & monthly med reporting with logbook to share with your doctor
‚Ä¢ Track health measurements for various medical conditions (diabetes, hypertension, cancer, anxiety, depression, HIV, multiple sclerosis, MS, Crohn‚Äôs, lymphoma, myeloma and leukemia) e.g. weight, blood pressure, blood sugar levels
‚Ä¢ Android Wear enabled
‚Ä¢ Customizable reminders and time settings (i.e weekend mode so you can sleep in)
‚Ä¢ Automatic time zone detection
‚Ä¢ Easily customize your pill reminder notifications.

‚ù§Ô∏è A Health Tracker Built for You
Medisafe doesn‚Äôt just remind you to take your meds. As a medication management platform, Medisafe is a comprehensive tool that compiles all of your medical and health information in one place: pill and medicine reminders, drug-to-drug interactions, refill alerts, doctor appointments, and health journal with 20+ trackable health measurements


üîíPrivacy
‚Ä¢ Medisafe is available for free and no registration is required
‚Ä¢ We comply with strict privacy laws (HIPAA and GDPR compliant) to safeguard medical information

Read Your Contacts - used if you choose to add a doctor or Medfriend. The app never stores your address book content and it doesn‚Äôt access your address book without asking you first.

comments: After a rocky start, I have finally figured out this app and it's almost perfect! Sometimes I run into issues when I experience a time change (for travel or daylight savings), and I would love an option to record a ketone measurement. Other than those, I'm so grateful that this app helps me keep track of my son's complicated medication schedule!

Honestly, this is a life saver! I was losing track of all the meds i was taking, missing out numerous doses and occasionally taking medication twice by accident! This app allows me to add all my medication (and give it an icon that actually looks like the tabley/inhaler/etc) and set up reminders for each day. The great thing is that if I'm in the middle of something and can't take my meds there and then, I can "snooze" the reminder to go off in 5/10/15+ minutes! Fantastic app :-)

This was a good app on my last phone but on my new phone it's very unreliable. Customer support sorted out my problems last time but now it's missing reminders again and I've changed nothing. It's happening every few days. I think the recent update killed it. I've never encountered a more troublesome app, ever! I'm now looking for another medication tracker as these problems seem to be more trouble than they're worth. EDIT: Rating lowered to 2 stars due to app breaking again after another bad update and customer support not responding for 17 days. I've resorted to using my bedside alarm clock and a paper note for guaranteed reminders. EDIT2: I did contact customer support. You choose to not respond. I'm not going to beg for help. Sort your app out. 20 people agree with me so far.

Reminds me when to take my meds and every week it lets me know how often I have missed them. If I miss my meds I am asked a multiple choice question of why. At the end of the week I am able to see why I miss my meds so I have insight on how to fix the situation. This app is better than I expected, although it could be a tad more user friendly.

I found a few glitches here and there but this app is very well done if you're somebody like me who has several serious medical conditions requiring medications at different times a day and you'd like to track on the effectiveness of such medication highly recommend this app. The designers and developers really did put the user in the driver's seat. There is still some work that could be done however I'm extremely impressed and I use this app every day multiple times a day. I love it.

comments: This app is still ridiculous when it comes to making or receiving calls so I have resorted to using it only for texting. The texting service is also still incredibly slow- taking up to a minute. Yes, I know 1 minute is not a very long time... But when you need to see messages immediately and instead you're left staring at a screen yelling "come on already!!" It sucks.

The calling feature isn't great. I tried to use the minutes it gave me for free, but I couldn't get the speakerphone to come on, nor could I hear it ringing on the regular headset when I held it to my ear. The texts sometimes get sent in pieces missing half or more of the message which makes conversations hard to have with the people you're trying to get ahold of or speak with. Frustrating. But I like the layout of the app, it's visually pleasing, & there are plenty of great numbers to choose!

It used to be great, now it pops up ads every time you go back or try to click a different conversation. And on top of that it is horribly slow now. Edit: if you rely off ads to make money why am I paying you for minutes? This app used to run slick but now it is a chore to use and now every 1 out of 3 calls now I have to restart my phone cause it locks in the call and I can't end it cause it is loading an ad.

This app is okay for what it is. It has its problems. Sometimes it will drop a call, the person your talking to said it sounds like I am under water, I have fool signal and strong Wi-Fi and it cuts in and out like you have poor signal. Over all for a free app to make free calls it is manageable. Keep the app up to date it will get better. Thanks Textfree for the free app!

So far so good..update hey thanks pinger..yes without your professional services some could be in an emergency so this is very vital to have as I do use this as a backup ...text works great !! One time my phone went out of service and this worked wonderfully ‚ù§Ô∏è I think if I lose my phone that this is here as a safety net and I add money to this asap üòâ ..&goes along way ...for those whom need to know more I use this on phone & my 2tablets & pc has no carrier except textfree thank you so much.

title: Bumble ‚Äì Dating, Make New Friends & Business
description:
Welcome to Bumble, the app where women make the first move ü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

More than 100 million boos have registered on Bumble to create meaningful relationships, find online friends and make purposeful connections. Bumble is a dating app that allows you to make new connections, whether you‚Äôre looking for a partner in crime, a new friend to complete your group Halloween costume, or to expand your professional network spooky fast. 

Making the first move on Bumble could change your life! 

DISCOVER OUR AMAZING FEATURES
- Top Filters: Find your right date or next BFF and get an unforgettable first online encounter
- SuperSwipe: See someone you really like? Send a SuperSwipe to get their attention
- Spotlight: Get more visibility by putting yourself at the top of the stack for 30 minutes
- Travel: Match with amazing people around the world without leaving your home


CHANGING THE RULES OF THE GAME
Continue to enjoy dating as you‚Äôve always done, finding love or friends is as easy as pie on Bumble, but women always make the first move.

- Bumble is a free dating app to download and use based on respect, equality and inclusion
- On Heterosexual matches, women have 24h to start a chat and men have 24h to respond 
- Other matches have 24h to start a chat or reply before the match expires (We promise that no one turns into a pumpkin after the match expires üéÉ)
- We offer the possibility to meet people in different fields with our 3 modes, Date, BFF and Bizz


WE‚ÄôRE NOT JUST FOR DATING ANYMORE
We‚Äôre the first app that combines the possibility to date, flirt or find your new boyfriend or girlfriend, meet new friends and make professional connections in one single app.

- Use Video Chat to make or respond to a first move and to know your matches better
- Send your videos and favourite pictures while you are chatting with new people
- Hide your profile with the Snooze Mode for as long as you want (you‚Äôll still keep all your matches, because no one likes a ghost üëª)
- Link your Spotify and Instagram account to make friends and get more dates


BOOST YOUR DATES THIS HALLOWEEN WITH PREMIUM
-  See everyone who has right-swiped you (your Beeline)
-  Extend your matches by 24 hours
-  Rematch with expired connections
-  Unlock SuperSwipe, Spotlight and Travel to make the most of your profile


THE BUZZ IS REAL
Bumble is much more than just a dating app, enter the truly inclusive dating community, discover single people who are looking for the same thing as you and find that ideal partner who will make you swoon. This is our commitment to our core values:

- We believe healthy relationships are fundamental to living a productive and positive life.
- We fight against old-fashioned heterosexual relationship habits, women always take the first step. 
- We've reformed the rules of the game to change the dynamics of dating. 



---
Bumble is free to download and use and always will be! However, we also offer an optional subscription package (Bumble Boost) and non-subscription, single and multi-use paid features (BumbleCoins).

https://bumble.com/en/privacy
https://bumble.com/en/terms

comments: Filters don't work at all when you set them (ex height, distance, etc.) After a few swipes, you're not allowed to swipe for the day. This app is annoying and needs to be updated as it has a lot of potential! I don't even know how many right swipes I get! I am told that there are no matches but then when I close the app, and open it in half an hour, then I have more matches. There are so many limitations to the app. I never get notifications on my Android phone even though the settings are fine

I think bumble is terrific. It's best feature is the profiles, which have long been great at encouraging users to build something that says a bit more about them. The quick facts allow a good cross-section of a person, while the questions encourage them to open up without authoring a long profile. The 24 hour limit also applies just enough pressure to give those early conversations momentum, while letting go of connections that weren't quite there, to encourage people to find something stronger.

My dating experience on here is very satisfying, I like how the app works. However, I have issues with receiving notifications, even when turning off battery saver or putting high priority from my phone settings. And also, please PLEASE don't send a notification to all my matches when my snooze is over, or at least let me choose whether I want to send the notification or not. It's very embarrassing for me.

80% of my matches never send that first message and when you do get one and reply, its like they deleted the app altogether. Basically any match will most likely waste your time and thoughts. The app would make more sense if it was called "dream crusher" or "crush crusher". And the truth is girls are even worse at messaging first so youre system right now just doesnt work!! And not worth a penny.

Account blocked for no reason given!!...avoid this app at all costs. I've had zero success on this app since April 2020 in comparison to others. I refuse to pay for any dating service long term and I've used the premium once. I went to check this morning and my account is blocked. There are no options to appeal nor are there any options to contact for the reason in doing so. Does the 'freedom of information act' not permit you to share with me the reasons for this action to be taken?

- Search Tenor‚Äôs millions of GIFs and videos to find the one that perfectly fits your moment. You can also search by emoji.
- Need inspiration? Browse by category like reactions, trending topics, and more.

Developers -- interested in integrating Tenor GIF Search into your apps, services, or websites? Visit tenor.co/gifapi to get your API Key.

Tenor was formerly known as Riffsy.
summary: Say more with GIF Keyboard by Tenor. Add tone to your conversation.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and other improvements.
comments: I think this is fun, however, it is called gif keyboard and does not function as such on my device. I got this app by recommendation by someone who uses it as a keyboard, and when I downloaded it no such option occurred for me. That does limit my ability to use the app. Very frustrating. That being said, this app does provide access to a better selection of gifs and more ways to use them. Cool app.

As soon as app is opened I get "Internet service is lost" every time despite my service is fine; can't seem to create or access an account. After seeing that these are known issues for at least 5 months, I lowered the rating. Clearly the developer has stopped supporting it.

Every time i open this app it says there is no internet connection....but at the same time my youtube and messenger is running very fine....without connection issues....please fix this....iam sorry i had to give you 3 stars otherwise i would've given you guys 5 on 5.

It worked well initial few days, but now I can't upload my own created gifs on Tenor, if I try to upload 5-6 gifs, after loading ,it only upload 1-2 gifs, sometimes even not a single gif is being uploaded. Please fix this issue.
Although the the GIF are fun ability to use some of my functions to use on my device are not usable such as deleting one one messenger if the wrong one is used. That is really frustrating üò§

How do you say use this app over and over and change app doesn't even look the same it doesn't mean go to the group reading and it's just a bad out it won't even accept my passwords

I Use this app/service to keep in touch with my two young children on their Tablets using my Phone while I'm away to work, etc. It's honestly been considerably hassle-free, and reliably dependable. I would be lying to say that I wasn't a bit Grateful that it's aroud/available.

Was asked to test this app and I can't even sign in with my email ( originally set up).. stating my email address does not exist!? Or when I use my phone # it says it's Spam?!!!! When I write the Devs here I even get a server error from Google! -100*s in my book!
love video chat with family far away. and my kids too... and there's like every once in a while there's like a high-pitch static noise thank you

title: APUS Message Center‚ÄîIntelligent management
description:
APUS Message Center is one of the best free unified messenger app for android. It helps unify and manage all messages from SMS, WhatsApp, Gmail and 3rd party apps. It includes message management, notification mamagement, contact manager, dialer and call log. It will completely bring you a fuss-free experience. 

You can not only manage all kinds of messages (SMS, WhatsApp, Gmail, Yahoo mail, and 3rd party apps), but also find your contacts easily and make a phone call or view your call log in the new APUS Message Center. You only need this one application to grasp all the necessary functions. 

If you are always jumping between SMS, WhatsAppp, Facebook Messenger, etc. Please try APUS Message Center right now! APUS Message Center brings you a more intelligent, easier and smarter experience. 

Key FeaturesÔºö


‚ñ∑Message Management (Support Dual SIM) 

APUS Message Center provides not only free text service such as SMS, WhatsApp, Facebook and instant messages but also email apps such as Gmail. APUS Message Center fully supports dual SIM devices for SMS, so you won‚Äôt miss any important messages. And it is also easy to search for contacts and message texts from dual SIM card. 

‚ñ∑Contact Manager

In APUS Message Center, you can find one contact‚Äôs multiple social information and connect with them by dragging to the app you want. Eg. SMS, Dialer, Line, WeChat, WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber, etc. 
‚ñ∑Notification Management 

APUS Message Center also provides notification manager.It will clean your unimprortant notifications from your notification bar and help you get rid of messy notifications. 

‚ñ∑Phone Calling

After you check a missed call or chatting with someone, you can directly make a phone call and view your call log in APUS Message Center. 

‚ñ∑Group Messaging

Tired for your orderless notification bar? Try APUS Message Center now, you can check any notification (Gmail, WeChat, WhatsApp, Skype, Facebook messenger, instant messaging, etc ) you want by using APUS Message Center. It will always organize your important messages so that you can read more simply and conveniently find all notifications at one stop any time. 

‚ñ∑Quick Reply

When there is a new message from SMS or WhatsApp, a message bubble will pop up to remind you to view the notification. Then you can read and reply messages of SMS and WhatsApp from pop-up notification bubble, without exiting the current app, and quick reply the message directly. 

‚ñ∑Regular Reminder for Messages 

Notification bar will push so many notifications everyday, what if you miss some important messages? Don‚Äôt worry, APUS Message Center always reminds you about the messages from these app: Messages, Call, WeChat, Gmail,  WhatsApp, Facebook messenger, Twitter, Snapchat, Skype,  Tinder and so on. 

You‚Äôll never miss important calls or unread messages (SMS, Gmail, Yahoo mail, social media apps notification)! 

‚ñ∑Easy Search

Within just one second, you can find notifications, Messages, SMS, Contacts, Calls, email (such as Yahoo mail and Gmail) without fuss by entering keywords. All messages and contacts are collected in one app. 

APUS Message Center is an intelligent, simple, easy and fast messenger and message management tool for android, comes with collecting all messages, such as SMS and 3rd party apps messages. You can enjoy contact manager, phone calling, regular notifications, dual sim support, quick reply, group messages. 

The conversation apps currently supported by APUS Message Center include but not limited: WhatsApp, Hike, Facebook, Facebook Messenger, Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat, Wechat, QQ, Skype, LinkedIn, Imo, Kakao, VK, Tinder, Yandex mail, Hangouts and more. 

Contact usÔºö
- Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/APUSGROUP
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/apusgroup
- Mail: apusmsgcenter@gmail.com
- Official website: http://www.apusapps.com

title: My Story: Choose Your Own Path
description:
üéâ Choose hours of fun with My Story: Choose Your Own Path! üéâ

This interactive storytelling game allows you to make your own decisions and impact the story with your choices. Whether you enjoy drama, romance, comedy or fantasy, in My Story, you are the one that gets to control what happens next. 

Choose a story genre and experience amazing adventures in the world of My Story! Choose a story and let the entertainment begin! Whatever you want to do, you can. 

üíÑRoleplay as a young fashion icon in Model Undercover and make important decisions for her career; take part in a dating show and find a perfect match in Who Wants to Marry Miss Larson?; or just go for some good old high school drama in our famous story, Love, Mona. üíÑ

My Story library offers a variety of fun stories! The choice of genre and story is entirely yours, but the fun is guaranteed!

‚ùóMake important decisions and change the narrative. In this fun interactive game, you can choose your own path and change the course of the story. The outcome of future chapters is entirely in your hands. Who will you choose to trust in Mortal Frenemy? How will you handle your magical new life in The Bitten Ones? Do your best to avoid the drama, or choose to confront anyone that stands in your way‚Ä¶ 
Why wait a week for the next episode of a TV series when you can find quality entertainment right here? ‚ùó

üíïStep up your dating game and control what happens in your love life. Dress up in an outfit that will impress your crush and maybe even get you a date. 
Romance is everywhere in My Story ‚Äì from high school crushes in Dear Mona to adult relationship drama in Bad Judgement. Go all out and spice up your love life with some seductive lingerie. Choose the most romantic path, create unforgettable moments with your favorite characters, and enjoy your love story!üíï

üíÉLooking for a book series that will give you more fun moments? You will love the Mona series! 
‚Ä¢	Start with Dear Mona ‚Äì After your first love story finishes mere moments after it started, you are left heartbroken. Few years later, you find yourself falling in love with Shawn, a bad boy with a good heart. However, when your old love returns, you need to make some difficult choices. How will your love story end?
‚Ä¢	After Dear Mona, make your way through the chapters of Love, Mona ‚Äì Follow Mona‚Äôs story from her high school days to adulthood. Navigate through teen crushes, enjoy the college parties, have adventures in Europe and much more. Enjoy the romance, live through the drama, and, in the most difficult moments, help Mona make her decisions. üíÉ

üíå For more intriguing love stories, check out Forbidden Fruit and The Billionaire‚Äôs Darling. 
‚Ä¢	Forbidden Fruit ‚Äì A night out is just what you needed to get your mind off of college, and that good-looking guy by the bar will make it even better. Too bad he‚Äôs your chemistry professor‚Ä¶ What will your decision be? Will you choose to pursue a romance with him or will you find another guy to date? How will you handle the drama that comes with dating your college professor? It‚Äôs really quite an unconventional love story‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢	The Billionaire‚Äôs Darling ‚Äì A handsome billionaire has his eye on you, a simple college girl? Sounds like every girl‚Äôs fantasy. But, when he makes you a strange offer, what path will you choose? And, what will happen when your fake romance starts turning into a real love story? Will you and Henry get through the drama and maintain your love for each other? üíå
 
My Story: Choose Your Own Path is constantly working on producing the most thrilling stories, getting the best authors on board, and creating an unforgettable reading experience for each reader. Our library has a story for every reader. 

Download My Story: Choose Your Own Path, and start shaping your own story!

summary: Welcome to MY STORY, a game where you write your life!
recentChanges:
My Story has a new update! We added some game improvements as well as other fun new content.
Thank you for downloading and we hope you‚Äôll have fun playing My Story!
comments: Ok...i tried it...it is nice but when i was playing it I felt like something was wrong...then I knew what it was.The everything is too expensive. If we have to make a choice it's like 15 gems but when the chapter is complete we get only 1.I respect that you worked hard on this (maybe because I am 10 years old)but i would appreciate it if you could improve it. Thanks for the game btw.I think it was worth giving 4 stars. Thanks for the game!!!

Stories seem like they could be fun if you had a lot of money to spend on buying diamonds. Every important decision only has one free option. There is only one or MAYBE two free outfits and then all the characters complain. I appreciate the work that went into the game but seriously? And I find every game similar to this one is the same. Honestly, even though I am curious and would like to, I am not even going to finish the first "book".

This would be great if you made it worth our time. Your cost on diamonds for reading a chapter is absurd. Maybe 10 diamonds for every chapter read. Get with the times. I'm sure there are other apps similar that probably are way better. Which I'm going to go find because you can only have the story go one way. Maybe bring down the cost of the outfits. Make it worth our time. This app is a disappointment based on that.

I like this game alot! It is really entertaining to read. I always read the stories at night cause it is better to me! U can pick from criminal, crime, romantic, comedy, and many more sections of books that u want!! There is only one problem to me and that is whenever u download it, it let's u pick ur clothes out, I feel like we shouldnt have to waist our diamonds on the first pick if clothes for what u select. It is my opinion. But besides that, the game is really fun and good!! Hope this help!

I love this game with all my heart it is so fun and interesting, it uplift my moods I really enjoy it as we know the is a but in every story, my only problem is that the story demands more diamonds and in the end of every chapter we get 1 diamond. It takes lots of time to get another ticket, 1 hour is a lot for one ticket of a wonderful story. Lastly the ADs, the story demands more data but some of us cant afford to spend more data in every ADs. Thank you for the wonderful stories

title: Light-It Up
description:
Warning: this game WILL hook you - jumping games have never been so awesomely addictive. 
It‚Äôs a dark world out there for a teeny little stickman like you, and it‚Äôs about time you light-it up and make the colors glow. 

Swing, jump, flip and slide your stickman body from one neon color shape to another to make them glow and light-it up. 

Collect stars as you swing, jump and flip to raise your score, in the funnest of all jumping games. 

Just when you start to feel like a stickman boss and are loving that color glow, things get complicated (or ‚Äústicky,‚Äù if you will) as you jump, flip and pass levels. Color shapes start moving, rotating and even exploding, and lethal spikes become a constant threat to your poor little stickman life.

If you miss a jump, if your swing‚Äôs a dud, if your flip isn‚Äôt on point, or if you hit a spike‚Ä¶ you fall into oblivion!

So what do you say, stickman? Ready to swing, jump, flip, light-it up and glow, in the brightest of all jumping games?

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app

developerAddress: 24 Raul Wallenberg, Ziv towers, Building D, Tel Aviv, Israel, 6971924
recentChanges: Bug fixes for smoother playing
comments: It's decent. Good balance between being too difficult amd not difficult enough. The major problem is that once you hit lvl 50 the ads get to the point where you could probably sue for harassment. Lol, jk. Before lvl 50 there are ads bout every 3 or 4 tries. Reasonable. But after 50 its an ad after every single attempt which has led me to delete it.

Really cool concept, easy to learn, and relaxing even on difficult levels, however, I'm not giving 5 stars for 2 reasons, and I really hope the developers listen to me on this. TOO many ads, I have to turn off my internet because I can't even skip the "Retry?" screen, and there is an ad literally after every death. I understand that there's a profit to be made, and there's VIP, but tone it down a little, it crashes the experience. The other one is a suggestion: An endless mode, think about it

Very fun and addictive. Very pleasing visuals. The ads on the free are not too frequent. A fair and good balance of them. There is no one off as free option and the weekly fee is a little excessive. Would be 5 star if there was an option to remove ads for a one off fee and they can keep the weekly for the other parts of they want.

is literally this is literally the fun ever and plus when you pick new skins are the superheroes and when I play I pretend to be a superhero because I get to jump and go on top of the ships that light up and it is so fun this is like the funnest game I've ever done thank you so much for making this game one point about the ads it's really great at but sometimes every time I'm done with around it is starts an atom you're actually like 20 or five a bunch of seconds and I'm kind of annoyed.

The gameplay is simple but enjoyable but the adds are unbearable. Full screen video adds between each short level with sound that interrupts Bluetooth streamed audio. The juice just isn't worth the squeeze.

title: Choices: Stories You Play
description:
One choice can change everything! With romance, drama, horror and more, Choices has the best collection of story games in the world!
‚ú¶ Customize your main character
‚ú¶ Fall in love, solve crimes and embark on epic fantasy adventures
‚ú¶ Pick your story from our constantly growing library with weekly chapter updates
‚ú¶ Control what happens next in immersive visual stories!

Current stories include:

‚ùñ THE FRESHMAN - Welcome to Hartfeld University! In this college drama, you‚Äôll make new friends for life and find true love romancing your schoolmates. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress your character in fashion-forward outfits for events like a sorority rush.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.

‚ùñ THE CROWN & THE FLAME - Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown! Assume the role of the hero in this interactive narrative adventure.

- Form alliances and relationships to build your army.
- Dress in elegant fashions and powerful armor.
- Crush enemies in an epic battle!

‚ùñ PERFECT MATCH - Sign up for the high-tech matchmaking services of Eros Incorporated, and master the dating game! Create your look, meet your perfect match, and fall in love in this thrilling mystery story!

- Customize your date to be your perfect match.
- Roleplay as a guy or a girl.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won‚Äôt see coming!

You might also love:

‚ùñ BLOODBOUND - You're applying for a job with brilliant CEO billionaire Adrian Raines. Urban fantasy meets romance in this sexy vampire thriller!

‚ùñ HIGH SCHOOL STORY - It's your first day at a new high school! Make friends, find love, and attend the Homecoming dance. Relive your teen years in your very own High School Story!

...PLUS more new stories and chapters EACH WEEK!

FOLLOW CHOICES:
facebook.com/ChoicesStoriesYouPlay
twitter.com/playchoices
instagram.com/choicesgame

Choices is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. You may limit the ability to make in-app purchases by creating a PIN in the Settings menu from within the Google Play Store.

PRIVACY POLICY & TERMS OF SERVICE
- Please read our privacy policy at http://www.pixelberrystudios.com/choices-privacy-policy/
- By playing Choices, you agree to our terms of service http://www.pixelberrystudios.com/choices-terms-of-service

ABOUT US

Choices is from the team that has been bringing you narrative games for over a decade. We created the top 25 hit games, Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA. After leaving EA, our team regrouped as Pixelberry in a small office, set out to continue creating story driven games with heart and launched the two interactive hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we‚Äôve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

Stay tuned for more new interactive story games to pick from in Choices!

- The Pixelberry Team

- Form alliances and relationships to build your army.
- Dress in elegant fashions and powerful armor.
- Crush enemies in an epic battle!

‚ùñ PERFECT MATCH - Sign up for the high-tech matchmaking services of Eros Incorporated, and master the dating game! Create your look, meet your perfect match, and fall in love in this thrilling mystery story!

- Customize your date to be your perfect match.
- Roleplay as a guy or a girl.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won‚Äôt see coming!

You might also love:

‚ùñ BLOODBOUND - You're applying for a job with brilliant CEO billionaire Adrian Raines. Urban fantasy meets romance in this sexy vampire thriller!

‚ùñ HIGH SCHOOL STORY - It's your first day at a new high school! Make friends, find love, and attend the Homecoming dance. Relive your teen years in your very own High School Story!

...PLUS more new stories and chapters EACH WEEK!

FOLLOW CHOICES:
facebook.com/ChoicesStoriesYouPlay
twitter.com/playchoices
instagram.com/choicesgame

Choices is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. You may limit the ability to make in-app purchases by creating a PIN in the Settings menu from within the Google Play Store.

PRIVACY POLICY & TERMS OF SERVICE
- Please read our privacy policy at http://www.pixelberrystudios.com/choices-privacy-policy/
- By playing Choices, you agree to our terms of service http://www.pixelberrystudios.com/choices-terms-of-service

ABOUT US

Choices is from the team that has been bringing you narrative games for over a decade. We created the top 25 hit games, Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA. After leaving EA, our team regrouped as Pixelberry in a small office, set out to continue creating story driven games with heart and launched the two interactive hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we‚Äôve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

Stay tuned for more new interactive story games to pick from in Choices!

- The Pixelberry Team

recentChanges:

comments: The stories are really good, and the charater designs look nice. The only thing is I wish there were no gem choices. It makes it hard to play the game the way you want, and the only way to get them is from reading chapters or ads. I can eventually get enough for some choices but it takes a while. The VIP subscription is really expensive too. Still, it's a good game with no pop up ads, And therr are a lot of different stories of many genres to choose from!

Everything about this game is great ‚Äî the stories, the characters, the graphics, the music. But I am giving it two stars because the pricing model is terrible. Each chapter of each book typically contains three premium choices which tend to cost 15+ "diamonds" each. The only effective way to get diamonds is to spend actual cash ‚Äî even if you pay the $15 a month for VIP, you get only 10 additional diamonds a day. VIPs don't even get a discount on diamond packages. Sad.

I love this game, but the only problem is when it comes to keys and gems. When you don't wanna pay for these things you end up having to wait FOREVER for them to re-gen. I see a way to fix this as being able to re-gen 5 keys instead of just 2, or make the keys re-gen faster. For the gems maybe they could give out 5 gems every 12 or so hours instead of 24. Overall the game is great, and these are the only problems I have with it.

It is a fun game just costs too much to be able to make the good choices. Should have more options available at least for the closet without having to use so many. Should be more ways to get more free diamonds or make the choices with having to use less of them. There should be way more options to get way more diamonds especially for VIPs. But no there isn't. Everything costs. Or you have to wait forever to build up enough diamonds to even finish a chapter. Not right.

This game is addictive. I loved it very much but the Graphics are blurry when it comes to the real part of love making. The developers should work on it and make the conversation more lengthy and seductive instead of going directly to love making. Moreover, the sound effects and music needs improvement by adding moaning, crying and laughing and ecstasy sounds to the game so that one should feel he/she is actually itself a character and not a spectator. 18 plus version is also needs to be added.

title: Word Cookies!¬Æ
description:
üç™ Here come some tasty Word Cookies hot out of the oven! Take a bite! üç™ 
Word Cookies is an addictive cross between all the word games you love! With so many exciting challenges, you'll soon be obsessed with testing your spelling and vocabulary limits to make as many words as you can!

HOW TO PLAY

‚Ä¢ Fill up Jack's cookie jar with extra words you find to earn coins!

SPECIAL FEATURES

comments: Great game. Very suspicious when routinely you get to the third level of tournament play and tend to always lose by approximately 200 points. This is especially if you are not choosing to watch the videos. Another concern is the daily wheel- and this is not just an issue I noticed- you never get more than 20 coins no matter what. How many sections are there on the wheel? 8, 10? odds would make it so you would land on each piece every 8 to 10 days.you wouldn't go a year without getting over 20

This is not a bad word game. But I wonder why I have never ever on the wheel spun and stopped on the 50 coins?!!!! ALWAYS the SMALL ones.....5, 10, 1 or whatever that very small one is!! I've been playing long enough to have at least once or twice stopped on something LARGE!! And pls don't tell me it's according to how I spin. Is there something you can do re this? Thank you.... Barbara Felton

The game is very addictive and fun to play. I love how it gives you so many things to do so you never get bored! For example: There's quests, special events, league, levels and daily levels. But what's unique about this ios game is that their's barely any ads! Overall, I think this game is very fun and I recommend you install it if you have'nt already.

We have played the game for years, and do enjoy the challenges. Sometimes you have words that no one in normal life would recognize, but that's where good ol' phonics comes in. But why, recently, have you changed the daily spin rewards to only 10 or 15 coins ( with a rare hint or a 20)? I've seen others comment on this, and a promise to look into it, but it doesn't seem to be getting back to the old way.

I love the game BUT lately it stalls when ads pop-up and they will not go away eventho I allow them to play out. I have uninstalled several times and reinstalled to no avail. Most of the ads are USELESS to me as I am retired, will not be starting a business and/or cannot use a RX card because I have Medicare Advantage insurance. Very irritating! 10/29/2020 UPDATE: New tablet and can now play the game with no problems. Highly recommend.

title: Eve Period Tracker - Love, Sex & Relationships App
description:
Eve is the TOP FREE period tracker & ovulation tracker app with love, sex & relationships tips. Join the Eve community to make friends and learn more about birth control, sex, pregnancy, period and ovulation tips. 

SEX & HEALTH UNLOCKED
+ Keep track of sex, moods & PMS symptoms.
+ Quick, elegant logging at any time of day or night.
+ See your health data and PMS symptoms visualized in beautiful charts.
+ Identify trends and patterns unique to your body.
+ Daily gem delivers insights, cyclescopes, quizzes, and fascinating women‚Äôs health topics every day.

INTERACTIVE PERIOD & CYCLE TRACKING
+ Fast, fun period tracker
+ Forecast your ovulation and fertility with period tracker predictions that get smarter over time.
+ Review past periods, menstrual cycles, PMS symptoms and ovulation dates. Girl, it‚Äôs time to better understand your cycle & fertility!
+ Calendar views on period tracker show your next fertile window, ovulation day, upcoming period.

EPIC COMMUNITY
+ Community forum provides an extended friend group of girls down to discuss sex, PMS, and other women‚Äôs health topics.
+ Trusted information about birth control & sex, powered by Bedsider.
+ Ask the community anything--nothing is off limits! Girl Power!
+ Learn from other women who have been there before.

Eve was named the Most Innovative App 2016 by Google Play, the Winner of 2016 Webby for Health & Fitness, and a proud partner of Bedsider.org.

comments: It's really frustrating to look at the dial that tracks your fertility. Sometimes I want to look ahead to see when it will be at its peak or I know my husband and I got frisky on a certain day and I want to see what the likelihood of getting pregnant was. Also, now that I am pregnant (clearly the likelihood was pretty high) it would be great if I could pause the cycle tracking. I know there's another app for tracking pregnancy, but it would be great to not have a 9 month period cycle on Eve.

I changed to Eve because I was using Glow just to track my period these days but I'm a bit disappointed. The app looks nice icons and layout but it's a bit confusing (like where do I find my daily logs?!) and I feel like Eve is 80% locked unless you are a premium user ü•≤

I only use it to track my period/what cycle day I'm on and I've never had an issue with that part. What I would like to see an improvement in: 1.) Less gendered language throughout the app. Not everyone who has a period is a woman and/or likes being referred to as "lady" or "girl". 2.) Cut out the patronising, outdated and frankly gimmicky comments about my cycle. I would much rather have an informative, comprehensive look at it, which takes into account that not everyone is the same.
Sadly none of the moods and symptoms I logged in Glow apps is available in this app. Would consider switching, but don't want to loose all the data.

I use to really like this app. You could log everything and see all your stats. Now you have to pay to get most of that. Also the community use to be very supportive. Now it's negativity, hate, and women tearing women or men down. After seeing racism was accepted on this app I will now be deleting the app and won't be returning.

comments: Change the distribution of the ads. Big block up front and, less ads in the middle. This layout is just really disruptive. If the app were glitch free it would be more acceptable but, it's full of bugs ON TOP of all these disruptive ads. I keep getting a buble notice about an "Error Changing Position."

Does not work. They wont let me sign up. I want to be a member, but it just keeps saying "we cannot create an account for you at this time." I even read and agreed to the terms and conditions of the app and they still wont let me. Also, when I try to play a movie, the ads are endless. And when they end, it's just a screen with the crackle logo. I would rate this -1/5 stars if there was an option to do that. Plz do not install. Download Tubi or Pluto instead.

This has to be the most bug filled app I've ever downloaded. There's actually some good content on here but actually being able to watch it after casting to the TV is near impossible. It often will start playing shows that are next to the one you click on and after ads will frequently restart the episodes.

Note to Samsung TV users: Do not DOWNLOAD the app! Please use smart view through your phone instead... You will have little or no freezing.... Downloading the app to your set, you will experience freezing (and a lot of it)!
Nice to have access to the content, but ad times a long AND if you pause at any point, it revert to the last Ad and replays all of them.

title: News Break: Local Breaking Stories & US Headlines
description:
Local headlines and breaking news ‚Äì get your local news, crime updates,  results and coverage, sports updates and U.S. headlines straight to your phone, with News Break.

Connect with your local community and follow U.S. headlines such as the local news, sports events, lifestyle stories, and even crime updates and traffic. News Break is personalized to your interests, likes and dislikes, so you‚Äôll always get relevant stories that really matter to you.

News Break helps people live safer, more vibrant, more truly connected lives. Whether it‚Äôs your local sports team, lifestyle tips, local headlines, breaking stories, U.S. news and updates ‚Äì you can access local, relevant stories and world news with just a tap.

U.S. News and Highlights

‚Ä¢ Get a curated daily brief focused on breaking stories, the U.S, local headlines, crime updates, traffic, events, sports updates and more U.S. news and local updates
‚Ä¢ Our intelligent local news platform aggregates rich, relevant stories from more than 10,000 trusted news outlets across the U.S.
‚Ä¢ Breaking news - be the first to know about breaking local news, U.S. headlines, world news and local updates

Local Updates: Know Your Town

‚Ä¢ Find local restaurants, local events, shop openings, traffic, breaking stories, and more ‚Äì all in a single app!
‚Ä¢ Read unique perspectives and personal stories from local writers and content creators
‚Ä¢ U.S. headlines, sports updates, lifestyle stories and local events - focus on the incredible things that are happening right where you live and work!

News Commentary: Express Yourself

‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt just read the news, discuss it with other News Break readers!
‚Ä¢ News Break welcomes all respectful perspectives and points of view

Support the Cause

‚Ä¢ News Break is working hard to revive the local-news ecosystem by supporting small publishers around the U.S.
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôre activating legions of local bloggers and content creators ‚Äì people just like you ‚Äì that have important things to say about their communities. Join in and share your views & news!

What are you waiting for? Download News Break today and start living a safer, more vibrant, more connected life through the power of local news, U.S. news and information!

Your place for local updates, breaking stories and world news. News Break ‚Äì Better Informed, Better Life.

comments: It's a pretty nice app. Loads of information and tons of links. The guys are great. If they run across something that you like, they will email you or text ya. They we're just letting me know about Tom's Place. It's really good too. Kinda slow at times but it's not bad. I would definitely recommend üòä this app.

I am tired of this app crashing, repeatedly. I will be in the middle of an interesting article and the app closes and restarts. I even deleted it and reloaded it and it still happens. To make things worse, I can't always find the article I was reading again. Annoying. Update...Still happening. Still annoyed.

it is a nice site- if you're into everything - I initially downloaded for my breaking neighborhood news - tried to adjust the notifications level to no avail - it resets itself for push, for local, for comments. it slowly started to take up my whole screen with updates on the same story, with nothing new to report on. I had to uninstall. :( updated 10/31 - app send emails only now :) it seems as though it has improved and I look forward to reading the articles now.

I've been using News break for about a year now, and it's been informative and accurate in relating the news. I like this app mainly because if it's wide variety of topics and interest pieces. My news etc. is ALWAYS just a few inches from me. I don't have to go buy a newspaper for almost $2.00 everyday. I feel I get the news I need to keep me up to date between this app and watching Action news a couple times a day.

The developer needs to work on this site!!! They do not respond back, or even care about issues. It freezes up and sometimes takes 30 minutes to as you to "stop"/"wait" or "close out" by that time you are other places. They load too many ads for the screens and ones that take over the whole screen where you can not close out of,you have to leave the app, and come back never to read the article you were trying. The ADs do not format to fit the page right. I need more space here to address issues

title: Textra SMS
description:
Want a beautiful, super fast and highly customizable alternative to your stock Android messaging app?

Well today is your day. Textra is simply outstanding!

Comes with a bunch of great features, notably 180+ material design theme, bubble & app icon colors. Dark, light & auto-night modes, multiple bubble styles, scheduled (future) SMS & MMS, stop during send, slide to delete, slide to call, quick snap camera, multi-select picture gallery, quick reply SMS popup, awesome MMS GROUP messaging, quick voice memos, GIFs, 21 text sizes, message blocker / blocklisting, pin-to-top, automatic video & picture compression, plus heaps more!

Customize your preferred theme & bubble colors, signatures and notifications (icon shape, LED color, sound, vibration, privacy, reminders and muting) PER CONTACT as well.

Get all the latest (3000+) Android, Twitter, Emoji One & iOS style emojis including diversity (skin tone). Just pick your preferred emoji style and express yourself!

NEW: Copy Partial Text inside a bubble, tap a bubble to check out this great new feature!

It's pretty special; try it, tell your friends, shout from the treetops, but most of all enjoy it.

Fully compatible with Pushbullet, MightyText, Android Wear and Android Auto (car) for enhanced notifications and quick reply.

All Textra features are free forever. Occasionally you'll see an ad, or you can choose to make a once only in-app purchase to remove ads forever.

Support, Knowledge Base & Feedback @ https://textra.uservoice.com

Simple. Beautiful. Fast.
