recentChanges: ‚úî Please refer to http://inapp.textra.me/changelog
comments: Hello I enjoy the app and feel it is one of the best out here. However, I would love to see the simple features of being able to: 1. Set the back ground image to an image of my own choosing like you can on Android phone's home screen or lock screen.  2. Allow you to like someone's text in a group chat.  3.  Allow you to add an remove ppl from group chats without having to create a new group.  Thanks

Years after my last review, I still use this app daily. This really is the best messaging app out there. Still doesn't support sending videos, for some weird reason, but it's a solid app, backs up messages directly to the Android message store, allows you to customize the background, foreground, text bubbles, even the app icon. If you're one of those people whose default messenger doesn't let you send you send full-sized images, Textra is the only one I've found that lets me do this.

Textra is the ONLY messenging app I will ever use! It's easy to use. You can customize EVERYTHING. Like the colors you use for every contact. You can set up Textra exactly how YOU want it to be. You can change the ring tones for every contact. There are 3 types of emojis you can use. I use IOS even though I have an Android phone. If you have an idea that you think might make Textra better, send them your idea and they may use it. If you need support-it's there. I love, love, love it!

I have been using textra for years, always loved it, but here within the past day or so, chat heads are now popping up for new message notifications while I'm currently in the middle of messaging someone else. When you click to open the chat head it doesn't allow you to do anything, so you have to drag it to bottom to close it. Please how do I disable this feature, it's unpleasant and unwelcomed.

When switching phones I ended up having trouble sending mms messages. When Textra support was contacted they were prompt in answering and emailed back and forth with me to try and fix the problem. Ultimately it was the cell providers/SIM card that was causing the issue. I have used the app for many years and on several different phones. I will continue to use this app and recommend it to everyone. Thank you for the help and a great app. Special thanx to Mandy and Maxüëçüëç

title: PUBG MOBILE - NEW ERA
description:
The official PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS designed exclusively for mobile. Play free anywhere, anytime. PUBG MOBILE delivers the most intense free-to-play multiplayer action on mobile. Drop in, gear up, and compete. Survive epic 100-player classic battles, payload mode and fast-paced 4v4 team deathmatch and zombie modes. Survival is key and the last one standing wins. When duty calls, fire at will!

FREE ON MOBILE - Powered by the Unreal Engine 4. Play console quality gaming on the go. Delivers jaw-dropping HD graphics and 3D sound. Featuring customizable mobile controls, training modes, and voice chat. Experience the most smooth control and realistic ballistics, weapon behavior on mobile.

MASSIVE BATTLE MAPS - From Erangel to Miramar, Vikendi to Sanhok, compete on these enormous and detailed battlegrounds varying in size, terrain, day/night cycles and dynamic weather ‚Äì from urban city spaces to frozen tundra, to dense jungles, master each battleground's secrets to create your own strategic approach to win. 

DEPTH AND VARIETY ‚Äì From the 100-player classic mode, the exhilarating payload mode to the lightning-fast Arcade and 4v4 Team Deathmatch modes, as well as the intense Zombie modes. There is something for everyone! There is something for everyone. Play Solo, Duo, and in 4-player Squads. Fire your weapon to your heart's content! Be a lone wolf soldier or play with a Clan and answer the duty calls when help is needed! Offers FPS (First-Person Shooter) and TPS (Third-Person Shooter) play, lots of vehicles for all the different terrains in the game and an arsenal of realistic weapons. Find your perfect ride and pieces to cruise towards the final circle! 

ALWAYS GROWING - Daily events & challenges, and monthly updates delivering new gameplay features and modes that keep PUBG MOBILE always growing and expanding. Our powerful and serious anti-cheating mechanisms ensure a fair and balanced gaming environment where everyone plays by the rules.

* Requires a stable internet connection.
* PUBG MOBILE recommended system requirements: Android 5.1.1 or above and at least 2 GB memory. For other devices can try out PUBG MOBILE LITE

Follow us:
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PUBGMOBILE
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PUBGMobile
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/PUBGMobile/
DiscordÔºöhttps://discord.gg/pubgm

Contact our customer service at PUBGMOBILE_CS@tencentgames.com if you have any questions.

summary:
Infection Mode is back!
Danger during Halloweeks!
Cheer Park Arena opens!
recentChanges:
Payload 2.0
- Enjoy the new armed vehicles!
All-new armed vehicles: armed UAZ, Dacia, buggy, and pick-up.
- Dominate enemies from the sky with the Armed AH6 Helicopter, AT4-A laser-guided missile, and M202 four-barreled rocket launcher!
- Take bases and Super Weapon Crates to get heavy weaponry and new items.
New items: UAV controller, man-portable radar, and bomb suit.
- Revive teammates with the advanced Communications Tower to keep fighting!
New exciting gameplay!
comments: Overall, I think this is the best battle royale kind of game I could find and it's because there is no other which has the same resources as PUBG does, congrats on the game, keep the work up! As seen in other reviews, there is indeed a lot of hackers and it looks like your work at banning them is not that efficient, as there are still a lot that don't get banned

I like this game very much but after latest update which was named 'new era' some problems start to happen. for example : location mark doesn't work well and after you mark a location if you rotate the camera it starts to move In addition, some of buttons of actions in game look very blurry. It seems that they have very low amount of quality

Arena, why would you put me in a match when the match is almost done. That is not ok 0 kills 5 seconds into the match, match is over. That's Ludacris, Not cool at all. Give the option to uneqip grenades in arena. Could there be any easier way to upgrade all weapons without spending a fortune. This is not only a game , well maybe it is but it would be so much more enjoyable if one could just buy parts to upgrade instead of randomised luck. Please that would be great.

This is 1 of my favorite games. 1 thing I would like to see is a map that is just 1 big city. With some 2-3-4-5 story buildings. That would be cool. This is a game that I would highly recommend it has good graphics and physics as well it is (mostly) balanced. It is a all around a vary good game. Also can you put the weapons and vehicles from payload 2.0 in the training and cheat park please.

This is an amazing game. Too bad the developers are greedy and selfish. Every season the game gets worse with bugs. Nobody cares to sort out the problems but they expect us to keep using our money. Many modes have continuous problems and customer care will ask the same ridiculous things over and over but do nothing. The game is full of cheaters and hackers. Game is getting more pathetic by the day. Just waiting for another game like this to come out with better support.

title: YouTube Kids
description:
A video app made just for kids
YouTube Kids was created to give kids a more contained environment that makes it simpler and more fun for them to explore on their own, and easier for parents and caregivers to guide their journey as they discover new and exciting interests along the way. Learn more at youtube.com/kids

A safer online experience for kids
We work hard to keep the videos on YouTube Kids family-friendly and use a mix of automated filters built by our engineering teams, human review, and feedback from parents to protect our youngest users online.  But no system is perfect and inappropriate videos can slip through, so we‚Äôre constantly working to improve our safeguards and offer more features to help parents create the right experience for their families.

Customize your child‚Äôs experience with Parental Controls
Limit screen time: Set a time limit for how long your kids can watch and help encourage their transition from watching to doing.
Keep up with what they watch: Simply check the watch it again page and you‚Äôll always know what they‚Äôve watched and the newest interests they‚Äôre exploring.
Blocking: Don‚Äôt like a video? Block the video or whole channel, and never see it again. 
Flagging: You can always alert us to inappropriate content by flagging a video for review. Flagged videos are reviewed 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

Create individual experiences as unique as your kids
Create up to eight kid profiles, each with their own viewing preferences, video recommendations, and settings. Choose from "Approved Content Only" mode or select an age category that fits your child, "Preschool", "Younger", or "Older". 

Select the "Approved Content Only" mode if you want to handpick the videos, channels and/or collections that you‚Äôve approved your child to watch. In this mode, kids won‚Äôt be able to search for videos.The "Preschool" Mode designed for kids 4 and under curates videos that promote creativity, playfulness, learning, and exploration. The "Younger" Mode allows kids 5-7 to explore their interests in a wide variety of topics including songs, cartoons, and crafts. While our "Older" Mode gives kids 8 and up the chance to search and explore additional content such as popular music and gaming videos for kids. 

All kinds of videos for all kinds of kids 
Our library is filled with family-friendly videos on all different topics, igniting your kids‚Äô inner creativity and playfulness. It‚Äôs everything from their favorite shows and music to learning how to build a model volcano (or make slime ;-), and everything in between. 

Other important information:
Parental setup is needed to ensure the best experience possible for your kid.
YouTube Kids contains paid ads in order to offer the app for free. Your kid may also see videos with commercial content from YouTube creators that are not paid ads.The Privacy Notice for Google Accounts managed with Family Link describes our privacy practices when your kid uses YouTube Kids with their Google Account. When your kid uses YouTube Kids without signing into their Google Account, the YouTube Kids Privacy Notice applies.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and stability improvements
comments: A month ago I would have given this app an easy 5 star rating. With this most recent update though, I'm forced to go for a single star for 2 main reasons. About once every 10 mins the video scroll bar at the bottom of the screen just dissappears and goes black, making users unable to change video. Secondly, children are now forced to watch adverts, which are unskippable and interrupts videos. Forcing young children to watch these very frequent adverts is simply unethical and very frustrating.

The 20 second video that auto plays at full volume when opening the app needs to have an option to disable it. Parental controls need to be more fleshed out, there should be an option to limit videos by language and the ability to whitelist particular channels even if they aren't marked for kids. Greater connection with Family Link is needed. Some of the channels that make it into the app aren't kid safe, others that are kid safe can't be viewed in the app. Nice start, needs a lot of work.

Need an option to disable the intro music when app is opening. In fact can we just disable the animation and jump straight to the content? Also, pls allow us parents to create a playlist so we can choose the videos in advance. Now each time I stream via chromecast, I'll have to open the app again to choose a new video when a video ends.

Very good app. Fantastic videos for all ages. Lots of videos that suit My age range 8-12. Only thing I will say is maybe have a wider range of longer videos for they are all like five mins long and I like long vids SOOOOOOO AD MORE LONG VIDS. Other than that what a fantastic app perfect for kids and family of all ages

This app used to keep my son so content until recently. He can't watch any videos because now there are too many ads that keep playing during the videos that my son is trying to watch! The ads are not loading correctly and I'm always forced to close the app and then re-open it only to see more ads trying to load where's now my son can't even watch his videos! It truly defeats the purpose of having this app. If this ad issue doesn't get fixed, I sadly will not use this app again.

title: Snowball.io
description:
The most addictive game with the simplest control ever.
Make a snowball bigger and bump it to opponents to flick them off the play field. 
You can make one giant snowball or a  number of small balls... and you can bump it directly to the opponent or snipe them with it... it is totally up to you.

How to control: swipe to the direction you want to move, and lift your finger to shoot the snowball.

How to control: swipe to the direction you want to move, and lift your finger to shoot the snowball.
summary: Push Off Your Opponents
recentChanges:
* Improved user experience.
* Fixed bugs
comments: The game overall has a pretty original concept, its fun for all ages. It also releives my stress. Theres a few things I dont like but ill give it a 4 star because this is a pretty good game.

Great concept but it would be great if you had two separate skills for two different modes (Solo/Practice, which is the one we have now, and real multiplayer) TL;DR Great game for airplanes, but multiplayer needed.

This app is wonderful!, i play this game after online class and this is a huge relief that i found these games. However there are a couple of fatal flaws, firstly. Ads, ads and ads EVERYWHERE. This is a pet peeve, and i need to turn off my internet just to have peaceful gameplay. Secondly, the bots. Its suprisingly EASY to get past all the stages. Maybe add game modes? Like battle royale mode, a hard mode. Make it challenging once in a while. I don't find this app good or bad, its pretty decent.
I like it, but I got a glitch where you fall in the water and don't die. Fix This! (Son of Claire)

I LOVE THIS GAME. They fixed all the bugs that are in the game. Plus they even have more skins. The only thing is that they make you watch a stupid add. I know i know. You get money bye doing that but come on eith this many adds. But other than that. üòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüôâüôâüôâüôâüôâüôâüôâ

title: Sleep Cycle: Sleep analysis & Smart alarm clock
description:
Relax, sleep better and wake up feeling rested with Sleep Cycle, the smart alarm clock. Track sleep from bedtime to morning, and get detailed analysis with the app that makes waking up in the morning just that bit easier. 

Track sleep using your phone and start your day feeling energized with our intelligent alarm clock and sleep tracker. Its unique design only wakes you up while you‚Äôre in your light sleep phase. Plus, you‚Äôll get detailed reports as Sleep Cycle monitors your sleep patterns, from bedtime until you're waking up. Track sleep and use the data to help you sleep better today! 

‚è∞ Waking up made easy - 5 reasons you‚Äôll love Sleep Cycle:

1. Sleep better with a gentle wake up call - Sleep Cycle‚Äôs alarm clock wakes you up while you‚Äôre in light sleep and is a natural way to start your day.
2. Relax at bedtime and track sleep easily - Learn about your sleep patterns with detailed analysis. 
3. A sleep tracker with a difference - There‚Äôs no phone under your pillow, you can track sleep by placing your device on the nightstand or close by on the floor. 
4. Your health comes first - Your sleep data and reports will help you feel great inside and out. 
5. Sleep better - Relax and let Sleep Cycle analyse your light sleep, deep sleep and overall health.

Relax with a good night‚Äôs sleep that will do wonders for your health. 

Download Sleep Cycle today - waking up in the morning has never been easier! 

Free features

‚àö Sleep analysis with Sleep Cycle patented sound technology, or accelerometer
‚àö Detailed sleep statistics and daily sleep graphs
‚àö Carefully selected alarm melodies
‚àö Snooze by shaking or double tapping the phone lightly
‚àö Customizable wake-up window. From instant (regular alarm clock), up to 90 minutes

Premium features

‚àö Longterm sleep tracker trends
‚àö Compare your sleep data to world sleep statistics ‚Ä¢ Snore trends - view historical snore trends data
‚àö Sleep aid - helps you fall asleep easier
‚àö Sleep notes - see how events such as drinking coffee, stress, working out, or eating late affect your sleep quality
‚àö Wake up mood - see how Sleep Cycle affects your wake up mood
‚àö Online backup - lets you secure your sleep data online
‚àö Export sleep data to Excel for detailed analysis


REQUIREMENTS
Ability to charge your phone by the bed.
Ability to place your phone near the bed, such as on a nightstand table or on the floor.
descriptionHTML:
Relax, sleep better and wake up feeling rested with Sleep Cycle, the smart alarm clock. Track sleep from bedtime to morning, and get detailed analysis with the app that makes waking up in the morning just that bit easier.

Track sleep using your phone and start your day feeling energized with our intelligent alarm clock and sleep tracker. Its unique design only wakes you up while you‚Äôre in your light sleep phase. Plus, you‚Äôll get detailed reports as Sleep Cycle monitors your sleep patterns, from bedtime until you're waking up. Track sleep and use the data to help you sleep better today!

‚è∞ Waking up made easy - 5 reasons you‚Äôll love Sleep Cycle:

1. Sleep better with a gentle wake up call - Sleep Cycle‚Äôs alarm clock wakes you up while you‚Äôre in light sleep and is a natural way to start your day.
2. Relax at bedtime and track sleep easily - Learn about your sleep patterns with detailed analysis.
3. A sleep tracker with a difference - There‚Äôs no phone under your pillow, you can track sleep by placing your device on the nightstand or close by on the floor.
4. Your health comes first - Your sleep data and reports will help you feel great inside and out.
5. Sleep better - Relax and let Sleep Cycle analyse your light sleep, deep sleep and overall health.

Relax with a good night‚Äôs sleep that will do wonders for your health.

Download Sleep Cycle today - waking up in the morning has never been easier!

Free features

‚àö Sleep analysis with Sleep Cycle patented sound technology, or accelerometer
‚àö Detailed sleep statistics and daily sleep graphs
‚àö Carefully selected alarm melodies
‚àö Snooze by shaking or double tapping the phone lightly
‚àö Customizable wake-up window. From instant (regular alarm clock), up to 90 minutes

Premium features

‚àö Longterm sleep tracker trends
‚àö Compare your sleep data to world sleep statistics ‚Ä¢ Snore trends - view historical snore trends data
‚àö Sleep aid - helps you fall asleep easier
‚àö Sleep notes - see how events such as drinking coffee, stress, working out, or eating late affect your sleep quality
‚àö Wake up mood - see how Sleep Cycle affects your wake up mood
‚àö Online backup - lets you secure your sleep data online
‚àö Export sleep data to Excel for detailed analysis


REQUIREMENTS
Ability to charge your phone by the bed.
Ability to place your phone near the bed, such as on a nightstand table or on the floor.
summary: Want to sleep better? Let Sleep Cycle coach you.
developerAddress:
Sleep Cycle AB
Kungsgatan 46
41115 G√∂teborg
SWEDEN
recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements.
comments: I love the sleep tracker feature on this! I upgraded just to accurately record my sleep and it has improved over time. One feature I wish it could do in the tracker is combine different sleep sessions in same day. For example, I like to take a 30min nap during lunch break. Sometimes at night, I am woken up to take dog out, or use the facilities. When I stop and restart it, it only records the most recent session.

Doesn't always record analysis. Some mornings you turn the alarm off (the alarm that is part of this app) and it simply does nothing instead of displaying your sleep record. It seems random as to when it works. In particular when you turn the alarm off and it goes to snooze (another glitch) it fails to record.

I benefited from this app a few years ago and need to do this again. Why did it switch from accelerometer to microphone? How will it know if I've stopped breathing or just changed sides? The accelerometer was way cool.

The microphone tracking is a great idea and seems well implemented, but there are two issues that baffle me that are easily fixed: 1) I often wake up early and want to know if I've gotten enough sleep. Show me. Why make me remember what time I went to bed and calculate? 2) It knows when I'm awake or asleep based on the microphone data so why doesn't it subtract out the time I was not sleeping? "In bed" time should be a second, less-important metric. Time actually asleep is more important.

It works. Its got a well designed UX. It really helps people with disorders such as ADHD where following a regular routine is important, but regular alarms are too discordant. I like the fact that the upgrade screen is at the beginning. The design is Honest. So all in all, well done.

comments: Great! Perfectly useful for local weather situations. As well as, checking the weather all over the world. I personally, use it to warn my friends in the Philippines, when Typhoons are coming (which happens all the time). I live on the opposite side of Earth in New England USA. If it's noon here, it's the following midnight there. Exactly opposite side of Earth.

This app has improved so much, especially as of lately. I gave it 5 stars initially but then noticed issues of it not having completely accurate weather in a timely manner, at least in my area. But it's been really great as of late & I use it several times a day for my city as well as my dad's city. Thank you for the improvements, very much appreciated.

A terrific app, easy to navigate, it's like someone actually designed an app that knows what a human want to see or find. Simple, swipe up/down or across. I like hourly detail, this app shows initial detail at a glance, slide up, you have hourly. Some apps you have to slide all damn near to the bottom. Not this app, they're labeled at the top. Simply put, great app.

great app for the most part, although it does take time to much time to load in my opinion , it would be great if this app gave the pollen count I rate this app @ 3 because of these issues; The radar hangs up( freeze up ) while selecting the layers exp; wind speed; clouds etc; Other these small issues this app is great; I would like to see the cloud ceiling measurement as other weather apps have

Most accurate, user friendly weather app I've used to date. The adsi find reasonable and alerts are all in fair timing. I especially like the FYI tidbits at opening, but they can be turned off if you choose. Only reason for not giving 5*is because on occasion the discussion tab is a little more distant than I consider "local weather."

title: Google Drive
description:
Google Drive is a safe place to back up and access all your files from any device. Easily invite others to view, edit, or leave comments on any of your files or folders.

With Drive, you can:

‚Ä¢ Safely store and access your files anywhere
‚Ä¢ Quickly access recent and important files
‚Ä¢ Search for files by name and content
‚Ä¢ Share and set permissions for files and folders
‚Ä¢ View your content on the go while offline
‚Ä¢ Receive notifications about important activity on your files
‚Ä¢ Use your device‚Äôs camera to scan paper documents

Learn more about Google Apps update policy: https://support.google.com/a/answer/6288871

Google accounts get 15GB of storage free, shared across Google Drive, Gmail, and Google Photos. For additional storage, you can upgrade to a premium subscription plan as an in-app purchase. Subscriptions start at $1.99/month for 100 GB in the US, and can vary by region.
 
Google Privacy Policy: https://www.google.com/intl/en_US/policies/privacy
Google Drive Terms of Service: https://www.google.com/drive/terms-of-service

comments: Its a good app, but lately i have been getting spam notification from russian email account. These notifications come to mobile with a document containing a link. sometimes i accidentally click on them. I had to install an antivirus and also resort to better security for all devices in the network because of this. I also see this issue been reported to you guys, please advice on how to be safe on this matter.

Can't upload any file. Tried using mobile data as well as wifi. It shows preparing to upload and an animated icon. Nothing got uploaded. I am facing no issues when using laptop to upload the same file... I tried resetting app data and cache, still no change. I recommend checking your app first and then respond. Same issues were happening with my brother's phone and the files were uploaded after an hour. Unlike him I am not having the time nor patience. I have high speed broadbanconnection.

Total mess. 1. When uploading things to the drive, I used to get a black arrow pointing upwards in my notifications to indicate that the upload was complete. Now, I have to manually go in and check to see if the upload has been completed. 2. Many uploads, for reasons which can only be down to the app, are not uploading completely and failing. The thing is you never know until after think you have saved space in your phone and deleted the item.

Upload from phone won't work. So hit and miss most of the time and often can't upload. Very frustrating. Edit: responding to Google LLC, I am using the app. On my phone. And I have tried incognito and the browser. Also how is a different network a solution? What am I supposed to do? Change my mobile service provider in order to use this app? I've paid for extra storage and honestly think this is a terrible app. I'd give it no stars at this point I'm so frustrated with it . :(

This app is so disappointing..... immediately I installed it, I tried uploading a file on there...it just didn't work, I tried multiple times but still nothing. It was like a complete waste of my time and WiFi. I still haven't been able to make use of it. So I'll definitely uninstall it soon because it's simply..only clugging my phone memory.

title: Minecraft
description:
Explore infinite worlds and build everything from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles. Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the world in survival mode, crafting weapons and armor to fend off dangerous mobs. Create, explore and survive alone or with friends on mobile devices or Windows 10.

EXPAND YOUR GAME:
Marketplace - Discover the latest community creations in the marketplace! Get unique maps, skins, and texture packs from your favorite creators. 

Slash commands - Tweak how the game plays: you can give items away, summon mobs, change the time of day, and more. 

Add-Ons - Customize your experience even further with free Add-Ons! If you're more tech-inclined, you can modify data-driven behaviors in the game to create new resource packs.

MULTIPLAYER
Realms - Play with up to 10 friends cross-platform, anytime, anywhere on Realms, your own private server that we host for you. Try a free 30-day trial in-app.

Multiplayer - Play with up to 4 friends with a free Xbox Live account online.
Servers - Join free massive multiplayer servers and play with thousands of others! Discover gigantic community-run worlds, compete in unique mini-games and socialize in lobbies full of new friends!

SUPPORT: https:///www.minecraft.net/help
LEARN MORE: https:///www.minecraft.net/

recentChanges: What's new in 1.16.40: Various bug fixes!
comments: Not sure if it's just me but my volume is all the way up on my device (tablet ) ,and both my music ,and volume is all the way up in the game . I can't hear any music play at all rather it's the entry song ,or the music for the jukebox , please fix it , also I can't into the market place even if my WiFi conction is on ,and working right . Other then that I really like this game have it for the ps3 ,and now for this it keeps me besy . Hope this helps

Oh this is the really really good game if you get to know it. That's a pretty good game I gave it four stars I would give it five stars well because I'm on Android and I can't get achievements and I can't see my friends when they're online :(. I wish I could earn achievements so I can get points too will be a lot easier for me. I hope soon Android can earn achievements if you do let it please and let us see our friends online too. If you can fix that.

Really an amazing game. I've never found a game that's better than minecraft! I love the fact you can play with your friends, enable TONS of resource packs and let your imagination run wild! I think this game should be free so younger children can experience it themselves, and help their creativity improve! One glitch I need to report, though. Whenever two of my friends are on my friend's realm, I can never join, and never can my friends. I hope you can help with this, thanks.

I love this app. I have played it for many years but recently it hasn't been working. Everytime I try to sign in my xbox account it takes me out the app and tells me the app stopped working. I reset my device 10 times. I even asked my friends who play it if it was working for them. It wasn't. This started happening after the recent updates.

I'm very happy with this game it was worth my money, but every time I open minecraft it doesn't work and I have to close the application. This is although the first time it happened and hopefully the last. The problem isn't fixed yet so if someone could help me please do. UPDATE Even with the new update it still doesn't work I hope you guys will fix it. It freezes every time I open Minecraft . EDIT: it works again. If you have the same problem watch a YouTube tutorial. Worked for me.

title: Bubbles Empire Champions
description:
Discover the new and addicting bubble shooter game! Take part in the legendary adventure, go to war against the colorful bubbles to defend your empire and win the fight. Try it out today and get ready for a clash in the epic shooting battle! 

Popping bubbles was never so exciting! Play the action bubble pop game Bubble Empire Champions, work on your strategy, practice your balloon matching skills, and get ready to become the war hero!

Join the bubbles empires game, conquer hundreds of challenging levels and win points. Hit the target, blast and pop all the colorful balls and clear the board. Get it now for FREE and enjoy the most fun bubble shooter game. You can play this bubbles game anywhere and anytime you‚Äôd like - no wifi and no internet required to become the puzzle fighter champion league.

Why You‚Äôll Like this Bubble Shooter Game?
* Play hundreds of addicting game levels, packed with fun championship puzzles.
* Explore the empire kingdom bubble shooting legend, and enjoy the classic smooth gameplay.
* Complete puzzle quests and collect awesome rewards.
* Reach the epic game level target and win. 
* Fight alongside the bravest warriors of the kingdom and conquer all the amazing challenges. 
* Boost your experience with awesome power-ups and boosters and pop all the colorful balloons.
* Shoot and explode 7 blaster balls in a row to unlock the FIREBALL that will burn every bubble on the way.
* Drop 10+ bubbles at once to get a BOMB that will take out surrounding bubbles.
* See which color you are getting next and work out a strategy to smash all bubbles using fewer shots. 
* Less moves you pass a level, the higher score you'll get.
* Overcome the challenges and break all the bubbles to win boosters and power-ups.
* Play offline!


Aim, Hit the Target and Pop Bubbles!
Solve puzzles in this fun bubble shooter and enjoy hundreds of addictive levels filled with fun and intriguing challenges. Come up with killer gaming tactics and win coins! Bubble Empire Champions is a relaxing free game, perfect for families and friends to play and have a great time. 

Don‚Äôt miss out on this epic legend! Are you ready to begin? Warm-up your fingers and prepare for the great blast game battle. Join the hero adventure and blast your way to victory. If you love online puzzle games and can‚Äôt get enough of exciting brain teasers, this bubble shooter is simply perfect for you. 

Conquer the empire of bubbles and win big! 


All rights of Bubble Empire Champions¬ÆÔ∏è are owned by Ilyon Dynamics Ltd.

comments: Good game, but with a huge glitch Far too often, after completing a level, the game just sits there. It's not frozen, but even w the screen cleared, it loads more shooters. You can't shoot them, even though there's nothing to shoot at, and the only way to get out is to minimize and toss the app. Has cost me coins and levels. Probably going to uninstall.

Im at level 200(+). This is a great game to play. Yea it's challenging sometimes to not get the color you need at the right time but it wouldn't be challenging if it was easy, nor would it be fun. People complaining about spending real money on the game are looking for instant gratification(which has become a problem these days). You DON'T NEED TO SPEND REAL MONEY to play this game. You have unlimited lives so if you don't get the color you need at the moment you need it, play again. Simple.

This game is garbage! Ive been stuck on lvls for hours, and now i can even pass lvl 34. Its so frustrating to start a level really hard and not easy enough. The coin amount is terrible too. You just get few coins and that is all, not even 10000 or 100000 or big amount of coins instead of 10 f**king coins. And also $104.99 for just 1,100 coins?!!!? Seriously, this game is just a waste of time.

Sensing a theme here looking at other reviews. Though mine is only occurring in the periodic challenges, it went thru nearly 1h play of either giving me ones I can't use or get near the end only to get ones I can't use and essentially the game is flipping me off. If this continues, I will not make an IAP and will delete and maybe even report foul play to Google Play

It is a good game, gets more challenging as you go. They have changed the ads, so you can't get out of them and added more so they play after every round. Just back out of game and restart, you won't have to watch the same ads over and over. Takes a little longer but don't have to watch the ads. Like most, they just get greedy. Not worth the ads push. Nice graphics and idea, but gets repetitive.

title: Notepad - Write Notes, Checklists & Reminders
description:
Notepad is an easy-to-use free notes app for Android, optimized for after-call note taking. This clear and simple notepad app allows you to make quick notes and checklists to help organize your life with great ease.

SIMPLE AND CLEAR ‚úî
This quick notepad allows you to sort notes by date or title to help you keep them in order and a useful search function will help you find specific notes if you have many saved in your list of notes. 

SHARE AND CONNECT ‚òù
All notes can easily be shared with others via your email account or various social media platforms, and a smart link to phone calls allows you to write notes or memos immediately following every phone call made or received. Connect all aspects of your communication with this smart Notepad app!

ORGANIZE YOUR TASKS ‚úç
The useful checklist function allows you to create clear checklists such as to do lists, shopping lists or task lists, and also allows you to cross out items on the list when they are completed without having to delete them, in case you need to refer to the original list later.

SMART CONNECTION TO PHONE CALLS ‚úÜ
Following every phone call Notepad is activated on your phone, allowing you to quickly make notes so that you don‚Äôt forget anything important from the call. An advanced Caller ID feature also displays detailed information about the call. Details such as caller name, number, time and much more are displayed and serve as a useful reminder when making notes.

NOTEPAD KEY FEATURES ‚úé
‚úí Clearly presented notes which can be sorted by date or title. Quickly and easily edit, save and delete notes at any time.
‚úí Easy checklist function where completed items can be marked as ‚Äòdone‚Äô.
‚úí Useful search function for those difficult-to-find notes to save time.
‚úí Sort your notes by date or title.
‚úí Backup & restore notes so that you don‚Äôt lose any important information. You can backup directly to your phone or to Google Drive.
‚úí Quickly share notes with others via email, SMS or various social media platforms including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp, Messenger, Skype and LinkedIn.
‚úí Create notes quickly following phone calls with a handy quick link to Notepad after every call made or received.
‚úí Identify unknown callers with the advanced caller ID feature and see detailed call information - useful when making notes after phone calls!

For your privacy and data protection we do not have access to any of your notes or store any of the information contained within them. Therefore, we recommend that you regularly use the useful backup feature on this app to avoid the accidental loss of any important information.

Install Notepad today and organize your life with this easy-to-use notepad application and enjoy a hassle-free time. Never be stuck without a pen and paper again!

‚úí Useful search function for those difficult-to-find notes to save time.
‚úí Sort your notes by date or title.
‚úí Backup & restore notes so that you don‚Äôt lose any important information. You can backup directly to your phone or to Google Drive.
‚úí Quickly share notes with others via email, SMS or various social media platforms including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp, Messenger, Skype and LinkedIn.
‚úí Create notes quickly following phone calls with a handy quick link to Notepad after every call made or received.
‚úí Identify unknown callers with the advanced caller ID feature and see detailed call information - useful when making notes after phone calls!

For your privacy and data protection we do not have access to any of your notes or store any of the information contained within them. Therefore, we recommend that you regularly use the useful backup feature on this app to avoid the accidental loss of any important information.

Install Notepad today and organize your life with this easy-to-use notepad application and enjoy a hassle-free time. Never be stuck without a pen and paper again!
summary: Write Notes, Checklists and see Caller ID easy with this Notepad App for Android
recentChanges: Thank you for using our app. The latest update optimizes performance and integrates improvements based on your suggestions.
comments: I've been using this app for a couple months. I think there's a problem with the automatic date it puts on the title line within each note. Today, 10-05-2020 (Oct.05,2020), I noticed my note had the date 10-25-20, so I tapped that date and changed it do the date (09-25-2020) that appears When I close the editing of the active note. But when I close that active note and reopen it for editing, it again shows the date 10-25-20--and I don't know where it's getting that date-- today is only Oct.05.

This app sucks it keeps stopping I have a lot of information on this app that I thought I could retrieve at any time now when I hit the app it just says the app has stopped,and do I want to close app or send a message which I am doing ,this app was working great until recent it just won't opem. I am using version 2.0 701 This app must stop working after you put a certain amount of data on it don't use this app it just keeps stopping .
Buggy.. obviously poorly tested. Would give it zero stars if it were possible.

it does what it's suppose to do no frills no fancy stuff ,I was looking for something I could just write something on real quick notepad does that...I only gave notepad 4 stars because when I first go to notepad to use it there's ad that pops up every time ,,I just hit go back button the notepad is there for me to start writing tommy g So,Cal,

It is a sketchy app. The devs comment and say the permissions you give for them to access your contacts and phone records are for better functionality. However, at no point while I was taking notes did that personal information have any relevance. I made two, brief notes on this app and yet when I went to delete it, the app had used 190mb. The only way that adds up is if it is recording your calls. Supposedly, it filters spam, but I only got a potential spam notice once. Report the app for theft

title: JEFIT Workout Tracker, Weight Lifting, Gym Log App
description:
Tracking workout training routines using JEFIT gym log is easy. Programs from bodybuilding, 3 day splits, 5x5 & strength plans to home exercises & body weight lifting.

‚òÖ Google Play Editor's Choice ‚òÖ Men‚Äôs Fitness - Best Fitness and Health Apps ‚òÖ USA Today - New year, new you

Over 8 million people use JEFIT to track their workouts and transform their bodies.

JEFIT, the number one workout tracking planner app, provides free fitness program database to help you stay fit, make progress and get the most out of your gym or home fitness sessions. From beginner programs like 5x5, 531, stronglifts, 3 or 4 day splits, starting strength to advanced bodybuilding, weightlifting, powerlifting or kettlebell routines to programs using bodyweight, limited space or specialized equipment, JEFIT is the only workout app you need.

Who is this app for?
If you‚Äôve logged your workouts in a journal, planner or just love training at the gym on your own schedule, JEFIT will help you reach your strength, weight and fat loss, and training goals from beginners to advanced lifters. We‚Äôve made the app to motivate you by rewarding you for consistency, pushing yourself to new personal records and committing to challenges with the community. 

Top Features
‚óè Web or App - Track with the app and edit routines on our web app.
‚óè Track Workouts - Set your exercises, track weights and reps and we‚Äôll show you the results of your training
‚óè Exercise Instruction Database - Over 1300+ demonstrations and variations with HD video from experts
‚óè Intuitive Tools - a Swiss army knife for training tools, including rest timer, superset, interval timer, body measurements system, and most importantly, workout routine planner.
‚óè Training Programs - Customized workout programs made for 3, 4 or 5 day splits, fat loss, stronglifts, 5x5, starting strength, bodybuilding, 531, weightlifting, powerlifting, GZCLP, Greyskull, or build your own
‚óè Stay Motivated - Join our monthly fitness challenge with cash prizes and get support from other gym goers in the community. Also add your gym buddies to compare routines and lifts so you can reach your goal of improving strength, getting lean, toned or just staying active
‚óè Set Goals - Want to lose weight, get lean, get stronger or exercise consistently? You can build that in JEFIT‚Äôs custom journal
‚óè Add Friends - Find new fitness buddies in our community. Whether it‚Äôs someone to spot you at the gym or to compare bodybuilding tips.

Programs for any fitness level with full instruction database
‚úî Beginner Programs - Stronglifts, 5x5, Starting Strength, 3 day splits
‚úî Advanced Programs - Powerlifting, bodybuilding, 531, GZCLP, Greyskull

‚úî Sports Training - Baseball, Space

‚úî Kettlebells, Cardio, Circuit Training, Space Limited Routines
* Or build your own custom workout routines or schedules

Special tools and features
‚úî Access from Desktop and Web
‚úî Rest Timer - Set custom times to remind when to lift
‚úî Supersets and circuit training routines supported
‚úî Interval Timer, Set Notes and 1 Rep Max Calculator
‚úî Body Measurements and Weekly Planner for Scheduling
‚úî Social Feed and Community Contest
‚úî Store Workouts in the Cloud and share with your personal trainer

1,300 exercises supported with full HD videos in our database
‚úî Barbell, Dumbbell, Machines, Cable, Band
‚úî Cardio, Elliptical, Rowing, Bike, Swimming
‚úî Static Movements, Planks, Stretching, Abs

Benchmarking, analysis and instructions

‚úî Weekly summaries of progress
‚úî Personalized Record PR tracking

comments: Used this apps for a couple of years and the latest updates are a backward step. The UI no longer displays the interval time but been replaced with an incremental number for those who can't count sets. I use to enter the weight for my next set during the interval however the keyboard won't appear while the interval timer is on. Also none of the graphics for the exercises display anymore which has caused me confusion. I hope the latest updates are reconsidered

Been using this app since the early days. I love the ongoing support but it wouldnt hurt for devs to stick to one UI and stop moving things around every other update. The latest update to intervals is just lazy. The timer auto-starts even if you dont want/need it and is always logged. A better approach would be to disable the time+logging if interval is set to 0, otherwise there is a x second delay before timer starts. Also the ability to set the main page under excerise history would be great.

Nice app an community. There must be a bug with the points earned: with the latest versions my sessions are not counted anylonger (and I do train every day almost...) Would be nice to get it resolved (I am in the contest, and it gives motivation ;) Overall, is a very good develooment, kudos to the team.

It's a good app, but it can be hard to use. I also couldn't find a way to contact them from the app and I feel like if you're going to charge people money you have to put a way to contact you if they have a problem or question. My husband just wants to know if there is a weekly report for reps like the other stats, but it makes me nervous that if something goes wrong I can't find a way to contact them about it.

Great app!!! Have been using for years. Really enjoy the improvements made over the years. Unfortunately, body stats page/functions have been very buggy and don't even work the last few updates. Weight doesn't record. Graph has goal weight posted way off in future. Weight no longer sync's w Google Fit. Could be 5star app. -2stars until fixed.

title: Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications
description:
Live Transcribe has a new name‚ÄîLive Transcribe & Sound Notifications. It's an app that makes everyday conversations and surrounding sounds more accessible among people who are deaf and hard of hearing, using just your Android phone.

Using Google‚Äôs state-of-the-art automatic speech recognition and sound detection technology, Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications provides you free, real-time transcriptions of your conversations and sends notifications based on your surrounding sounds at home. The notifications make you aware of important situations at home, such as a fire alarm or doorbell ringing, so that you can respond quickly.

On most phones, you can directly access Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications with these steps:
1. Open your device's Settings app.
2. Tap Accessibility, then tap Live Transcribe, or Sound Notifications, depending on which app you‚Äôd like to start.
3. Tap Use service, then accept the permissions.
4. Use the Accessibility button or gesture to start Live Transcribe or Sound Notifications.

[New] Sound Notifications:
‚Ä¢ Get notified of potential risky situations and personal situations based on sounds happening at home (for example, smoke alarm, siren, baby sounds).
‚Ä¢ Get notifications with a flashing light or vibration to your mobile device or wearable.
‚Ä¢ Timeline view lets you go back in history (currently limited to 12 hours) to see what was happening around you.

Real-time transcription:
‚Ä¢ Transcribes in real-time. Text appears on your phone as words are spoken.
‚Ä¢ Accurately captures the nuances of how words are used in context.
‚Ä¢ Choose from over 80 languages and dialects, and quickly switch between two languages.
‚Ä¢ Add custom words that you use frequently, like names or household items.
‚Ä¢ Set your phone to vibrate when someone says your name.
‚Ä¢ Type responses in your conversation. Bring up your phone‚Äôs keyboard and type your words for a continuous dialogue. Transcriptions still appear while you type.
‚Ä¢ See the volume of the speaker‚Äôs voice compared to the loudness in your environment. You can use this sound indicator to adjust your volume when you speak.
‚Ä¢ Use external microphones found in wired headsets, Bluetooth headsets, and USB mics for better audio reception.

Referring back to transcription:
‚Ä¢ Choose to save transcriptions for 3 days. Saved transcriptions will stay locally on your device for 3 days, so you can copy and paste them elsewhere. (By default, transcriptions are not saved.)
‚Ä¢ Search within saved transcriptions.
‚Ä¢ Touch and hold text in transcription to copy and paste.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Android 5.0 (Lollipop) and up.

Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications was made in collaboration with Gallaudet University, the premier Deaf and hard of hearing university in the US.

Join the Google Accessible community to provide feedback and receive product updates. For help using Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications, visit contact the Disability Support team.

Permissions Notice
Microphone: Live Transcribe needs microphone access to transcribe the speech around you. The audio is not stored after the transcription is processed. Sound Notifications needs microphone access to listen for sounds happening around you. The audio is also not stored after processing is finished.

summary: Real-time transcriptions of your conversations and sound event notifications
comments: Very helpful for me, since I am legally deaf. Sometimes I have trouble understanding someone that talk very fast and low, and in loud environment for example like Walmart paying for my items and the cashier had some questions and I had a hard time understanding her, thankfully this app came in very handy. I also have a speech impairment due to my deafness, and sometimes others have trouble understanding me, again this app made my day. Thanks a million, Michael

I'm deaf/ hard of hearing. I came upon this app. Read where it can detect knocking at the door. I can't hear people knock, so I decided to down load the app. Unless there is absolutely no noice and someone pounds on the door. The phone doesn't tell me when someone knocks. Back to my flashing light doorbell. I would need an app the can distinguish between sounds at any volume, including music, human speech, or tv and between someone talking to me and just near me having a conversation.

I am just learning to use this app. So far, so good. Am trying to discern just how accurate are the transcriptions under different circumstances: indoor and out, telephone, TV dialog, children's voices and other, including effects of ambient noise. As of now, results of my "tests" are encouraging.

I'm profoundly deaf and hoped I might be able to use this to alert me to sounds at home instead of relying on old fashioned equipment. It doesn't seem to pick up anything except really loud sounds and that's with the phone held close to the source. It doesn't detect door knocking or the phone ringing or the microwave beeping or any of the things it's supposed to. The transcribing feature works - though it doesn't seem to do well with Scottish accents - so I don't think there's a problem with my microphone. I wonder if it might be an issue with sensitivity but there isn't any option to configure the microphone, which is maybe something the developers need to add? Disappointed as I've seen a similar feature on a friend's Iphone and it seemed to work perfectly. Time to give up on Android devices when it comes to accessibility I think.

I gave it 4 stars coz' there are times that there are missing words & I would like to suggest for you to have an editing mode, All caps, upper or lower case, and to have a key word as a command or a button maybe? Take this words as an example: PLUS SIGN plus sign (as a word) + (as a sign) yeah, I hope you get my point somehow cause I swear you're going to bring this app on another level if you can. Love lots and Take care to all of us during this pandemicü§ç God Blessü§ç

summary: Live streaming worldwide, find your cool new friends,  and meet me in MICO!
recentChanges: You can turned off gift animations and entry effects now.
comments: Bad experience. Don't download load it I didn't read the review and its lame that you have to put in Facebook and gmail in order to meet with people then the other problem is that if you haven't log in your phone number and want to unlink the websites you have to add the number in order to unlink it. DO NOT INSTALL. if you don't believe me and other people experience it yourself.

Sooo many fake accounts(robots)(Bots)(AI)(Artificial Intelligence). Too many people using the same exact message. Nobody says anything real. For what it's worth the app feels nice and the programmer should be proud of their own craftsmanship.
Its a good app just needs to improve more and they should think of some advantages for the senders as the senders invest huge amounts in the app

Do not download. The layout is confusing, invasive, and refuses to respond through their customer service email when they have no option to permanently delete unless you want to link Facebook, google, and your phone number. I didn't read the reviews and tried on a whim. Seriously, don't install it. If there were such a thing as negative stars or turds, this app deserve the lot of those. Has anyone successfully deleted their account from there?

Tiktok is BY FAR better. I spent 4 hours trying to figure out this app, and customer service did NOT help. The app DOES have potential, but the problem right now is, there needs to be an entire rescripting of the English version of this app. User guidelines are vague and not well written. FAQ does not hold enough information. The 24-7 customer service bot is all AI and there is no actual person, unless they give you an email.. which I am still waiting for.. App is fun, but still needs work.

title: YouTube Music - Stream Songs & Music Videos
description:
YouTube Music is a new music app that allows you to easily find what you‚Äôre looking for and discover new music. Get playlists and recommendations served to you based on your context, tastes, and what‚Äôs trending around you.

A new music streaming service from YouTube
‚óè This is a completely reimagined music service with official releases from your favorite artists.

Find the music you want
‚óè Easily find the albums, singles, live performances, covers, and remixes you‚Äôre looking for.
‚óè Don‚Äôt know a song‚Äôs name? Just search for the lyrics or describe it.

Discover new music
‚óè Get music recommendations based on taste, location, and time of day.
‚óè Use ‚ÄúThe Hotlist‚Äù to keep up with what‚Äôs trending.

Uninterrupted listening with Music Premium
‚óè Listen ad-free
‚óè Don‚Äôt worry about your music stopping when you lock your screen or use other apps.
‚óè Download your favorites or let us do it for you by enabling Offline Mixtape.

Get one free month of Music Premium to listen ad-free, offline, and with your screen locked, then pay just $9.99 a month. Existing YouTube Red or Google Play Music members and users of either service who have already received a 30 day trial are not eligible. Monthly charges auto-renew for Music Premium membership outside of trial periods.

summary: The official YouTube app built just for music.
recentChanges: Change up your routine with the new Discover Mix, a personalized playlist with songs you‚Äôll love based on what you listen to the most. With a new set of songs each Wednesday, there is always more to explore.
comments: Cannot listen to most of the music I purchased on Google Play in this new app. I was always reluctant to "buy" music online like on Google Play and this is exactly why. Seems like it must intentionally be a scam, because otherwise there's absolutely no excuse for Google not making it a crystal clear and perfect transition for previously PURCHASED music.

Awful! The quality of sound is subpar. Not to mention the app allows songs/videos recorded by mobile phones, & mind you I have to use this app now bc Google is dropping Google Play Music, & I am actively paying for a Music Subscription. And Google deems this recording adequate on their paid subscription! Absolutely an abysmal platform. The Google Play Music selections & radio algorithms were amazing, rarely disappointed. I am so glad I never invested in the family plan.

Worst app ever. Way to take a step backwards. I want a refund for all my purchased songs through google play! I dont even want to open the app. My purchased songs and music I have off of CDs are separated and cant listen to them together. I used to beable to hook my phone up to my speaker at work, hit play and have a good day, now I have songs repair g themselves on a shuffle. Why even take away google play? All these jack asses is suits whith their heads shoved so far up their asses. REFUND ME!

Horrid, coming from Google play music, it's a HUGE downgrade. Wise people say if it's not broken, please don't try fix it. Unfortunately YT music only proves how true that saying is. Twice as buggy, one fifth as intuitive with an order of magnitude the complexity. Along with the most amateurish design I have seen in a long long time. Compared to the clean lines and simple design on Google play music, this is a massive slap in the face! I simply won't stand for it.

If you force someone to use an app because a different one is no longer active, you have to make sure the app works properly! It takes forever for my device music to load, and when it finally does, it takes forever to play a song (that's saved to the device mind you). And this wait time occurs after EVERY song. This is unacceptable. I didn't ask to integrate Youtube with my personal music library, but make sure the app works properly if you're going to force someone to use it.

title: My Boo - Your Virtual Pet Game
description:
Meet Boo, your very own virtual pet! Enjoy countless hours of fun in this addictive and entertaining game brought to you by Tapps Games!

Each Boo is like a real pet that needs lots of attention, and your task is to take care of it in the best way possible. Feed it, wash it, take care of its health, put it to sleep and play with your Boo - while you have lots of fun with over 20 thrilling mini games that will surely keep you entertained and your Boo happy as a puppy! 

If your Boo is hungry, you can find an array of delicious and nutritious food in the pantry: from yummy tacos to some tender barbecue ribs, or even a portion of octopus sashimi if you‚Äôre in the mood for a more exotic food! Your sweet tooth will be satisfied with mouthwatering candies, such as pumpkin pies, milk shakes and colorful lollipops!

You can also dress up your boo any way you like! Go to his closet and style it like your favorite movie or book character! Choose its hair and accessorize, from top hats to a regal crown, or even a leprechaun hat! Choose your attire! From formal to fun - and every style in between! You can buy new accessories to customize your Boo as you level up!  

Your boo will get dirty from time to time, and like any other pet, a bath is necessary! Taking care of your pet also entails giving it some medication whenever needed, and you can play with magic potions and energy drinks! You can also decorate its house with fun posters and decorative rugs - not to mention redo the walls with beautiful wallpaper and some fancy flooring! You‚Äôll LOVE this BOOtiful game so much, you won‚Äôt be able to leave it alone!

HIGHLIGHTS
‚Ä¢ ADOPT your Boo, give it a special name and watch it grow up! It‚Äôs so cute!
‚Ä¢ DRESS it up with countless outfits to give your Boo the best look! Just they way you want!
‚Ä¢ FEED Boo with candy, cookies, fruits, pizza or even sushi for a treat! Yummy!
‚Ä¢ TICKLE, play keepie uppie, trampoline or jump rope with your Boo to keep it happy and smiling!
‚Ä¢ TUCK your Boo in when the day is over and Boo is tired!
‚Ä¢ BATHE your Boo to keep it clean and happy!
‚Ä¢ DECORATE every room of your Boo's house with dozens of awesome items!

And a lot more! There‚Äôs always so much to do in My Boo!
You will never get tired of your cute little pet monster!

MINI GAMES
Have fun with exciting mini games and earn coins to buy items and food for your Boo!

‚Ä¢ Boo Mix - Match Boos
‚Ä¢ Piano Boo - Tap the Boos and avoid the white tiles
‚Ä¢ Basket Boo - How many points can you score in this basketball game?
‚Ä¢ Matching - A match-3 style game to combine Boos
‚Ä¢ Bubble Pop - Launch and combine Boos of the same color

And many more!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: I love this game! It is so interactive. Its actually like having a pet because you have to feed it, play with it, clean it, and you have to let it sleep to get energy. I have this game on multiple devices. It is an awesome game. I really recommend it.

This game is awesome in my opinion you can care for it and play games most of them take finger and hand eye coordination so if you need to practice some of the games will help you can go outside and collect food from the trees just like animal crossing
I give this game 5 stars because it is super fun, easy and has so many ideas for clothing and boo games that you can unlock and enjoy plus you don't have to pay. So I will recommend this game. üòÄ
I love this app so cute and fun but the only thing I'm having problems with is that when I try to enter my age, it does not let me continue after I have put in my age. Please help. üíô
It's a great game but the amount of ads you put into the minigames now is driving me absolutely insane.

title: Homescapes
description:
Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in‚Äîadventures await you from the moment you walk in the door! 

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!
 
The game features:

‚óè Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
‚óè Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
‚óè Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
‚óè A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
‚óè Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
‚óè A cute pet: meet –∞ naughty and fluffy cat.
‚óè Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!
 
Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.
 
Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/
 
Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com

developerAddress: 4th floor, Red Oak North, South County Business Park, Leopardstown, Dublin 18 D18 X5K7, Ireland
recentChanges:
ONCE UPON A HALLOWEEN
‚Ä¢ Decorate the hall for Halloween!
‚Ä¢ Get a spooky mansion as a gift!
‚Ä¢ Lay a Road of Horrors

COTTAGE IN THE WOODS
‚Ä¢ Decorate a log cabin and picnic area!
‚Ä¢ Get a special profile picture

ALSO

comments: Don't, just don't. I got into the 4400's for my level, so I played this quite a bit. They even got me to shell out money for the events a couple of times, which no other game managed. 500 characters isn't enough to fully explain why this isn't worth your time. And when I post this,if I get a reply from the company, it will be an insincere copy-paste that screams minimal effort for maximum money grab. You will spend less money if you just buy a mobile game. Also, the deceitful ads are a thing.

Same matching game it always has been. They REALLY need to stop advertising it as a different game. They even went through the trouble of adding an initial level thats like the advertisements and then it goes back to matching gems....they could EASILY create the same style of game with different ways to earn the energy you need to complete tasks. I would love to see them develop a similar game with a play style similar to the click-bait ads they create.

Started off as a very good game, but at level 64 it has become impossible to advance without spending money. Very poor as it reels you in then basically the only way to advance is to spend spend spend. Have tried over 80 times and its the same outcome because you don't have enough turns to complete the level. IF the developers respond I guarantee it will the same stock answer they all use. Very poor indeed. Have now uninstalled.

When you reach a certain level, you are mandated to play a Tournament of Champions. You cannot play the regular game. So if you are in the middle of a game and the game expires before the tournament is over, you loose your points and potential winnings. Some people paid to get coins to play these games which is a huge waste of money. The game designers should either be ashamed of themselves or be sued.

Such a great game. What I like the most about this is that it does not have ads. Not even a single ad since the day I first played it. Such a nice game. Playrix company always make great games. So, this was all its praise. But the reason I gave it 4 stars is that the levels are too hard. Hey hey hey! But not every level. I mean 2/5. And it is specially mentioned there that the levels are going to be difficult. But we can clear the levels by using power ups. This was all my suggestion. Bye.

title: Candy Crush Jelly Saga
description:
There's a new player in town, the wiggling, jiggling Jelly Queen and she's here to challenge you to a game of Candy Crush Jelly Saga!  Whatever your favorite moves, you better hope they're Jellylicious enough to take on the mighty Jelly Queen.
 
The unstoppably spreadable game!  New Candy Crush Jelly Saga is full of delightful game modes, features and boss battles featuring the Jelly Queen!  Playing as Jenny, show off your Jellylicious moves and take turns switching Candies against the jiggling Jelly Queen. Every sweet move will spread more Jelly and whoever spreads the most will win the level!
 
There are splendid new Candies, a marvelous new booster and a dreamy treetop world to explore in the Candy Kingdom too!

Royal Championship is the new VS Mode in Candy Crush Jelly Saga. Players will compete 1:1 in fast paced game rounds in real time! Win a big bundle of rewards by completing a consecutive win streak and finishing in the top half of the leaderboard. The higher the position, the bigger the reward! Have you got what it takes?

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
 
Candy Crush Jelly Saga is completely free to play but in-game currency, to buy items such as extra moves or lives, will require payment with real money.
 
You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device‚Äôs settings.
 
Candy Crush Jelly Saga features:
> Over 3000 Jellylicious Levels
> Real Time VS mode   	
> Boss Modes   	
> Marvelous game modes including: Spread the Jelly & Release the Pufflers  	
> Tasty Color Bomb Lollipop booster    
> Mesmerizing new Candies  	
> Dreamy new treetop world and a host of quirky characters led by the Jelly Queen and her stooges.  
> Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master

For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Jellylicious scores
 
Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet	
 
Now you can express yourself, jelly-style! Be sassy like the Jelly Queen or cool like Cupcake Carl with our sweet Candy Crush Jelly Stickers!
 
Facebook @CandyCrushJellySaga
Twitter @CandyCrushJelly
Instagram @CandyCrushSaga
YouTube @CandyCrushOfficial
 
Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Candy Crush Jelly Saga!
 
Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact

recentChanges: Get ready for a jellylicious update! New sweet levels and graphics are coming your way! Also, you will soon be able to challenge friends around the world to an exciting Jelly Duel in our Player vs Player feature. Watch out for updates coming soon!
comments: I enjoy this game, very addictive!Recommend it to everyone wanting to play and improve their brain. I disagree with those claiming that at some level you must use money. I have played this game for years and refuse spend a dime. I have patience and detrrminationand try to learn from the failures. Usually do.Just give us more FREE weapons. Great game!

Very beautyful game. But in the championship game i want not to lose my progress.Why? As in football, and in other games , and in this championship ,the tickets that we collect is not, good to cancel.The best player,is he , who , for 48 ours ,play and win more games that enother player. .For example ! I collect 3 ,tickets in, 3 games.When I go in 4 game ,the colors are not in my favore ,so the progress stop.But is not right, to lose the tickets.

Hello King. GLITCH! Level 730! I beat a player and it still will not let me progress. Why incorporate sudden forced competitions into a game I've been playing for so long? AND if you're going to do so.. why not make it optional only? If this issue isn't cleared by morning I am uninstalling and KING won't get another dime from me. Ridiculous and unfortunate. It was a good game.

The game is fun to play but the Royal Championship is somehow unfair. It always unfavor players who are one win away from getting the treasure boxes. The other player would have an advantage because they would be given opportunities for combos and would normally win after a few moves. There should be fairness in giving out combos so that the game should be fair. Edit:It's so unfair that everytime I'm near getting the chest box, I always get disconnected or there's a problem with the game.

Stuck at level 60. It's blatantly obvious that this is one of those levels that is intended to make you pay. They will not give you what you need to progress until after 30 to 40 times of going through this level they get sick of looking at you and give you what you need until you hit the next one which is intended to force you to pay. I've found this with this company many times before and I'm not surprised it's in this one as well.

title: Bloomberg: Market & Financial News
description:
Get comprehensive access to global business, stock market and finance news, and trending topics like bitcoin and cryptocurrency.

You can customize the app to monitor your personal portfolio and receive continuous alerts on global stock positions and summarized financial, economic, and corporate information that meets the needs of the global business and financial professional. 

Whether you need to monitor your stock portfolio or just want to discover breaking financial news, Bloomberg provides the news and analysis you require, whenever and wherever you need it. 

FEATURES:

- News: Featured and trending stories in Markets, Industries, Technology, Politics, Luxury, Personal Finance, Opinion and more. 

- Market Data: Latest market data on your customizable portfolio and personalized for your region including Equity Indexes, Futures, Bonds, Commodities & Currencies. 

- Watchlist: Easily track your portfolio by adding a security (stocks, mutual funds, ETFs, currencies, etc.) to your personal Watchlist(s).

- Video: Watch Bloomberg Television Live without the need of any Cable or Satellite subscription. Watch featured videos specifically chosen for top news categories.

- Audio: Listen to interviews and analysis from around the world by the smartest names in Global Finance, Business, Economics & Investment from our radio shows and podcasts.

More Features: 

Markets data in your region and a Watchlist summary with leaders and laggers. Introducing a bold, new look for Businessweek including issue downloading for offline reading.

Download the app now for accurate and concise finance news, stock market intelligence alerts and everything you need to know about currencies, commodities and futures‚Ä¶

A subscription to the Bloomberg app gets you unlimited access to all Bloomberg content within the app and on the website (after linking your account). You can start with a 30 days free trial and then a monthly subscription for $34.99/month.

Your payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. You may manage your subscription and auto-renew may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase.
