descriptionHTML:
Get comprehensive access to global business, stock market and finance news, and trending topics like bitcoin and cryptocurrency.

You can customize the app to monitor your personal portfolio and receive continuous alerts on global stock positions and summarized financial, economic, and corporate information that meets the needs of the global business and financial professional.

Whether you need to monitor your stock portfolio or just want to discover breaking financial news, Bloomberg provides the news and analysis you require, whenever and wherever you need it.

FEATURES:

- News: Featured and trending stories in Markets, Industries, Technology, Politics, Luxury, Personal Finance, Opinion and more.

- Market Data: Latest market data on your customizable portfolio and personalized for your region including Equity Indexes, Futures, Bonds, Commodities & Currencies.

- Watchlist: Easily track your portfolio by adding a security (stocks, mutual funds, ETFs, currencies, etc.) to your personal Watchlist(s).

- Video: Watch Bloomberg Television Live without the need of any Cable or Satellite subscription. Watch featured videos specifically chosen for top news categories.

- Audio: Listen to interviews and analysis from around the world by the smartest names in Global Finance, Business, Economics & Investment from our radio shows and podcasts.

More Features:

Markets data in your region and a Watchlist summary with leaders and laggers. Introducing a bold, new look for Businessweek including issue downloading for offline reading.

Download the app now for accurate and concise finance news, stock market intelligence alerts and everything you need to know about currencies, commodities and futures‚Ä¶

A subscription to the Bloomberg app gets you unlimited access to all Bloomberg content within the app and on the website (after linking your account). You can start with a 30 days free trial and then a monthly subscription for $34.99/month.

Your payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. You may manage your subscription and auto-renew may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Terms of Use: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/privacy

Visit us at:

http://www.bloomberg.com
summary: Get the latest stock market, financial, business news and more.
developerAddress:
731 Lexington Ave
New York, New York 10022
recentChanges: ‚óâ Performance improvements
comments: Content great but app very clunky and slow, and loads of ads despite subscription. Main missing feature for me is ability to replay, pause & fast forward interviews. I watch it for an hour or two day, more some days. Ads feel like 30%, and I assume they are filling the time between interviews. Mostly I don't need to watch the interviews live; they should all be available to watch later, skipping the ads, or most of them. (They only have a repertoire of 4 or 5 ads, endlessly repeated)

The app will not get past the loading screen upon opening. It just continually loads and never opens. I read businessweek primarily on my phone and since the new app doesn't open it makes it pointless to have a subscription. Shame because content itself is great.

The app has no dark mode. Big No-No in today's day&age! The app has no video PIP - so I am stuck in it. They should take inspiration from YouTube's PIP allowing one to switch over to another app to read other news in app, or take notes in another app while watching the Live TV. The app's ads are a problem. It starts with 6-10 ads but it horrible because the button of 'Skip ads' has no effect. üòÇ The ads are repeated again if you had to leave app, go to another app and come back. üòÇ
I love watching Bloomberg in the mornings it helps me understand the market before I do my daily analysing also the app makes it easy to be on the move and still keep and eye out on critical news

Intelligent productive news experience Well sourced and a calm effective vocal experience with a neutral voice command ..made the news not only sound archaic but also progressive at the same time ..broad appeal .and yet I'm not a fan of apps in general .I'm not addicted to tech as much as most tech companies and apps for $ think the common occasional user ..I'm not addicted to updates but if I was ..I would be listening to your voice cast

title: Fire Balls 3D
description:
Fire Balls 3D is a single-tap hyper casual game that will keep you hooked for hours!

Hold to make your dot fire forward, and be careful from moving obstacles.

The game features unlimited levels and 20 beautiful color themes.
descriptionHTML:
Fire Balls 3D is a single-tap hyper casual game that will keep you hooked for hours!

Hold to make your dot fire forward, and be careful from moving obstacles.

The game features unlimited levels and 20 beautiful color themes.
summary: Hit the stack!
comments: Fun, Simple,Addictive game. My only problems are every once in awhile I'll tap the screen one time & two canon balls SHOOT out causing the second one to hit the border and destroying my shooter. Then you get a choice of either starting over or watching a 30 second ad which runs any kind of flow you have. Which gets frustrating after awhile!! 3/5

In the beginning I gave this game a 2-star rating that was over a year-and-a-half ago but since then the game has progressed and gotten a little better as they upgraded and given you a few more options to continue your play but the background is still very Bland and boring but all in all it is a fun time waster game
Literally takes longer to watch the ads between each level then it does to play it. Worst game I've ever played. Don't waste your time.
It's pretty funny when I lose because after the ball hits the red, it shoots back to me!üòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇüòÇ
Fun for the kids. Can get challenging. Good time killer. Basic graffics

title: TextNow: Free Texting & Calling App
description:
*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting in the US over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE.  Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" in the app menu.

Local US or Canada Phone number
Give your friends your very own phone number they can call!

Unlimited Text & Picture Messaging 
You can send as many text messages as you want to US & Canada - FREE!

Unlimited Calling to USA and Canada 
Make unlimited free phone calls to any phone number in the US & Canada!

Cheap International Calling
TextNow offers low-cost, international calling to over 230 countries. Stay connected longer with rates starting at less than $0.01 per minute. Add money or earn free money by completing offers to your account and make low-cost international calls.

Features:
- Make and receive voice calls
- Emojis, stickers and gifs
- Full picture messaging : send, receive and save pictures!
- Video messaging: Send videos to your friends and family
- Voicemail Transcription: transcript of your voicemail
- Caller ID
- PassCode: keep your messages under lock and key
- Google SmartLock: no need to remember your password
- Call Forwarding
- Conference calling
- Signatures: add your own personalized signature to each text
- Customizable text-tone, ringtone & vibration
- Customizable backgrounds
- Assign individual contacts their own ringtone & background
- Quick Reply to easily (and quickly) respond to friends
- Home screen widget to launch TextNow, compose a new message or quickly make a call
- Unified inbox: send and receive your texts, SMS and GIFs directly via TextNow - use TextNow as your one-stop SMS texting app!
- One number, multiple devices ‚Äì Send messages and make calls on your computer or tablet, then access them from your phone while on the go.
- TextNow.com - text from your computer too! All messages seamlessly synchronize with your mobile device.
- Turn your Wi-Fi enabled tablets into a phone.
- Elastic calling to protect you from dropped calls. Elastic calling is TextNow‚Äôs unique ability to have our calls choose the best possible route for your call to improve quality

Is it really free? 

There is no catch. No yearly or monthly fees! It is completely free! Download today and start sending and receiving your unlimited texts, pics, videos, and SMS messages.

How can all this be free?

The app comes with a few ads. If you don't like ads, you can purchase a subscription to remove them. Join the 100 million people who have already found a better way to talk & text free.

Suite 200 - 420 Wes Graham Way
Waterloo, ON
N2L 0J6
Canada
recentChanges:
New & Noticeable:
- No new features, as our engineering elves were busy working under the hood this week. We update every week, so keep checking this space for new features and other nifty stuff.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
- Many bug fixes, plus performance and stability improvements.
comments: Ever since the update it made it worse. It rings again, that's good. Problem is, people can't hear me but I can hear them. I have to use LINE for the time being until it gets fixed. Dont tell me to get the latest update either etc. I did all that. You guys need to update this again because my callers can't hear me when talking. It works then I stops working.

Its great! Actually free. Ive had it for a 2nd private line since like 2016. But you have to pay attention to your account. Because I didn't use mine for a while, lapsed & I still had an account sort of. But I lost my phone number. But its totally not a big deal! For real only actually free. When I lapsed I didn't renew right away because textnow had changed with how it had always been. But now that I renewed, its like it was before and even better! Katy

Totally free for calling, texting and calling landlines and toll free # also when I traveles overseas I could call landlines and office numbers with ease and for free. I use this as a number to give out to people who i buy stuff from online or when companies ask for my # to send ad text, as wel. If it is not used, you will lose the number. I do not recommend using for sensitive data as it is easy to lose the number assigned . that said it is easy to get any # in any area code within the US. üëç

I love this app. Been using it for about 3 years now. I always tell people about this app. It's a great way to have a secondary phone but on same device. Plus it works really well and offers great plans and If you cant afford a plan you can still use it and keep your # for free if needed. Even free for all incoming/outgoing calls with voicemail and text messages also. So you can stay in touch with friends, family, and/or work anytime needed!! Awesome app!!

Beautiful app. I have been using this app for several years and find it very useful and stable. My only reservation is the possibility of losing your phone number if it is not used for a while. The time needs to be extended as sometimes people are unable to use the phone for extensive periods either because of illl health or because the device the number was loaded on has become temporarily unavailable.

title: myAT&T

‚Ä¢ Same app. New myAT&T icon. Check it out on your home screen.
‚Ä¢ New hotspot? Get help with setup at the top of the Support tab.
comments: Very confusing. Every time I try to login I have to change my password. Takes me forever to accomplish anything with ATT. I uninstalled this app, could not get it to let me in. Wanted a wireless number that I do not have. All I want to do is pay my bills. I go through some kind of B.S. every month. Between being on the phone and using the simple AT&T app I have been at this for well over an hour, and still have not paid my bill. Ridiculous!

Update: Originally I could never pay my bill with the app. I always had to call in and explain the difficulties each time. The last 2 or 3 payments have been made so smoothly I would have to say this is now one of the better apps I use. Thanks for fixing all of the issues I have noticed. Original post: This app is absolutely junk. I have so much difficulty with paying my bill each and every month. It just sits there spinning gaining no traction.

I don't really know how good this works. It seems to be working a little bit better now, but it is still having problems remembering my USER ID AND PASSWORD. OH Well, I really hope that is just temporary. On one page it thinks it's 1 thing and on another page it thinks they are something else. For the third time, THIS APP OFFICIALLY STILL WON'T LET ME SIGN IN!üò†üò†üò°üò§ OTHER than that I guess it's ok.

Its been 2 months that me and my wife switched from Verizon to ATT, and yet have been able to get login into an online account. We have spent many hours trying to get this resolved with att and nobody seems to know how to fix the issue, still to this day nothing has been done. The customer service is very unprofessional, and possibly undertrained. I've never had such issues with Verizon and Verizon service is always top notch. Will be back with Verizon after our two years are up.

This app is garbage. You would think AT&T would be sure the app was functioning properly so people could spend money with them, open new accounts, etc., But instead this app literally never works right. It always crashes. It's just garbage. Which reflects AT&T well because none of their stuff ever works. Their service is garbage. And their CUSTOMER SERVICE is even worse. This is so sub par. Verizon is far superior in every way. Unfortunately I live in the woods and AT&T is only one that works

title: Toon Blast
description:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds! 

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

FEATURES:

‚óè Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!
‚óè Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
‚óè Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!
‚óè Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
‚óè Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world! 
‚óè Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing! 
‚óè Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
‚óè Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
descriptionHTML:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds!

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

summary: Welcome to the funniest cartoon puzzle adventure!
recentChanges:
PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS!
Toon Blast introduces the Gelato Runaway episode with 50 new levels!
Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content.
Come and join the fun!
comments: It starts out as a really fun and challenging game, until you advance to higher levels. It becomes nearly impossible to win certain levels without money, boosters or making purchases. No one likes impossible odds. You continually lose on a level just 1 or 2 moves away from winning. So very frustrating! The more you play, the more you realize, there's no skill or strategy, there's not even chance. The game is anything but random: it's totally controlled and manipulated by the game's programming.

I like the game and how challenging the levels are, but the reason for the rating is that it sucks that the only way to save progress is by signing in with Facebook. I'm not a fan of Facebook and wish there was other options to sign in like Candy Crush has. The rewards could be way better the higher you move up the level not the same as the first 20 levels.

Loved playing this game and did so for quite some time. I got permanently banned because of I was accused of cheating. I was using 2 names. I however, wasnt using both. My grandchildren were. So my advice to all is dont use more than 1 name. Lesson learned. Never would have done that if I knew. Read the rules folks. This is an awesome game though and I will miss it horribly.

A little advice about this game. I have been playing for 2 years now.Been hearing how difficult this game is. I have learned to take my time on difficult level's. Their is no time line to complete a game. With knowing this I am able to figure out the difficult level's. I find this game challenging but rewarding. If it becomes hard just take a break and return when ready. Don't give up. The hard levels aren't impossible. Maranatha!!

This game is addictive because of the teams. When it gets too difficult; and it does; you'll find it necessary to buy boosters with real money. ...It sucks when you can't contribute to your team during the tournaments. Don't fall for the free coins, and unlimited lives scam, that will show up in team chat. I'd give this game five stars, but it's too difficult (to do soüòâ).

title: Verizon Cloud
description:
Cloud storage for your mobile devices. Easy to backup, search and share. 

Sign up today for 600 GB or 2 TB of storage and your first 30 days are on us.

Features:  
‚Ä¢	BACK UP your photos, videos, contacts and more to a secure cloud storage
‚Ä¢	SYNC & ACCESS across devices ‚Äì Backup, sync and access your content when you need it, from your smartphone, tablet or computer
‚Ä¢	PRIVATE FOLDER with PIN-protection for your sensitive content 
‚Ä¢	ORDER PHOTO PRINTS & GIFTS using your favorite photos in app
‚Ä¢	CREATE MOVIES AND CUSTOMIZE PHOTOS Make masterpieces with music, filters and fun stickers to share
‚Ä¢	FLASHBACKS ‚Äì Relive your memories from past years with weekly photo flashbacks
‚Ä¢	CAST TO YOUR TV ‚Äì Share your pictures, videos and music with family and friends on the big screen 
‚Ä¢	SHARE select media content from your Cloud using your favorite native apps
What's New in Version 20.10
‚Ä¢	Enhanced Stories for Fall. Highlighting Halloween and Thanksgiving 
‚Ä¢	Backend updates, bug fixes and performance improvements 

Get started with Verizon Cloud today to securely back up, access & share photos, videos, contacts & more!

The Verizon Cloud app can be downloaded and used on any smartphone or tablet running Android software. Go to www.vzw.com/cloud for the complete list.

comments: Absolutely no issues to report. MotoZ4, running Android 10. It's a basic app but, that's exactly what you want in cloud storage. Simple and to the point. Transitions are a little slow but, I'm fine with it; this app is doing what it's supposed to üëç. Total app size: 114 MB. No issues with this. Hey people: a 128 GB Samsung EVO memory card is $20 on Amazon. If your phone is "full," clean it out and expand the storage if you can.

So far good. Will need to see down the calendar a ways. 10/30 - still can't access cloud account. 'Sign in and password valid. We can not verify you have a valid account'. (Paraphrasing). When I purchased this tablet, I also purchased a 1TB account. Why can't I get in?

The latest update (10/9/2020) on my Samsung Galaxy J3V is quite a space hog. The amount of space used has gone from around 40 MB to over 400 MB. The creepy part is that it continues to grow with no end in sight like some weird tumor. The growth is classified as data rather than cache. I was told could delete data but it would then have to re sync. It is now the largest app in memory. Asked if I could safely uninstall this update still waiting for an answer. Less than 3 GB left in storage space.

Upload speeds to cloud server are extremely poor (1-5Mbps), files in the Verizon Sync folder fail to upload and will just repeatedly try over and over (which I suspect is the cause of reviews saying this app used up all their data), desktop app is clunky and outdated, can not log into my account via app from a second phone (my work phone), connections to the cloud service often time out. Competing services have never given me any of these issues and are far more price competitive. This service was included in my cell plan but I would rather pay to use a different service than fight to make this one work for free.

Have never even used this app yet since the latest update my phone has completely run out of space. I have deleted hundreds of pictures and videos (DAILY), deleted apps, and am still unable to use literally anything in my phone. Can't so much as make a call or even try to open any app, including cloud, because they close instantly as it still says it's 100% full. Last night I just happened to notice that this app, that has never been used, is now taking up 10gb! That is completely unacceptable.

STREAM AND DOWNLOAD SONGS FROM TOP ARTISTS

recentChanges:
Say hello to Audiomack version 5.9!

With this new version we made tons of behind-the-scenes improvements and design fixes. The app should run smoother than ever.

Plus... we added a sleep timer feature for premium users! Go to settings to check it out.

If you have any feedback or questions, please reach out to us on Twitter at @audiomack.
comments: Best. App. EVER!! Its amazing! Sure you cant download as many songs as you want, but they are just making buisness! Furthermore, its just great and I am listining to it as I am writing this. I can't think of a better app, spotify is way too expensive as I am a kid. But this here is just an amazing legend. It gets my 5 stars. (It deserves infinite stars though)

I really hate the fact that you know have to upgrade to premium to download as much songs as you want, it really sucks, I've had this app since 2017 when you didn't have to be premium, kinda sucks now you have a limited amount of songs you can download. Also adds are getting worse and worse, need to fix that

audiomack is usually a 5star App ...However, this new upgrade which only allows you to download a certain amount of premiums downloads before forcing an upgrade .... which once was free causing my rating to be as is... i am a long time customer and once im able to download an unlimited amount of download w\o seeing certain songs being characterized as premiums my rating will increase significantly!!!!!

If I'm being honest. Don't understand the complaints. The app devs need the money that they get for premium, limiting the offline Playlist to 20 isn't bad because you can still have an online one. You just need internet to play the songs and most people have data so I don't see the big deal. The app is good, you find new artist, remix and really anything you want. The staff is monitoring the app constantly from what I've seen and overall just works as a good music streaming app.

First. Anybody on this app that is looking for a Apple music replacement is lame; thats why excluscivity has a fee. Second, if you use Live Mixtapes but are tired of the lack of currensy, this is the type of release access you need. Finally, I use more Audiomack than the LiveMixtapes App, the Apple Music app, because apple is...corporate. Eventually they'll pick it up but Audiomack to me is still getting the links to the streets. Like that Zayetoven release, i cant find it anywhere. Thank you.

title: Daily Yoga - Yoga Fitness Plans
description:
We‚Äôre here for you! Daily Yoga opens a Free Collection for you to provide 6 programs and 13 sessions free to everyone, plus the up to 80% Special Off of subscription. We hope to help users to stay safe and keep positive during the uncertain time!

If you're a beginner to yoga, Daily Yoga App provides various guided classes to help you learn the basics before diving into more advanced classes and flows, and if you're advanced‚Äîthere are plenty of the world - class teachers you want to follow with.		

Featured as ‚ÄúWorks with Google Fit‚Äù,‚ÄúTop Developer‚Äù,‚ÄúClear Your MindÔºå Engage Your Body‚Äù, ‚ÄúKeep Calm & Carry On‚Äù in Google Play, 
Voted as‚Äù Best Yoga App‚Äù of the year 2016-2019 by Healthline, 
Awarded by The Wall Street Journal as the ‚Äú5 Addictive Fitness Apps‚Äù.

Various Classes Fit Your Goal‚Ä®
Daily Yoga offers 500+ asanas, 70+ yoga programs, 500+ guided yoga, pilates, meditation sessions plus the largest yoga pose library for man and woman that suit yogis from beginner to advanced. Not only helps you stay with yoga every day, but also provides health benefits for both your mind and body.

Follow the World-Class Master
Altogether 20 yoga masters who are globally respected or the initiator of yoga styles focus on yoga for weight loss, beginner to advanced, better sleep & full relax. Aim to make it easier & convenient to yoga workout and provide programs that align with your current goals. All sessions are taught in English. 

Motivated by Community
The community in Daily Yoga App brings yogis from all over the world closer to one another. Yogis gather here to discuss their practicing experience under the topics, tag and encourage each other to finish the challenge, follow the Yoga Tips to improve their techniques, prepare the weight-control meals according to the selected recipes. Never feel lonely, and become more limber with other motivated yogis around you.

Create Private Yoga Plan
Don‚Äôt like to choose  the default plan? You can create yours. Private Yoga plan is a cycle of 7 days. Set the workout days and rest days according to your own schedule. Then you can combine yoga sessions to each workout day according to your need. If you know your body well, please give it a try to make your workout more efficient.

Adjust to Your Habits¬†
Multiple choices for session duration varied from 5 - 70 minutes to fit your schedule, and 7 languages available worldwide (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, Chinese, German, French). Support for Dark Mode to help to prevent eye strain.

Track Your Activity
Personal data from various devices can be tracked in App. With smart watch, you can track your exercise duration and calories burned and heart rate to contribute to your activity rings and meet your daily goals.

While you are waiting for the update to install, try this easy abdominal breathing: draw your abdomen inward to stabilise your core. As you inhale, bring your fingertips to touch in front of the belly. As you exhale, open your hands out to the sides. Inhale the future, exhale the past. Have fun with it!‚Ä®

Find out even more at http://www.dailyyoga.com;
Contact:
Email: support@dailyyoga.com
Instagram: @DailyYogaApp
Facebook: facebook.com/DailyYogaApp

Privacy Policy: http://www.dailyyoga.com/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: http://www.dailyyoga.com/terms.html

developer: Hong Kong Daily Yoga Culture Technology., Limited
developerAddress:
Room 3306-12, 33/F, Shui On Centre
6-8 Hong Kong Road
Wanchai, Hong Kong
recentChanges:
You can enjoy the new Smart Coach now, with 7 categories and over 400 sessions waiting for serving your personal preference.
1. SCHEDULE supports the retake of missed sessions in history now. Try and get more circles.
2. Another upgrade! Tap the screen to check the pose list while exercising. It's much easier to browse and switch poses now.
3. New Courses in November: Winter Energy Flow-Intermediate Element Yoga, Easy Morning Yoga.
Monthly Golden Day, Thanksgiving, and Black Friday are coming!
comments: I keep using the app often. However, it has many bugs to be fixed. The smart coach shows sessions I did as not done. The time is off by a day so I cannot start my training at the correct day. The contact link connects to a share experience link instead. So how to contact you directly? Navigation through the app is not intuitive and it is congested with a lot of ballast. I'd appreciate very much a simplified version that is more straightforward to use.

Smart Coach was available for silver members. Now they have changed it only for gold members. It is like changing the game rules during the game. May be they will take away other things!!! Very poor taste of business. Although I love the app, I am thinking of switching to the other app just for this reason. Lack of business ethics, and in a yoga app. Another issue with the program. Now they have created a schedule to schedule a program. But there is no reschedule option for the missed days. üò≠

The programs and variety are good, but the app is bad. Buggy, and the material you want to get to - ie sessions - is difficult to get to. Constant ads and notifications you can't turn off, even with the Gold subscription, and the support staff's response is either ignoring criticism or suggesting you delete your account. Would suggest looking elsewhere.

This is the best yoga app I have ever tried and worth every penny if you choose to become a gold member. I tested it for a while now. I get usually bored easily with the same routine and this provides loads of options including levels, specific needs, length, time of day, goals,... The list is long and easy to organize with favorites and home page featured workouts. I will be renewing my subscription for sure!

This was my very first time trying yoga, and this was my first session... as a beginner I think it went pretty well. Could really feel my muscles stretching on some of those poses. But I was afraid I wasn't going to hear what the pose was correctly so I tried to keep my phone within eyesight so I could watch the instructor, but I think once I get the hang of it I won't need to look at my phone anymore and I can concentrate more on my poses.

title: Facebook
description:
Keeping up with friends is faster and easier than ever. Share updates and photos, engage with friends and Pages, and stay connected to communities important to you. 

Features on the Facebook app include:

* Connect with friends and family and meet new people on your social media network
* Set status updates & use Facebook emoji to help relay what‚Äôs going on in your world
* Share photos, videos, and your favorite memories.
* Get notifications when friends like and comment on your posts
* Find local social events, and make plans to meet up with friends
* Play games with any of your Facebook friends
* Backup photos by saving them in albums
* Follow your favorite artists, websites, and companies to get their latest news
* Look up local businesses to see reviews, operation hours, and pictures
* Buy and sell locally on Facebook Marketplace
* Watch live videos on the go


The Facebook app does more than help you stay connected with your friends and interests. It's also your personal organizer for storing, saving and sharing photos. It's easy to share photos straight from your Android camera, and you have full control over your photos and privacy settings. You can choose when to keep individual photos private or even set up a secret photo album to control who sees it.

Facebook also helps you keep up with the latest news and current events around the world. Subscribe to your favorite celebrities, brands, news sources, artists, or sports teams to follow their newsfeeds, watch live streaming videos and be caught up on the latest happenings no matter where you are!

The most important desktop features of Facebook are also available on the app, such as writing on timelines, liking photos, browsing for people, and editing your profile and groups. 

Now you can get early access to the next version of Facebook for Android by becoming a beta tester. Learn how to sign up, give feedback and leave the program in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/133NwuP 

Sign up directly here: 
http://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.facebook.katana

Problems downloading or installing the app? See http://bit.ly/GPDownload1
Still need help? Please tell us more about the issue. http://bit.ly/invalidpackage

Facebook is only available for users age 13 and over.
Terms of Service: http://m.facebook.com/terms.php.

summary: Find friends, watch live videos, play games & save photos in your social network
comments: I could say a lot of things about Facebook and its' very interesting ways of getting zucced, but we are talking about the app itself so here we go: I'm quite used to Facebook app being heavy and full of glitches. But since one of the latest updates, I'm not able to save pictures to my phone. I click 'Save to phone', but it does not save. This is the only app that has this issue.

I Love it because I have found people that I haven't seen in decades. And you can really keep in touch your family and friends. Chat face to face. Especially with the Coivd 19 going. I just think Facebook is the best App. They have ever came out with. I don't think anything could ever top it. So I Just want to thank the Guy Who invented Facebook. Thank you So Very, Very, Very, Very Much. Sincerely Blanche Gilbert : Family, and Friends.

I can't even log on, it. Keep saying my notifications needed to be on, well I never turned it off. I've complained about the issue but I guess they made their money, so the hell with people who have a issue, I got so many people into this game, now I can't do anything Thanks for nothing , I'd give you 1/2 star, because I liked the game

The app works great unless you dare to say anything contrary to the liberal agenda. Expect a lot of censorship, revoking of advertising, and even blocking of your account if you express anything rightwing or moderate. Its a pity, because Facebook used to be a great place where all ideas could be shared and discussed. Now, you can only share and discuss PC ideas or face repercussions. Imagine such a structure when we discovered the earth was a sphere. Oh right. This is exactly what happened then.

The app has been constantly logging me out after the last few updates; and I just noticed today that uploaded videos don't get treated the same way as photos when it comes to privacy settings. Why can't I select my own audience for videos without having to delete them or forever have them accessible to everyone on my friends list? Especially if I use the profile video option, I like choosing my privacy for each post on my own.

title: Diamond Digger Saga
description:
Diamond Digger Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Can you dig it?

Join Diggy as you dig through diamonds and unearth special treasures. Epic adventures await you in the lands of Diamond Dale, Turquoise Meringue and beyond.  

Diggy finds a treasure map, sparking his underground search for gems! Lead Diggy through a world full of diamonds in this wonderful digging adventure! 

Dig a path by clearing away a group of 3 or more diamonds to reach a target score. Use the water to make your way through the rooms and discover treasures!

Unearth gems and rescue fireflies in this beautiful game of wonder and delight.

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!¬†

Diamond Digger Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Diamond Digger Saga features:

‚óè Bright and colorful graphics
‚óè Friendly and fascinating characters living in a fantasy world
‚óè Color bursts, line blasts and dynamite to lend a helping hand
‚óè Unlock boosters and special treasures hidden beneath the ground tiles!
‚óè Easy and fun to play, challenging to master¬†
‚óè Over 700 levels to complete filled with wondrous delights!
‚óè Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
‚óè Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Already a fan of Diamond Digger Saga?¬†Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

facebook.com/diamonddiggersaga
twitter.com/diamond_digger

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Diamond Digger Saga! ‚Ä®‚Ä®

Hey Diggy fans!

The diamonds got a little dusty, so we decided to make them shinier than ever before! You‚Äôll find a heap of improvements made to your gaming experience in this new update.

comments: Was fun for awhile but get to the end it takes weeks to get more levels. The daily gifts never get better the longer you play. Last update has the banners across game almost impossible to move and stuck on 1872 with last phase there are no diamonds to actually pass the level. Now they added this stupid help others, instead of adding levels.
I like this app. Actually I am playing this game since 2017... What I like the most is there is NO ad that will pop up... even your Wifi is on... there will never be an irrititation in this gameüòç
The game is relaxing and cute, and so far I haven't been bombarded with ads!
It's not good when the computer will not give you a match to make anywhere near the goal. I don't spend money on games. Some companies are money grubbers!!!

This game is a random game, I like it for the fact that it makes you think but as an offset it drops stuff you can not think about. If you win the game you can discover hidden layers to the game. I just ask the folks from this game to make it more of a thinking game and less random. Casino games are like that and this one is cute:) Colab with some good games and give out free stuff. I'm not included. I kick this games levels daily./Make it less like a casino slot machine and more like a thought game:) much funner:) OUCCCHHHHH my daughter told me about the money games, Make it real not fake!!! Your game is awesome I love it:) Anyway giving people good things for playing are awesome. Just don't promise 1k in a week for nothing. I love your game and will continue to play:)

Watch on the big screen with Chromecast or Airplay
View on your Android device as well as your connected TV (Chromecast, Apple TV, Roku devices, Playstation, Xbox, Amazon Fire TV, Samsung TV, etc.) and online at www.tubitv.com
Continue watching videos exactly where you left off on any device.
Watch entertainment in your favorite categories and genres like:

Drama Genre
Comedy Genre
Action Genre
Horror Genre
Anime (New Anime, and Next Day!)
Spanish Language (Telenovela)
Korean Movies
...And much, much more from Hollywood, Japan, and Korea!

Find the movie or series you love from leading Hollywood talent, including Oscar winners and movies featuring Ryan Reynolds, Curtis ""50 Cent"" Jackson, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Charlize Theron, Dwayne Johnson, Samuel Jackson, Russell Crowe, and Julia Louis-Dreyfus, among many other elite Hollywood royalty.

Check back weekly (new content added every Friday) to see new free TV shows and movies that are available for you to stream online. You do not have to torrent to watch your favorite movies or shows. Let us know what you want to see added to Tubi and we will work hard to free those videos. We believe that sometimes the best things in life ARE free. Please enjoy and let us know what you think.

Download Tubi TV today and welcome to the FREE TV and movie revolution!
summary: Stream Movies & TV Shows in Holiday, Anime, Horror, Reality & More!
comments: My experience with this app has been a very positive one. This is my fall back app to watch movies when cable TV gets stale. I like to escape in an entertaining movie and can usually find that here. Many older and off the wall movies which works perfectly for my taste. Also some newer movies available. The ads are few and placed about every 20 minutes or so with 1 to 3 at a time. Much better than any other service period. Broadcast TV and cable TV should learn from this. Highly recommended !

Tubi is a good app. I had to change to a tablet, and why did I do that. Now I cannot watch anything without that condemned little circle going round and round every 10 secondsü•∂üò¨üò¨ Now I know we already have at least 3 ads going on in between recesses. These are still ok. But that blasted circle really gots*to*go. I don't know how its gonna happen, but its gotta go. If I cannot watch the movies, it makes no sense keeping the App. Same thing happened on a different phone. I'm hoping for the best

I like that I can pause or fast forward. I miss being able to hit the continue watching part because I usually have limited time and then have to start the show over. For example I was in season six of my kitchen rules and for whatever reason the continue watching part was removed and now I have to rewatch episode one or fast forward several seasons to get back to where I was.

I'm surprised by this app. I didn't think I would like it, but, thanks to the new chromecast with Google tv, I'm trying streaming apps I wouldn't have before. The ads aren't too frequent, and they don't last more than 2 minutes total. And the content is pretty diverse -- a nice supplement to the paid subscriptions I have. I just wish 1. The navigation was a bit smoother/more intuitive, and 2. I could exclude certain types of ads (such as political) from my account.

It was a great app I had no trouble. I for some reason the app is not working you should delet it and intall it again. Other wise it is juast google play. It happened to me and I just donlowed it again and it worked. The other time it was every thing in google play that was not working so the app is perfectly fine and great. I am giving it five stars.

title: GO SMS Pro - Messenger, Free Themes, Emoji
description:
GO SMS Pro - Nearly 100 Million users' choice, all time #1 messaging app to replace the stock! 

The brand new messaging app is simple, intuitive, personalizing and fun!

GO SMS Pro comes with beautiful themes, lovely stickers, private box, pop up windows, GO chat (send free SMS & MMS), dual sim support, and much more. We are committed to making GO SMS Pro faster, safer and tons of great features - messaging has never been so fun and efficient!
----------------------------------------------
Free Features:
‚ñ∫ Hundreds of personalized themes and lovely stickers (keep increasing) 
‚ñ∫ Private box to encrypt messages & protect your privacy
‚ñ∫ Sticky conversations help you focus on important contacts by sticking them at the top
‚ñ∫ Pop up new messages for quick viewing and replying
‚ñ∫ Dual SIM matching, supports 8,000+ dual SIM devices (keep increasing)
‚ñ∫ SMS blocker smartly block blacklist/keywords and filter spam messages 
‚ñ∫ GO chat support for free messages and group chat 
‚ñ∫ Delay to send give you opportunity to correct the wrong messages. 
‚ñ∫ Folded stranger messages Automatically categorize strangers conversations and keep your Inbox simplicity
‚ñ∫ Avatar popup Show the contact avatar above all apps when new messages arrive. It needs SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW permission to show the system level popup.
‚ñ∫Identify calls Identify unknown calls and block spam calls.

Pro Features:
‚ñ∫ Support disabling all sponsored messages
‚ñ∫ Advanced Private Box for renaming or hiding entrance, faking notification as well
‚ñ∫ Unlimited cloud storage space for message backup
‚ñ∫ Free to enjoy all paid themes (Upgrade to Themes VIP) 
--------------------------------------------------------------

GO SMS VIP offers you unlock all features, like themes, stickers, fonts, private box and ad-free experience. Subscription content will be
updated regularly and you can enjoy the updating content during an active period of
subscription. It is an auto-renewing subscription after your 3-day free trial. If you
choose to purchase GO SMS VIP, payment will be charged to your Google
Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to
the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the Play Store after purchase. The current subscription price starts at $9.99/month, $59.99/year. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other
than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. If you don‚Äôt choose to
purchase GO SMS VIP , you can simply continue using it for free.

‚òÖ Follow Us on Facebook
www.facebook.com/gosmspro
Google+: https://plus.google.com/communities/101889041913381333536
Contact us: gosmsprofeedback@gmail.com

Use of this app is governed by our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy!

There will be ad content shown in certain scenes in our app. For more details, visit https://m.facebook.com/ads/ad_choices.

developer: Best Free Video Editor & Video Maker Dev
comments: For an app that supposedly got "updated" recently it still isn't that great. My ringtone still doesn't work. So when I get a text I don't hear the text. If it sounds off it's only for a few seconds. Can you please fix or I'll uninstall this crappy app that I supposedly should "pay for". Even when it was free it worked better. Guess it went down the toilet. Oh, and your email doesn't work either. Should get that fixed too while you're at it.

I have been using Go Sms for a few years now and at the beginning I received read receipt reports when my messages was deliver and read. Now I do not receive that anymore. Could you please have a look into this as it is very important to me to get the notification that the messages I send has been received and opend on the other side. Your feedback would be much appreciated.

I have been using this app for years, even paying for the full version years ago. However, I just noticed I am unable to access or see the backup and restore settings. It is nowhere in the current version (7.92) of the app. I've checked every option available. I've searched troubleshooting articles. I attempted to reach out to the gosms feedback as listed in Google play store, however, the email bounced back stating the mailbox was full. The website doesn't work either. Time to switch!

I like it so far, I like that you can design your own background, text bubbles, color etc, but one thing I noticed is when I get a notification, pull it down and try to reply, the reply button does not appear. Pics wouldn't download after several hours. Update: Pics have been coming thru recently. Please make a way to search keywords in a rext conversation.

I thought I would give this another try. Had it for years and went to another app because of the continuous problems and no response from developer. It says you get a three day trial. But they IMMEDIATELY charged me $59.99. Google Play won't refund me and the developers email is full. If they respond to this review I will update the rating. Now I need to call my bank.

title: Color Road
description:
Roll to the ball which has the same color!
Avoid the ball which has different color.
Good luck!
descriptionHTML:
Roll to the ball which has the same color!
Avoid the ball which has different color.
Good luck!
summary: Welcome to the colorful race!
recentChanges: Minor update.
comments: Good game if a bit boring. My main problem is that the yellow balls with stripes look like money from far away. Quite a simple problem and can be fixed easily. Only get this game if u are really desperate and have nothing else to do. Btw can people STOP moaning about ads as they r needed to keep the game free. If u care that much then dont play the game!!!!!! Duh.

2 issues, ads and lag. Even with a $900 LG V60, this game lags like im playing on a slow phone from 9 years ago. Constantly dropping from a smooth 60fps to 10-15fps. Also, the ad situation is awful. This developer is great at creating a simple, creative game concept, and then ruining it with insane amounts of ads. Literally everytime you die you are faced with a 15-30 second UNSKIPPABLE ad, which happens often with the god awful lag. Which ends up making this more ad watching, than game playing.

It makes me wanna scream, very laggy, i've noticed the developers don't look at the ratings and don't fix the problem, my phone suppers not rejester me swiping the virtual ball the ads are clickbait, it's hard trying to get the ball in the middle, overall just a sucky app
LOVE THIIIIIIISSSSSS but there is lots of lagging I have a good quality phone because its lagging it's weird but it's the game. Worth playing very fun and can get a little boring.
Difficult, but extremely fun at the same time. If people are complaining about ads, then turn your WiFi/mobile data off. 5/5

title: Google Photos
description:
Google Photos is the home for all your photos and videos, automatically organized and easy to share.

      - ‚ÄúThe best photo product on Earth‚Äù ‚Äì The Verge

      - ‚ÄúGoogle Photos is your new essential picture app‚Äù ‚Äì Wired



    The official Google Photos app is made for the way you take photos today and includes essential features like shared albums, automatic creations and an advanced editing suite. You won‚Äôt have to worry about storage either as you can choose to automatically back up all your photos and videos for free in high quality. You can then access them from any connected device and on photos.google.com.



    With the official app, you get:



    FREE HIGH QUALITY STORAGE: Back up unlimited photos and videos for free for up to 16 megapixels and 1080p HD and access them from any device and photos.google.com ‚Äì your photos are safe, secure, and private to you.



    FREE UP SPACE: Never worry about running out of space on your phone again. Photos that are safely backed up can be removed from your device's storage in just a tap.



    SMART AUTOMATIC ALBUMS: Automatically get a new album with just your best shots after an event or trip, then invite others to add their photos.



    AUTOMATIC CREATIONS: Bring photos to life with automatically created movies, collages, animations, panoramas, and more from your photos. Or easily create them yourself.



    ADVANCED EDITING SUITE: Transform photos with a tap. Use intuitive and powerful photo editing tools to apply content-aware filters, adjust lighting, and more.



    SHARING SUGGESTIONS: With smart sharing suggestions, giving your friends the photos you took of them is painless. And they can add their photos, too, so you‚Äôll finally get the photos you‚Äôre actually in.



    FAST AND POWERFUL SEARCH: Your photos are now searchable by the people, places and things in them ‚Äî no tagging required.



    LIVE ALBUMS: Select the people and pets you want to see and Google Photos will automatically add photos of them as you take them, no manual updates needed.*



    PHOTO BOOKS: Create a photo book in just minutes from your phone or computer. You can also see suggested photo books based on your best shots from a trip or period of time.*



    GOOGLE LENS: Search the hard-to-describe and get stuff done, right from a photo. Copy and translate text, identify plants and animals, add events to your calendar, find products online, and more.



    SEND PHOTOS IN SECONDS: Instantly share photos with any contact, email, or phone number.



    SHARED LIBRARIES: Grant a trusted person access to all of your photos.



    You can also upgrade storage for your Google Account, used for Original Quality photos and videos by subscribing to Google One. Subscriptions start at $1.99/month for 100 GB in the US. Pricing and availability can vary by region.

      - Google One Terms of Service: https://one.google.com/terms-of-service

      - One Google Pricing: https://one.google.com/about



    For additional help visit https://support.google.com/photos



    *Face grouping, live albums and photo books are not available in all countries.

comments: It is very good, there is good editing in it, it is available for free in everyone's phone and it also looks good editing the normal photo, but it really takes backup so I liked it This is a gallery, it is very good to save photos and it also has edits, it really keeps updating, so keep updating it, then you get to see new features and I like it too That is why I did not force stop it and I am using it, I would give it 5 stars but due to the lack of any more good features, I will start it only 3

I really can't say that I love the way this app works. It's not at all intutitive. There's such a disconnect between my sd card and my photos on my phone when I'm in the photos app.. I don't really get why this has to be so difficult? It'd be nice if every pic or video the phone has access to (on device or on sd card or in other apps, etc) would just come up when I go into the photos or gallery app. It's like a mystery I have to solve any time I'm trying to work with this app! Thx.

This update is the absolute worst. No longer are the folders small, easy to navigate single pics, but now the first dozen photos from each folder, filling the entire screen, with a tiny label... I can't just tap a pic to open the folder, now I have to scroll through pages to find the folder I'm looking for - plus, other than "camera," everytime I open "Photos," the folders are going n random order - and there's no way to alter or customize the view. Thanks for making garbage! üëç

mostly positive. i like that it keeps my photos on the cloud and that i can use google apps to switch info from phone to phone. but my pixel 3 had an issue with this app where it restarted randomly as i was backing a LOT of stuff up to the cloud and about a 3rd of the photos were corrupted when it started back up again, even on the cloud, even on my phone. also, it says in the description of the app that you can upload unlimited photos and videos for free but you really only get 15 gb

Good. But we need an option where you can manually set some photos to be saved in full resolution and the rest in high quality (free tier). So that the pictures that the user don't want it compressed can be availed in full resolution but the other pictures can be compressed and saved in free tier without using up the GBs allocated to and account. Right now the entire gallery gets uploaded on full resolution, when you change the mode.

title: Monster Legends
description:
Lead your Monster Legends into arena battles in this fighting game. Breed, feed, and train Legendary  and Epic monsters ‚Äì even the brand new Mythics! Build your fighting force and face the ultimate challenge: real-time battles against other Monster Masters.

Collect monsters, choose different sets of skills, and boost your strategy in action-packed battles. Start by building a world for your monsters to live, fill it with habitats, and breed new species!

If you‚Äôre a true Monster Master, you‚Äôll love fighting in Team Wars, where you‚Äôll be able to join other players in the game and win magnificent rewards.

COLLECTION & BREEDING GAME ‚Äì UNIQUE MONSTERS AWAIT
üî• Collect over 700 monsters: New monsters are added to the game every week.
üî• Breed monsters of different elements and rarities to create cool new species.
üî• Obtain incredible monsters of all types in the game‚Äôs limited-time events.
üî• Get ready to master the strongest rarity ever discovered, the new Mythic monsters.

RPG PROGRESSION & STRATEGY
üÜô Level up your monsters for the battles ahead and rank them up in the Monster Lab to break their limits.
üÜô Boost your monsters‚Äô powers with Runes and equip them with valuable Relics to gain advantages in battle.
üÜô Set your monster teams combining attackers, tanks, and control monsters.

MULTIPLAYER REAL-TIME GAMES!
‚öîÔ∏è In Live Duels, you don‚Äôt need to own monsters to create your dream team and duel against another Monster Master.
‚öîÔ∏è Fight PvP battles in the Multiplayer Mode each season for trophies, rewards, and a chance to reach the Top Leagues.
‚öîÔ∏è Join a team, build a strategy in the Team Chat, fight in Team Wars, and obtain exclusive monsters from the Team Shop.
‚öîÔ∏è Challenge your teammates and friends in Friendly Live Battles, a real-time battle mode.

BUILD A MONSTER PARADISE!
üß∞ Build a Monster Paradise with everything you need: A Breeding Mountain, Habitats, Temples, and more!
üß∞ Unlock special buildings in the islands, like the Library, the Ultra Breeding Tree, the Temples of the Guardians, and the Monster Lab.

Are you skillful enough to fight for your chance to become the #1 Monster Master in the world?

Join your friends and connect with a Monster Community of over 60 million players:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MonsterLegends
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/monsterlegends
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/MonsterLegendsGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Monster_Legends
Discord: https://discord.gg/monsterlegends

Monster Legends is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-game items with real money. If you wish to disable this, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet‚Äôs Settings.

summary: Monster breeding game where you collect monsters and battle your opponents! üëäüèÜ
recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Great game! I've been playing maybe 4 months now and, hey, I'm still here and a daily player! The gameplay is very similar to Dragon Mania, but there are more events, ways of earning free stuff, and tons of side-quests to do. The game is fun and keeps me busy! I would recomend this app to everyone who likes fighting and collecting games. Did I mention there are also live duels and PVP aspects of the game?!?!?

The game is awesome and all, but I do have a couple complaints. First, I do not like when I press "Repeat" on accident when I'm about to breed two monsters, why not make another tab asking if you really wanna repeat just in case we do press it? Second is just a recommendation, but if you're removing like, a medium rock and it only has less than an hour left to finish, it'd be cool if you would make it cost gold at that point.

I really like this game! The graphics are definately simething that I also enjoy. However, I find it unbelivable that gems are so hard to get and majority of the monsters are really expensive. I think that it would be better if it was easier to obtain gems, like giving more gems for daily reward, making gems the reward for completing daily tasks or so. Thank you for reading this! I hope you consider this post!

This game is really good and gives you something to do if you are bored. The reason why I only gave it 4 stars is just because there is so much downtime whenever you want to play. For example if you wanted to do the campain you only have a certain amount of energy. I get why they do this but I dont like how long you have to wait in order to be able to do the missions again. I do love the fact however that you can get free epics, rares, and legendaries with the maze events. I recommend the game!

Honestly it's a really good game and it's addicting but some of the past updates have made it harder to play for example, the dungeons use to give really good rewards that helped you progress through the game faster and easier but now it gives really low rewards and as well of rewards in general like a roulette wheel spin, I don't know if it's because of my level but either way this game is really awesome and you should download and try it if you haven't already.

title: TSheets Time Tracker
description:
Manage time & log hours with ease! TSheets time tracker for work is a cloud-based time tracking and scheduling app for employees that allows them to clock in and out each work day from their smartphones. With TSheets as the work clock, employees can easily track work hours, create a work log and even track PTO - More than your usual time clock app.

ONLINE TIMESHEETS ‚è≤Ô∏è
 Time logging has never been easier - The TSheets time clock app allows you to replace paper timesheets with accurate, electronic time data and makes payroll and invoicing faster and more affordable. The TSheets time tracking app also accurately tracks time and GPS locations. So, why track work hours manually? Install this time clock app, calculate timesheets automatically and manage time for quick bookkeeping with the best time tracking software. 

SOPHISTICATED TIME RECORDING ‚è≤Ô∏è
Here are some features that make TSheets the best app for tracking work hours: use TSheets time clock features - clock in and out to track work hours, change job codes, edit digital timesheets, view time tracking reports and changes to the work schedule and even track PTO. Time recording is easy with this time tracker app.
‚Ä¢ Track time against multi-level job codes, projects, locations, clients, and more.
‚Ä¢ Track employee hours accurately with a real-time online time clock.
‚Ä¢ Easily switch between job codes, pause time tracking, or take a break.

MANAGE TIME ‚è≤Ô∏è

recentChanges: We squashed those pesky bugs that were causing the app to crash for some of you.
comments: Freezes up every time try to check week time clock and scroll through jobs. Makes checking in a pain in the a$$ Update... 3 updates in the few weeks and still bugs. I'm not able to balance out my crew because I cant check week totals. All these changes to this app are making me want to find a new program.

Ever since they updated with qb security, it takes way too long to log in. Why do I need a verification code EVERY TIME I log in! It's as bad as QuickBooks now. My bank doesn't require a verification code every single time and they are infinitely way more important than QuickBooks or Tsheets. You guys act like you need this much security. Qb is a terrible company. I hope I find another service soon so I can dump them.

After the Tsheets has joined with Intuit it has locked myself and most of my staff out. As we use it for payroll you can imagine the headache. Periodic downtimes, schedule duplication if you have it on separate devices, or making changes that simply disappear are all common issues. Not clocking out or back in or from job to job is an issue for the field as well. I and my office spend more time on this app than needed to. Use another service.

So far this app has been great. Only had it crash once, but once the update came in it was fixed. The only tiny issue i have now is when i clock in it delays a minute before clocking me in causing me to be a minute late. However i'm not entirely sure if that's the app or just my phone.

Horrible since Quickbooks bought the company. I have been a Tsheets user for 3 years. Before QB, it was wonderful and had immediate phone support. QB's made changes to login and have to generate a QB account and even then they email you a verification code every time you try and login. There is no longer any telephone support and have pushed everyone to online chat. My last chat experience took 38 minutes to get a hold of someone.

title: Pandora - Streaming Music, Radio & Podcasts
description:
Listen to songs hand-picked by some of the top athletes in the world on UNINTERRUPTED Radio. Their music, their vibes, their channel.

Pandora gives you a personalized listening experience that continually evolves with your tastes. 

Create stations from your favorite songs, artists or genres, search or browse to find recommended stations for your mood or activity, and discover podcasts that speak to you. Download today and get instant access to your favorite artists and podcasts, while staying up to date on the most recent singles and releases. From rap and pop to rock and country, play your favorite artists and stay up to date on today‚Äôs top hits and releases. Start streaming all of the current global hits and enjoy your own personalized music experience. 

Take Pandora with you wherever you go with Android Auto for your daily commute or your next road trip. Enjoy your own personalized music or podcast experience from anywhere on the world‚Äôs most powerful music discovery platform. The new voice mode lets you search, play, pause, skip adjust volume & thumb up music with a simple voice command. Start streaming your favorite artist, song, genre, or podcast instantly today for free in your car.

With Podcasts on Pandora, find your favorites and listen to personalized recommendations that actually make sense. Just search on your mobile phone or tablet and play to start listening, then tap + to add to your collection. Find something new by simply browse and tap recommended podcasts to find over 1,400 podcasts, including SiriusXM shows, on-demand whether you're on Pandora Premium, Plus or Radio.

Looking for more?

Meet Pandora Modes - The new way to customize your station experience. Choose from six different modes to switch up the kind of music you're hearing:
‚Ä¢My Station: The station experience you know and love.
‚Ä¢Crowd Faves: Hear the most üëçsongs by other listeners.
‚Ä¢Deep Cuts: Hear less familiar songs from station artists.
‚Ä¢Discovery: Hear more artists who don't usually play on this station.
‚Ä¢Newly Released: Hear the newest releases from station artists.
‚Ä¢Artist Only: Hear songs from the station artist.

Pandora Premium‚Ñ¢
Subscribe to enjoy personalized on-demand music and podcasts

‚Ä¢ Search and play your favorite songs, podcasts, albums and playlists on-demand
‚Ä¢ Create playlists, not worklists ‚Äì on your own or powered by Pandora
‚Ä¢ Download the music you want for offline listening
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and replays
‚Ä¢ Higher quality audio
‚Ä¢ Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus‚Ñ¢
Subscribe to enjoy personalized radio with ad-free music

‚Ä¢ Unlimited personalized stations and podcasts
‚Ä¢ Up to four stations for offline listening
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and replays
‚Ä¢ Higher quality audio
‚Ä¢ Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus subscriptions are $4.99 per month. Pandora Premium subscriptions are $9.99 per month. You‚Äôll be charged as a recurring transaction through your Google Play account. Pending trial eligibility, charges for Plus >($4.99/month) or Premium ($9.99/month) begin at the end of a free trial unless you cancel 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription month. Any unused portion of a free Pandora Plus trial period will be forfeited if you upgrade to Pandora Premium. You can manage your subscription, cancel or turn off auto-renewal through Account Settings in your Google Play account. Pandora is available to US customers only.

Some advertising exclusions apply. Skips, replays and offline features may be limited by certain licensing restrictions. Pandora may use large amounts of data, and carrier data charges may apply. For best results, we recommend you connect your device to trusted Wi-Fi networks when available.

Terms and conditions:
www.pandora.com/legal
www.pandora.com/legal/subscription
www.pandora.com/privacy

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Dark Mode is now available to users with Android 10 or greater and Samsung users with devices supporting Night Mode! Switch to Dark Mode to lower the brightness of your interface so you can focus on your music, not the screen.

‚Ä¢ Offline Podcasts are now available to Plus and Premium subscribers! Take your favorite episodes and series with you wherever you go, even without internet.
comments: Ive been using Pandora for three years, and lately I've been having issues. Whenever I choose a specific song on my playlist it doesnt play it and ends up playing a different song on my playlist. I updated it and everything, and it still hasnt been fixed. I have no idea if it is a bug, but it needs to be fixed asap.

I've had continuous problems with pandora since I got it. I download songs and playlists, then when I try to play them, it says I haven't downloaded them. It never wants to open unless it has an internet connection, even though all I ever listen to is my playlists in offline mode unless I am actively searching for new music. And now today, with no warning or reason WHATSOEVER, it has erased ALL my music and playlists!!!!! My advice is don't waste your money.

I use it just about every day. The app will automatically close if I pause a song for 1 min to do something on my phone. The app will close and I have to restart it and the playlist. super annoying. I've un-installed and re-installed it, and that helped the crashes that everyone, including myself, used to have. It didn't help the pause and automatically closing issues...I've checked my phone settings on my old Samsung10 5g and they're cool...it is the app that is the issue.

I've been a Pandora subscriber for several years now. I love no ads. Since Last update, Pandora just stops working and closes. I thought it was my phone. Then I changed phones, for other reasons. Still plays for about 15 minutes before having to reopen the app. I hope that bug can be fixed. I have to see all that work fine tuning my stations be all for naught.

Used to work great but now it will shuffle through all songs without playing them , the songs will pop up then the next one will pop up while no music is heard or can be played. I've uninstalled multiple times and can't figure out the issue. I want my refund back because I can't use the app or listen to the song I want

title: YouTube
description:
Get the official YouTube app for Android phones and tablets. See what the world is watching -- from the hottest music videos to what‚Äôs trending in gaming, entertainment, news, and more. Subscribe to channels you love, share with friends, and watch on any device.

With a new design, you can have fun exploring videos you love more easily and quickly than before. Just tap an icon or swipe to switch between recommended videos, your subscriptions, or your account. You can also subscribe to your favorite channels, create playlists, edit and upload videos, express yourself with comments or shares, cast a video to your TV, and more ‚Äì all from inside the app.

FIND VIDEOS YOU LOVE FAST

‚Ä¢ Browse personal recommendations on the Home tab

‚Ä¢ See the latest from your favorite channels on the Subscriptions tab

‚Ä¢ Look up videos you‚Äôve watched and liked on the Account tab

CONNECT AND SHARE

‚Ä¢ Let people know how you feel with likes, comments, and shares

‚Ä¢ Upload and edit your own videos with filters and music ‚Äì all inside the app

comments: I have been using the app for years! And I still think it holds up today! However, there is a worrying trend i've been seeing YouTube do over the last few years. From what ive seen, with each new update, YouTube keeps finding ways to make it's mobile app more and more genaric looking and confusing to navigate though. To the point where the interface looks more like a bootleg instagram than YouTube! It doesn't destroy the app or anything, but I hope this gets less of an issue in the future.

Finally the touch interface has been reverted back to normal. On screen info disappears after a few seconds, or you can tap somewhere there is no controls to make them disappear. This is so much better than the controls staying on screen forever until you press the X in the top right. It took a long time (I have no idea why) This way of using touchscreen devices in a full screen mode like YouTube videos is way easier. You tap to bring up controls, you turn captions on or change the resolution.

Every time this app updates it gets worse. I don't understand how the rating is 4.1 when every review is 2 stars or less. I pay for premium and even when I put on a playlist the screen will go black after a few videos and stop completely. I'm paying! If I want to watch videos all night non stop I should be able to, it's ludicrous. There's no customer support whatsoever. Complete garbage. I'm just going to switch to Rumble or another service. Every once in a while it'll show ads I pay not to see.

This is really annoying. At first, it.was great and really working well except from a little bit log. But now,i can't even open it. Once i open it,it would say to update. So i update it. After that, it say that"There is a problem network connection(400)". Even if i try to restart my device,it will still do the same! This is really annoying. All of my battery just got that i spent that i used to watch,all just work for nothing. Fix it right away! This is just what i do relax! miss the old Youtube

This is by far my favorite app that has ever been created so far! It's great for music, podcasts, funny videos! U name it then it's most likely to be a video on YouTube! The king application for uploading videos! The one downside is there are way too many ads. But your in luck because there's a ad free version, for a small monthly fee, of course! Enjoy!

title: Twitter
description:
Join the conversation! Twitter is your go-to social media app and the source for what's happening in the world. Tweets cover trending topics from world news to local news, celebrity gossip to sports and gaming, politics to fun stories that go viral, if it happens in the world, it is trending now on Twitter. Find friends, share your opinion, gain followers or follow influential people - every voice can impact the world! Join over 2 BILLION users worldwide!

Tweet, Retweet, Reply to Tweets, Share or Like all that‚Äôs trending now!
Retweet, chat privately or go big and initiate a group conversation with your Twitter followers. Get all the social media news in one place - Search hashtags and influencers, chat with friends & other Twitter followers or follow your favorite celebrity alongside hundreds of interesting Twitter users. Read their content & all trending topics at a glance. Engage your social network with noteworthy links, photos and videos. Start microblogging, share your opinion and discover which of your daily Tweets were liked or Retweeted.

Create Your Free Twitter Account Today!
Twitter allows you to find interesting people or build a following of people who are interested in your opinion. Social networking has never been easier! Twitter allows celebs to build a personal connection and even chat with their fans. This is why Twitter has become one of the most used social media platforms in the world.

Build an Engaging Profile
*Customize your profile, add a photo, description, location, and background photo
*Tweet often, expand your social network and optimize your posting times
*Post visual content
*Use hashtags in your tweets
*Draw in followers from other social media platforms outside of Twitter

Know What‚Äôs Trending Now
Discover top trending hashtags, find the latest social media news and celebrity gossip, stories, entertainment and breaking news headlines. Whether you‚Äôre interested in sports highlights, pop culture and entertainment or politics, Twitter is your source of information.

Live Streaming Events
Join the conversation or watch live videos to deeply engage with large audiences & influencers directly from your mobile device. Go Live, create your own live streaming events, share videos or sit back and watch events from around the world.

Like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/TwitterInc/
Follow us on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/twitter/?hl=en


Privacy Policy: https://twitter.com/en/privacy
Terms and Conditions: https://twitter.com/en/tos


We share device identifying data with some advertising partners which may include app opens that happen prior to signing up. Please see here for more details: https://help.twitter.com/en/safety-and-security/data-through-partnerships

recentChanges: Get ready for the new dark mode, now with 2 options ‚Äì dim and lights out ‚Äì and an automatic setting!
comments: This has been bothering me for so many times already. i mean, who would like to be verified multiple times when they've already done it once?!?!? twitter keeps asking me to verify myself to prove that i'm not a bot, so i did. then Twitter asks me again. Honestly its annoying, shouldn't once be enough already? now i can't even get into my account cause they're asking for my phone number, and it says that its unsupported, which doesn't make sense cause thats what i've been using 4 making accs..

For the new update, when my list is pinned to my home page, if I scroll through my list and look at a video or picture, when I exit out of the full screen I'm immediately sent up to the very top of the page. It doesn't go back to the tweet I was looking at. Can you please fix it everything was working fine before :)

It's been working fine until I couldn't post tweets as fast as before. Thought it was because of the connection or it just needs an update but no, it took forever before it worked properly. It gave me a scare cause suddenly it wouldn't load the interface, I even thought I was hacked. Please make an announcement if you had a downtime, outage etc.

As many have already pointed out and subsequently ignored by the devs, the latest update is a complete disaster. Everything has slowed down to a crawl, it's laggy, notifications don't work and there is no transparency in what exactly is changed or improved with each download just "bugfixes" they write, who knows what stuff they are secretly adding or doing that effects your private things. Heavily Disappointed. Fix this please and reply to the users instead of ignoring them.

Can't see Tweets from accounts I haven't blocked, can't see any profile (if I'm lucky to even be able to see one) without seeing a message saying "The term you entered did not bring any results. Please try again later.", media won't load 4 times out of 5 when clicking on it. Been happening since the latest update

title: PewDiePie's Tuber Simulator
description:
Follow in the footsteps of one of the biggest internet stars, PewDiePie, by creating your very own pocket Tuber in PewDiePie's Tuber Simulator! Will you become the biggest, baddest Tuber ever in no time and kick PewDiePie out of his own throne? 

Find out in this 2.5D isometric retro styled game!
