comments: This app can clean junk files and find duplicate files, so they can be deleted (cleaned). It also can find any large files that are taking up allot of space, then you can select the large files that you don't want to keep, so they can be removed. I've only used this app a few times, so if there are any other features that I overlooked, then I probably haven't encountered them yet.

Earlier I requested to reduce the text size and you did it. Thanks a lot, now it is looking very good. I have one more suggestion/request. It shows, for example in my phone, out of "64 GB", 20 GB used. But in 64 GB some space are reserved, as we know, so it is quite difficult for me to analyze what actual space I used out of the free space. It should show something like out of 43 GB free space that has been given to user, I have used 20 GB. I hope you understand what I am trying to say.

I love that this app finds your duplicate files, however there is not enough information provided. What does the little white tag in the corner of the photo mean? After you click delete a message asks-do you want to delete all versions of downloaded files? (4) What? Why? I selected more than 4 photos. Which ones are these? Did I select all versions? Then, NO. But your only choice is yes (recommended) or cancel which goes back to the previous screen, thereby blocking the delete function. SCARY!

Like many of the Google apps, this one is both helpful and annoying. It is helpful to have an app that makes it easier to clean up my phone and get rid of unneeded files to free up space. On the other hand, it's annoying that it always wants to delete my downloaded pictures, music, etc., that I really want to keep on my phone.

I have always loved Google files. A lot of times you think you have cleared out a lot of junk. But then you think to see what files may say. And you are surprised to see that you missed some. Great gift you get even more free space. THANK YOU again Google! Edited, I just got a new phone and files was one of the first appt I downloaded. It is still a must have.ü§ó Edit. 10/26/20 I just wanted to repeat everything I said already. Especially for my Lenovo Chromebook Duet Google Files is the best.

title: VLC for Android
description:
VLC media player is a free and open source cross-platform multimedia player that plays most multimedia files as well as discs, devices, and network streaming protocols.

This is the port of VLC media player to the Android‚Ñ¢ platform. VLC for Android can play any video and audio files, as well as network streams, network shares and drives, and DVD ISOs, like the desktop version of VLC.

VLC for Android is a full audio player, with a complete database, an equalizer and filters, playing all weird audio formats.

VLC is intended for everyone, is totally free, has no ads, no in-app-purchases, no spying and is developed by passionate volunteers. All the source code is available for free.


Features
‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì
VLC for Android‚Ñ¢ plays most local video and audio files, as well as network streams (including adaptive streaming), DVD ISOs, like the desktop version of VLC. It also support disk shares.

All formats are supported, including MKV, MP4, AVI, MOV, Ogg, FLAC, TS, M2TS, Wv and AAC. All codecs are included with no separate downloads. It supports subtitles, Teletext and Closed Captions.

VLC for Android has a media library for audio and video files, and allows to browse folders directly.

VLC has support for multi-track audio and subtitles. It supports auto-rotation, aspect-ratio adjustments and gestures to control volume, brightness and seeking.

It also includes a widget for audio control, supports audio headsets control, cover art and a complete audio media library.


Permissions
‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì
VLC for Android needs access to those categories:
‚Ä¢ "Photos/Media/Files" to read your all media files :)
‚Ä¢ "Storage" to read your all media files on SD cards :)
‚Ä¢ "Other" to check network connections, change the volume, set the ringtone, run on Android TV and display the popup view, see below for details.

Permission Details :
‚Ä¢ It needs "read the contents of your USB storage", in to order to read your media files on it.
‚Ä¢ It needs "modify or delete the contents of your USB storage", in order to allow deletion of files and store subtitles.

‚Ä¢ It needs "full network access", to open network and internet streams.
‚Ä¢ It needs "prevent phone from sleeping" in order to prevent... your phone from sleeping when watching a video.
‚Ä¢ It needs "change your audio settings", in order to change audio volume.
‚Ä¢ It needs "modify system settings", in order to allow you to change your audio ringtone.
‚Ä¢ It needs "view network connections" in order to monitor whether device is connected or not.
‚Ä¢ It needs "draw over other apps" to start the custom picture-in-picture widget.
‚Ä¢ It needs "control vibration" to give feedback on the controls.
‚Ä¢ It needs "run at startup" to set recommendations on Android TV launcher screen, only used on Android TV devices.
‚Ä¢ It needs "microphone" to provide voice search on Android TV devices, only asked on Android TV devices.
descriptionHTML:
VLC media player is a free and open source cross-platform multimedia player that plays most multimedia files as well as discs, devices, and network streaming protocols.

This is the port of VLC media player to the Android‚Ñ¢ platform. VLC for Android can play any video and audio files, as well as network streams, network shares and drives, and DVD ISOs, like the desktop version of VLC.

VLC for Android is a full audio player, with a complete database, an equalizer and filters, playing all weird audio formats.

VLC is intended for everyone, is totally free, has no ads, no in-app-purchases, no spying and is developed by passionate volunteers. All the source code is available for free.

comments: Used to be my favorite media player app on all devices, but no more. PC version is still great, but the Android version can no longer log into my samba server. It did not work great, I had to quit and restart ever so often to re-access folders, but at least this workaround existed. Now this (for me) most essential feature is broken. Now I use MX Player for my smb needs. That works ok, but MX Player does not support casting to Chromecast anywhere near as well as VLC used to.

Prior to the current update, this app was 5 stars. Every part of it was magnificent and truly revolutionary. A free all encompassing media player with a built in preamp, no ads being shoved down your throat, and a beautiful interface. However, the current update removes the latter, making it look like a Facebook clone, as well as adds significant slowdowns and lag spikes. At times, I have to wait 10-15 seconds for my song to play, an "instantaneous" action. The prior was better, but still fine.

was the best app for my audio files. started "parsing media" all the time a couple of months ago, and today, it completely lost all of my files. sad. now I have to find a new media playerüòü Update 10/25/2020: reinstalled this app on my new phone, and it worked great! . . . Until it was updated. Then it lost most of my files, and I had to uninstall it. Again. It seems like this app is either 5 stars or 1 star depending on the updates, so I'm going to give it 3 stars for average.

Before current update, was 5-star. Now it's incredibly buggy. Biggest problems I've encountered is that media continues to play when app is closed, and random album art assigned to any audio files without existing art. The former is especially irritating. New interface is also much more awkward. Looking for a new media player.

I have used VLC for more than ten years -- on Macs, PCs, Linux, and Android. Beginning with this version, I can no longer manually load subtitles, which makes the app unusable on my Android devices. I am currently working on removing it from my tablet and manually installing an older version. Sorry, but this has gone from being the best media player on the planet, to becoming a major fail.

title: Microsoft Outlook: Organize Your Email & Calendar
description:
Easily organize with email, calendar, and files in one app with Microsoft Outlook. With intelligent email, calendar reminders and contacts, Outlook for Android lets you do more from one powerful inbox. Connect. Organize. Get things done.

Email friends, family and colleagues from multiple accounts on one app and see what matters most first with the Focused Inbox that keeps the important messages on top. Switch between your emails and calendar to schedule your next meeting or share your availability with anyone with just a few taps. Email a document from your Files list or a photo from your Gallery and attach it easily.

Microsoft Outlook provides seamless inbox management that enables you to stay connected on the go. Outlook includes Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneDrive integrations to help you manage and send files and connects with Teams, Zoom and other video calling providers without hassle.

Customize email and calendars so you can stay on top of your busy day. Listen to what‚Äôs new in your inbox, organize  schedules and more. Find what you need with Search- it‚Äôs only a tap away or you can use your voice and ask for what you need with language you use every day.

Outlook for Android works with Microsoft Exchange, Microsoft 365, Outlook.com, Gmail and Yahoo Mail.

 MICROSOFT OUTLOOK FEATURES:

 One Place ‚Äì Email, Calendar, Contacts & Files
‚Ä¢ Email, calendar, contacts and files are all together in one place.
‚Ä¢ Calendar and file access right from your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Connected experiences with Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Office documents are accessible from Outlook, stored locally, or on OneDrive or other cloud storage.
‚Ä¢ Create and join your online video calls and meetings with Teams, Zoom, BlueJeans and Webex.

Organized ‚Äì Email & Day Planner Management
‚Ä¢ Outlook helps you stay on top of your day with customized calendar and email capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Know what‚Äôs Up Next in your day from your calendar with a glance at your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Email inbox management displays your most important messages first and enables swipe gestures and smart filters.
‚Ä¢ Use as an organizer & share calendars to easily coordinate schedules.
‚Ä¢ RSVP to invitations from your inbox and send a personalized comment too.
‚Ä¢ Add schedules from Facebook or of your favorite sports & TV shows through Bing calendars.

Intelligent ‚Äì Calendar & Inbox Organizer
‚Ä¢ Outlook provides helpful ways for you to stay focused.
‚Ä¢ Use your voice to find people, contacts, emails, events and attachments with Search.
‚Ä¢ Use suggested replies instead of typing out your message responses to get things done faster.
‚Ä¢ Email manager highlights actions for you through @mentions.
‚Ä¢ Calendar automatically updates with travel and delivery information.
‚Ä¢ Focused Inbox keeps important emails and conversations front and center.
‚Ä¢ Email organizer groups same subject emails and conversations for easier tracking.
‚Ä¢ Listen to your emails with Play My Emails in English and catch up hands-free to get time back in your day.

Secure ‚Äì Safe Email Management & Spam Protection
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Outlook protects your information with security you can trust.
‚Ä¢ Simple, secure sign-on to authenticate and protect your identity.
‚Ä¢ Email management with built-in protection against viruses and spam.
‚Ä¢ Advanced protection to keep your messages safe from phishing attacks and other online threats.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft security and privacy keeps your email, calendar, contacts and files safe.

Get management for contacts, email, work schedule, files and more with Microsoft Outlook today.

recentChanges: Sick of that company-wide email that everyone is still replying all to? So are we. Stay focused on what's important by getting it and all future replies out of your inbox and straight into deleted items with our new Ignore Conversation feature.
comments: Love Outlook! Always have! I've used other formats & platforms over the years, when working at someone else's house or office, or using equipment not my own, but nothing has ever come close to matching the complete package that is Outlook. It's extremely user friendly & even the tech-challenged can usually sort their way through pretty much any function, with relative ease. I have always used Outlook & at 55 years old, don't imagine I'll be changing anytime soon.

I use this for work. There is often an extremely long delay between getting a notification for an email and actually being able to view it. The email will be instantly available in Outlook online, but can take up to 5 minutes to load in mobile. The app sends notifications for meetings 15 minutes in advance, but clearing the notification in any way just results in the app resending the notification. Oh, it does the same thing with "meeting has ended" notifications. Atrocious app design.

On my old Samsung phone I had the outlook app and NEVER had problems with it. I have had a new phone for 2 weeks and this app has had endless problems. It freezes, it doesn't load emails, it won't send emails and every variation in between. I have followed online suggestions to clear the cache and data and yes the problem is solved for no more than 1 day. I have also uninstalled and reinstalled the app and again the problem is solved for a day and then back to having the same issues. Woeful!

Whilst I love the features of Ms Outlook, the app has pitfalls. I will receive a notification of a new email, click to review said email and it will be no where to be found. Refresh, refresh, nothing! However, if I go on the desktop web version I will see everything as it is to date. ... This app defeats the purpose of having a mobile service if I always have to draw for my laptop to review emails.

This version of Outlook (mobile, Android) seems appropriately scaled down to suit small screen and "keyboard" use and appears to have been optimised for email. Most (or maybe all?) of its original functionality is there, but some features might need a bit of hunting, until you learn how to find them. . Great to be able to use full strength email via phone, with that robust corporate look & feel that Outlook is known for.

comments: I straight up didn't install this app. I've never used it or opened it either but it was taking up lots of my battery (about 1% which is a lot for an app that I have literally never opened). I'm assuming my provider (Verizon, surprise, surprise) downloaded this app automatically during an update to my phone which is fantastic, since I was never alerted of this (read: sarcasm).

Complete Battery Hog. I have to disable the web protection settings or it chews up my battery life in a matter of hours. According to my battery usage stats, Verizon's "anti-virus scanner" uses up more battery than Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Mobile Games. On some days, Combined. Samsung Galaxy S10.

I have been a subscriber with VERIZON for about 14 yrs. I have been more than satisfied with the cell svc, their products they sell, the support teams, and most of all the protection products they offer. This particular app is of the highest quality out on the market. Can't go wrong with this one!!!

comments: The game was amazing. But when I hit level 12 it did not let me go to the next level. I played level 12 about 5 times. It only let me play levels 1-12. Then it said that I have to rate the game. When I rated the game, I went to the game to play again. But it said I have to rate but I already did. So I deleted the review and decided to write a really mean review. IF YOU WILL REGET IT. PLEASE DO NOT GET THE GAME.

At first this game was really fun, but then when i finished level 12 it asked me to rate it and there was no "later" option as there usually is so i rated the game and when i got back to the game to continue playing, i had to do the level all over again, so i did, and then the same thing happened after i finished the level for the second time. I am so angry. Defenitly deleting the game.

I love this game. Because of quarantine I have a lot of free time and this game helps m kill that time. I love that the ads are somewhat limited. The only thing I don't like is that is makes you watch an ad when you got the help buttun. Would definitely recommend üòâ

Roller Splat! is the exciting free game you'll want to tell your friends about. Which level can they get to?!

comments: I really like the idea, the art is very nice. Everything feels natural with the controls. The one thing I DONT LIKE is that it feels like a tutorial for 29 levels and then level 30 took me by surprise. It was a fun challenge. But a steep jump in difficulty progression. Once again, a great game which deserves 5 stars, but tweaks could be made to better user experience!

Would be a good game if they didn't just repeat the same puzzles over and over again, just flipping and reversing previous levels. It's dumb. Also you can't go back to previous levels you can only play the one you're on and the difficult ones come maybe once in 50 levels. Boring. And since it's a VOODOO game, you know you have to turn off your data and wifi otherwise you'll be hit with a ridiculous amount of ads... At least one after each 10 second level...

Good concept, decent design, crappy execution. I think it's relaxing, and it'd be fun if the ads weren't so intrusive, it didn't constantly repeat levels, and if there was actually thought put into the puzzles. Half of the time you can't actually make any choices. You just move the ball on a track. The other half it's very random feeling. There's no ramp up in challenge. Some of the first levels are repeated much later in the game.

You must work on levels. how come level 139 is as easy as level 1.. It seems its just showing up any random level and back button does not work when you are playing a level... you cannot go back to level listing. I could play this game with absolutely no mind involved. Its like drawing doodles on a blank paper. and after some time. people will just delete it out of boredome. Seems like work of someone new with game dev. well if that is the case. Keep it up. Consider players' perspective.

The first time I played this game it was pretty cool good but as I played it more I realized that the levels became easier.... I hate the game now. Even though level 20 and 15 look "hard" their really easy so umm.... Why do people even give this five four three stars? ;-; I'm honestly disappointed well done to the people who tried and are enjoying the game. Oh and to many ads!.. the same fricking and keeps playing again (x2) So like um the ads are way to much

comments: I had AVG years ago. Had issues. Installed AVG Free a month ago. So impressed after a month, I bought the upgrade version. WOW! What a difference a clean machine makes! TY ! BobG in AZ

Love this!! Can clean out caches, hibernate files etc. without accidentally getting rid of files I don't want to lose, all with a push of a couple of buttons. No more painstaking searches through each and every file to find more memory space each time I get low or my speed bogs down. I use this at least once a day if not more. Can't beat the price--FREE!!!

I've tried using this 3 times with an uninstall in between. Last time was directly after a factory reset. Each time the app just makes all open apps flash on and off as well as my screen to come on after locking my phone with the power button. Seriously not a good performing app. Did it do what it was supposed to do? I think so when everything stopped flashing. But nothing that my OS tools already don't do for free. Am using Android 10 on an LG V40 ThinQ.

I am impressed. Easy to use and you can take care of your device for all your devices in one app! Adding the AVG Antvirus is a great plus especially when you have the Ultimate subscription. The anti virus is always looking out for your device in real time keeping it safe. The VPN also a fantastic feature! Thamk you AVG for looking out for me.

It's working good so far. I've only installed it today and subscribed to premium. It's been doing a lot of work for me, so I haven't had a chance to learn to navigate the app. That's one of my bigger things I look for, navigation ease and understanding its terms and language. So far, I don't understand a lot of what the app is asking me to do but I put my trust in it because it's AVG. I've always liked AVG

title: Cut the Rope: Experiments
description:
Experiment to feed Om Nom candy! Cut the rope like never before. Everything you love and new gameplay! 200 levels and more to come! 

Eager to learn more about Om Nom's adventures? Watch "Om Nom Stories" cartoons and other amazing videos on our YouTube channel!
www.zep.tl/youtube

The little green monster Om Nom is back and hungrier than ever! Team up with the Professor, a mad (but not bad!) scientist determined to study Om Nom‚Äôs candy-loving behavior through a series of experiments. Use suction cups and other funny devices to collect shiny gold stars, uncover hidden prizes and unlock new levels! 

Key features: 

- 8 level packs with 200 levels 
- Innovative physics gameplay
- Adorable character
- Outstanding graphics
- Om Nom animation shorts
- Superpowers
- Constant free updates with new levels and animations

About the game: 

‚ÄúCut the Rope: Experiments from ZeptoLab follows the exact same formula as its predecessor, which means it's awesome.‚Äù - IGN 

‚ÄúIf Cut the Rope: Experiments uncovers one scientific truth, it‚Äôs this: ZeptoLab knows how to put together a charming puzzle game.‚Äù - Tapscape 

‚ÄúCut the Rope: Experiments takes the original's addictive formula and adds a splash of deviousness, thanks to the addition of some cunning new items.‚Äù - Pocket Gamer

Help us improve our games.  We love your feedback.  Contact us at support@zeptolab.com.

comments: Actually it is almost more ads than gameplay. You have to watch annoying videos after each and every level and even if you need to repeat a level. At the beginning of chapter 2 the game crashed and was not able to launch again. I gave it a final try, removed the game from my device and installed again from the PlayStore. After that all my progress was deleted. Seriously... The gameplay itself is fun, just as we know it from every Cut the Rope game, but with these issues it felt unplayable to me. I played several Cut the Rope games before and always loved them, but this was simply a disappointment.
Every time I watch an ad it gets stuk so I have to clear the game reset it and then it happens over and over again. I would be happy and rate this 5 stars if the problem is fixed. Thank you :)

It was the best game you made until you began charging "candy" to play a single level and even to replay other levels, superpowers were a little understandable, now it's just sad to see a great developer succumb to the greed of microtransactions
Way too many ads, most cannot be skipped. Way more time spent waiting for ads to finish then playing. The actual game is fun though.
Irritating ads -- the worst. The game is excellent, yet it is limited by greed.

title: Magic Tiles 3
description:
Play Magic Tiles 3 for free on mobile today!

It is a special game in different genres of piano games and wonderful gameplay.

Rule of the game :
It‚Äôs similar to other piano games, just tap the black tiles and avoid the white tiles. That's all !

Game features:
- Real music feeling when tapping the black tiles
- Many HOT songs with great vocals are frequently updated
- Many genres of music: POP, EDM, classical, country, Latin,..

Do not hesitate to try free piano online! This excellent piano game has more challenges in store for you than you imagine.

summary: Piano in your pocket. New songs updated every week.
recentChanges:
- New HOT SONGS released: SAD!
- Fix minor bugs.

Hope you all enjoy the game!
comments: You really need to put in less instrumental songs and more songs with words. Most of these songs are like fast paced lullaby songs. Need more songs that have a good beat, are English, and have words in the songs. Also a few more songs that start off a bit slower for beginners.

This game is just horrible. It's slow, it's lags, the adds are constant, I had to play airplane mode and it still lagged. The music gets drowned out by the vibrations and the app overall is just ugly. I'm not sure what happened here but it's honestly not worth the time and energy to even download.

*sigh* I have to take a quick break from this game because it's so addictive! But the only problem I have is about the amount of ads shown literally whenever you do ANYTHING! It's getting irritating. Please do something to shorten the amount of ads. Please please please! I love this game but the ads make me want to delete it. :-) thank you for taking my comment into consideration.

This game is amazing but, It missed out on a star as the songs are mostly covers and not the original song and I don't like it as (not to be rude) I sometimes cant hear the singers or they are singing the wrong lyrics. Other that that, this is a very good game :)

I'll give you two stars for only one reason.Just one , ADS!!!!.I mean like everything is literally based on ads , If you want to try out a new song ,ADS.When you finish the song ,ADS.When you hit the wrong key , ADS when you loose ADS.LIKE SERIOUSLY THOUGH,Try to find a way to minimize the ads .Apart from that everything else is good.I was so irritated by those ads I had to uninstall the app just to have a wonderful day. Try and consider myrequest infact everyone is telling the same thing üòìüò•

comments: Ever since I upgraded recently to my S20, Spotify just doesn't work as well as it used to. I have to open and close the app several times to get it to work, and half the time it just hangs on a black screen and never opens, the other half it makes it to a playlist but never starts playing. Restarting my phone fixes it for a little while, but having to restart every time just to get Spotify to work?? Ugh. This isn't what I'm paying for Premium for!!

The ads are getting ridiculous. I don't mind ads every 6-7 songs. It's a tolerable necessity. Once and a while it'll start playing ads after ever second song, though. Usually I have checked and updated the app and it goes back to normal, except this time. Now I get an ad ever other or after every second song. This is just stupid. I am not going to subscribe to a paid version if you folks can't even manage the free one. Not to mention, you should be getting enough $ from the ads, anyway. Fix it!

Spotify has been one of my most used Apps and well worth the price of my premium price I pay. But lately it's been glitchy as hell, especially when listening to podcasts. The podcast will randomly stop playing in the middle of the episode, and more often than not, the "Now Playing" screen is out of sync with what I'm currently listening to. I've uninstalled and reinstalled, but to know avail. Super frustrating.

This should be my favorite app. I use it every day, throughout the day, and it lets me listen to a wide variety of music. But it's so ridiculously laggy, especially the first time I open it in a day. Just now it took 20 minutes to actually open up, after crashing twice and making my entire phone so laggy I couldn't use it. I pay money for this, stop telling people to uninstall and reinstall it and FIX IT.

Pretty solid music app. Audio quality is good if you pay for premium, and decent if you don't. One major problem is that the app ends up needlessly taking up 1GB or more within about a month, maybe less. Fix this and I'll fix my review. Edit: they fixed that issue, but now there's an issue where the music stops randomly. Arguably worse.

title: Tangle Master 3D
description: Just untangle them all, relax your brain and have "quadruple" fun!
descriptionHTML: Just untangle them all, relax your brain and have "quadruple" fun!
summary: Relax and Untangle!
developerAddress: Esentepe Mahallesi, Talatpa≈üa Caddesi, No: 5-6 ≈ûi≈üli, ƒ∞stanbul  34394
recentChanges: - Performance Improvements
comments: The game is really fun. There are way too many ads but it's a free game so I'm willing to accept them. I like that you can also watch a video for 3 extra moves if needed, no strings attached, no payments, no coin cost. The only real issue I have is occasionally it won't let me place a rope in the end slot which then means I have to fiddle with the order and can mean I lose the level. It's not always it's just a little annoying, even when I position it carefully it happens.

TOO MANY ADS. NOT WORTH IT. Gave it 5 stars yesterday...big mistake. One star is all it really deserves. It is fun but after each 'level' (which takes anywhere from 30 sec to 2 min)you are BOMBARDED with 2 or more BLARING ADS lasting more than the play itself!! I am uninstalling this game. Actually, all-in-all, not enjoyable at all. Trust me when I tell you not to take up space on your phone. (BTW, developed in Turkey, not the USA) It would be more enjoyable to pick your nose.

At first I was enjoying it, but soon I founded it very addictive and annoying at the same time, due to the very short time they give you to solve the difficult ones, it's taking me about 20 attempts to solve just one , very stressful and it's starting to make me mad, plus it has a lot of long adds I'm uninstalling it.

While I am enjoying this game as a way to relax in between moments, I have found no use for the coins collected. You use them to purchase the visual mods but you can also win these. I'd adjust it to a leveling system or provide MANY more options for purchase. With the adds, while frequent, I have seen much worse. My only issue with them is that when I first started playing most would automatically be muted. As I often listen to audiobooks this was a great selling point. Please bring this back.

At first the game was enjoyable. Nice way to spend a few seconds. But the tangles are repetitive. With 3 or 4 ropes and only 5 spaces to use to untangle, there aren't a lot of options. I'm up to level 450. I have over 165,000 coins. I still have no idea what to do with them. And, as other reviews as said, the ratio of ad watching to actual game play is way out of balance. An adult themed pregnant wife, cheating husband game app ad when children could be playing is inappropriate.

title: Garena Free Fire: BOOYAH Day
description:
Free Fire is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 49 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in wild, or become invisible by proning under grass or rifts. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive and answer the call of duty.

[Survival shooter in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for legendary airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Fast and Lite gameplay - Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will you go beyond the call of duty and be the one under the shining lite?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Answer the call of duty and lead your friends to victory and be the last team standing at the apex.

[Clash Squad]
Fast paced 4v4 game mode is now open 24/7! Manage your economy, purchase weapons, and defeat the enemy squad!

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile to help you immortalize your name among the legends. 

[Contact us]
Customer Service: https://goo.gl/8f5918

Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Answer the call of duty and lead your friends to victory and be the last team standing at the apex.

[Clash Squad]
Fast paced 4v4 game mode is now open 24/7! Manage your economy, purchase weapons, and defeat the enemy squad!

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile to help you immortalize your name among the legends.

[Contact us]
Customer Service: https://goo.gl/8f5918
summary: 10-minute Survival Shooter!
recentChanges:
1. Clash Squad Season 3 - Begins 09/24 17:00 SGT
2. New Weapon - PARAFAL
3. Updated Training Grounds
- Players now spawn on set locations inside the training grounds.
- Added nitro boost and honk on the vehicles inside the training grounds.
- Brand new private theatre.
4. Grenades can now be cooked before thrown
5. Team boost (Classic Only)
- Players can now jump higher by taking off from a crouched ally.
comments: Everything is going well but their is some need to improve your server because we are facing so many problems related to high ping during the gameplay. Our character is ejected out to lobby again and again because of which we can't perform properly in battle royal. I hope you will take a quick decision to improve all of these problems which players are facing.

Great game ever but it had a connection problem and more of bugs after this update please resolve it. And other thing is that we want to purchase diamonds there is no other way. And all of good characters are only of diamonds. I am of middle class family i do not have such money. Please solve it. Anyway its such a lovely game.I like it very much. THANK YOU.

I rated it 5 star, because when I installed this this game is really nice because it's graphics. But nowadays there is many issues arised,one of them is the connection problem,I have really good internet connection but here always ping above 200,when I watching others game play when my character is dead,there is ping 78-90, but when I target a enemies at that point of time ping is converted into 250-350, .I saw damage on my screen and after few seconds, showing me that I'm dead..lol games.

Overall it's one of the best game tru there. Superd gameplay and graphical. Also easy to play too. It's very addictive and engaging . But the only problem is It's a pay to win the game with the power ful guns they get from it . I for fact don't like it and it's disappointing. I would suggest to include more skins and other Stuffs in the Elite pass rather then making guns more power.

The game overall is good but pls fix the problem of the sensitivity of the player and especially the scope (of all kind). And pls fix the graphics section. The graphics are not nice, so pls get it like call of duty. So it may look better and then playing this game will become more interesting. And just add more variety of guns and skins. Just these 3 problems forced me to to cut out 2 stars from my review.

title: The Walking Dead: Road to Survival
description:
The Walking Dead Road to Survival is the definitive Walking Dead strategy RPG game, brought to you by Robert Kirkman, creator of The Walking Dead comic series.

Build your team of Survivors and develop battle strategies to lead them into battle in an uncompromising story, fraught with danger. Fight for survival against walkers and humans alike, using strategy to attack enemy weak points and deep RPG progression to decide your path. Build a town to keep the walkers at bay, but be warned ‚Äì The horrors that lurk outside aren‚Äôt the only threat, and your decisions are all that stand between life and death.

Based on an all-new story from award-winning Walking Dead writer Jay Bonansinga, the dark aesthetic of this game reflects the uncompromising decisions you will need to make as you strategize for survival.

Stand with Michonne, Rick and other survivors from The Walking Dead, and join the epic battle against the darkest enemies from the Governor to Negan.

THE WALKING DEAD: ROAD TO SURVIVAL FEATURES:

Fight Walkers & Survivors
‚Ä¢ Battle against fierce opponents and use your best strategy to survive
‚Ä¢ Charge opponents with special melee and ranged attacks using deadly weapons like Michonne‚Äôs katana

Collect & Recruit Survivors
‚Ä¢ Collect new Survivors from The Walking Dead universe, each with their own specialized battle strategy

Upgrade Your Survivors 
‚Ä¢ Level up and customize Survivors to enhance their fighting strategies, weapons and skills
‚Ä¢ RPG progression makes your Survivors stronger as they cut down more walkers

Strategy Gameplay - Capitalize on Strengths & Exploit Weaknesses
‚Ä¢ Battle strategy is key to scoring powerful hits ‚Äì but watch out for retaliating strikes
‚Ä¢ Your battle strategy is all that‚Äôs keeping the Survivors of Woodbury safe ‚Äì Strategize and strike to win

Maps & Locations From The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Explore a new 3D map featuring real locations from The Walking Dead comics

Build your Community Base & Expand into the Wasteland
‚Ä¢ Build houses to hold Survivors, a Town Hall to expand your city, a Workshop to craft items, and more

PvP - Raid Enemies
‚Ä¢ Use your battle strategy to raid enemy factions for resources in the All Out War online mode
‚Ä¢ Strategic Multiplayer battles in a wide-open world filled with potential enemies and vicious walkers. 

Alliance Factions & Online Strategy
‚Ä¢ Multiplayer alliances and battle strategies keep you safe. Join allies in a faction to create a battle strategy and pool resources in the harsh world of The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Battle and build together with friends in multiplayer role-playing strategy gameplay

Battle in Iconic The Walking Dead Locations
‚Ä¢ Fight alongside your faction for control of areas from The Walking Dead
‚Ä¢ Battle to conquer and defend locations like Alexandria, Woodbury, Sanctuary, and more

Make Strategized Decisions to Change the Story
‚Ä¢ Decisions impact the story mode and make each game campaign unique
‚Ä¢ Write your own Survivor story in this dynamic and compelling Walking Dead RPG

Live In-Game Events 
‚Ä¢ Play to obtain valuable resources and new, exclusive Survivors.

Walkers tear at your city walls, while desperate Survivors rip apart the town‚Äôs foundations from the inside. When the time comes to fight, what will you choose?

Terms of Service: http://scopely.com/tos/
Privacy Policy: http://scopely.com/privacy/
Additional Information, Rights, and Choices Available to California Players: https://scopely.com/privacy/#additionalinfo-california.

recentChanges:
The Total War update is here!
-Two all new War maps have been added: Sanctuary and Kingdom
-Mercenaries have been added to War! Allowing you to jump into the fight faster in Road to Survival's premier event!
-Intra-region matchmaking has been added to Cross Region War! You can now be matched against factions on your region and other regions during CRW events!
-Six New Stronghold effects have been added, mixing up the War experience!
comments: Better since last updated . Before i had lots of issues with the game and now its just an occasional hiccup and when it does go out its game wide and everyone gets some type of apology gift. Still a lot of differences between free vs pay but better for free now than it was in the past. I love my faction and this is the best aspect of the game. They make me want to log in even on busy or bad days. Try it, just wait to be sure that you're gonna keep playing before you spend too much $$$.

I absolutely love this game but my biggest complaint as I've gotten into later game play is that, every time I try to raid, I have to refresh for up to 30 or more minutes trying to find an opponent within even 90,000 levels of my rank. I've even been given the rank 23 person twice before I've gotten someone close. A person whose rank 100,000 should not have to almost exclusively fight people in the top 1000 players. They're characters are exceptionally stronger.

These seasonal events and just events in general need to be lowered in team power all together. Literally feel like i cant do anything in the Halloween event because you need a S11 or higher team.... Hey Devs? You want poeple playing and enjoying your events and content later on yes? Why have the power for seasonal events on the roadmaps be for S11 - S12 and up? Why not have as many people as possible enjoying it? Why save it for players at the end of the game, or people who pay lots of cash?

One of the best game i've ever played but the raid is so unbalanced,the wars is the worst its so unbalanced that it's almost impossible to win.Imagine workimg hard to get strong then ended up being defeated by a rich player who is at low level but have strong characters.

Royal Coins fail. I've won enough to at lease have 800 TWD points/coins but yet my number is still stuck at 550. Between yesterdays jackpot and today's I should have had enough to unlock TWD Shane. But its like its stuck to that number. Can someone like help me.

comments: I've redownload this game on different phones over the years and do really enjoy the game. But one issue seems consistent despite the device. Maybe it's because I have little fingers but the movements aren't always accurate and it gets really frustrating when you get to higher speeds. I try to slide over and end up jumping instead. Or flat out don't move at all and go splat into the train I was trying to avoid in the first place. It's fun and a good game but the tolerances need to be better.

I haven't played this game for a very long time, but after reinstalling it again recently, all I can say is... Good job on this masterpiece! Seriously, this game is better than I remember! The only reason I vote it for 4 stars is because there are ads popping up on the home screen. Other than that, keep up the good work! üôåüèº

Amazing game, one of the "originals"- I remember when everyone I knew had this game- and it's continued to develop amazingly! One idea though, would be an option to change the theme, as I, personally, prefer to other themes than the current (Halloween) one. This would be a really nice thing to see added, but still a great game either way! Thank you!

I understand why ads are necessary but what I hate about is the "UnityAds" are always crashing my game and it automatically closing the game. "Google Ads" are better, it does not crash my game. Still 3 stars for now. Hope you removed all the "Unity Ads" in the app. It spoils my experiences in the game. Reported this issue already to your support team. Still waiting for a response. Please? Thank you.

I liked this game very much...‚úåüèªIt's amazingüòçüëçüèªIt's features are also too good üëçüèª‚úåüèªBut one ‚òùthing I doesn't like is that, that when I am playing my üéÆgame the, "Unity Ads" Crash/stop üôÖmy üéÆgame... The other ads like goggle ads are good then unity ads... because they doesn't stop/crash my üéÆgame... I hope that you will remove unity ads.. Plz reply about this.... Thank You for reading my post...

title: Tabou Stories: Love Episodes
description:
Have you ever watched episodes of your favorite TV show and imagined yourself as the main character?

Tabou Stories: Love Episodes lets you do just that!

Make choices that matter ‚Äì dress up in beautiful outfits, navigate the drama and get lovestruck.

In our thrilling stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

üíÖ Customize your avatar ‚Äì you choose what you want to look like üíÖ

üìö Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories üìö

üíã Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories‚Ä¶You name it ‚Äì our chapters have it!üíã

üëó Dress up ‚Äì wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices üëó

üíï Develop relationships with other characters in our stories ‚Äì will you be friends, enemies or lovers? üíï

üòâ Make choices that will affect the ending of the story ‚Äì you are the master of your destiny!üòâ

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending! 

In¬†BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you‚Äôre already married! You‚Äôre lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it‚Äôs your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In¬†THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of¬†MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In¬†BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

Take part in high society, dress up in expensive outfits, experience romantic moments and uncover mysteries, all in these dramatic chapters!

In¬†MY BAD BILLIONAIRE, you pretend to be your boss‚Äôs wife! Your relationship may be fake, but the chemistry between you is real. With people trying to sabotage your love story, can you two fall in love?

Try your best in these romantic episodes!

And those are just some of our romantic stories! We are constantly working to bring you new and exciting chapters.

Whichever story you choose, hours of fun are guaranteed!

Download Tabou Stories: Love Episodes now, and start living your secret life!

recentChanges:
Hi, Players!

New update is here. We‚Äôre very excited about the improvements we made to the game, hope you‚Äôll be, too!
Needless to say, some bugs were squashed so you could have a better gaming experience.
As every week, we have new chapters coming out so time to start reading your favorite stories!
Install and enjoy yourself!
comments: The game is fun and addicting, I just wish the choices didn't cost so much, I realize money has to be made, but it would be nice if there was an option to get more than 10 a day for a VIP pass. UPDATE: I still enjoy the game, however it would be nice if once you played through a story, you didn't have to use tickets to go through it again or use more gems to get hairstyles or clothes or pick choices you already made.

I liked the stories but it gets expensive very quickly (I could buy several books with the costs) and you can't change the gender of your character. It was set to female and that was my only choice. The ad I clicked on showed a gay storyline but none of the story choices were that type. I'm a little confused. I also purchased the vip package but saw no benefit from it. Not really sure what I paid for. Still spent a ton on gems, had to buy outfits, hairstyles, experiences, and keys.

Now don't get me wrong the storylines are awesome,they're steamyinteractive but the price of the gems are ridiculous! Now I've downloaded this game I've given it at least a week before I made a judgment on it to actually post a review but it's ridiculous the amount of money that needs to be spent in order to have a good choice or a good ending........ So it keeps the reader interested, it is too much money I understand that you guys need money to keep the game running but it shouldn't be THIS

I love the storyline but like others have said, it's hard to get diamonds. It gives you options but you can't afford the premium options. I think you should be awarded more than 1 diamond for reading a 10-15 minute story. I would love to finish but I'm afraid I may have to uninstall this because at the rate I'm going, I will not get finished. Plus when you click to try to speed up or add diamonds, the game locks up and you lose where you were and you don't get rewarded.

So far I love this app but gems are very useful and I have barely enough for anything. And the fact that you have to buy clothes that you already have. So gems need a big upgrade like come on it really needs it. I love the story that I am in and I think that's it the best but it judges you if your clothes aren't good enough üòï and some of the best things cost so much gems its unbelievable. So I am on Lessons on Lust or something and I wanted to do the threesome with Gemma but its costs to much.

title: Microsoft OneDrive
description:
Microsoft OneDrive keeps your photos and files backed up, protected, synced, and accessible on all your devices. This OneDrive app lets you view and share OneDrive files, documents, and photos with friends and family. Plus, you can use the app to automatically back up your phone‚Äôs photos and videos. Start with 5 GB of free cloud storage or upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription to get 1 TB of storage.

Microsoft OneDrive offers the following features:

Back up photos & videos
‚Ä¢ Automatic photo backup when you turn on Camera Upload
‚Ä¢ Find photos easily thanks to automatic tagging
‚Ä¢ View photos on your phone, computer, and online

File sharing and access
‚Ä¢ Share files, photos, videos, and albums with friends and family
‚Ä¢ Get notifications when a shared document is edited
‚Ä¢ Set password-protected or expiring sharing links*
‚Ä¢ Access selected OneDrive files on the app without being online

Document Scanning
‚Ä¢ Scan, sign, and send docs right from the OneDrive mobile app
‚Ä¢ Scan and markup docs, receipts, whiteboards, and more

Search
‚Ä¢ Search photos by what‚Äôs in them (i.e. beach, snow, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Search docs by name or content

Security
‚Ä¢ All OneDrive files are encrypted at rest and in transit
‚Ä¢ Personal Vault lets you protect your important files with identity verification
‚Ä¢ Restore files with version history
‚Ä¢ Stay protected with ransomware detection & recovery*

Works with Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Outlook
‚Ä¢  Use Microsoft Office apps to edit and collaborate in real time on Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote files stored in OneDrive.
‚Ä¢  Back up, view, and save your Office documents.

The OneDrive app for Android offers 5 GB of free cloud storage to sync photos and files across your devices, share photos and docs, and keep your digital life backed up in the cloud.

Upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription
With a Microsoft 365 Personal subscription you get 1TB of storage (1TB of storage per person for up to 6 people with the Family subscription), OneDrive premium features, and access to all features in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and OneNote on mobiles devices, web browsers, PCs and Macs. 

To make an in-app purchase of a Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription: open the app, tap the Me tab, then tap your storage or the diamond icon. Subscriptions begin at $6.99 a month in the US, and can vary by region. Microsoft 365 subscriptions and OneDrive standalone subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Google Play store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. 

To manage your subscriptions or to disable auto-renewal, after purchase, go to your Google Play store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled or refunded during the active subscription period.

Using this OneDrive app for work or school
For you to sign into your work or school account on OneDrive, your organization needs to have a qualifying OneDrive, SharePoint Online or Microsoft 365 business subscription plan. 
 
Privacy
This app is provided by Microsoft. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or its affiliates maintain facilities. 
 
Privacy Policy: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=507539 
Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246338 

*Requires Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription

The OneDrive app for Android offers 5 GB of free cloud storage to sync photos and files across your devices, share photos and docs, and keep your digital life backed up in the cloud.

Upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription
With a Microsoft 365 Personal subscription you get 1TB of storage (1TB of storage per person for up to 6 people with the Family subscription), OneDrive premium features, and access to all features in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and OneNote on mobiles devices, web browsers, PCs and Macs.

To make an in-app purchase of a Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription: open the app, tap the Me tab, then tap your storage or the diamond icon. Subscriptions begin at $6.99 a month in the US, and can vary by region. Microsoft 365 subscriptions and OneDrive standalone subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Google Play store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand.

To manage your subscriptions or to disable auto-renewal, after purchase, go to your Google Play store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled or refunded during the active subscription period.

Using this OneDrive app for work or school
For you to sign into your work or school account on OneDrive, your organization needs to have a qualifying OneDrive, SharePoint Online or Microsoft 365 business subscription plan.

Privacy
This app is provided by Microsoft. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or its affiliates maintain facilities.

Privacy Policy: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=507539
Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246338

*Requires Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription
summary: Access and share your photos, docs, and more from anywhere for free.
recentChanges: You can now set up OneDrive to unlock with your face, if your device supports it.
comments: This is a frustrating app. On one hand, on one of my devices, this app is great. It runs properly, is decently clear on what everything does, and having the peace of mind that my photos are safe is nice. On the other hand, on another device, this app crashes every time I try to move photos to a different app, is slow when doing anything else, and ends up wasting my time.

So far I am LOVING THIS!!! I have only just begun using OneDrive, not knowing entirely what it was to begin with. Now I look for it wherever I am. I can open ANY file from pretty much ANY device! Word, power point, excel, etc.! I find that impressive. Especially since it's Microsoft. Like, I think Google tried to do the same thing but something just doesn't feel right over there. This is where it's at. Hands down. So far I highly recommend.

I don't understand what's happend with this app. It worked perfectly fine and then Samsung backup switched to using one drive and it just isn't uploading anything right, it's not uploaded and new pictures from the last month since it change apart from some pictures from a year ago. Then it's saying it can no longer back up from and SD card? There doesn't appear to be anyway to change back and it's not clear what I actually have backed up now. So disappointed.

Setup trying, should be made easier. Sometimes it takes days for uploads. Amazon is good for auto uploads. Making sub- albums is nonexistent (I used to keep info on leases, rent receipts, complaints, etc. in separate albums then group them under 1 album). Even Google changed that capability. I can't deal with these egomaniacs deciding what to do with my pics.

Works ok except one annoying issue. The file dates displayed appear to be the dates the file was initially created and not the date the file was modified/synced. You cannot tell if file is modified until you open and inspect it. This problem is unique to Android version. Works correctly on all other OneDrive apps on other platforms (IOS, Windows, etc).

recentChanges: New features and improvements.
comments: I understand that the refund is under process and will probably take 14 days to reflect into my account. I will wait for 14 days and check with the bank. However, I would like to feedback that there is no option to choose for wish cash for the pay later option. It would be more convenient for this function to be available. And also, the refund details only state the full purchase to be refunded and not the 1st installment that was actually paid. Kindly update that into the order details. Thank y

May be easy to use and some prices are great! But some charges are hidden and when they say they can't use your card as payment but end up charging you a fee for services they cannot provide this turned me off and is beyond wrong! If I'm paying for something I expect something and I don't pay for something with no product. I ordered a few times but after I was charged for services not rendered I will not order from wish again!!! I don't pay for nothing and I pray you won't either!!!

This app is getting better and better but the pickup nearby system is in need of much improvement! If you forget to pick something up on the exact date or something happens which makes you unable to pick it up on that date you get a partial refund and no product because the store doesn't know what's in the packages and can't scan it for you anymore! So the store is left with products they can't deliver and the costumer has to reorder the product or is simply left empty handed. CS is sh*'t too..

Updated "blitz buy" is BROKEN. I don't know what they did, but the new Blitz Buy is constantly crashing and not working.... Maybe y'all can call it "glitch buy" because it glitches more than it actually works. Other than that, I've found some unique gifts and good prices. You just have to watch the cost of shipping in order to decide whether the price is "good" or not.

Love everything except that the promos they offer always sound better than they are. It's always like "save up to 90%" but then it's only 5% off. Also the shipping is worded in a way that makes it sound like it's going to be quicker than it is. BUT the prices are low low and the product selection is HUGE!! so the issues are not too important. I love wish!

title: Pi Music Player - Free Music Player, YouTube Music
description:
üé∂With 30 Million+ Downloadsüî• and an overall rating of 4.8 ‚≠ê, Pi Music Player is one of the most accepted and loved Music Players available on the Google Play Store. Consisting of a variety of features that allow users not only to Listen to Music but also share and edit music, Pi Music Player is sure to become your default audio player. üé∂
 
 KEY FEATURES :

 ‚≠êRingtone maker & MP3 cutter: Liked a tune or specific part of a song ? We got you covered. The inbuilt MP3 Cutter - Ringtone Cutter in Pi Music Player can be used as a MP3 Player or to cut your MP3 songs and also set them as your Ringtones.
 
 ‚≠êPowerful Equalizer: A powerful equalizer with 25 Presets, Bass Boost, Virtualizer and 3D-Reverb Effects in the MP3 Player provides an immersive music listening experience with amazing sound effects.
 
 ‚≠êFour Magnificent Themes : Crafted with Intuitive controls and Stunning Design, this MP3 Player comes in four stunning themes - GLOSS, DARK, BLACK, LIGHT. In addition, our GLOSS BACKGROUNDS pack can be purchased in-app to unlock 25 beautiful backgrounds.

 ‚≠êPi Power Share : A unique share feature in our music player powered by Send-Anywhere that allows you to share audio files with anyone, anytime and anywhere.
  
 ‚≠êYouTube Music Player :  The all new update lets you browse across millions of YouTube music videos and add them to your own Playlists in our music player. Search manually for your desired tracks or listen to our curated Playlists that are spread over a variety of Genres, Moods and Trending Content. You can seamlessly switch between YouTube tracks and local audio tracks and create hybrid playlists that consist of both YouTube music and Local MP3 music.
 
 ‚≠êFloating Video Player : Send a text, edit an image, post a tweet, browse the Internet or use any other application while listening to uninterrupted YouTube music with the Floating YouTube Music Player that can be placed anywhere on screen.
 
 ‚≠êPower Saver Mode:  A battery friendly option in this Youtube Music Player that allows you to Listen To YouTube videos while optimizing battery usage.
 
 ‚≠êAudiobooks & Podcasts: An exclusive interface and player to neatly organize and play your Audiobooks & Podcasts separate from other MP3 music. Remember your last played file and position and start off from where you left. Skip forwards and backwards by 30 seconds and adjust Playback speeds.
 
 
In addition to the above mentioned key features, Pi Music Player offers other features such as SLEEP-TIMER, HIDE FOLDERS, PLAYLIST BACKUP & RESTORE and much more making it the most complete music player in the Google Play Store. This Music Player is available in more than 40 languages.
 
 If you looking for an alternate for your default music player, this is the best music player to play music in your android device.
 We are striving hard to make this MP3 player perfect for you.
 Please write to support@100pilabs.com for queries, suggestions and feedback.
 We will surely respond to your mail.
 
 # First 20 application openings will be ad-free.
 Disclaimer :
 
 Pi Music Player is a third party MP3 player. It is not a music/mp3 downloader.
 It is not affiliated to YouTube in any way. 
 
 All kinds of YouTube content, artist images and videos are provided by YouTube services.
 Therefore, Pi Music Player does not have direct control over the content displayed.
 
 According to YouTube's Terms of Use, Pi Music Player is not allowed to display videos when in lock screen, nor to let you download songs.
 
 We have no influence over the advertisements that are shown and played in the YouTube videos.
 So, our Ad-Free Forever! pack and Combo Pack cannot remove Ads in YouTube Videos
 
 Enjoy listening to music in the best MP3 playerüéµ
 Thank you so much for your patience and support! üòä

comments: Great music app, been using it for years. The only things I'd add is being being to edit multiple songs at once and being able to edit the order of songs in an album.

I enjoy all the music that was downloaded on this app. I especially like that It has a favorites. I have them all starred. Sometimes the wrong artists appear with the music choices. I am not sure how many songs this app can hold. That would be helpful, so if I need to buy a memory card for additional storage or not. I plan on having more songs downloaded. My daughter did not complain about any problems transferring music over from one phone to the next with this app. Using app for 1 year now.

for about 6 years April 2014-July 2020 this was always my go to app, I recommended it to everyone. never had issues, always worked beyond great. but lately, as of July 2020, it randomly crashes. in the middle of a song it just cuts out. thought it was just a minor issue, but it keeps getting worse, as of October 22, 2020, I'm deleting it. I love the customization, and options, but I can't listen to not even 1 full song without it cutting off, went from a 5 star rating to a 2. very disappointing

It Won't add songs to Playlists. On my old cell, this app worked amazingly, I loved it. Recently I had to upgrade my phone and on my new cell I can't make playlists. The app is still great, but I need to be able to add songs to playlists. Edit: I can make Playlists now, but I gotta add the individual tracks. If you try to add a whole album to a list nothing happens. Still love the app, keep it up guys

I hate the software that forces users to rate an app after its initial use. Yes, given the short time I use it its functioning well but time will til. One issue that bothers me is the player only finds items save to the hard drive, which is fine, except my drive is all but fill n I'm now saving mostly to SD card. But I can't do so n still use app. A work around need to be made. That said, everything else is okay for now.

title: Truecaller: Caller ID, block fraud & scam calls
description:
*Truecaller does not upload your phonebook to make it public or searchable* 

** Truecaller is the world‚Äôs best Caller ID and spam blocking app - 500 million downloads worldwide **

Manage all your calls and messages quickly, by filtering out telemarketers, robocalls and other unwanted disturbances. With a community-based spam list updated by millions of users worldwide, Truecaller is the only app you need to make your communication safe and efficient. 
 
Powerful Dialer & Caller ID: 
- The world‚Äôs best Caller ID will identify anyone calling you 
- See who is calling even before they call
- Use Voice calling to talk to your friends on Truecaller for free
- Call Recording - Record important phone calls and save them to your phone (not supported on Android Pie and above)
- Backup call history, contacts, messages and settings to Google Drive 

World Class Blocking & Spam Detection:
- Block calls and SMS - Identify and auto-block telemarketers, robocallers, scammers, fraud, sales, and more
- Community based spam reporting in real time
- Advanced blocking options for blocking countries, similar digit sequences, and more!

Smart Messaging: 
- Automatically identify every unknown SMS 
- Automatically block spam and telemarketing SMS

- Free Chat with your friends and family in Group Chat

Truecaller Gold ‚Äì Stand out from the crowd:
