comments: The free version, with all the "good stuff" locked behind a paywall, is a demo. If you want the full game, then just like any other gaming platform, you have to pay. Actual people put actual work into making this game. They should be compensated. So why not give them the $10? Or delete the demo if you don't like the game enough to pay for it.

I know people worked hard on this game but I have some complaints about Coco itself. 1. How do I enjoy the game with so many ads seriously every 15sec there is a ad . Witch makes the whole process difficult. 2. This is crazy I like to play but everything costs money that some people won't do or can't afford. 3. Learn to let the ages not affect the game it asks my age and I say my age it works but some reviews say there age doesn't work so please fix this. Please fix this we would all like it.

Well on this game, you basically nave to pay FOR EVERYTHING. And when i say everything i mean the GOOD stuff. I mean you get the bad/medium stuff for free, but when it comes to the good stuff, you basically have to get your credit card ready. Also, the game gets a bit boring after a while. You just repeat all of the stuff and then just carry on all over again. The good stuff is that if you loose you still get fans, there are options to choose from of what you want to do and I guess thats it.

It's a really good game but... You can't have that much access to a lot of things because they're locked and it not fair cuz well you have to pay to unlock alot of things while if you don't wanna pay you don't have much access to anything but it not fair cuz we should at least get access to the clinic like right? All I want is for you to make more things available for people who don't wanna pay and to also take away the ads cuz there's alot them btw I still love this game thank you! üòâ

3 reasons I have this game a 4 instead a 5. 1 there is A LOT OF ADDS, and when I mean A LOT... well that just mean a lot! 2 there is a lot of buying, you need to fix that! Will it make more sense if u earn the "money and then buy what ever u need to buy in the game? 3 please let the other contestants be other people instead of bots, please! So I really love this game, but I think u should make some changes! Love E!

title: Google Chrome: Fast & Secure
description:
Google Chrome is a fast, easy to use, and secure web browser. Designed for Android, Chrome brings you personalized news articles, quick links to your favorite sites, downloads, and Google Search and Google Translate built-in. Download now to enjoy the same Chrome web browser experience you love across all your devices.
        
        Browse fast and type less. Choose from personalized search results that instantly appear as you type and quickly browse previously visited web pages. Fill in forms quickly with Autofill.
        
        Incognito Browsing. Use Incognito mode to browse the internet without saving your history. Browse privately across all your devices.
        
        Sync Chrome Across Devices. When you sign into Chrome, your bookmarks, passwords, and settings will be automatically synced across all your devices. You can seamlessly access all your information from your phone, tablet, or laptop.
        
        All your favorite content, one tap away. Chrome is not just fast for Google Search, but designed so you are one tap away from all your favorite content. You can tap on your favorite news sites or social media directly from the new tab page. Chrome also has the ‚ÄúTap to Search‚Äù- feature on most webpages. You can tap on any word or phrase to start a Google search while still in the page you are enjoying.
        
        Protect your phone with Google Safe Browsing. Chrome has Google Safe Browsing built-in. It keeps your phone safe by showing warnings to you when you attempt to navigate to dangerous sites or download dangerous files.
        
        Fast downloads and view web pages and videos offline Chrome has a dedicated download button, so you can easily download videos, pictures, and entire webpages with just one tap. Chrome also has downloads home right inside Chrome, where you can access all the content you downloaded, even when you are offline.
        
        Google Voice Search. Chrome gives you an actual web browser you can talk to. Use your voice to find answers on-the-go without typing and go hands free. You can browse and navigate quicker using your voice anywhere, anytime.
        
        Google Translate built-in: Quickly translate entire web pages. Chrome has Google Translate built in to help you to translate entire web to your own language with one tap.
        
        Use less mobile data and speed up the web. Turn on Lite mode and use up to 60% less data. Chrome can compress text, images, videos, and websites without lowering the quality.
        
        Smart personalized recommendations. Chrome creates an experience that is tailored to your interests.  On the new tab page, you will find articles that Chrome selected based on your previous browsing history.

comments: Why the heck are there so many freaking adds now?!?! I'll be reading an article and one will pop up to block the whole screen. I close that out. One pops in and scrolls me to a different area. Then a video pops up at the top and I can get rid of it until the add is done playing, meanwhile there is an add at the bottom of my screen. I used to only use chrome and now it's ruined.

Used to have this app as my web browser main....and then it got updated. Since the update, pages do not load, it does not inform how many tabs are open, the open tabs do not show when looking through them, and it sticks on one page unless i close it down. Tool this back to the Factory settings and will not be updating from this as it runs much better than the last few updates. Sad to see my main browser fall to least favorite. Edge got you guys replaced.

Its nice app but I can't give it five stars because I can't update the app..... And I am sure it's not my problem.... It's chrome's problem because I can't update it in my father's, mother's and also in my sister's phone..and everyone is also complaining about it, it is happening from many days but you are not clearing the issue... Please check the issue and correct it. Hope you will correct it soon. Thank you

Eversince my last update, this rubbish app has caused numerous problems for me. My phone freezes, I can't connect to WiFi and many times unable to access websites on the internet. I hate this crappy Google and Chrome app on my phone. It has caused me numerous prospective business deals, as i couldn't log in to video meetings. Fix this rubbish!!!üò≠

I love Google Chrome . However I have been having problems with it for the last few days since the last update . The page freezes , shows a black and white spots , blue screen , i can't look at most pages online without this happening . I thought it was just me but I have read other reviews with the same problem . Please fix it ! This app has not worked or updated for over 3 months what is going on ? My phone is not even a year old so it has nothing to do with the phone the phone is not old phon

title: My Talking Tom Friends
description:
From the creators of insanely popular virtual pet games My Talking Tom, My Talking Tom 2, My Talking Angela, My Talking Hank, and other worldwide successful titles, comes a revolution in virtual pet simulation!

‚òÖ PLAY IN A FULL HOUSE OF BEST FRIENDS üè°üê±üê∂üê∞
What‚Äôs better than having one best friend? Having six! Players can join Talking Tom, Angela, Hank, Ginger, Ben and Becca as they move in together in their new home for the first time, and get to know the pets that are adored around the world!

‚òÖ TAKE CARE OF THEM ü•∞üõÅüç∞
They need someone to feed them, bathe them, tend to their wishes and play fun games with their cool toys! Players can help Talking Tom and his friends advance in their skills, and when it‚Äôs time to sleep, they need to find a cozy spot to recharge for a whole new day of fun and games!

‚òÖ UNIQUE CHARACTERS üòªüòæüôÄüòπ
Who likes to bake? And who is a secret artist in the family? Why is Talking Tom looking at Talking Angela LIKE THAT? Players will have fun meeting all of the characters, and discover their interesting and playful personalities!

‚òÖ CUSTOMIZE EVERYTHING üñºÔ∏èüéÅüëí
Players can make this virtual house their own! They can collect cool toys on bus trips to town and change the look of the friends‚Äô home. And who can miss this amazing wardrobe?! Anyone can show their fashion sense and customize the friends‚Äô outfits any way they want. This is one stylish pet family!

‚òÖ FUN PLAY TIME! ‚öΩüé∏üé®
The game features a totally new collection of mini games to test users‚Äô skill, reflex, and puzzle-solving - in spacious landscape mode for the first time! But that‚Äôs not all - there are many new fantastic toys to discover in the game as well! Uh-oh, looks like Hank is hungry again! Time to grow some veggies with Angela!

‚òÖ BEAUTIFUL WORLD üëÄ‚ú®üå∑
Players can discover beautiful 3D visuals and the exciting open space of the friends‚Äô new family home, and move through different rooms as they wish! There are many toys and games that they can play outside their home too!

Download now, play and join the amazing virtual pet family fun in My Talking Tom Friends!

‚òÖ PLAY FOR FREE! ‚òÖ

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7‚Äôs websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player‚Äôs progress; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

Customer support: support@outfit7.com

title: Google Duo - High Quality Video Calls
description:
Google Duo is the highest quality video calling app*. It‚Äôs simple, reliable, and works across Android and iOS phones and tablets, smart devices, and on the web.


    Features:

    Make calls between Android and iOS
 Whether you‚Äôre on your phone, tablet, or on the web, you can stay in touch with Duo. You can also share and join group calls with just a link.

    Group call with up to 32 people
 Bring together all the people who matter most, even when you're apart, with group calling. Duo now supports 32 people in group video calls.

    Bring everyone together with Family mode**
 Doodle on video calls and surprise loved ones with fun masks and effects that transform you into astronauts, cats and more.\
    Capture special moments
 Take photos of your video calls to capture any moment and share it automatically with everyone on the call.

    Send video and voice messages, photos, and more
 Short on time or your friends can‚Äôt pick up? Leave a personalized video message with fun effects, or share voice messages, photos, notes, and emojis.

    Low Light Mode
 Duo lets you make video calls even in poor lighting conditions.

    Voice calling
 Make voice-only calls to your friends when you can‚Äôt chat over video.

    *Based on Signals Research Group technical study comparing video degradation time over 3G, LTE, and WiFi.

    **Requires sign-in with a Google account.

    ***Data charges may apply. Check your carrier for details.

    ****Specific feature availability may vary based on device specifications.

comments: I use Skype,better and faster also doesn't want all your information and everything in your personal life given over. Trouble with Google is they want far too much information and personal details. Not going to happen. Tried to find away to get rid,sadly embedded and can't be deleted. Also just let it waste time downloading updates that will never be used . The problem being we will never own our own mobile phone ,there always will be somebody sending files to reduce battery power,apps that spy.

Video calls continue to ring after being answered. This is only an issue when recieving calls. 1 Reply I've updated the app several times. It works but after a day or so right back to the same issue. I'll answer the video call but the phone continues to ring only on my end. I continue to hit Accept until it stops or I hang up and call the person back.

Just switched over to an Android from an iphone. Video and call quality really make a difference and wanted something just as good as FaceTime. So far, I'd have to say that Duo really comes through and is probably better than FaceTime. I'm sure it helps when the software fully utilizes the hardware on my Galaxy Note20 Ultra, it it doesn't disappoint. Throughout most areas of cell coverage, call quality is good and I'm amazed by the smooth and detailed video quality compared to FaceTime.

This app is perfect for casual video calls. The filters and drawing option is perfect for interacting with kids. I wish the devs would add more fun filters and more interactive options for kids. I love the screen sharing feature as well, but it would be better if you can share the audio as well, and not just the video.

I really want to like this app but when doing video calls the recipient complains of my voice being very "small or far away". We know it's not a problem with the hardware because we've been testing and when we use WhatsApp the audio is perfect. Similarly when we use headphones plugged into the 3.5mm jack the audio on duo is perfect. Please review and let me know

title: Amazon Prime Video
description:
Watch movies and TV shows recommended for you, including Amazon Originals like The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel, Tom Clancy‚Äôs Jack Ryan, and the kids series Tumble Leaf.

App features:
- Download videos to watch offline ‚Äì anywhere, anytime.
- Follow actors or directors and we‚Äôll notify you when they have new videos on Prime Video. Available in US only.
- Cast from your phone or tablet to the big screen with Chromecast.

comments: Overall not a terrible app. has good films and shows on it. One thing that keeps on annoying me is that every time I open the app it reminds me about the profiles feature even tho I have already set up a profile on it. Also what's with the adverts, I am already paying ¬£10 a month I don't want adverts. I get that you are promoting your new shows but put them at the end so when I exit the show give me a recommendation for a new show to watch. I know I can skip the adverts but it's just annoying.

Generally first rate. The apps weak point is with no (or a weak) WiFi signal. Then when you go to play a previously downloaded show, you may get a license error. The license errors come in groups. Connecting to WiFi doesn't fix the problem. Deleting and re-dowloading the show will fix the problem. Sometimes it fixes a group of them.

Almost great. No way to rate content. Unfortunately a lot of content is not available in original language. In Switzerland we have German, French and Italian as major languages so it is hit and miss if a film or show is in a language you speak even if it was originally made in English. Bohemian Rhapsody is only available in Italian, Electric Dreams only in German. Curiously Buffy the vampire slayer is only available in English. Netflix has original plus German, French and often Italian.

The good things about prime video is it is a good deal for a lot of perks. The prime video library is really good too. Now the bad things The app is buggy at times. Sometimes when I close the player it returns to episode menu but is stuck there unless I go back to homepage The video player opens in seperate window and when I'm switching applications I can't tell which prime video window to select in recent apps window. The windows app is even worse, downloads expire as soon as I download them.

It's an app deserving of 5 star rating all right. But this is an updated review because I am unable to stream in full HD on my LG G8x. I've checked the phone just to be sure and it supports Widevine L1 plus all other streaming services like Netflix are able to play HD content on my phone except this app. Please fix this. It's a frustrating experience and no one is even responding to my emails or feedback

title: Talking Tom Gold Run
description:
Players run and chase the robber, exploring the fun endless running worlds of Talking Tom Gold Run! This cool running game is all about racing, jumping, dashing and getting an epic adrenaline rush in no time at all!

RUNNING ACTION: Players can have epic fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chasing after the robber who stole the gold and unlocking new worlds is an incredible adventure! Who has what it takes to run through all the worlds and win? With enough running and racing, anyone can become the best runner there is. It‚Äôs time to go for gold! Players can also complete missions to get cool rewards!

ROBBER RUN AND CHASE: The sneaky raccoon thief stole the gold! Players can get the gold bars back and use them to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds they can explore and go racing through! Let‚Äôs run for fun!

RACCOON BOSS: The big bad raccoon boss will try to stop players at any cost! They have to run and dodge obstacles and take down the robber‚Äôs truck in an awesome boss fight. Kicking chili bombs at him will make him give up eventually!

SPECIAL CHARACTERS: Players can run even faster and do cool tricks with the help of special characters! Princess Angela, Shark Hank and Super Tom to the rescue!

THE BEST ENDLESS RUNNING FUN IS IN TALKING TOM GOLD RUN!

This app is certified by PRIVO, an FTC Children‚Äôs Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) Safe Harbor. The app meets the requirements for compliance with COPPA. PRIVO is an independent, third-party organization committed to safeguarding children's personal information collected online.

This app contains:
- The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (build progress, in-game functionalities, etc.);
- Promotions for Outfit7‚Äôs products, as well as advertising;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player‚Äôs progress;
- Videos to watch starring Outfit7‚Äôs animated characters via YouTube integration; and
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7‚Äôs websites and other apps.

Great game. Bad customer service. Ad version/non premium is so full of ads it's unplayable. I bought the premium but got demoted back to ad support version. Sent contacts, emails with purchase receipt. No response. I want to be reinstated to paid premium. Would be 5 stars if I got what I paid for.

title: Microsoft Teams
description:
Microsoft Teams is your hub for teamwork, which brings together everything a team needs: chat and threaded conversations, meetings & video conferencing, calling, content collaboration with the power of Microsoft 365 applications, and the ability to create and integrate apps and workflows that your business relies on.

You can now also use Microsoft Teams to manage your personal life - chat, make plans, share shopping lists, tasks and even your location, coordinate events with fellow club or family members and make decisions quickly. Teams provides a single hub to help you stay connected, get organized and bring balance to your entire life.

Easily‚ÄØmove between your work and personal account to stay organized‚ÄØthroughout the day. Whether you‚Äôre sprinting towards a deadline or helping your kids with their homework, Teams can help you achieve more.

Connect & Communicate
‚Ä¢ Chat 1-1, use group messages or dedicated channels to communicate with the entire team**
‚Ä¢ HD audio and video calls for scheduled face-to-face meetings from almost anywhere**
‚Ä¢ Mention individual team members, or the whole team at once, to get your colleagues‚Äô attention**
‚Ä¢ To-do lists, calendars, and cloud storage access right in group chats
‚Ä¢ Personal chats, documents, & files can be securely accessed 

Organize Your Whole Life
‚Ä¢ File sharing & editing on the go makes managing your work projects a breeze**
‚Ä¢ Intelligent search finds documents, spreadsheets, & photos in chats and team conversations ** 
‚Ä¢ Custom notifications give you control to stay focus on what matters most**

Easily‚ÄØmove between your work and personal account to stay organized‚ÄØthroughout the day. Whether you‚Äôre sprinting towards a deadline or helping your kids with their homework, Teams can help you achieve more.

comments: My experience with this app was really great. Its the perfect app for online study and calls. I just have one suggestion. Sometimes when we are asked a question which has a yes/no answer but its not always possible to unmute and answer so if its possible can we get a yes/no option for fast and direct response.

Works very poor on mobile phone app when it comes to Teams calls. One can only listen and not speak well on a Teams call while using the mobile app. Also when searching for a message, it takes to the latest messages in the conversation and not that particular message being searched. Works on heavy data transfer.

It is a really good app. I hope you continue to update it and make it better. But there is one problem. Since the starting of this week, there is a glitch for the teachers in the school that disallows them to join the meeting and sometimes even the app. I have given it Four stars cause it is very annoying and we students can't study properly. If this situation is fixed I will give it a five I swear.

Great Online Meeting App.. But there is this thing that I would like to request the developers to add in Teams that there should be an option to delete an entire conversation with a specific person. We have to delete every single message to vanish the whole chat. Try to add this feature also to make it work more flexibly Overall nice application.. keep it up üëçüèªü§üüèª

Teams is a good app. But there is a problem with the app. The app was fine but after the latest update, I can't join any meeting. I have a stable network. I tried signing out and signing in, but that also didn't work. Whenever I click on join button, it is showing that, "Your call dropped and we couldn't reconnect". So, I deleted it and installed an old problem free version. Edited : Now there is no problem after updating to the latest version. Thanks for solving the issues.

title: Pinterest
description:
Looking for creative ideas? Whether you‚Äôre planning your next big travel adventure, searching for home design concepts, looking for fashion & fitness tips or checking out new recipes, explore lifestyle inspiration on Pinterest. Good ideas start here!

Discover billions of possibilities for every part of your life, from new recipes to creative home design ideas. Create extra home storage space, find your new favorite recipe, or get tattoo inspiration on Pinterest.

Save ideas on Pinterest:
‚òÖ Find lifestyle inspiration & explore articles on trending and recommended topics 

‚òÖ Collaborate with friends for your next group trip, party or DIY project 

‚òÖ See ideas & images out in the world that you like and snap a photo with Pinterest Lens to find out how to buy/make/do them!

Discover wedding tips, beauty inspiration and design concepts for your big day. Explore thousands of recommended or trending images, get travel inspiration or read new recipes and creative food ideas for your next dinner party. With fitness tips, interesting DIY projects to try out and tons of great fashion, style & beauty tips, Pinterest keeps all of your lifestyle inspiration in one place.

You never know what sparks a great design idea or when inspiration for your next DIY project might strike.

Get inspired from anywhere on the internet. Save your ideas, organize them by topic and share with others ‚Äì all from your pocket! 

Get ideas for the topics you care about most:
- Home design, architecture & DIY
- Creative wedding tips 
- Travel, fitness & beauty
- Fashion and style inspiration
- Food, new recipes & cooking 

To start saving and sharing Pins, download now.

comments: I really love Pinterest, it's a great source of dopamine for my ADHD brain. But more and more frequently I'm having trouble saving Pins. They take FOREVER to load (sometimes they don't load at all) and if the Pin isn't fully loaded it won't let me save it to my boards. Also, why can't I search for other people's boards anymore?? Please bring that feature back!

I love this app. It is exceptionally handy, simple to use and much more. It has most of the topics ranging from celebrities, Do It Yourself (D.I.Y) , and many many more. It also helps me to pin the photos, create new boards, looking for new ideas and many more. Thanks for your kindness, helpfulness and keep it interesting. So, keep on improving. I will be looking forward to see many more topics. As I always replying politely, stay home, stay safe and have a great time.

This app has been great in so many ways and I love it. But lately the app keeps crashing. It doesn't stay open for more than 2 seconds and as someone else mentioned, it does stay open in the background. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling. I switched my cell off and on again. Cleared cache and even did a deep scan of my phone. But nothing seems to be working. Hope the issue gets resolved quickly.

This app was pretty good. I've been using it for 2 years. But lately the app has been crashing very much. It does stays open for more than 2-3 second. Also when i am using any other apps then suddenly a thing pops out saying "Unfortunately, pinterest has stopped" . I have seen that others are also facing this same problem. If you can then please repair it asap.

Idk what the hell is going on, but it will go from allowing you to scroll to not allowing anything but moving up and down the pin. You have to back out of the pin you're on, which is possibly really are far down or closer to where the LAST time it stopped letting you scroll, and have to go all the way to the pin you were on. THEN it'll stop scrolling like three pins. Or five. And it needs to be fixed before I change my review. Even updating it didn't fix the issue, if anything it got worse.

title: Turbo Dismount‚Ñ¢
description:
The legendary crash simulator is now on Google Play!

Perform death-defying motor stunts, crash into walls, create traffic pile-ups of epic scale - and share the fun!

Turbo Dismount‚Ñ¢ is a kinetic tragedy about Mr. Dismount and the cars who love him. It is the official sequel to the wildly popular and immensely successful personal impact simulator - Stair Dismount‚Ñ¢. 

FEATURES:
* Flinch-inducing crash physics
* Crunchy sound effects
* Delicious slow-mo replay system
* Multiple vehicles: cars, trucks, construction vehicles, a skateboard...
* Multiple levels, obstacle types and characters
* Tweak levels to your liking!
* Customize your character and the vehicles with your own photos!
* Game controller support!
* Leaderboards and achievements
* Smooth full resolution 4x MSAA visuals on SHIELD Tablet

Turbo Dismount is the most convincing vehicular personal impact simulation seen on Android!

Follow Mr. Dismount on facebook.com/MrDismount
Follow Secret Exit on Twitter: twitter.com/secretexit

Dismounting (turbocharged or regular) is not to be attempted at home or outside, and should be left to trained professionals. Secret Exit does not recommend or condone dismount attempts outside 3D computer simulations.

comments: I love this game! I like the crushes! Everybody and body part of our shelf! We can change any vehicle we want! Can change our shelf! We want to! It's FUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This game is very awesome, there is a slow motion feature, maps, millions of cars to destroy, and more, you can even get a fighter jet, almost like a F-22 Raptor, with cool cities in the background as well, but even better,you can preform dangerous stunts, its really cool.

Very fun, has a bunch of levels, cars, and hats my favorite car is the bumper car and magnum. recommend you get this if you want to see destruction. Edit: And I would want to see another update. Have not seen one for a while, if you are making another game I will definitely play it.

Love this game absolutely amazing. I found out about this game from a lot youtubers and honestly that made me want to play it so I decided to play it and it was great. Graphics are amazing, I love how you can turn the replay into slow motion and everything else! 11 out of 10 perfect.üòÅ‚ù§ü§Ø
Crash! Bang! Crunch! I love the sound effects! I watched Jacksepticeye play this, and while this is more limited, it's still very much the game he played. So nice to see it on mobile!

description:
You liked Paper.io ? You'll love Paper2.io!
Conquer as much territory as possible and beat the competition.
A smooth drawing experience!
descriptionHTML:
You liked Paper.io ? You'll love Paper2.io!
Conquer as much territory as possible and beat the competition.
A smooth drawing experience!

recentChanges: Minor bug fixes
comments: Love the game, hate the glitches. Please fix them. It's frustrating to get a decent chunk and the whole entire thing dissappears and you're left with a line. Or dying after watching an ad for the extra life before you even get to touch the screen. You shouldn't be able to die on your own area. I wish I could choose the plain black square, as the other colors are easily confused as I am color- blind.

Not even 10 seconds into the game and I notice you can put almost infinite characters as your name. I play the game and I am instantly distracted by the longest name ever that goes WAY off the screen. I die. The controls are a little bad, or maybe thats cause I'm on a chromebook. I like it, but I think it works better on the website. I don't trust VOODOO anymore cause I think you guys make us play with robots on the apps... none of these names look real... Anyway, I had fun. Gud Game.

Watching a video to get an extraordinary, only to die immediately after respawn, despite being in your area is dumb. There are glitches that make you lose a ton of covered space. I had 30ish percent covered....and for no reason went down to less than 5%. Fix these issues for a better rating

I love this game, it's addicting, time killer, fun, & once you see your score go up you will want to get a higher score than that. but it does have some glitches right now. it keeps shutting down, stops working, some times the ads won't play, & suddenly it does work.

The app is so good . But the problem is They can show at the top in the whole map where we are in small version , Show our way after the game is done where we see our percentage how much we covered . And the frustating thing is there is no way to exit ads üëøüëøüëø.pls fix this problem then your game will be in top 3 üôÇ

title: Google Docs
description:
Create, edit and collaborate with others on documents from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Docs app. With Docs you can:
 
 - Create new documents or edit existing files
 - Share documents and collaborate in the same document at the same time.
 - Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
 - Add and respond to comments.
 - Never worry about losing your work ‚Äì everything is saved automatically as you type.
 - Research, right in Docs with Explore
 - Open, edit and save Word documents.
 
 Permissions Notice
 Contacts: This is used to give suggestions of people to add to files and share with.
 Storage: This is used to save and open files on USB or SD storage.
descriptionHTML:
Create, edit and collaborate with others on documents from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Docs app. With Docs you can:

- Create new documents or edit existing files
- Share documents and collaborate in the same document at the same time.
- Work anywhere, anytime - even offline

summary: Create and edit documents on the go.
comments: I don't want any headers or footers on any of my documents, so I have to manually go into every document individually to remove them because there's no general setting for this - extremely inconvenient. Also, this can only be done via desktop, as even individual doc removal of headers/footers isn't an option via app - another extreme inconvenience. And when I change the font, the doc has to be refreshed in order for it to reflect the new font. Much inconvenience.

Love it. You can write tons of things. And documents never deletes unless you deleted them. 2 suggestions though. Can you make it so of your writing a story to have the option to have book pages that you can adjust the size cuz im writing a story and i wud LOVE that option. Also not just for storys but for essays and stuff. Would be great for printing 2 so you know size of page. Also have spelling corrections. Thanks google!!

Very unfortunate to repot that 'Docs have stopped unexpectedly. Report this issue to help us determine what went wrong' popping up frequently and even the reporting page is not opening. It was so friendly earlier.

Thank you SOOOO much for adding a dark theme setting! I'm a writer and sometimes I have to stop because the bright white screen hurts my head, but the dark theme setting makes things a lot easier for me and many others. ‚ô°

I like it but for the life of me I can't find out how to change the settings for sharing documents. Now whenever I want to share a document it goes automatically to Gmail, and I don't want that. There doesn't seem to be anyway in the app to change that.

comments: Been playing for awhile and got enough coins to cash out for a voucher, however everything is showing as sold out. I'm using the UK version so maybe people will have a better experience in other countries. Update I have logged in several times through the day and all show as sold out. I also do not understand the new piggy bank, how do you collect nuts and bolts?, how do you heist from other players?

It was good. Then it was not so good, introduced piggy bank... A way to spend tokens in hopes of winning more. Prize was tokens and blackjack hands. New piggy is worse.. I don't even get tokens, just get jerked around by the piggy. I know I will never get the last nickel to cash out at$10, doesn't bother me, liked the gift cards. I know I will never get anything from the piggy. I just keep coming back hoping I will get one last gift card. And I cannot find your help center.

Worst app ever!!!. Once you are approaching the minimum withdrawal then they won't give you any cash anymore and, I am just 0.15 away.They just let you watch a lot of advertisements over and over again. I won't recommend this app. Now they have an update to heist from some other players too. Nah it just goes on in circles over and over again.No withdrawal has been made.I have been playing it for a while. Highly won't recommend this app.

Waste of time. Period. Deleting now with no regrets despite being $0.25 away from cashing out (For 1-2weeks of multi-daily check-ins to the app). My gut says I'll never see a dime and my time is better spent elsewhere on games and activities I actually enjoy. Download at your own risk, but don't say I didn't warn you! Edit: After that response, I'm confident that I'm right. They make vague and empty promises so they can make more money through their scam.

Has been slow for cash payouts but I have gotten a few gift cards.. Now this app sucks. Doesn't pay out. You get enough tokens and all of a sudden its sold out... used to be legit. Beats paying for scratchers but man change the payout system back to what it was a year ago and I will change my rating back to 5 stars. Took a legit app and made it a SCAM or just near damn impossible to get any gift cards. Fun to pass the time but doesn't pay out anymore üôÉ

title: Adobe Lightroom - Photo Editor & Pro Camera
description:
Adobe Photoshop Lightroom is a free, powerful photo editor and camera app that empowers your photography, helping you capture and edit stunning images.

Easy image editing tools like sliders and filters for pictures simplify photo editing. Retouch full-resolution photos, apply photo filters, or start photo editing wherever you are.

EDIT PHOTOS ANYWHERE
Transform raw photos with one of the world‚Äôs most intuitive photo editing apps. Tap and drag sliders to improve light and color, apply photo filters for pictures, and more. Breathe life into your photo editing with leading photography tools.

Retouch light and color to make photos pop. Easy sliders let you control photo properties from your phone screen.

Crop and Rotate tools find the right size and aspect ratio to best show off your camera work. Create clean shots with straight lines by adjusting the perspective with powerful upright, guided upright, and Geometry sliders. 

Experiment and compare different photo versions without losing the original and pick your favorite look.

Access all your presets anywhere. Image edits on one device are automatically applied everywhere else.

EDIT THE FINE DETAILS
Finesse details with the advanced picture editor. Control images with selective adjustments. Remove almost anything with a touch of the Healing Brush. Local Hue Adjustments as part of selective edits let you alter hue and saturation with precision and elevate your photos. Have more control with advanced color grading and achieve stunning effects. Import your own graphical watermarks and apply your personal touch.

Easy, interactive tutorials from fellow photographers teach you to use the photo editor to its potential.

LIGHTROOM PRESETS SIMPLIFY PHOTO EDITING:
Achieve professional photo editing faster with presets - filters for pictures with unlimited customization options. Presets make each step of photo editing visible so you can learn easily. 
Combine presets to recreate your favorite photo effects perfectly every time with one click.

PRO-LEVEL CAMERA
Unique phone camera controls unlock your photography potential. Choose exposure, timer, instant presets, raw and more. Enjoy more control over your photography with capture modes like Professional and HDR.

SMART PHOTO ORGANIZATION
Adobe Sensei harnesses the power of AI to tag and organize photos based on the objects or people that are in them. A quick search for ‚Äúmountains‚Äù or ‚ÄúMaria‚Äù will display all the relevant photos. Use handy organizational tools like ratings and flags to mark and group your favorite photos, and see suggestions for the best photos across all your albums.

ADVANCED PHOTO SHARING
Group Albums let you invite others and collect everyone‚Äôs photos in one place. Share your creative process with users in the Discover section so they can see how you got from start to finish. Lightroom galleries showcase your photos online. Photo edits sync seamlessly so any changes you make are always up-to-date. Get inspiration from other creatives in the Lightroom Community and see personalized content in your feed.

Follow your favorite contributors and get inspiration for your work.

EASY ADOBE CREATIVE CLOUD STORAGE:
The Lightroom image editor is the best cloud-based service for photography lovers.
Retouch full-resolution shots and have originals and edits backed up to the cloud, ready to access anywhere. Searchable keywords are automatically applied to help you sort photos without tagging.

*Full raw HDR capture mode is currently supported on devices that contain advanced processing and memory capabilities including but not limited to devices such as - Samsung S7, S7 Edge, S8, S8+, Note 8, Google Pixel, Pixel XL, Pixel 2, Pixel 2 XL, Pixel 3, Pixel 3 XL, and OnePlus 5.

Fine Print
You must be 13 or older and agree to Adobe‚Äôs terms and privacy policy:

descriptionHTML:
Adobe Photoshop Lightroom is a free, powerful photo editor and camera app that empowers your photography, helping you capture and edit stunning images.

Easy image editing tools like sliders and filters for pictures simplify photo editing. Retouch full-resolution photos, apply photo filters, or start photo editing wherever you are.

EDIT PHOTOS ANYWHERE
Transform raw photos with one of the world‚Äôs most intuitive photo editing apps. Tap and drag sliders to improve light and color, apply photo filters for pictures, and more. Breathe life into your photo editing with leading photography tools.

Retouch light and color to make photos pop. Easy sliders let you control photo properties from your phone screen.

Crop and Rotate tools find the right size and aspect ratio to best show off your camera work. Create clean shots with straight lines by adjusting the perspective with powerful upright, guided upright, and Geometry sliders.

Experiment and compare different photo versions without losing the original and pick your favorite look.

Access all your presets anywhere. Image edits on one device are automatically applied everywhere else.

EDIT THE FINE DETAILS
Finesse details with the advanced picture editor. Control images with selective adjustments. Remove almost anything with a touch of the Healing Brush. Local Hue Adjustments as part of selective edits let you alter hue and saturation with precision and elevate your photos. Have more control with advanced color grading and achieve stunning effects. Import your own graphical watermarks and apply your personal touch.

Easy, interactive tutorials from fellow photographers teach you to use the photo editor to its potential.

LIGHTROOM PRESETS SIMPLIFY PHOTO EDITING:
Achieve professional photo editing faster with presets - filters for pictures with unlimited customization options. Presets make each step of photo editing visible so you can learn easily.
Combine presets to recreate your favorite photo effects perfectly every time with one click.

PRO-LEVEL CAMERA
Unique phone camera controls unlock your photography potential. Choose exposure, timer, instant presets, raw and more. Enjoy more control over your photography with capture modes like Professional and HDR.

SMART PHOTO ORGANIZATION
Adobe Sensei harnesses the power of AI to tag and organize photos based on the objects or people that are in them. A quick search for ‚Äúmountains‚Äù or ‚ÄúMaria‚Äù will display all the relevant photos. Use handy organizational tools like ratings and flags to mark and group your favorite photos, and see suggestions for the best photos across all your albums.

ADVANCED PHOTO SHARING
Group Albums let you invite others and collect everyone‚Äôs photos in one place. Share your creative process with users in the Discover section so they can see how you got from start to finish. Lightroom galleries showcase your photos online. Photo edits sync seamlessly so any changes you make are always up-to-date. Get inspiration from other creatives in the Lightroom Community and see personalized content in your feed.

Follow your favorite contributors and get inspiration for your work.

EASY ADOBE CREATIVE CLOUD STORAGE:
The Lightroom image editor is the best cloud-based service for photography lovers.
Retouch full-resolution shots and have originals and edits backed up to the cloud, ready to access anywhere. Searchable keywords are automatically applied to help you sort photos without tagging.

*Full raw HDR capture mode is currently supported on devices that contain advanced processing and memory capabilities including but not limited to devices such as - Samsung S7, S7 Edge, S8, S8+, Note 8, Google Pixel, Pixel XL, Pixel 2, Pixel 2 XL, Pixel 3, Pixel 3 XL, and OnePlus 5.

Fine Print
You must be 13 or older and agree to Adobe‚Äôs terms and privacy policy:
http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_linkfree
http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_linkfree
Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.adobe.com/privacy/ca-rights.html
summary: Shoot & edit raw images, make advanced color & lighting adjustments, easily.
developerAddress:
Adobe Inc.
345 Park Avenue
San Jose, CA 95110-2704
recentChanges:
- Color Grading: New creative control of midtones, highlights, and shadows
- Auto Versions: Versions created automatically as you edit
- Graphical Watermarks: Apply graphical watermark to your photos
- Follow Authors: Follow your favorite photographers to get quick access to their tutorials
- [Premium] Best Photos: Let the power of AI suggest the best photos in your album
- [Premium] Support for the latest cameras and lenses - http://www.adobe.com/go/supported_cameras
comments: Mostly docking points for the system integration (which is classic Adobe arrogance imo). If I could open images directly from the gallery (etc), it would be much more efficient. As-is I have to add it to "All Photos" (no other options), open the app manually, open the folder, find the image, and then I can start editing it. Also, while I like the new UI, it took me a bit to find everything. It's not visually obvious that you can swipe the toolbars for one thing.

AVOID AVOID AVOID AVOID!!! - I have been using this PAID product for over a month and have experienced nothing but persistent crashes.It cant even do an export to JPG without crashing. I have sent numerous reports to Adobe, but nothing has been done. So disappointing, as the product has some good features, but is totally overshadowed by instability issues and the fact Adobe charge you monthly for the pleasure. Maybe it works OK for other platforms, but for Android its a car crash. I've cancelled my subscription and uninstalled. On the look out for a professional product that allows you to edit/save work.

Needs a way to allow the theme to be changed from dark to light. Poor choice of text color for files uploading count. Needs a way to get a list of the files claimed to be uploading which never seem to finish! Always hangs on uploads. Syncing fails on a regular basis to LR Classic. Camera only uses some of the lenses on my LG V40 using Android V10.

A great app I have yet to try the paid version. It does almost anything you want it to. I do have a minor complaint. I use this on my android tablet usually and I wish there were ambidextrous controls. I use my pen a lot and it's very difficult to tune the color and lighting which are all on the right side as a left handed person.

I'm blown away by how much you can do with the free version. It seems a little complicated at first but the more time yo give it the more you learn and the more you realize this is probably the best free editing app available on your phone. Have so many lessons available aswell. Honestly excited about any new updates.

title: Alibaba.com - Leading online B2B Trade Marketplace
description:
The Alibaba.com app is a leading wholesale mobile marketplace for global trade. Buy products from suppliers around the world, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Buy & Pay with confidence
Alibaba Trade Assurance fully covers your purchases when suppliers do not meet the product quality and delivery schedule specified in the agreed contract. 

Customized products
Suppliers have years of experience in customizing products, fulfilling the demands from sellers on Amazon, eBay, wish, etsy, mercari, lazada, etc.

Easy sourcing
Browse millions of products from industry-wide categories. Post Request for Quotations (RFQs) and receive price quotes quickly. 

Fast shipping 
Alibaba partners with major freight forwarders to provide sea, air & land shipping solutions with on time delivery , tracking information and fair pricing.

Popular Categories
Alibaba.com covers a wide range of popular categories including hot and trending consumer products, also features industrial and raw materials categories 

Product quality under control
Chose Alibaba.com's Inspection Service, making sure orders meet the quality standards specified in your contract.

Discount & Promotions
Pick the best deals from factories offering discounts and promotions.

Stay in the loop
Buyers on the Alibaba.com app can follow their favorite suppliers to stay up to date on new products and promotions.

Languages & currencies supported
Alibaba.com supports 16 popular languages and 140 more local currencies. 
Now you can use Alibaba Real-time Translator to communicate with sellers in mother tongue.

Performance updates and upgrades, including:

comments: The app doesn't allow me to log in with my existing account. I've even changed my password many times to try and get in of which I still cant. The app usually says my email is not registered with the app. When I attempt to "register" the the app says the email already exists. I dont understand what is going on. Even with trying to get through to the help centre I have to "log in" but I cant coz I keep being kicked out

Absolutely Horrible, my personal email is sent or something when I view items and I am getting responses for things I have not enquired about. That notification bar is a nuisance, I have turned it off 10times and it keeps coming back. the notifications bar just doesn't stay hidden it just keeps taking up real estate on my screen for nothing. How do you delete your account?

Ok this is my example of how things work they post an add off an amplifier pricing it from 100-1000 ! But whenever you try to buy ! Its always $1,000 most sellers lie on the add and some are rude after you question the ! Plus app doesnt work ! I cant open it keeps telling me to go to a desktop ! Useless app.

I am do tired of uninstalling this app (6 times so far this week), it is worse than a virus. I never asked for it, dont want it and cant apparently get rid of it. So my advice - avoid it like the plague. If I could find a good way tp complain about this unwanted invasion of my phone I would. Another 2 uninstalls later. Google should ban this app.

Messenger doesn't work after the last update, keeps giving "sign in failed" error. I have to use my laptop browser to access the website instead, which is frustrating. 29/10/2020 we are back to the "sign in failed" issue again. Works ok on browser but app is still having problems.

title: MovieStarPlanet
description:
MovieStarPlanet is the coolest social network & game for kids!
 
Attention boys and girls! Are you looking for stardom?
Then welcome to our planet filled with stars.
Create a Movie Star today and make awesome Movies, ArtBooks, photos, design clothes and share them with your friends and fans. You might become a famous celebrity overnight.
Let your creativity loose!
Become the best fashion designer and design your own clothes, play Dress Up and model your creations. Create the most amazing art of all time to earn Fame, get awards and rise to stardom.
There is tons of fun waiting for you on MovieStarPlanet! We are a family-oriented game that takes safety SERIOUSLY, and we always work to ensure MovieStarPlanet is a place where parents can trust their kids to hang out.

comments: This game is really really nostalgic, I've been playing since 2012 alright, but you guys really really need to fix these bugs and stuff that's making the game suck. You can't see your friends movies anymore, your friends pictures, the statuses are just for Nova and Zac, and the game lags. Like really bad. But, otherwise this game brings back memories.

I love this game!! But it does have some problems. I think you should be able to earn diamonds just like you can earn fame and starcoins. My account got hacked 6 different times so I feel like there should be more protection than what they have. The game is so fun and addictive though I get stuck playing for hours!!!!!

As much as I love this game there's a lot of bugs that need to be fixed no one plays the games anymore because you don't get rewards, my game keep glitching out even though WiFi bars are full, and for some reason I get a message saying its getting late chat opens in 1 hour, im 18 this doesn't happen to my 12 year old sister. But over all this game is fun but needs some work done.

the app is horrible. it's so sensitive to everything. you can type one number and get locked. and how do I know ? bc I did. I typed the number 5 and git locked for "sharing password" the game needs to grow up and I don't recommend it to anyone it's a waste of time and money. and they don't refund you your money when they lock your account. just bad overall.

So I've been playing this game for a long time on pc and mobile but the thing is on mobile I can't log out or anything because of the black bar. I've tried it on a different phone (Samsung) it was fine no bar or anything everything worked but the phone I mainly use (Motorola) it's like the screen is slight moved to the right so it's not fully on the screen which makes it hard for me to log out, exit profiles or movies. For msp 2 I have no problems with any of these things.

title: Google News - Top world & local news headlines
description:
Google News is a personalized news aggregator that organizes and highlights what‚Äôs happening in the world so you can discover more about the stories that matter to you.


Stay up to date on your interests

‚Ä¢ The For You tab delivers the top stories across all your favorite topics and sources in one place. Deep dive into science, entertainment, fashion, sports, finance or whatever else you care about.

One story. Numerous perspectives.

‚Ä¢ With Full Coverage you can be informed on how a story is reported from a variety of sources. With just a tap you‚Äôll see recent headlines from different sources, videos, local news reports, FAQs, news analysis, social commentary, and a timeline of events for stories that developed over time.

Breaking news

‚Ä¢ The Headlines tab offers an unfiltered view of top and breaking news articles from around the world. Additional sections let you dig in to more on tech news, business news, travel news, national and international news, health and more.

Discover new sources and topics

‚Ä¢ The Newsstand tab makes it easy to find and follow the sources you trust, as well as browse and discover new ones.

Access your favorite news and magazines subscriptions, together

‚Ä¢ If you want to support your favorite news publisher, we‚Äôve made it simple to subscribe with your Google Account. This means no more forms, credit card numbers, or new passwords. Easily access them all within the same app.

A smart news app built for every phone, everywhere

‚Ä¢ Google News is designed to meet the needs of users with different phones and levels of connection.

‚Ä¢ When your connection isn‚Äôt strong or you need to save data, Google News will continue to work smoothly by slimming down the size of images and downloading less data.

‚Ä¢ Articles can be downloaded over Wi-Fi to save for reading later when you are offline.

recentChanges: ¬∑ Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: It has been good so far. It is unobtrusive and has provided interesting news items. It is not 5 stars yet (or possibly less) because I have not used it often enough to form an opinion on if the news is biased or not. Update.:. I am liking this app alot. I find myself checking it at least once a day without fail. I like that it sometimes asks if a particular news item is appreciated (hopefully getting a better understanding of what I like)

They've really put a lot of work into the interface and quality of the app which, to be honest, wasn't very good in the past. It seems much more deliberate and with a much greater investment of thought in how it attempts to deliver the news in a "context" relavant format, as opposed to how it once felt as if Google was treating it as an afterthought just to have a cursory presence in newsreader apps. Much, much better, I o.

It's pretty good, especially for searching historical articles and emerging trends, but for day to day, you have to be very careful with your curation, it is very easy to create an echo chamber of the same articles, for days, to the exclusion of new things you would want to see. And, on the flip side, not curating your tastes results in only top headline pop culture garbage. Oh, and if you use a browser other than chrome, it gets flaky. I'm looking for something less finicky and more robust.

Not working well in split-screen mode (Tab S7+). With 2 side-by-side apps, opening some articles has the layout configured for the full screen width of the tablet, rather than the width of the split-screen window. Makes it difficult to read, having to scroll both left-to-right on each line. I will revise my review when this issue is fixed.

It's a good news app, it's doesn't have all variety of newspapers all over world ofcourse but it do have popular newspapers. The video quality is good, keeps you up to date in whatever field you want. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars cause it doesn't support "e - newspapers". I love e - newspapers a lot and they don't have that feature. Looking for this feature in future updates.

title: PicsArt Photo Editor: Pic, Video & Collage Maker
description:
PicsArt is the best all-in-one photo and video editor on mobile! Unleash your creativity with one of the most popular apps with over 1 billion downloads to date. PicsArt gives you everything you need to create awesome edits. The best part? It‚Äôs free!

Awesome Features: 

 PHOTO EDITOR
- Try hot filters for pictures & trendy photo effects.
- Access impressive background eraser: cut out photos & erase backgrounds.

- Get a stunning makeover with Beautify tools: hair color changer, makeup stickers & more.
- Blur photo backgrounds with a smart selection tool.

- Edit videos or make them from scratch using outstanding video maker with music. 
- Bring your exciting stories to life and create exciting TikTok videos.

COLLAGE MAKER
- Create an amazing photo collage using all your favorite pictures. 
- Try photo grid, freestyle collage, scrapbook, and frames for photos. 
- Go viral. Create funny memes with our meme generator & share with friends. 
- Use story maker and level up your Instagram game with story templates.

STICKER MAKER + FREE STICKERS
- Discover over 60+ million cool PicsArt stickers for iMessage.
- Add stickers to photos to turn up the fun level on edits.
- Make your own cute clipart & use cut out tool to create funny custom stickers.

PHOTO EFFECTS
- Outline selfies with the hottest Sketch effects.

- Cartoon yourself with amazing Magic effects to turn photos into cartoons.
- Play with cool Doodle Art & start doodling away for hours.
 
DRAWING TOOL

REPLAY

- Go Gold! PicsArt‚Äôs Gold subscription grants access to NEW EXCLUSIVE content all the time. All the hottest features with ad-free editing experience.

comments: At first the app was fun to use and it was helped me to make funny skits. But when I accidentally deleted it and just downloaded it today, it made me let Picsart have the permission to access my Storage. I went to settings to change the permissions but it wouldn't let me, and now I can't do anything. For now I'm giving this 4 stars overall. FIX THIS PLEASE!!!!!!

Okay so, I like this app. I love how you can edit your photos and videos. It's just why cant you edit your videos without the text costing too much. Like I want to edit my videos and add text and it cost too much with the premium. But overall theres not a lot of problems, it does lag so it always mess up my edits and I have to start over. BUT I recommend this app for anyone!üëçüèæ

been using the premium version for over a year. good but has issues. sometimes slow, sometimes doesn't see images (even those you just edited with this app), even after multiple refresh/reopening the app, the gallery, cleaning the cache and even restarting the phone. no other pics editing app has this issue on my phone. will switch to another app once i find the better option. p.s. they should definitely work on their text editing options. poor so far.

well, it's always going back while im editing, but maybe it's just my phone. it's just MY experience with it. no need to get worked up by it. Edit: well, I've changed to my 4 stars to 2 stars because it won't let me edit. It won't let me do anything. I thought it was my lack of storage space, but I've fred up a lot and it still won't work.

The app is quite good but the only thing I hate is that when I actually want to apply effects to a picture, it keeps loading and then they turn me back to the editing page. I reinstalled the app but it still does the same thing. Please fix this issue real quick or I might uninstall the app

title: Call me a Legend - Game of Battle & Love
description:
Playboy x Call Me A Legend

12 beautiful Playmates are trapped in the zombie world. Rescue all the Playmates before they are gone!  
Time is limited for all legends to finish the rescue-missions and set them free from the zombies. They promise to thank you and you won't be disappointed.
Meet the Playmates of the month including Gia, Audrey, Raquel, Stephanie, Sophie, Monica....etc, they are waiting for you to rescue them. 

Call me a Legend is a free RPG game simulation with plenty of love affairs and politics! Become a Legend in the game, which enables you to get rich and gain power! But beware of zombies, because they are lurking behind every corner!

Main features:
‚úî Love affairs - Increase intimacy with girls by dating them and giving them gifts. Become a Legend among girls!
‚úî Raising a family - Take care of your wife and she will take care of your life and your children. Groom your heirs!
‚úî Political games - Get rich and powerful!
‚úî Forge Alliances - Recruit heroes which will help you defeat the zombies! 
‚úî Develop the camp and upgrade your heroes to make them stronger. Be the top of the legend!
‚úî Go on Quests - send expeditions to explore new territories and find more survivors.
‚úî Chat online with other players - exchange your experiences! Who is the Legend at the end?
‚úî Set the record - We challenge you to try to become the best-ranked player on our worldwide ranking list! Are you the Legend?

Play Call me a Legend for FREE now! Get Rich, Gain Power Now!

¬© 2020 Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. Playboy and the Rabbit Head Design are trademarks of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. and used under license by Empire Studios Inc.

comments: Downloaded the game to see what it was about. Waiting for it to load which was exceptionally long load time, only to get to the main background screen and nothing else. Nothing to click on to proceed any further. Just the main screen. Read the reviews for the gane and seems to me like the devs for this gane arent sure what they are doing. Waste of time.

Very challenging game. Excellent girls, can build soldiers to whatever strength you want according to your resources. Would recommend this game if your diligent. The bad, it's a little glitchy, have had 2 uninstall and reinstall several times this last week in order for the game to load. Also likes to disconnect from the server, occasionally it won't reconnect. Once required a reinstall. Fortunately no game play was lost and no penalties. Kudos to the DEVS for the mini game and variety.

The is a good game but it sucks that you have to collect 800 puzzle pieces for most girls and sucks that the girls never get put in the rotation, so I have alot of puzzle pieces and never get the chance to get them, unless they start putting back into rotation then I'm going to delete the game

Beware, extremely low probabilities and undisclosed gacha odds. Did over 150+ searches and did not gain a single point in progression towards a character. Needs more work and bug fixes. Half of the content says "Coming Soon," and even a screen still shows as "Beta testing." Servers are pretty much dead, no social aspect and lacks co-cop related content. Also don't like that some events run at 4am in the morning and only last 2 hours.

Fun enough game if you're patient. The beauties are ridiculous but entertaining and at least they aren't Anime style. There's enough to do to keep you coming back and figure out. Like that if you miss out on something it will come around again in a few months. PTP helps but you don't need to if you're patient and don't mind grinding it out.

title: Google Meet - Secure Video Meetings
description:
Securely connect, collaborate, and celebrate from anywhere. With Google Meet, everyone can safely create and join high-quality video meetings for groups of up to 250 people.

 ‚Ä¢ Meet safely - video meetings are encrypted in transit and our array of safety measures are continuously updated for added protection
‚Ä¢ Host large meetings - invite up to 250 participants to a meeting, whether they‚Äôre in the same team or outside of your organization
‚Ä¢ Easy access on any device - share a link and invite team members to join your conversations with one click from a web browser or the Google Meet mobile app
‚Ä¢ Share your screen - present documents, slides, and more during your conference call.
‚Ä¢ Participate in broadcasted events - teams, businesses, and schools can view and present in live-streamed events that include up to 100,000 in-domain viewers
‚Ä¢ Record for later - for important events on your calendar, hit record while in the meeting and get the recording file straight from Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Follow along - live, real-time captions powered by Google speech-to-text technology

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/gsuite
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/gsuite
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gsuitebygoogle/

comments: I didn't like at all the latest update because the total system is changed a lot and against a comfort zone. Secondly, the presented screen is small, which is quite disturbing and disappointing. And sending of messages is so difficult and different. Besides, checking infos, links are quite difficult. I am not able to see the participants in a meeting. In short, not so user-friendly. Please fix this and update to previous version. The previous version was much better. Thank you.

The former version of this was better. Ever since my google meet updated, it did not allowed to me join peacefully. It just kept saying either "Failed to join the meeting" or "Cannot connect you to a video call". It really irritates me, in a way that I'am the President of our class and it's very humilliating for me not to attend. I really HATE the new version. It works on my other relatives phone, but I don't have the chance to ask them to lend me their phone even 'cause they are using it.

After the integration of meet and Gmail app, I can't adjust the volume of the meeting. Even if I click the volume button and move the level to mininum, it stays the same. Please fix this. Seems like this is happening to my specific device model. Edit: After the latest update, it's working fine. Still the 3 star to bring back the old UI.

The recent update is worst!.. Trust me, I am not able to handle this new version of Google meet. I was struggling to find where the chat section was and from where to send messages. I have to zoom each and every thing presented on the screen. The screen looks too small. Once you go in the chat section,you are not able to see the screen. The old version is way better than the new version. Please bring back the old version. Please!

The latest version is the worst and it's a shame considering the app was already great. Typing a message is very frustrating with all the names entering and leaving the meeting appearing in front of the message, this could be solved by putting this feature in the top instead, sometimes your message hides behind the keyboard. This version also doesn't allow to see the chat at the same time as the meeting. Please comeback with the older version and we will all pretend this version never happened.

title: LinkedIn: Jobs, Business News & Social Networking
description:
LinkedIn has open jobs for every profession.

Find a career and stay up to date on the most relevant openings with the LinkedIn app, the most trusted network. Job search is easy with the most up-to-date job listings and business news, with millions of connections in every industry.

Grow your network with business contacts, stay up to date with companies, and follow thought leaders. Apply for jobs easily and get recommendations for jobs where we think you‚Äôll be a fit. LinkedIn is here to help you land your next job.

Job seeker looking for new employment? Business networking? Business news and industry buzz? Do that and more with the free LinkedIn app.

Filter through millions of openings and customized recommendations to find your perfect career. Safely apply for your perfect position with your resume or professional profile in a few taps, straight through the app. The LinkedIn job search app lets you build a profile highlighting your professional experience, so you can show your successes, skills and network.

Start business networking to keep in touch with connections and other professionals. Find a job hiring near you and use LinkedIn to ask your business contacts for referrals. Check online jobs, share posts and converse with fellow professionals to boost your odds of getting hired.

No matter where you're at or what you're looking for, LinkedIn makes job searching easy. Grow and connect with friends, colleagues, companies, industry experts and the rest of the LinkedIn community.

5 reasons why you‚Äôll love the LinkedIn app:

- Job search & recruiting: Find positions suited to your skills and apply
- Career finder: Research companies you‚Äôre interested and see if their open roles
- Business networking: Network, request referrals, and stay up to date on your contacts
- Business news: Get relevant news delivered to you via your Daily Rundown and write your own 
- Social network: Create your profile, keep an up to date resume online and highlight your skillset

Search jobs, develop business contacts, connect with recruiters, and apply for your next job LinkedIn helps you start and finish your job search!

LinkedIn App Features:

JOB SEARCH APP & CAREER FINDER
‚Ä¢ Find jobs now hiring & apply using your LinkedIn profile and/or resume
‚Ä¢ Apply for jobs for every type of profession ‚Äì salaried, hourly, part-time, remote and more
‚Ä¢ Find jobs through recruiters & find new contacts
‚Ä¢ Job alerts for any new openings you might be interested in
‚Ä¢ Set job alerts to get notified when new jobs from your followed companies are posted

BUSINESS NEWS
‚Ä¢ Share articles with the LinkedIn community & your business contacts
‚Ä¢ Business news from related industries to help you stay up to date
‚Ä¢ Write posts and connect with your community

BUSINESS NETWORKING
‚Ä¢ Network on the go; connect with new contacts and easily find industry experts
‚Ä¢ Follow companies, influencers and professionals
‚Ä¢ Social networking for businesses: showcase your company or product to find new opportunities

RESUME & PROFILE
‚Ä¢ Apply for jobs using your LinkedIn profile
‚Ä¢ Easily submit your resume for any job
‚Ä¢ Keep your LinkedIn profile up to date as a virtual resume highlighting your experience
‚Ä¢ Share accomplishments, job responsibilities and skills on your professional profile

SOCIAL NETWORKING
‚Ä¢ Connect to the largest social network of professionals from around the globe
‚Ä¢ Import contacts for a quick & easy way to grow your network

Find a job with job search tools, recruiters, industry experts and career opportunities at your fingertips. The LinkedIn app is a perfect way to network, apply to jobs and find new contacts - straight from your phone, wherever you are.

Want to make the most of LinkedIn? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools.

We ask for a few permissions when you use this app. Here‚Äôs why: http://linkd.in/1l0S8YZ

recentChanges: Thanks for using LinkedIn! We regularly update our app to fix bugs, improve performance and add new features to help you connect with your professional network and advance your career.
comments: My experience has been awful. After the 1 month free premium trial I tried to cancel my subscription it would not let me. Day 6 of trying to get a refund, countless hours spent on the 'live chat' feature which kicks you off every 3 minutes. Emailed them with link below. Haven't heard anything yet. This is incredibky disappointing and shows that I cannot support this company with my money as it seems impossible to speak to someone or get an issue resolved. Utterly disappointing customer service.

For a professional tool, there are way too many bugs. For instance, when someone sends us a connection request, we can't click to see their picture. It simply doesn't open. Same thing happens with replying to their message. Unless we accept the connection, go back and enter into the person's profile properly, many features don't work. Sometimes the app needs to be restarted in order for it to start working again. A month after this review still no info from the developers team... Disappointing.

I really like LinkedIn app but I guess your app is couple of steps behind your website. Watching live events on the app is just like being tortured! Comments cover the screen in landscape mode, and if you want to turn it back to portrait mode, the screen becomes too small that makes it impossible to read a single word! Would you please fix it ASAP?

The app is useless for the last few days. I'm following a highly active community on LinkedIn. But same posts from 3-4 days back is always there on top of my feed. No matter how much I refresh the feed, new posts won't appear. I tried everything from clearing cache to reinstalling the app. The feed is like my profile now. There are posts I've liked and commented. Even if there are no new activities on the post by my connection, it's still there.

It will be nice if you were able to edit a conversation piece that you accidentally sent that had mistakes, and that you wanted to correct or unsend. Example if you were sending date each text message (case in point this a speech to text) and there a lot of errors in it. Then you accidentally send it. You can't unsend it. It should be a way to fix an error after it's been sent or unsend something.

title: Tom's Love Letters
description:
Show your special someone how you feel. Download now and start your love story!

Want to tell that special someone how you feel, but don't know how? Don't worry! Your friends Talking Tom and Talking Angela are here to help! They've got lots of ideas, including cards and cute songs you can send.

Send personal romantic messages and cute pictures to your special someone.

You might want to let a friend know they're important to you. Or declare your love for someone. Whoever it is and whatever you want to share, Tom and Angela are here to help! Go on. Share the love!

Game features:
- Send an awesome card to your special someone. There are 19 to choose from!
- Enjoy and buy 4 great songs.
- Need inspiration? Watch animations of love gurus Tom and Angela!

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates Outfit7 has established COPPA compliant privacy practices to protect your child‚Äôs personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and contextual advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- The possibility to connect with friends via social networks
- The option to make in-app purchases

http://outfit7.com/eula-android/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/

comments: THIS is No Joke I'm Positive About This.. Just One... one! Thing. Change it to the old version It's way better. The version in paris where You can send angela Letters And sing with Angela. can we have that back? i Really. really! Like the first version way better than this. Its A Not Kind of fun game now The Update Ate whole of the game. I Promise you If You Change It. it will get more Rates. Its Not only for me Fun, But You to change your new boring game to the old

I WANT THE OLD VERSION! It was so nice . Tom would sing with Angela ,chat with her,ginger would throw a flower pot on Tom's head,there would be an earthquake, a strong gust of wind,the would sing together, Tom would give gifts to Angela.I was awesome!but this version is just boring

Listen here dude the old version "Tom loves Angela" was way better. This version is boring and you can see them kiss, hug, dance which is gross. I want to the version when Angela is on the balcony and Tom on the roof, and you could write letters üìù to Angels and she would answer, also you would sing a song called "you get me". Do not install this game. Not good game dev. I have no idea how this game has so many 5 stars.

It's a good game, But I want to add some more features in this games like Tom and Angela live with each other. They go out and we have to dress up them. We have to make food for them, decorate there house and many more. And I also want some action scenes that some thieves took Angela with them and we Tom will go on a mission to rescue her. Please add these features. üôÇ

We want the old version So the old version was amazing, And so fun. They could sing songs and chat (I would troll her) She was on a balcony and Tom was on a roof, there could be a earthquake and Ginger could throw a flower pot on Tom's head. Tom could give her gifts and stuff, And there was really fun games as well. This Version This version is really boring. All they can do is Kiss, Hug, dance and read cards. That's literally it. It's super boring, If I could I would give it no star.

title: Dancing Road: Color Ball Run!
description:
Top free sound game in the music game category!
Let‚Äôs dance hard with the colorful ball under the rolling sky challenging like solving puzzle 
Galaxy adventure to unlock new songs in the music box:.
And if you are an authentic KPOP fans, you cannot skip BigBang, BLACKPINK,iKON,...Your idols are in here!!!

Roll the ball to match other balls of the same color under the galaxy sky background. Collect the coins and Gift Boxes to unlock new treasures in music box. Train your eyes coordination when the ball suddenly hop from one color to another.
