comments: Every five seconds there is an ad. Make a mistake? Well, gotta wait 30 seconds for an ad to play. Immediately make another mistake 4 seconds after resuming play? There's another 30 second ad. And that's on top of all the other ads. I was initially very excited to play this, because I used to play a very similar game on Steam about ten years ago. If this app didn't interrupt you every. Five. Seconds. With. An. Ad. It might be a lot of fun, but it's unplayable. Uninstalled after 20 minutes. :(

This might possibly be without a shadow of a doubt the worst game I've ever played this year and the high reviews I am convinced those are bots and will be reporting this there's no way anyone can get any pleasure from ads the dancing game. Every two seconds there's an ad they're not even trying to hide this fact. Runaway runaway from the pain and the trash

Fun game if there weren't so many ads! It's an overwhelming amount of ads in every level! I understand that ads are how you make money but you could ease up a little bit! I found even the very first level to be somewhat difficult to pass. Would give a much higher rating if the amount of advertising was decreased even a little bit.

Worse than color hop and tile hop, which are the same idea and by the same company. The only thing about this game that's better is that you don't lose if you miss one of the tiles/balls. But now there are balls of the wrong color set as obstacles, your ball is big enough to hit two of the target balls at the same time (so you lose because one was the wrong color), and the road bends which makes it harder to aim. Without bouncing in tempo (color/tile hop) music is unrelated to timing of ball hit

I hate this now everytime I wanna skip an ad ligitt it keeps on coming with an ad. On the other side it also glitches it doesn't show the balls so I don't know where to goüò≠! And then THERE WAS AN AD!!! Jeez it's so annoying I turned off the WiFi and... THE AD STILL KEPT ON GOING this is the worst game I've ever downloaded and that's really bad for me because well... I've had alot of really really absolutely terrible bad apps but this is the worst of them so plz take my ADVICE DON'T DOWNLOAD IT

title: Snapchat
description:
Snapchat is a fast and fun way to share the moment with friends and family üëª

Snapchat opens right to the camera, so you can send a Snap in seconds! Just take a photo or video, add a caption, and send it to your best friends and family. Express yourself with Filters, Lenses, Bitmojis, and all kinds of fun effects.

SNAP üì∏
‚Ä¢ Snapchat opens right to the camera. Tap to take a photo, or press and hold for video.
‚Ä¢ Add a Lens or Filter to your photo ‚Äî new ones are added every day! Change the way you look, dance with your 3D Bitmoji, and discover games you can play with your face.
‚Ä¢ Create your own Filters to add to photos and videos ‚Äî or try out Lenses made by our community!

CHAT üí¨
‚Ä¢ Stay in touch and Chat with friends with live messaging, or share your day with Group Stories.
‚Ä¢ Video Chat with up to 16 friends at once. You can even use Filters and Lenses!
‚Ä¢ Express yourself with Friendmojis ‚Äî exclusive Bitmojis made just for you and a friend.

STORIES
‚Ä¢ Watch friends' Stories to see their day unfold.
‚Ä¢ Watch Stories from the Snapchat community, based on your interests.

comments: It was a fantastic platform until they sold out for ad placement. You used to be able to swipe right and see a list of your friends stories that was easy to navigate until they replaced it with the Discover section, leaving at least myself with a far greater struggle of navigating my friends content to the point that it makes me stop using the app at times. I'm sorry but I didn't get a private picture messaging app to try and find trendy stuff, the only reason I still use it is my friends do.

Snapchat is a nice app in concept, however there are quite a few issues. Sending and receiving photos works great. But the UI adds too many extra things that are unhelpful. Quick add below my messages in the chat section? Why I just want to see my current friends and snaps. Extra stories from sources other than my friends and no way to hide them. It's labeled "for you" but I don't want them. Ads in-between friends stories.

I have a samsung and recently the app has stopped working as it used to. For large stretches of the day I am not able to send or receive any snaps (snaps I try to send fail, and when people send me snaps they show up 'delivered', looking as if I have already viewed them when I haven't). It is not a network issue as I have tried it on 2 wifi networks as well as using data.

Back to their old ways I've been using snapchat for years. Everytime they used to update, I would not receive notifications. There was a time where there was an emergency and my friend messaged me through snap, previous to this I was receiving notifications just fine but after the update my friends message did not appear on my phone. By the time I had opened the message it was too late (my friend is okay now). But the point is that snapchat has gotten crazy with updates and its affecting people

It's overall a great app and I love using it but in the last month or so I haven't been able to see that people are messaging me (and my siblings are having the same problem). It will sometimes tell me that someone is typing or someone sent a snap but most of the time I'll look on snapchat and someone will have sent me a snap hours earlier and it never told me. I looked on settings to see if I had turned of notifications and I looked on certain people's names but I didn't find anything. Recent.

title: Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit
description:
Count on Lyft to take you wherever you need to to go. Got an early flight? Need to get to the office to prep for the morning meeting? We‚Äôll match you with a driver, help you find the quickest bus route, or show you the nearest scooter ‚Äî you‚Äôll be on your way in minutes.  If it gets you there, it‚Äôs in the app. 

Save time (and your sanity)
We‚Äôll match you with a driver in seconds.  Your time is your money ‚Äî having to tackle traffic and hunt for parking is a total pain. With Lyft, you can just sit back and relax.

You‚Äôve got options
Choose from 9 different ways to go*, they‚Äôre all available right from your app. Whether you‚Äôre looking for an affordable ride, the most direct route, or a way to treat your crew ‚Äî we‚Äôve got the mode to suit your needs and mood.

Adventure all day and night
Have peace of mind knowing you can always request a Lyft ride 24/7 ‚Äî and share your route with friends. Our Community Safety Program is designed to bring our riders and drivers greater protection ‚Äî from in-person trainings to in-app features.

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.

recentChanges: Thanks for choosing Lyft! To make your rides even better, we update the app regularly. It‚Äôs like housekeeping: squashing bugs, cleaning up code, and other small-but-mighty improvements.
comments: I have been trying to use my lyft account for about 2 years. When I type in my debit/credit it doesn't not accept it error when I have triple checked it and still won't take it. I typed it in right. It pretty frustrating when you need a ride and can't even access your lyft account for a ride. This has been going of for 2 years now.

Up until tonight Ive loved the app, but as of tonight it charges me for the ride but after I go and order it it just goes back to the select destination screen it doesn't look for a car then it tells me I found a car and be ready in 18 minutes but there's no trace of it inside the app I don't know what's going on right now, I'm very disappointed and kind of stranded not because of this possibly unless this guy just shows up mysteriously in 18 minutes I have no clue if he's going to or not

I have had an account for years but have not used it since 2015. I moved to a new state recently and had re-download lyft and tried to attach my payment methods. I tried to attach every option that is offered and the app wouldn't let me. I even Uninstalled and reinstalled several times. There's is no proper customer service set up. I finally found a number that would keep me on hold then eventually hang up. This is why I prefer uber, I never have these problems with them.

Changed my address a week before downloading. My card didnt match my new address when adding it yet. Understandable. But now that my address is up to date, i still have to use a completely different card. I contacted support who told me my card wasnt working or they dont accept it _. I tried explaining it was my address, they sent me to a link that told me I need to use a new card. Its just very frustdrating. I gave it two stars because the drivers are always awesome and the prices are fair.

Terrible. Added my credit card a day prior and thought it was set to go. Now I request a ride and they want a second credit card that has matching address, provided this unnecessary info and rejected because could not validate, your problem not mine. Dishonest, unreliable, do not use if your ride is a necessity. Unbelievable. 0 stars if I could

title: Skype - free IM & video calls
description:
Skype keeps the world talking. Say ‚Äúhello‚Äù with an instant message, voice or video call ‚Äì all for free*.

Use Skype to send SMS messages to mobiles worldwide and with SMS Connect you can now also read and reply to your phone's SMS messages right from your computer. SMS connect will be released gradually.

‚Ä¢ Video calls ‚Äì Don‚Äôt just hear the cheers, see them! Get together with 1 or 24 of your friends and family on a HD video call. Watch everyone‚Äôs smiles and cries when you tell them ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre engaged!!!" 
‚Ä¢ Chat ‚Äì Reach people instantly. Send messages to your friends, grab someone‚Äôs attention with @ mentions, or create a group chat to plan a family reunion. 
‚Ä¢ SMS Connect - Read and reply to your phone's SMS messages in Skype on your PC or Mac.
‚Ä¢ Share ‚Äì Send photos and videos with your family and friends. Save shared photos and videos to your camera roll. Share your screen to make travel plans with friends or present designs to your team.
‚Ä¢ Voice calls ‚Äì Camera shy? Make voice calls to anyone in the world on Skype. You can also call mobile and landlines at low rates.
‚Ä¢ Express yourself ‚Äì Liven up conversations with emoticons, click on the ‚Äú+‚Äù in chat to send a Giphy or images from the web, and annotate images with words, lines and more.

By downloading the Skype Preview, you‚Äôll gain early access to our newest and coolest features. Of course, while you‚Äôre having fun, know that this app is a work in progress. We're hoping to get your vital feedback as we add new enhancements and features to Skype. Simply click the heart icon on the main screen and you will be able to send your comments to our team, helping us shape the future of Skype.

Skype is available on phones, tablets, PCs and Macs.

*Skype to Skype calls are free. Operator data charges may apply. We recommend using an unlimited data plan or WiFi connection.

developerAddress: Skype Software S.√†.r.l, 23 ‚Äì 29 Rives de Clausen, L-2165 Luxembourg
recentChanges:
We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve Skype.

What's new?
- Easier deletion of multiple contacts
- Added support for Android Auto
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

Visit https://go.skype.com/whatsnew for more details.
comments: Skype is my go-to video call app. I've been using it for many years, to stay in touch with family and friends. My daughter used it for years for piano lessons and helped us stay in touch with her piano teacher when we moved. My elderly parent was able to learn how to use it. I use the call feature to reach family and friends in the UK, Hong Kong Indonesia, add Canada inexpensively. I also appreciate not having to set up a link in advance, I just dial and get on.

The majority of the time the audio is good and the video is good but a significant percentage of the time the video freezes and the audio is unable to be understood. The other problem is Skype does not seem to work with Firefox and Firefox is my browser. The the biggest Improvement I think that I could make make would be to make it compatible with the latest version of Firefox

Skype; a communication app we have been using since the earlier days of internet. From calls to messaging, or even getting a second number--this app is really all you need. Be it your desktop PC, laptop, or smartphone--the app will give you similar experience on all different platforms. The international call rates are quite price competitive. You may also add balance and use it as you go. Highly recommended!

Works well for video calls - of course it requires a good internet connection. Occasionally the video will halt for a moment, and once or twice the audio has dropped out. Usually there are no problems. Update: I wish the developers would prioritize the audio. It's usually not a problem if the video freezes briefly, but too often the audio drops out completely.

Works great.... most of the time? So many times messages are delayed because Skype says "no connection" even though I have Fiber Optic internet, 895 Mbps connection at the moment. Sms, and othe aps work flawlessly. Unfortunately I get this message multiple times a day which tells me there's an issue with Skype servers. Please fix so I can stop closing the app, clearing the cache and reopening 10x a day!

title: CamScanner - Scanner to scan PDF
description:
CamScanner is the best scanner app that will turn your phone into a PDF scanner. Convert images to pdf in a simple tap. Download it for FREE! 


* Installed on over 380 million devices in over 200 countries around the world
* Over 500,000 new registrations per day

CamScanner helps you scan, store, sync and collaborate on various contents across smartphones, iPads, tablets and computers.

Features:

*Quickly Digitize Document
Just use your phone camera to scan and digitize all kinds of paper documents: receipts, notes, invoices, whiteboard discussions, business cards, certificates, etc.

*Optimize Scan Quality
Smart cropping and auto enhancing ensures the texts and graphics in scanned documents are clear and sharp with premium colors and resolutions.

*Extract Texts from Image
OCR (optical character recognition) feature recognizes texts in document images and extract them from images for later searching, editing or sharing. (Premium only)

*Share PDF/JPEG Files
Easily share documents in PDF or JPEG format with friends via various ways: post on social media, send attachment or document download link through email.

*AirPrint & Fax Documents
Instantly print out any documents in CamScanner with nearby printer via AirPrint; directly select document and fax to over 30 countries from the app.

*Advanced Document Editing
Make annotations on documents with a full set of editing tools. Also adding customized watermarks are made available to mark your own documents.

*Quick Search
When you have plenty of documents, you can use Tags to categorize and easily find them. In addition, OCR for Search helps you find texts inside image and notes. Just enter one keyword, you can quickly find the document you want. (Registrants only)

*Secure Important Documents
If you want to protect confidential contents, you can set passcode for viewing important documents; also, while sending document download link, you can set password to protect others from seeing it.

*Sync across Platforms
Sign up to sync documents on the go. Just sign in to any smartphone, tablet or computer (visit www.camscanner.com ) and you can view, edit and share any document. (Registrants only)

Premium Subscription Service:
1. OCR (Convert Image to TXT, Image to WORD & Image to EXCEL)
2. Batch download PDF files in web app
3. Share secured document downlink with others
4. Add extra 40 to the maximum number of collaborators
5. Add 10G cloud space
6. ID Mode Scan
7. Remove ads or watermarks
8. Collage of two separate documents
9. E-signature
10. Book Mode Scan

Payment models for Premium subscription:
-$ 4.99/month
-$ 49.99/year
Please note the subscription is automatically renewed at the end of the period unless you choose to cancel the subscription.

CamScanner users scan and manage
* Bill, Invoice, Contract, Tax Roll, Business Card‚Ä¶
* Whiteboard, Memo, Script, Letter‚Ä¶
* Blackboard, Note, PPT, Book, Article‚Ä¶
* Credential, Certificate, Identity Documents‚Ä¶

3rd Party Cloud Storage Services Supported:
-Box.com, Google Drive, Evernote, Dropbox,

The free version is an ad-supported version and scanned documents are generated are with watermark, plus a limit of 30 pages of adding annotations; Uploading to Evernote/OneDrive is only available for 7 days; Invite 10 collaborators per document at most.

Permission Overview:
1. Storage: CamScanner needs permission to store docs in your phone.
2. Camera: CamScanner needs permission to use camera to scan docs.
3. Phone: In order to bind Premium membership to your device or to ensure normal use without login, CamScanner needs to get your device ID.

We‚Äôd love to hear your feedback: asupport@intsig.com
Follow us on Twitter: @CamScanner
Like us on Facebook: CamScanner
Follow us on Google+: CamScanner

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I installed this app on my account for the first time back in 2014, at the time I paid to get all services unlocked and it was great it was only a one time payment.... the app kept growing and improving, mostly because they added a cloud service. In 2019 I decided to pay monthly just because I needed to sign a document. After I realized I could sign any document in pdf with a pdf reader I decided to stop paying. So what happens with the money I paid a long time ago? Do I need to pay monthly?

It was dumb of me to rate this app 4 stars, specially when most of then times I try to share my work on Google classroom, it shows a blank class which frustrates me. The ads are annoying and also the sharing is so slow, it buffers for 5 minutes, and no, my WiFi Isn't the problem here. Don't use this app specifically when you are sending work last minute, it delays you.

I did not upgrade so I guess I am way ahead of the game, I still have a very usable cam scanner. However, yesterday I tried to use the scanner that I have used for so many years and it simply would not allow me to go through the program to a finished downloadable product. Constantly asking me to subscribe. I have given up. It allows a download for free but it can not be used for free. No more for me. I will find something else.

It's like having acrobat, printer, pdf creator, microsoft picture manger in one. Super easy to just click the high qualitypic of the document/ card/qr code etc. and customize it if you want, send in as a jpg or pdf reduce size and share via different platforms like Gmail/ messages/ fb etc.. all these in less than a minute..

Too expensive. I use this app occasionally for scanning documents. Wanted to support the developer and buy a "Pro" version. Turns out that Premium is $50 bucks a year! No way! So instead of receiving a reasonable payment of, say, $4.99 (which is what they should be charging) they get nothing. Oh well! ‚òπÔ∏è

title: Messenger Lite: Free Calls & Messages
description:
A fast and data-efficient messaging app to reach the people in your life. 

Messenger Lite:
- Installs quickly. It's less than 10MB to download!
- Saves data. It loads fast, runs efficiently and uses less mobile data.
- Works everywhere. Reach people when you're in an area with a slow or unstable internet connection.

With Messenger Lite, you can:
- Contact anyone on Messenger, Facebook or Facebook Lite.
- See when people are active and available to chat.
- Message people one-on-one or in groups to catch up or make plans.
- Send photos, links, or express yourself with stickers.
- Make one-on-one voice and video calls for free over Wi-Fi (otherwise standard data charges apply). Talk as long as you want, even with people in other countries!

comments: Since the last update I am unable to copy a message from messenger Lite. Instead of giving me the copy edit Etc menu it gives me a list of emojis. They've dumbed it down to the point where I can no longer use the new version and I will have to go to one of the mirror sites and load an old version. It's the only part of Facebook I use and they managed to muck it up.

a lot of people are reporting problems with latest update & I see no agent stepping in 2 reply. I have also reached my limit in as far as any updates saying, " Update info not provided by developer". Last update has 2 many problems. After last update, my posts pass fast as if a speil game! When will fb ever learn? If there is no definition for the app. I will not upload it. I have to go to my frigging insights to do an edit on my spiritual angel page! One star is 2 much 2 give.

Please add a message attachments, just like what's App has.... ,and also there is problem when I try to share link, the full link doesn't get generated and when we try to delete the message, it should be delete from both the sides, the sender and receiver side... Please, please, please..... It's a humble request...

Messenger Lite is a good app but it could use a bit more improvements and features. One is that it should have a dark mode option, everyone is wanting it for months now so please do it. Also add the reply function and the option to unsend messages. Lastly, sending a file is such a good feature of the app that also should be added to the main app, but please improve it by retaining the actual file name of the files we send instead of changing it to randomly generated name and numbers. Thank you.

Since the new update It is not working. I have new messages showing, but when I click on the persons name it never loads the message. No messages are showing up. I Am beyond frustrated. Before, I never had a problem viewing my messages and sending them.

title: Google Calendar
description:
Get the official Google Calendar app for your Android phone and tablet to save time and make the most of every day.
‚Ä¢ Different ways to view your calendar - Quickly switch between month, week and day view.
‚Ä¢ Events from Gmail - Flight, hotel, concert, restaurant reservations and more are added to your calendar automatically.
‚Ä¢ To-dos - Use Reminders to create and view to-dos alongside your events.
‚Ä¢ Goals - Add personal goals‚Äîlike ‚Äúrun 3 times a week‚Äù‚Äîand Calendar will schedule time for them automatically.
‚Ä¢ All your calendars in one place - Google Calendar works with all calendars on your phone, including Exchange.
descriptionHTML:
Get the official Google Calendar app for your Android phone and tablet to save time and make the most of every day.
‚Ä¢ Different ways to view your calendar - Quickly switch between month, week and day view.
‚Ä¢ Events from Gmail - Flight, hotel, concert, restaurant reservations and more are added to your calendar automatically.
‚Ä¢ To-dos - Use Reminders to create and view to-dos alongside your events.
‚Ä¢ Goals - Add personal goals‚Äîlike ‚Äúrun 3 times a week‚Äù‚Äîand Calendar will schedule time for them automatically.
‚Ä¢ All your calendars in one place - Google Calendar works with all calendars on your phone, including Exchange.
summary: Get the official Google Calendar app designed to make the most of every day
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ When you create or edit an event, you can now interact directly with the Calendar grid to easily choose a meeting slot that fits for you and your guests.
‚Ä¢ You can now enable Dark Theme on devices with Android N+.
comments: Just recently updated my Google Calendar app, but the logo remains the same. It did not change into the new one. Also, I find it very interesting that the app's logo matches with the date that I finally noticed my Google Calendar app. What a coincidence! I even thought that the logo is real-time before I learned that the 'date' or the '31' is actually part of the standard logo.

Until a few years ago it was bad, now it's way more than that, now it's horrible. :) Simple task of sharing and unsharing calendar with other people is either missing or requires more than 10 minutes to locate in the app options. Whatever takes more time in an app than on a laptop makes zero sense as a function of an app. Keep it simple. It's a calendar app.

What's with the new icon. Must admit, not a fan of the new icons for Gmail or calendar. They just look like the branding/marketing team have taken over any they no longer look like they represent a symbol for the apps functionality rather a Google something. I'm beginning to question Google's direction with the inconsistent pixel experience now this garbage...

I have been using this app for many years, however, the new goal-setting function is very inconsistent. I will set a goal to occur every day, and it will skip random days, with no way to re-include those skipped days. It also does not let you define the duration of your goal, which is quite daft. Goals must have dates in order to be effective. The 'smart' notifications are pretty silly; they remind you to complete your goal, and have an option to tap 'later', which defers goals by a whole day!

New update hijacked my Outlook calendar & added notifications for all events, despite NO NOTIFICATIONS set in BOTH Outlook AND Google Calendar app. Update also caused Samsung Calendar to also trigger alarms for Outook events despite being previously disabled as well. Dev's suggestion to cancel alarms in Google app 1 by 1 for each Outlook event is not a fix. As I stated, NO NOTIFICATIONS is the default, so there's nothing to turn off when new events sync.

title: The Survival Hunter Games 2
description:
The game comes fully loaded with amazing features! Our new game interface is extremely user friendly, and boasts easy to play touch screen controls that allow you to effortlessly run, jump, sprint, reload, aim, shoot and more! 

The new menu screen includes map style level select and settings screen. Gain game insight in between maps during loading with tip screens, and begin each game with mission style instructions! Before you begin your first level, you can watch a short video ad in order to earn a power up. You may opt not to watch, but you'll lose out on the advantage. 

As soon as the game begins, a timer will begin to count down. If you are able to beat the level quickly enough, you will earn a permanent weapon, which can be used in all other levels! If you do not beat the clock, you can still advance through the game, just without the permanent weapon. 

Fight stronger, more intelligent enemies, who make this game an intense battle of wit, stealth and skill! Enjoy hand-to-hand combat and precision aiming to take down enemies. Collect your blocky weapons and get ready to aim and shoot!!

Features:
-User friendly interface with touch pad controls
-Timers
-Power-ups
-Ammo and weapon collection
-Jump, aim and run
-Mini-map to spot your dangerous foes
-Mission orders
-Hand-to-hand combat

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: Push notifications declaring I have matches and should start conversation only to get in and there's nothing. Either don't do the push notifications like that until they've been there a little, or if it's bugging, fix it; I don't mind if someone unmatches but I'd rather know that's why they're not showing up so I'm not left thinking the app is sabotaging it? Definitely wouldn't spend money on it like that.

Totally miserable experience. Repetitive match suggestions, they keep appearing even after I reject them. Overpriced super expensive extras. All my matches, conversations, media and settings were lost after a website update - I was unable to continue with my connections - no reaction from support. And that was a paid "gold" account! Complete waste of money, time and energy.

Wouldn't recommend. Dudes swipe right, in order to match but don't talk. It makes no sense. If you're interested in someone and match them, why be unresponsive? It is very immature and wastes everyone's time. Therefore I am giving a low rating. There's great potential, but people need to stop being immature and actually talk to their matches.

Installed the app and cannot log on either with Facebook, phone or email. Constant errors keep popping up when trying to log into an existing account. Edit October 2020. Since found out I have been banned from Tinder. When I spoke to them, they will not tell me why I have been banned and they didn't do appeals. How can you ban someone and not tell them why or to even get their side of the story!!!

Ive been on tinder acouple of times in the past and it was easy without and real problem or bug. I downloaded it again last night and it won't open and keeps saying "we're experiencing some issues". Who's messed around with it? I mean there's no actual chance of meeting anyone on there, but it was perfectly fine and straightforward before.

title: KineMaster - Video Editor, Video Maker
description:
Make incredible videos on your phone, tablet, or Chromebook! KineMaster is an easy-to-use, full-featured video editor loaded with powerful tools. KineMaster and all of its editing tools are free to use, but you can unlock even more with KineMaster Premium. Edit and share all your videos with KineMaster!

Feature Highlights

‚Ä¢ Add and combine multiple layers of video, images, stickers, special effects, text, and handwriting 
‚Ä¢ Color adjustment tools to correct and enhance videos and images 
‚Ä¢ Share on YouTube, Facebook Feed and Stories, Instagram Feed, Stories, and more!
‚Ä¢ Reverse your videos 
‚Ä¢ Blending modes to create startling, beautiful effects
‚Ä¢ Add voiceovers, background music, voice changers, and sound effects 
‚Ä¢ Editing tools to trim, splice, and crop your video 
‚Ä¢ The KineMaster Asset Store provides music, clip graphics, fonts, stickers, transitions, and more to enhance your video, updated weekly 
‚Ä¢ Speed control for time lapse and slow motion effects 
‚Ä¢ EQ presets, ducking, and volume envelope tools for immersive audio 
‚Ä¢ Keyframe animation tool to add motion to layers 
‚Ä¢ Export 4K 2160p video at 30FPS 
‚Ä¢ Apply different color filters to make your video stand out 
 ‚Ä¢ Many, many more features, options, and settings!
  
When you subscribe to KineMaster Premium, you remove the watermark and ads, unlock professional tool presets, and get access to over a thousand premium assets in the KineMaster Asset Store. Subscribe to KineMaster today Premium within the app!   

KineMaster is the Editors' Choice! Find out why creators love KineMaster for YouTube, and Instagram and why journalists, educators, marketers, and vloggers use it professionally! Download KineMaster to create, edit, and share your own amazing videos!

Subscriptions to KineMaster Premium automatically renew unless you cancel in Google Play.  

For more details, questions and feature requests, please contact us: Tap on the question mark button on the KineMaster main screen, then tap E-mail support!

comments: It's a brilliant app, especially for gachatubers like me. I kinda wish the way you could tween was easier, and looked more realistic. I'm not trying to be rude, I love the app! But cute cut is to complicated for me and many others. So, i tried kinemaster, yeah it works but it doesn't look that realistic. This doesn't have to mean hate to the company! Have a great day whoever is reading!

I am a premium subscriber. I've used this app since November last year or so. It was amazing! It had everything I ever needed to make videos. But as soon as I became a premium suscriber, all the quality went down. Now, everything looks pixelated and fuzzy. It also sometimes lags and kicks me out nonstop. I'll go onto kinemaster and my screen freezes and eits me out saying 'Kinemaster isn't responding' I'll be waiting for this to be fixed. Right now I'm on a different app for videos.

this app is exquisite! once you get the hang of it, it's really easy to edit with! an amazing thing about this is that it's on android and ios. But the downside of this app is whenever i export a video and put it on high quaility, the video actually looks like it has bad quaility! i also wish that a you could get rid of the watermark for free, but it's fine! overall, i think this app works amazing! totally reccommend!

This app used to be awesome. Now it is so slow. Especially when you are checking through the music or sfx library. It takes times to load. Tsk tsk... not a value for my subscription anymore. Not gonna renew this anymore until I see a fix. Additonal review: I'm surprised that no one got back to me on this after the 1 star rating. Anyway, my annual sunscription is about to finish and already looking for a better one and I can see one worth trying though.

I've been using Kinemaster for approx 2 months, makin videos for my gaming YouTube Channel. I do it all on my phone and the response has been just incredible. I can extract audio and overlay it enablin voice over clip commentary, I add effects, transitions and overlay not just pictures but also VIDEOS, yes, SCREENCAPTURES off my phone, crop such videos not just in length but also a specific area of the video I want to show, and all round every thing i could want to make memes and vids. 10/10!üî•

title: ZEDGE‚Ñ¢ Wallpapers & Ringtones
description:
ZEDGE‚Ñ¢ gives you the best background wallpapers and cool ringtones for free! 
Personalize your phone with a HD wallpaper, live wallpaper, alarm sound or ringtone with ease. ZEDGE‚Ñ¢ offers an extensive catalog with millions of free backgrounds, live wallpapers, stickers, ringtones, alarm sounds & notification sounds for your Android phone. Search for Anything - It‚Äôs on ZEDGE‚Ñ¢

Join the over 300 million people üôå who already installed this highly popular personalization app. 

Wallpapers 
‚Ä¢ No need to look for more wallpaper apps. An endless selection of free backgrounds supporting the most common screen sizes.
‚Ä¢ Supports full HD wallpaper and 4K wallpaper to use as backgrounds.
‚Ä¢ Fancy a black phone wallpaper, or maybe a girly wallpaper? You‚Äôve got it!
‚Ä¢ Option to apply lock screen wallpapers, home screen wallpapers, or both at the same time.
‚Ä¢ Option to auto select a new background that rotates at selected intervals.
‚Ä¢ Customize your background with cool filters and stickers.

Live Wallpapers
‚Ä¢ Imagine having cool video effects as background on your home screen. You‚Äôve got it!
‚Ä¢ Our live wallpapers don‚Äôt drain your battery - only plays once when turning on your home screen.
‚Ä¢ No need to install additional new live wallpapers - it‚Äôs embedded in the app.
‚Ä¢ Extensive catalog of quality live wallpapers for all tastes.

Ringtones
No need to look for more ringtone apps. An endless selection of free ringtones including music, effects and funny tones. Probably the largest selection of free ringtones in the world.
‚Ä¢ Option to set individual contact ringtones, alarm sounds and default ringtone. Apply a cool ringtone for your mum or sister.
 
Alarm & Notification sounds
‚Ä¢ Massive selection of notification sounds, alert tones and funny tones.
‚Ä¢ Option to set an alert and alarm sound.

Stickers
‚Ä¢ Add stickers to a wallpaper and create your own personal background.
‚Ä¢ Set as wallpaper or share in messaging app and social media.
‚Ä¢ Turn a wallpaper into a cool meme! 

Favorite and Save
‚Ä¢ Add a sound or wall paper to favorites without downloading.
‚Ä¢ Access your ringtones and backgrounds across all your devices with one simple login.
‚Ä¢ Receive notifications on limited edition holiday wallpapers and ringtones for occasions and holidays like Valentines Day, Fathers day, Mothers Day, New Years, Halloween and Christmas plus cool customizations for birthdays, anniversaries, graduations, and more.

App permission notice
‚Ä¢ Contacts: Optional if you want to set individual ringtones to contacts in your address book. 
‚Ä¢ Photos/Media/Files: Needed to allow you to save and use a custom wallpaper, ringtone or notification sound. 
‚Ä¢ Storage: Needed to display or use the currently set background, ringtone or notification sound. 
‚Ä¢ System settings: Optional if you want to apply a ringtone as the default phone ringtone.
‚Ä¢ Location: Optional if you want personalized recommendations based on your location.

Our promise
We do not import or use any personal information or files in your media library, storage or contact list. 

We love ringtones, we love wallpapers - and we love diversity!

recentChanges: We are constantly updating our app to make it better for you, make sure you are on the latest version.
comments: Zedge is an awesome application for the customization of your ringtones and notification sounds. It has an incredible selection of wallpapers but I wouldn't say that's the star quality of this app but when it comes down to customizing ringtones and notification sounds... I haven't searched for a notification, alarm, or ringtone that Zedge didn't have, or a supplemental sound that sounds just as good if not better!! KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK!! I don't think I will ever use another software/program!!

I love it . But they don't have "WHAT'S UP" . They used to. I had it as my friends ring tone and somehow I lost it. I have been trying and trying to find it again, to no avail . All I could find is these stupid whistle songs. I really want the loud "WHAT'S UP " I believe it came from a Budweiser commercial. My friend says it all the time. I am hard of hearing so I need a really loud ring tone. Otherwise it's a great app.

Went downhill. Can't find download files for live wallpaper and mandatory 30 sec ads to download each wallpaper, and then not being able to find it. And they even include a little useless chat bubble that says it's stored in internal storage > data but it's not there (and the article they link you to is useless too!) üôÉüôÉ Honestly I have this app cause I've used it for over 5+ years but yikes it sucks now.

Mediocre! It used to work perfectly, no problems. But recently when I allocate a ringtone to either my phone or a contact it works for a short time, then reverts back to the default phone ringtone. When I try to reallocate the ringtone in the app, it states, 'Something went wrong'. I initially paid the ¬£3.99 thinking this may fix the issue, but no luck. Cancelled the prescription immediately. Only get this app if you like getting ignored by the app developers, as I've still not had any response.

I like the Zedge app's massive amount of ringtones, notifications, and wallpapers to choose from, but I don't think this app has enough different categories of smartphone customizing features available. I think this app, it's developers, and it's users would all benefit greatly from a few theme customization options to download, for example, there could be an in-app option that allows the user to create their own custom app themes, custom text fonts, and a customized wallpaper creator.

title: My Talking Tom
description:
My Talking Tom is the best virtual pet game for the whole family.

- Players can adopt Tom and take care of him every day, making sure he gets enough food and sleep, taking him to the toilet, and keeping him happy, smiling and laughing.

- The game features a collection of mini games designed to test skill, reflexes and puzzle solving ability - puzzle games, action games, adventure games, and even a sport game. There‚Äôs something for everyone!

- Players can compete head-to-head in Goal! or slingshot to survive in Go Up - the challenge never ends!

- Tom likes to be petted and even spoken to - he repeats everything he hears in his funny voice!

- Users can collect new clothes for him and new furniture items for his house are unlocked.

- Everyone can customize Tom in their own way - an astronaut, a pilot, a superhero‚Ä¶ or maybe just something cool and casual.

- Tom can go on trips to other countries and build up an album of photos from his travels!

Millions of people play My Talking Tom every day, so why not join the fun?

And best of all‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs absolutely FREE! So download now, and start playing today!

Officer Tom‚Äôs Monthly Subscription ‚Äì which offers the Policeman Outfit, the option to resume playing 4x per mini-game session, and unlimited energy for playing mini-games ‚Äì is priced at $4.99 per month. 

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews every month unless it is canceled any time before the end of the current subscription period. When you cancel your subscription, the cancellation will apply from the next subscription period onwards. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your Google Play Account settings after purchase. Please note that deleting the app does not result in cancellation of your subscription.

This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 Limited has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect your child‚Äôs personal information. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;
- Links that direct customers to Outfit7‚Äôs websites and other apps;
- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;
- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;
- The option to make in-app purchases;
- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player‚Äôs progress; and
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
EEA privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/eea/
US privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Rest of the world privacy policy: https://outfit7.com/privacy/
Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: It's agood for kids app, fun to play. But I want to report a complain here, that is, about advertisements. It's okay to advertise, but my problem is what type you are providing. Once my sister was playing and suddenly she got to see an add with an almost naked person. It's disturbing to see such things especially on a kids app. Please, the developers should look forward to it. Thanks.

Very cool! I personally think that the outfits are very cool and stylish. The graphics and audio are also very adorable and cute. My 2 year old sister is very joyful about this application. Please add more updates and try to fix some bugs. Keep up the good work and never stop until you feel happy and pleased with your game. You're very amazing to help us with stress. I love taking care of Tom!

I wanted to install the game again and immediately installed it... I used to love this game and now there afe THREE packages you can click to earn something by watching an ad and normally I don't mind that but they won't go away. They follow you in every room and it annoys me so much that the fun of decorating is taken by that... So no, not again... Pretty sad

Never pass this game. All the comments about this were wrong. They don't know how to play and always loose so they give all of you a bad review. This is my suggestion do not leave this game. I was always on this game when ever i have time. You all would like it. And it's birthday's come very fast ‚ùó‚ùó‚ùó‚ùóand it level up also very faster. I love this game. There are some rumors about this game but they sre not true, when speaking of Talking Angela the things are true. I saw something in her eye. ü§óü§ó

I played this game since I was 3 years old my brother gave the suggestion of this game and I only not love this game but all your games and also your to see your videos . Now too I love to play this game now I am 10 years old. But please add more mini games.üò∫

title: Uber - Request a ride
description:
We‚Äôre committed to your safety at Uber. We‚Äôve established a Door-to-Door Safety Standard to help you feel safe every time you ride.

And with Uber, your destination is at your fingertips. Just open the app and enter where you want to go, and a nearby driver will help you get there reliably.

FIND A RIDE FROM ALMOST ANYWHERE
Request a ride from 600+ airports and in 10,000+ cities around the world, the Uber app is a great way to make your travel plans stress-free. Request a ride on demand or schedule one ahead of time.    

FIND A RIDE TO ALMOST ANYWHERE
Whether you‚Äôre looking for style, space, or affordability, Uber can help you find the perfect ride to fit your needs:

Enjoy elegance and premium features with Uber Black
Ride with extra room (and more of your friends) with UberXL

All of these transportation options and more are available in one place with the Uber app.

SEE PRICE ESTIMATES
With Uber, you can see your price estimate up front before booking. That means you‚Äôll always have an idea of what you‚Äôll pay before requesting your ride.

YOUR SAFETY DRIVES US
We‚Äôre committed to making every trip with Uber as safe as possible. That's why‚Äîin addition to our Door-to-Door Safety Standard‚Äîwe've built new safety features and updated our Community Guidelines for respectful and positive experiences.

You can share your trip
Give your loved ones peace of mind while you‚Äôre on a trip‚Äîyou can share your location and trip status so they know you made it to your destination.

You can contact emergency services
You can call your local authorities directly from the app, and your location and trip details will be displayed so you can quickly share them with emergency services.

TIP AND RATE YOUR DRIVER
After every ride, you can submit a rating along with comments. You can also let your driver know you appreciated your experience by adding a tip for them right in the app.

Not all products are available in all markets.

To see if Uber is available in your city, visit https://www.uber.com/cities.
Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber.
Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber.

Have a question? Visit uber.com/help.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps us to improve the Uber app.
Have a question? Tap Help in the Uber app or visit help.uber.com.
comments: I'd changed my number recently and had installed your app. I entered my new number, my email address and all but I'd forgotten my password. So I clicked in the forgot password option. It says my account already exists. Why are you guys making it difficult? Why isn't there a customer service centre or a quick helpline? It's frustrating when I want to use your app but can't because of this glitch. Can y'all please help me?

I got a new phone so now I can't sign in since I don't have access to my old phone number. I would try and make a new account but someone is using my new phone number. I tried to contact customer support but they tell me to sign into the app and send them some information. Funny thing is, I can't sign in, that's my problem!! Worst customer support, all they have is bots that keep repeating the same things over and over, I'm honestly done, and Uber can suck me.

App doesn't have a sign in feature that is easily accessible. I can't log in to change my phone number to my new one, because my email is in use. If I try to sign in by social it also locks me because email is use. This is a joke of a UX, use LYFT, this app and experience is trash.

Previously i had booked many cab with uber. But now i dont know what is this otp thing that has come. Firstly the trip is not shown when i have already booked. I have to again do the booking so that trip info comes up. Next when the cab comes he asks otp. And this has been three time. I have even updated my app and rechecked the phone no too. But still i dont recieve any otp. So please look into it.

It's very hard to get support from a real person, and even if you manage to do it (it's hidden behind layers and layers of FAQs, ridiculous) they're unhelpful af, and don't even understand the platform they're supposed to work with. I've deleted my account and uninstalled the app, and you should do the same unless you wanna go through hell when something goes wrong (it will)

title: Bubble Shooter
description:
Play the classic and most addictive bubble pop game for FREE, match 3 colors and clear levels. Don‚Äôt miss out on this fun relaxing game! In this good old version, you need to aim & shoot, to drop & burst all bubbles. Train your brain with this original puzzle as you blast balls online or offline - anytime! Bubble Shooter ‚Ñ¢ is the most exciting FREE app available on Google Play. 

Ready to start the action? 
Aim, match and smash all the balls in this relaxing color-matching adventure. This is one of the best shooter games that are simple and easy to learn, perfect for families to enjoy!  

Put your strategy skills to the test! Compete against friends and family and see who can reach the highest score and get 3 stars on every level. Earn coins while you play and use them to get cool boosters. Use your logic and puzzle-solving skills to complete the missions and clear the board, and make sure to collect special daily bonuses. 


Play the Classic Game Mode - So Simple.
Match 3 balls to blast and clear the board, complete the missions and win coins & awesome rewards. Tap on the screen to drag the laser aim and lift it to take a shot. It‚Äôs important to form a strategy according to the different bubbles layout at each level. Shoot and pop all the colored balls in this fun free game, aim carefully and hit the target! Work your way through all the different challenges and puzzles, solve the brain teasers and win levels.

Enjoy the Arcade Game Mode ‚Äì Never get bored!
Pop the balls in this cool retro mode, and rediscover the classic arcade experience straight on your Android device. Advance along thousands of fun puzzle levels as this addicting game gets even more challenging. Enjoy the retro gaming experience anywhere and whenever you want, no internet connection is required.

Try the Puzzle Game Mode and Discover the Ultimate Bubble Popping Fun!
This shooter is a thrilling balloon popper free app with thousands of challenging puzzles to master. Shoot the colorful balls to advance to the next amazing puzzle level, train your brain and test your matching skills while playing this addictive, casual game for free. 
Hurry up and join the balloon crushing mania, but be careful - once you start popping bubbles you simply can‚Äôt stop! 

Retro game, new features
We took the classic arcade game and added some new features that you‚Äôll definitely love. 

FUN FEATURES: 
‚òÖ 3000 + Exciting levels, with more, added all the time. 
‚òÖ New elements and great prizes.
‚òÖ Brand new effects and sounds. 
‚òÖ Collect awesome daily rewards.
‚òÖ Connect to Facebook and share the fun with friends!
‚òÖ Stay in the loop: now you have the best option to send a direct message to support.
‚òÖ Leaderboard, challenging achievements.
‚òÖ Clear obstacles and beat the challenges. 
‚òÖ Colorblind mode ‚Äì so everyone can enjoy fun matching games for free.
‚òÖ Pop 7 bubbles in a row to unlock the fireball.
‚òÖ Drop 10+ bubbles at once to get a bomb.
‚òÖ Play anytime and anywhere, no WiFi connection is required! 


What are you waiting for? Warm-up your fingers and start popping. Experience this fun casual shooter and explore thousands of amazing levels filled with puzzles and surprises. Get the online color-matching app and enjoy smooth and addicting gameplay. With so many exciting levels, powerful boosters and awesome features, you simply won‚Äôt put it down! 

Get ready, take aim and shoot the balls!!

Download and play this fun arcade game for free. It‚Äôs the perfect app to play without wifi! Every 2-3 weeks, we add new features and new levels. Come and join the fun!

Bubble Shooter ‚Ñ¢ is completely free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.

Follow us for updates and surprises!
Visit our FB page: https://www.facebook.com/BubbleShooterOriginal/

All rights of Bubble Shooter ‚Ñ¢ are owned by Ilyon Dynamics Ltd.

comments: It's great at first but it start to get really irritating when you can't do anything without paying or watching ads. The ads are incredibly long. When you end up watching them to get the extra shots, it still makes it impossible to move past. And tbh it backfires because eventually after a few attempts over days, you get fed up of the whole game and find something new to play. Not happy with it

Some users are complaining about the bubbles, and how the useful colours don't show up until it's far too late to win. I've been playing this game for a very long time, and I can say with 100% certainty that this was not the case until the last few updates. Clearly the game is becoming more about the ad revenue. The events and races are also just messed up (some days they're there, and suddenly you open the game and it's no longer there). Point is, I'm too annoyed to continue with this nonsense.

The app is not working properly . It is coming that bubble shooter is not working properly. It is coming that bubble shooter is not working properly then there come 3 options:- 1. Send feedback 2. Open app again 3. Close app . But now the problem is solved and I have completed almost 1600 levels. It's an excellent game to play . Please download this game

Bubble Shooter is grt fun when yr bored & it is casual and reminds u of arcade machines back in the day. It does have annoying adds and it can hoax u when you watch a video for Bonus Shots. But overwise it is amaze! Good times playing it, but even if u played every day for a year you still wouldn't finish Level Mode, cuz it has litterally over 2000 levels! I'm not kidding, play it & see. The graphics are grt and they have decent contorls. Overall its a grt game, which is grt fun.

This could be a great game. I am a very good player and in the first 20 levels (the easy ones) more than a 3rd of all bubbles could not be used becuz the color was blocked or so far up unreachable. And worse yet it gives you the same non useable color over n over n over again in row til you get to the last 10 shots then gives u a useable color too late to have any chance of winning. This is not a hard game at all. Is just rediculously unplayable.

title: MX Player
description:
Powerful video player with advanced hardware acceleration and subtitle support.

You can now share files, music, apps and more in a click using MX File Transfer


a) HARDWARE ACCELERATION - Hardware acceleration can be applied to more videos with the help of new HW+ decoder.

b) MULTI-CORE DECODING - MX Player is the first Android video player which supports multi-core decoding. Test result proved that multi-core device's performance is up to 70% better than single-core devices.

c) PINCH TO ZOOM, ZOOM AND PAN - Easily zoom in and out by pinching and swiping across the screen. Zoom and Pan is also available by option.

d) SUBTITLE GESTURES - Scroll forward/backward to move to next/previous text, Up/down to move text up and down, Zoom in/out to change text size.

e) MX FILE SHARING - File sharing app for fast file transfer without mobile data usage. Share Music, Share Video, Share Photos or Send Files & Apps instantly

f) KIDS LOCK - Keep your kids entertained without having to worry that they can make calls or touch other apps.

Subtitle formats:

- DVD, DVB, SSA/*ASS* subtitle tracks.
- SubStation Alpha(.ssa/.*ass*) with full styling.
- SAMI(.smi) with Ruby tag support.
- SubRip(.srt)
- MicroDVD(.sub)
- VobSub(.sub/.idx)
- SubViewer2.0(.sub)
- MPL2(.mpl)
- TMPlayer(.txt)
- Teletext
- PJS(.pjs)
- WebVTT(.vtt)

******
Permission Details:
‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì
* "READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" is required to read your media files in your primary & secondary storages.
* "WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" is required to rename or deletion of files and to store the downloaded subtitles.

* "LOCATION" permission is required to help find nearby friends for file transfers.
* "NETWORK" and "WIFI" permissions are required to get the network status which is required for various activities like license checking, update checking etc. Wifi connection is also used for faster file transfers. 
* "BLUETOOTH" permission is required in order to improve AV sync when Bluetooth headset is connected, and create connections for file transfers.
* "CAMERA" permission is required to scan QR code for file transfers.
* "INTERNET" is required to play internet streams.

* "VIBRATE" is required to control the vibration feedbacks.
* "WAKE_LOCK" is required to prevent your phone from sleeping while watching any video.
* "KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES" is required to stop the MX Player services used in background play.
* "DISABLE_KEYGUARD" is required to temporarily prevent secure screen lock when Kids Lock is used.
* "SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW" is required to block some keys when Kids Lock is used.
* "DRAW OVER OTHER APPS" is required to block system buttons when input blocking is activated on the playback screen.

******
If you are facing "package file is invalid" error, please install it again from product home page (https://sites.google.com/site/mxvpen/download)
******


If you have any questions, please visit our Facebook Page or XDA MX Player forum.
https://www.facebook.com/MXPlayer
http://forum.xda-developers.com/apps/mx-player

Some of the screens are from the Elephants Dreams licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 2.5.
(c) copyright 2006, Blender Foundation / Netherlands Media Art Institute / www.elephantsdream.org

Some of the screens are from the Big Buck Bunny licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported.
(c) copyright 2008, Blender Foundation / www.bigbuckbunny.org

comments: The app is super great but there's just an improvement I would like to see. It's about the touch option on my Bluetooth earbuds, coz it has an option that touching it once either play or pause the video. The pause function is working but the play isn't. It's working on VLC but I kinda like using your app coz it's much easier when loading subtitles. I know it's really not an issue, hence rating it 5 stars coz I can just play it on my mobile but just wanted to let you know on something to improve.

I have been using only MX player on my phone for years but the recent update has messed up its navigation system. Reasons: 1. A new feature has been added to seek the video by 10 secs by double click and now I'm so much used to using it for play/pause & there is absolutely no way to turn this feature off. 2. When you try to seek the video by swiping screen or even by using the forward/backward button, it doesn't move ths video according to the customized settings. I'm using it Note 9 btw

Please Add Subtitles option for movies added in Mx Player. It will be good development in app to enhance user experience. Right now only online Subtitles available for playing movies from our folder. Already added Websereies and movies please enable the subtitles option. In case if I want to watch Tamil movies or kannada movies there are subtitles available. Please develop this option for MX Player.

This app is awesome... I've been using this app for 2-3 years by now. The local video player is amazing and the customization is beyond amazing. But there's only one little simple problem though, that you haven't fixed yet. The brightness bar. Yeah the brightness bar you gave is 15 point bar instead of a 100. And the lowest point in the bar isnt even the dimmest brightness of the handset. Please do this one upgrade as soon as you can. And do the same for the volume bar too while youre at it plz

This has been a really useful video player. I'm able to watch some of my favorite movies which I didn't get to by downloading or via Youtube. It also has a great feature of synchronisation to fix the videos which are not synced correctly. It also saves me the trouble of seeking subtitles of movies and TV shows from the browser. But I gotta say the ads are way too annoying. Whenever I open it or pause a video while the mobile data is on ads get in my way. Fix this so that I'll be glad to give 5 ‚≠ê

comments: Ok game. Way to many ads. Not sure how they get paid. BUT it seems if they get enough ads watched, before the game is uninstalled, they are happy. Because they must know its way to many and just dont care. This game is just to make a quick dollar.

Game really REALLY wants you to watch those ads. Some puzzles are easy to solve but won't work properly unless you get a hint first, which I let slide the first few times because I thought maybe I just wasn't doing the puzzles right, but it very quickly started to get annoying. Fun puzzles, for the most part, but more often than not are they more like questions you'd get on a school exam than fun little word problems to solve.

Got to the first one I needed a hint for, and used 25 points for a clue. All it tells me is that it's an easy one. Really? Upsides: There weren't many ads. Downsides: Other than the main issue, the tricks aren't consistent in their logic when compared to a previous similar challenge, like something having to do with size may have similar wording using different logic.

I tried playing the game but it was not as great and i had trouble opening the refrigerator on the second level I hope you can fix that please. But it was a great game needs some fixing but I recommend it if you are tired of games that don't make sense . But great game. But needs alot more levels I know some six year olds that have no trouble playing this and it is not that complicated . But no hate

I feel like this game was okay. Overall there were a bunch of ads but the game was pretty easy. I only skipped a few and even the 4 year old kid I was babysitting could complete some levels. It only took like 2 weeks to finish the whole game but I'm giving it 3 stars because they need to add more levels and less ads!!!

title: Booking.com: Hotels, Apartments & Accommodation
description:
Travel and save on the world‚Äôs best hotels with Booking.com! Find great deals on hotels or apartments to rent and book accommodation for your next trip in just a few minutes.

Hotels, apartments, hostels, vacation rentals, motels & more - browse over 27 million options across the world! Discover daily deals and save on your next hotel, apartment, or villa booking. 

Vacations to go! Find accommodation, compare hotel deals & save with our free app. Here are 5 reasons you‚Äôll love using the Booking.com app to find hotels the next time you travel:

1. Hotel comparison - Compare your favorite hotels and get the best price on hotel rooms.
2. Accommodation search - Use our in-depth filters to find the best deals on hotels for your next trip.
3. Hotel deals for any budget - From motels & hostels, to B&Bs and resorts, to luxury hotels, inns, homes, houses, apartments & vacation rentals, find your ideal accommodation. We‚Äôve got it all.
4. Hotel booking made easy - Find a room nearby you, complete your hotel booking in just a few taps, and easily manage your reservation on the go.
5. Hotel reviews - When you‚Äôre planning to visit a city for the first time, it‚Äôs best to be informed. Read over 135 million verified reviews from other bookers.

Want to get away from home? Download the highest-rated travel app now and join thousands of bookers like you finding unbeatable hotel & apartment rental deals!

Hotel Deals & Accommodation

‚Ä¢ Hotels, apartments, homes, hostels, vacation rentals, motels, bed and breakfasts & more - compare hotel deals now!
‚Ä¢ Secure the best deal for your next holiday booking today. You can cancel for free at most hotel rooms and apartments if you change your mind. 

Hotel Comparison & Search Filters

‚Ä¢ Filter hotels by price, review score, WiFi quality and other things important to you.
‚Ä¢ Travelling soon? Book hotels at the last minute (or far in advance).
‚Ä¢ Search cheap hotels by city, attraction, landmark, or hotel name with just one tap.


Want the perfect trip planner? Manage your hotel booking on our free app

‚Ä¢ Get paperless confirmation of your reservation.
‚Ä¢ Make changes to your bookings whenever, wherever.
‚Ä¢ 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages.
‚Ä¢ Contact your host, view check-in times, and write reviews.
‚Ä¢ No booking or credit card fees.

-------------

We love hearing from you! Leave us a review and let us know what you think of our app.

summary: Book travel accommodation & save! Compare hotel deals, apartments & hostels
recentChanges: We added some important info about our properties. Our listings now include details on each accommodation's cleaning practices, social distancing measures, and other health and safety policies.
comments: Good app. Finally showing room sizes in the search results. Please add room size filters to save time searching. Hotel star rating often does not match the real rating, for example many 5 stars properties are actually 4 stars or unrated. Prices can often be misleading as they do not include fees and taxes until the final step of booking, and then the final price can end up to be significantly higher. Final prices should be listed at early stages and we should be able to filter by them too.

I made a booking and then I found a cheaper price though someone else at the same property. I tried to cancel the booking and have the cancellation fees waived and when it came time for me to hit the confirm the fee waiver button it went straight to cancelled for $65.00. I literally found the other price less than five minutes later and immediately cancelled the booking.......smh. Bad Business.

Terrible app. Too many bugs to list, and I couldn't even write them to tell them about it because the Google Recaptcha just kept asking me to select images over and over again. Oh, and after trying 5 different times to book a flight, I got "reservation failed" with no explanation. One time, when I went back to reserve, the same flight I tried to book initially went up $70. Oh, and you'll have to scroll back about 420 times to enter your DOB cause you can't enter it manually. What a joke.

Frankly the app is really great. I usually check the googles and find hotels online. Then i open up booking and compare prices. 90% of the time the mobile booking app has deals and tends to be cheaper by $10 to $30. Not much but that extra $10 can go towards a meal or something else like the mini bar. I love it and i recommend to all my travel buddies.

Fast to download, every bit of information you could possibly need is right there so you don't have to search elsewhere for numbers & dates & times, and extremely easy to use & understand. Very pleased with this app.

title: Verizon Call Filter
description:
Your phone is your door to the world, and you shouldn't open it for just anyone. With Call Filter, you can screen incoming calls, auto-block spam and report any unwanted numbers. Or, upgrade to Call Filter Plus with Caller ID for added security. Put a name to the unknown numbers, make your own personal block list, and even assess the risk level of incoming calls. Enroll today and start answering with confidence.

 

Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Get real-time alerts on your incoming call screen so you can better avoid spam calls

‚Ä¢ Automatically send spam callers to voicemail with the spam filter

‚Ä¢ Report a number as spam so you can help improve our algorithm

‚Ä¢ See each spam call‚Äôs level of risk so that you can learn more about the caller

‚Ä¢ Manage other unwanted calls with a personal spam and block list

‚Ä¢ Block all incoming calls from international numbers

‚Ä¢ Search our spam database to see if a number has already been identified as spam

‚Ä¢ Identify unknown numbers by name on the incoming call screen, call log and eligible messaging apps, even if the caller is not saved to your contacts

‚Ä¢ Seamlessly update your contacts with newly identified numbers

 

Eligible customers get a 10-day trial of Call Filter Plus. Customers can choose to enroll in Call Filter to get just the basics (spam detection, blocking and reporting) for free, or subscribe to Call Filter Plus for all that and more for $2.99 per month, per line. Accounts with 3 or more eligible lines can subscribe to Call Filter Plus (Multi-line) for $7.99/mo by logging in to My Verizon. If you choose to enroll in Call Filter or Call Filter Plus via the app, the spam filter will be automatically set to block high-risk spam callers, but you can change your block settings at any time. Data charges apply.

 

Please reference https://www.vzw.com/support/how-to-use-call-filter/ and https://www.vzw.com/support/call-filter-faqs/ for step-by-step instructions on how to use the app and answers to frequently asked questions. For additional details on Call Filter and Call Filter Plus, please see https://www.verizonwireless.com/solutions-and-services/call-filter/.

developerAddress: One Verizon Way, Basking Ridge, New Jersey
recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: Absolutely the worst...DOES NOT filter the "unknown name" calls which are usually spoofed numbers anyway, and are scammers, even though there is a feature to filter "unknown name" calls....IT DOES NOT WORK!!! Verizon and all of the other cell service providers have yet to figure this s**t out, yet expect YOU to pay your f***ing bill every month. PISS POOR SERVICE!!!

This app is horrible, If I could give it Zero stars I would. I pay every month to use this app, but blocked calls still continue to come through, I get the notifications of the blocked calls, and they are able to leave voice mails. Every time this app updates it gets worse. All the damn money I pay a month for the service would think it would be a little but better but no Verizon is rip offs! This app was great until 10 updates ago, now it's junk! If it ain't broken, don't fix it!

Piece of Junk. The thing is enabled and I still get calls daily saying I won a free stay at a Marriott hotel. This call comes from a different number every day so blocking one number (on my phone) doesn't help so I thought this app would do a better job. I'd have better luck teaching my dog long division.

I seem to get more spam calls since they implemented this than i did before it existed. Half the time, calls marked "possible spam" are my actual health insurance trying to contact me. Worst part is, they charge for a version they claim is better. Anyone risking money on this app has lost their minds!! Blocking spam calls/texts should be the DUTY of the provider; NOT a service they charge extra for.

this app works okay but it doesn't truly block calls they will burp in to let me know I'm getting a block call that certainly defeats the purpose of blocking the calls. It also allows the block calls to leave voice messages. Unknown calls and restricted calls should automatically be blocked but they aren't. Calls it do not ID the callers should be blocked also automatically.

title: Shazam: Discover songs & lyrics in seconds
description:
Shazam will identify any song in seconds. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists, all for free. Over 1 billion installs and counting.

‚ÄúShazam is an app that feels like magic‚Äù - Techradar.com (http://techradar.com/)

‚ÄúShazam is a gift... a game changer‚Äù -¬†Pharrell Williams, GQ interview¬†

WHY YOU‚ÄôLL LOVE IT

* Find the name of any song in seconds.
* Listen and add to Apple Music or Spotify playlists.
* Follow along with time-synced lyrics.
* Watch music videos from Apple Music or YouTube.
* New! Enable Dark theme on Shazam.


SHAZAM ANYWHERE, AT ANYTIME

* Use Pop-up Shazam to identify music in any app - Instagram, YouTube, TikTok... 
* No connection? No problem! Shazam while offline.
* Turn on Auto Shazam to keep finding songs even when you leave the app.


WHAT ELSE?

* Find out what is popular in your country or city with Shazam charts.
* Get recommended songs and playlists to discover new music.
* Open any song directly in Spotify, Apple Music or Google Play Music.
* Share songs with friends through Snapchat, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter and more.

THOUSANDS OF 5-STAR REVIEWS!

Availability and features may vary by country.
For more information on Shazam‚Äôs privacy practices, please read the Privacy Policy, available at https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/.

developerAddress:
Apple Inc.
One Apple Park Way
Cupertino, CA 95014
USA
recentChanges:
Shazam is Android 11 ready.
Today we‚Äôve made it easier to Shazam music in other apps with ‚ÄòShazam from notification bar‚Äô. Simply swipe down on the Android status bar and tap to Shazam. Give it a go with Instagram, YouTube, TikTok‚Ä¶ It even works with headphones.
Looking for lyrics? Turn on Pop-Up from Shazam settings, and you can sing along after finding a match.
comments: Not sure what's happening at the moment but Shazam is not picking up any songs, it's struggling with movies, TV shows, new releases etc etc. I do absolutely love this app, but I'm missing so much good stuff! I just hope all my recordings you're taking is going to good use! I'd love to see some stats. It scares me how much you take on of everybody's lives when they use your app. Please be smart, safe and sensible with our lives üôèüí™ü•∞ #illgiveahigherreviewsoon

This is awsome! I was wondering how could i identify the music I've been watching in YouTube, cause the owner of the video didn't credit the song. I was finding a way to detect this song and i found the Shazam app it was a great pleasure to detect my interest song in just a seconds! Great job! It was useful to other people who wanted to find their fav song! I gave 5 stars ‚ú® keep it up shazam! ‚ù£Ô∏è

EDIT: Tray icon added. Now I can instantly launch 5 Stars, like I promised, leaving my original review intact... OK so far... But I just want a button in the notification tray, I don't want the bubble on screen the entire time. Sure, I can move it around, but that's a pain. If there is some way to ONLY have something in the notification tray, it's 5 stars otherwise.

I was using an app from sony on an old xperia but they discontinued the app, been using this for a year or two now, helps when finding a song from a movie or the show I'm watching, since upgraded to a new phone I get an issue now and again it keeps the app open and recording for songs apparently, manage to get it cancelled but it happens again over time

Like many others, I'm uninstalling Shazam due to Shazam recently adding a persistent notification alert that can't be dismissed. Sorry Shazam, I don't need your un-dismissible spam cluttering my notification area, especially when I only use your app a few times a year. Whoever added the un-dismissible notification to the app deserves to be fired and never work in the tech industry again!

title: WhatsApp Business
description:
WhatsApp Business from Facebook

WhatsApp Business enables you to have a business presence on WhatsApp, communicate more efficiently with your customers, and help you grow your business. 

If you have separate business and personal phone numbers, you can have both WhatsApp Business and WhatsApp Messenger installed on the same phone, and register them with different numbers.

In addition to the features available in WhatsApp Messenger, WhatsApp Business includes:

‚Ä¢ BUSINESS PROFILE: Create a profile for your business to help your customers find valuable information ‚Äî like your website, location, or contact information.

‚Ä¢ BUSINESS MESSAGING TOOLS: Be more responsive to your customers by using Away messages to indicate when you're away or Greeting message to send your customers an introductory message when they first message you.

‚Ä¢ LANDLINE/FIXED NUMBER SUPPORT: You can use WhatsApp Business with a landline (or fixed) phone number and your customers can message you on that number. During verification, select the ‚ÄúCall me‚Äù option to receive the code over a phone call.

‚Ä¢ RUN BOTH WHATSAPP MESSENGER AND WHATSAPP BUSINESS: You can use both WhatsApp Business and WhatsApp Messenger on the same phone, but each app must have its own unique phone number.

‚Ä¢ WHATSAPP WEB: You can more efficiently respond to your customers right from your computer's browser.

WhatsApp Business is built on top of WhatsApp Messenger and includes all the features that you rely on, such as the ability to send multimedia, free calls*, free international messaging*, group chat, offline messages, and much more.

*Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.

Note: once you restore chat backup from WhatsApp Messenger to WhatsApp Business, you will no longer be able to restore it back to WhatsApp Messenger. If you would like to go back, we recommend that you copy the WhatsApp Messenger backup on your phone to your computer before you start using WhatsApp Business.

---------------------------------------------------------
We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at:


smb@support.whatsapp.com


or follow us on twitter:


http://twitter.com/WhatsApp
@WhatsApp
---------------------------------------------------------
