summary: Simple tool for businesses to talk to their customers.
recentChanges:
* Create, share, and print QR codes to enable customers to launch a conversation with you. Go to Business tools > Short link > View QR Code to access your QR code.
* Share your catalog and item links on any digital platform to enable customers to discover your products and services. Go to Business tools > Catalog to learn more.
comments: Its good app for calling and all. But i wnt to add group chat shortcuts in my mobile desktop. But its not working for business whatsapp. And in delete chat data need options date wise or month wise delete. It will very useful for business. Pls do the needful. Need urgently. From last 1 week after new update it was not working. When i was forwarding or searching its not working. Asking for close or wait. Earlier update is good. Now is very worst. Pls update soon. Need urgently. No use. Reupdate

I haven't been able to access my contacts for more than 2 weeks now. Some of my contacts suddenly went missing from my WhatsApp even though they're still on my phone üì± I thought the issue was from my phone but I just saw another person complaining about it here. I use this account for business and most of my contacts view my status. Now how will I get people to view my status when they aren't on my list?ü§∑üèæ This is frustrating to be honest. Please do something about this.

Not as convenient as I thought it would be. The whole point of me downloading this was so I minimize the stress of getting back to my customers late on my personal WhatsApp with the auto reply when I'm offline function but it's as useless because it doesn't work and I only receive messages from customers days later if I don't check the app now and again, it's not at all instant as the normal WhatsApp because there even if I'm not online, as long as I have internet connection, I will receive text

please create a 'word done' option in the chat box. like we 'star' an important chat. same like that but the 'word done' status could be seen by the sender also. this will help us to know that the work that was assigned is done or not. it will save our time.üôèüôè

Give us the option to block only calls from people. I dislike people calling me randomly when i don't want to speak. You could add a feature where you can block calls from groups or certain individuals undefinitely or for specific periods. We don't have to have only a block option that works if we block folks from both calls and messages. Thank you.

title: Google Keep - Notes and Lists
description:
Quickly capture what‚Äôs on your mind and get a reminder later at the right place or time. Speak a voice memo on the go and have it automatically transcribed. Grab a photo of a poster, receipt or document and easily organize or find it later in search. Google Keep makes it easy to capture a thought or list for yourself, and share it with friends and family.
 
 Capture what‚Äôs on your mind
 ‚Ä¢ Add notes, lists and photos to Google Keep. Pressed for time? Record a voice memo and Keep will transcribe it so you can find it later.
 Share ideas with friends and family
 ‚Ä¢ Easily plan that surprise party by sharing your Keep notes with others and collaborating on them in real time.
 Find what you need, fast
 ‚Ä¢ Color and add labels to code notes to quickly organize and get on with your life. If you need to find something you saved, a simple search will turn it up.
 Always within reach
 ‚Ä¢ Keep works on your phone, tablet, computer and Android wearables. Everything you add syncs across all of your devices so your thoughts are always with you.
 The right note at the right time
 ‚Ä¢ Need to remember to pick up some groceries? Set a location-based reminder to pull up your grocery list right when you get to the store.
 Available everywhere
 ‚Ä¢ Try Google Keep on the web at http://keep.google.com and find it in the Chrome Web Store at http://g.co/keepinchrome.
 
 Permissions Notice
 Camera: This is used to attach images to notes in Keep.
 Contacts: This is used to share notes to contacts.
 Microphone: This is used to attach audio to notes.
 Location: This is used to set and fire location-based reminders.
 Storage: This is used to add attachments from storage to their notes.

summary: Google Keep
recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: Good but needs updation There is no flexibility to change the font, size of the font, underline, highlight with color, etc. When we take a lot of notes we demand certain highlighting options that makes the important points to be visible. But this note pad, unfortunately doesn't have the feature. Also the theme should be flexible. Not everyone would love dark theme. Or not all the time dark theme suits. Perhpas what Google docs have should be incorporated in google keep too.

I like this app too much, but any sequence of number it thinks is a phone number and suggest me to call it, but it isn't a phone number. It's very hard to edit line of numbers, because the app alway pop-up an window to suggest you to make a call, you have to click on edit, but if it was on the wrong spot then you'll have to click again, select edit. Always like that, can you guys fix it? I don't save phone numbers on Google Keep, I do it on contacts. 160 (14) /559 isn't a phone number.

This is a great app with a wonderful user interface, but it would be good to have other fonts for use. Additionally, it would be good if we could change font sizes. Lastly, it would be good if you had the option to make the list only partly a checklist (if you press the checklist button it makes everything apart of the list, granting it a checkbox). Thanks! üëç

Hey Google! I hope this isn't too much to ask for, for the Google Keep app...but When writing a note, the date & time is saved but when edited it changes and that's perfectly fine but I was wondering if u could still have the original date & time saved. For example, I wrote a note yesterday at 5pm & edited it this morning at 8am, but let's say I wanted to look back at the original time and date that I wrote the note on, I think it would be a good idea to tap on the edited date & time to see it.

I personally love the app and I use it almost every day for everything. Though I think there are things that could be better. Like for example, a feature where you can protect notes with password/pin. I'd also love to see a feature wherein we can add more photos in whatever part of the notes we choose (not just one at the top). Also, the ability to change font size or at least make some texts italicized/bold. Would it also be possible to make a subtask under a subtask? Thanks a bunch!

title: Maps - Navigate & Explore
description:
Navigate your world faster and easier with Google Maps.  Over 220 countries and territories mapped and hundreds of millions of businesses and places on the map.  Get real-time GPS navigation, traffic, and transit info, and explore local neighborhoods by knowing where to eat, drink and go - no matter what part of the world you‚Äôre in.

Get there faster with real-time updates
‚Ä¢ Beat traffic with real-time ETAs and traffic conditions
‚Ä¢ Catch your bus, train, or ride-share with real-time transit info
‚Ä¢ Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents, and road closures

Discover places and explore like a local
‚Ä¢ Discover local restaurant, events, and activities that matter to you
‚Ä¢ Know what‚Äôs trending and new places that are opening in the areas you care about
‚Ä¢ Decide more confidently with ‚ÄúYour match,‚Äù a number on how likely you are to like a place
‚Ä¢ Group planning made easy.  Share a shortlist of options and vote in real-time
‚Ä¢ Create lists of your favorite places and share with friends
‚Ä¢ Follow must-try places recommended by local experts, Google, and publishers
‚Ä¢ Review places you‚Äôve visited. Add photos, missing roads and places.

More experiences on Google Maps
‚Ä¢ Offline maps to search and navigate without an internet connection
‚Ä¢ Street View and indoor imagery for restaurants, shops, museums and more
‚Ä¢ Indoor maps to quickly find your way inside big places like airports, malls and stadiums

* Some features not available in all countries

* Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Google Maps! This release brings bug fixes that improve our product to help you discover new places and navigate to them.

Become a beta tester: http://goo.gl/vLUcaJ
comments: I've been using Google Maps for years, and update my timeline every day so I've got an accurate tracking record of where I've been. And then, today, I find that most of the data for this and previous years has suddenly disappeared (it was there yesterday). Most days now have no places visited and I just don't understand where all the data has gone. I've tried clearing cache, restarting phone, uninstalling and reinstalling the app - nothing. At disappointed.

This had been one of the most useful apps I ever used. But for the last several weeks it is not responding. I had done all possible troublshooting and failed to update the app. I also sent feedback and yet to receive a reply. I also cannot contribute to google local guide, where I crosssd level 8. Looking forward to your support. (15 Oct 2020) Still unable to use this app! (20 Oct 2010)

Really like Google maps it is accurate and normally doesn't glitch out. But for the last 3 weeks it has been giving me trouble. It won't give detailed directions while driving; basically goes turn right then turn left, with out giving how far until I need to turn or what street I need to turn on. I tried going through settings to find a solution but nothing has worked. I have searched through page after page on Google to find a solution but have not found one yet. I have a Samsung S20 5G.

Stopped working. I have been using this app for I can't even tell you how many years and recently just stopped working. doesn't find any of the addresses I'm searching to go to and won't even find my own location. ***I did uninstall updates and it seems to currently be working again without the updates. Send it to me to an article isn't what I'm looking for from the developer. I'm looking for them to fix their update.

Terrible! Google maps has been my go to for years on every phone I've had now over the past week the maps won't load the addresses and won't give directions. I have uninstalled then reinstalled for under a minute temporary fix then it does it all over again. I can't get any numbers or find my way unless I zoom into the map and follow my blue icon showing where I am. If I didn't know how to read maps ill be f***ed. This is bad.

title: Samsung Internet Browser
description:
New Features for you 
* Support the Context menu in the Tab Bar
You can manage your tab through the Context menu in the Tab Bar. Please long press the tab in the Tab Bar to lock the tab, refresh the page, or close all the open tabs.

* New tab manager - See in the Grid view
Now you can use the ‚ÄòGrid view‚Äô on your phone. This enables you to have an easy access to the web page that is open in each tab through the screenshots bigger than ‚ÄòList view‚Äô size.

Security & Privacy
Samsung Internet helps you protect your security and privacy while browsing the Internet.

* Smart Anti-Tracking
Intelligently identify domains which have cross-site tracking ability and block storage (cookie) access.

* Protected Browsing
We will warn you before you can view known malicious sites to prevent you from visiting web sites which may try to steal your data.

* Content Blockers
Samsung Internet for Android allows 3rd party apps to provide filters for content blocking, making browsing safer and more streamlined.

The following permissions are required for the app service.
For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

Required permissions
none

Optional permissions
Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for app analysis information
Location: Used to provide location-based content requested by the user or location information requested by the webpage in use
Camera: Used to provide webpage shooting function and QR code shooting function
Microphone: Used to provide recording function on webpage
Contacts: Used to get the device account information for cloud sync
Storage: Used to store files when downloading from webpages

If your system software version is lower than Android 6.0, please update the software to configure App permissions.
Previously allowed permissions can be reset on Apps menu in device Settings after software update.

comments: Before the most recent update this was my go to default browser. I loved that they had dark mode and autofill on everything. Now I cant even open up the app. When i attempt to do so, it just crashes every single time. I've already cleared the app data and cache via the settings but it still wont open up properly. Hoping to get this fixed asap before I have to stick with google chrome going forward. **UPDATE** Fixed a while ago. Best browser period

A lot of trouble bringing up messages and meetings and other items. end up deleting a lot of things because there's nothing there when you hit the meet or the Greet or the like button. You get the same message over and over and over from girls. After a while you just delete everything that comes across the page for a couple of days and then you get some new stuff

Im going to give this four stars for now, however I feel as if this browser is actually somewhat safer to use now that Google is the juggernaut that they are and choose to be. However, as much as I do enjoy the fact that you can change how you want to display your tabs, the password for "secret mode" especially with a biometric scanner is genius in my opinion. However, I just wish the address bar was easier to use.. it feels like im using an old Samsung before mobile compatibility was a thing

Samsung Internet is the best app ever seen It is easy to use and customizable settings. I loved it using this browser. I recommend all the others to use this app. But there is some drawbacks. It doesn't have settings for downloads like concurrent downloads. I would like if it is added in the next update.

It works good and I like it! The only thing is you can only have 50 (or now 99) tabs open at once, so be sure to bookmark or save elsewhere any pages you think you want to go back and see again sometime. If it gets to 50 (or now 99) tabs open and you open another tab, the oldest tab will automatically be closed.

title: Hulu: Stream TV shows & watch the latest movies
description:
Watch movies, new shows, Hulu Originals, sports, live news, and more with Hulu.

Stream TV shows your way. From anime to sports, watch shows, get live news and much more on your favorite devices. Stream live TV, browse episodes and watch shows with a plan that works for you‚ÄîHulu, Hulu (No Ads), or Hulu + Live TV*. Watch movies, stream TV shows, and enjoy your own personalized streaming library.

*Regional restrictions, blackouts, and additional terms apply.

Plus, Hulu is now the new home of FX Networks, with 40+ acclaimed shows as well as new FX originals.

Watch shows, stream movies, browse episodes, and more. Here‚Äôs what you have access to on all Hulu plans:

‚Ä¢ A personalized TV experience and streaming library‚Äîget recommendations when you watch TV shows or movies
‚Ä¢ Personalized profiles‚Äîcreate up to 6 profiles so everyone can keep track when they browse episodes, shows, and movies
‚Ä¢ My Stuff‚Äîadd shows and movies for quick access to your favorites
‚Ä¢ Watch movies or stream TV shows at home or on the go
‚Ä¢ Premium networks‚Äîdiscover and watch shows from HBO Max‚Ñ¢, SHOWTIME¬Æ, CINEMAX¬Æ, and STARZ¬Æ for an additional monthly fee
‚Ä¢ No hidden fees when you want to watch shows‚ÄîThere are no equipment rentals fees, or installation appointments
‚Ä¢ Watch acclaimed FX Originals on Hulu, the new home of FX Networks

Hulu

Our ad-supported plan lets you browse episodes, shows, and more in the largest streaming TV library. Stream over 80,000+ episodes of the shows you love, from award-winning Originals like The Handmaid‚Äôs Tale and The Act to other popular shows like This is Us and The Good Doctor. 

Hulu (No Ads)

Discover the plan that gives you everything you get with the Hulu plan in an ad-free* experience. Plus, you can download from thousands of titles to watch offline.**

*There are a few shows in our streaming library that are not included in Hulu (No Ads) due to streaming rights. Episodes of those shows will stream uninterrupted ‚Äî there will just be a quick ad before and after each video. **Selected content available for download.

Hulu + Live TV

Watch on-demand and live TV from 60+ channels, including live news, sports, and more. Plus, get unlimited access to the entire Hulu streaming library through our ad-supported plan. No cable required.

Whether you want to discover shows, watch live news, get sports updates or binge-watch your favorite anime show, with Hulu you choose the plan that works for you.

Download the Hulu app now to stream movies, anime shows and much more! 

Terms of Use: http://www.hulu.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.hulu.com/privacy
Your California Privacy Rights: https://www.hulu.com/ca-privacy-rights
Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://www.hulu.com/do-not-sell-my-info

This app features third party software which allows you to contribute to measurement statistics (e.g., Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings). To learn more about digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them, including opting out, please visit our privacy policy. Please see http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information about Nielsen measurement.

We may work with mobile advertising companies to help deliver online and in-app advertisements tailored to your interests based on your activities on our website and apps and on other, unaffiliated websites and apps. To learn more, visit www.aboutads.info. To opt-out of online interest-based advertising, visit www.aboutads.info/choices. To opt-out of cross-app advertising, download the App Choices app at www.aboutads.info/appchoices. Hulu is committed to complying with the DAA‚Äôs Self-Regulatory Principles for Online Behavioral Advertising and the DAA‚Äôs Application of Self-Regulatory Principles for the Mobile Environment.

recentChanges: Spooky season is in full swing, but it shouldn‚Äôt get in the way of your streaming. In this latest update, we‚Äôve gotten rid of some of those creepy crawly bugs to make sure you can continue watching your Huluween favorites. Update your Hulu app today and get back to streaming!.
comments: This app is great. Lots of options. However, it irritates the friggin piss outta me that even though the app has been around for years and they're mostly known for their TV shows, they still don't have a Skip Intro option! If I'm binge watching a show, I don't wanna have to watch the intro every single freakin time! Disney+ has it and they haven't even been out for a year yet! Like why hasn't that been added yet!?

Commercials commercialscommercials Maybe it is deliberate to drive you to buy the ad-free option. It just makes me despise Hulu. It makes even Netflix seem like a good app. If you want to rewind, it triggers commercials. Fast-forward? Commercials. Not infrequently, you get to see the same set of commercials. Sometimes, you get to watch them three times in a row. Over and over and over. Yay. (It's maddening.) And avoidable. And inept programming.

I've never had an issue with this program in all the years I've used it, however, NOW I DO and I need to uninstall and reinstall, but there is NO way that I found to do that, yet.... What a serious pain and it shouldn't be. This is my home computer, and this shouldn't be a national secret how to do this! I'm soooo damn annoyed. The program loads just fine, but soon as I click a play arrow it freezes everything. I looked at the tools/inspect page, it clear shows the play path has been altered somehow. I don't do computer coding or maybe I could fix this myself, but it should be a simple fix to uninstall and reinstall like you would on your phone. I'm 65 years old, I am running Windows 7 because I like it. This really shouldn't be happening.

Very convenient for listening to my news programs on ABC while out of town or otherwise away from home. But "watching" my shows on the Hulu app mean I can't multi-task on my phone. It would be nice to adjust settings so it continued to play while my phone is locked or if I go to another app. Like I do with audiobooks. And when I put my unlocked phone in my pocket with the app running, it always seems to bounce to another show on my "next up" list before the show I am interested ends.

I love Hulu I will always have it on my phone! I usually never have a problem and if i do, the app some how fixes its self. If i disconnect i just reload and its fixed. I have never had a issue that prevented me from watching my favorite adult cartoons. The price is good the content is awesome! I can always find something to watch for what ever situation. Hulu is doing everything right in my book!

title: Gboard - the Google Keyboard
description:
Gboard has everything you love about Google Keyboard‚Äîspeed and reliability, Glide Typing, voice typing, and more

Glide Typing ‚Äî Type faster by sliding your finger from letter to letter

Voice typing ‚Äî Easily dictate text on the go

Handwriting* ‚Äî Write in cursive and printed letters

Emoji Search* ‚Äî Find that emoji, faster

GIFs* ‚Äî Search and share GIFs for the perfect reaction.

Multilingual typing ‚Äî No more switching between languages manually. Gboard will autocorrect and suggest from any of your enabled languages.

Google Translate ‚Äî Translate as you type in the keyboard

* Not supported on Android Go devices
Hundreds of language varieties, including:
Afrikaans, Amharic, Arabic, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bavarian, Bengali, Bhojpuri, Burmese, Cebuano, Chhattisgarhi, Chinese (Mandarin, Cantonese, and others), Chittagonian, Czech, Deccan, Dutch, English, Filipino, French, German, Greek, Gujarati, Hausa, Hindi, Igbo, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Khmer, Korean, Kurdish, Magahi, Maithili, Malay, Malayalam, Marathi, Nepali, Northern Sotho, Odia, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Saraiki, Sindhi, Sinhala, Somali, Southern Sotho, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Tswana, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu, and many more! Visit https://goo.gl/fMQ85U for the full list of languages supported

Pro tips:
‚Ä¢ Gesture cursor control: Slide your finger across the space bar to move the cursor
‚Ä¢ Gesture delete: Slide left from the delete key to quickly delete multiple words
‚Ä¢ Make the number row always available (enable in Settings ‚Üí Preferences ‚Üí Number Row)
‚Ä¢ Symbols hints: Show quick hints on your keys to access symbols with a long press (enable in Settings ‚Üí Preferences ‚Üí Long press for symbols)
‚Ä¢ One handed mode: On large screen phones, pin keyboard to the left or the right of the screen
‚Ä¢ Themes: Choose your own theme, with or without key borders

Pro tips:
‚Ä¢ Gesture cursor control: Slide your finger across the space bar to move the cursor
‚Ä¢ Gesture delete: Slide left from the delete key to quickly delete multiple words
‚Ä¢ Make the number row always available (enable in Settings ‚Üí Preferences ‚Üí Number Row)
‚Ä¢ Symbols hints: Show quick hints on your keys to access symbols with a long press (enable in Settings ‚Üí Preferences ‚Üí Long press for symbols)

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Download the beta version to give feedback on upcoming improvements https://goo.gl/8Ksj7x
comments: There are lots of things I liked about this app like the ability to modify its appearance, but the autocorrect is really getting out of hand. Even though I've gone into the app's settings and turned off autocorrect, it's still changing every other word I type into something I have to go back, delete and correct. I'm just about giving up on texting or emailing from my phone now because it takes at least twice as long to clean up all the autocorruptions and retype. Is there a fix for this?!

They've done something to The voice to text option and it is not picking up when I am using punctuation. Instead of inserting the punctuation it's actually spelling the word out. For example once I am done with the sentence if I say (period) ......before it would normally put a . (period) at the end of the sentence whereas now it spells the word out. it also does this randomly. it is a real pain and makes using voice to text very annoying and irritating!

It's a great application except every time I do voice recognition it does not capitalize the first word of every sentence. Even though I have the setting to capitalize the word at the start of each sentence. how do I fix it? Now whenever I say period it spells out the word period instead of putting punctuation. Please fix that as well.

Seems to be allowing a GIANT glitch in my operating system. Until recently I didn't have any problems, then I think something was updated and allowed a virus to be entered into my phone. This has happened before. I just started to uninstall applications until my phone started to work properly again. What a pain in my backside!

I miss the old and the original Swype app. Something that was done 12 to 15 years ago and still is astronomically superior to anything being done now by leaps and bounds. I wish the founders of the original Swype app would relaunch! Google is so arrogant they think they don't even have to post any information about what is being updated. That is always a major tell! I hate Google!

title: Samsung Email
description:
This update is available for Samsung Mobile with Android OS.

Samsung Email enables users to manage multiple personal and business email accounts seamlessly.¬†Samsung Email also offers EAS integration for business, encryption using S/MIME to safeguard data and ease-of-use features such as insightful notifications, SPAM management.¬†Furthermore, organizations can administer various policies as needed.¬† 
¬†
Precautions
. Doesn't support SamsungTheme from P OS

Key features
¬∑¬†POP3 and IMAP support for managing personal email accounts 
¬∑ Exchange ActiveSync (EAS) integration for synchronizing Exchange Server based business email, calendars, contacts and tasks
¬∑¬†Encryption using S/MIME for secure email communication

Additional features
¬∑¬†Customizable user experience with notifications, schedule synchronization, SPAM management, and combined mailboxes
¬∑¬†Policy administration with comprehensive, built-in EAS support
¬∑¬†Conversation and thread view to read related mail


--- Regarding the App Access Permission ---

The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

[Required permissions]
   - None 

[Optional permissions]
   - Camera: Used to attach photos to email
   - Location: Used to attach current location information to email
   - Contacts: Used to link email recipients/senders with contacts and synchronize contact information when using Microsoft Exchange account
   - Storage: Used to attach files to email or save attached files
   - Phone: Used to check device-unique identification information when using Microsoft Exchange account.

comments: App has stopped syncing. It stopped for 3 or 4 days. It then worked for 2 or 3 days. Now it has stopped syncing again the last 1 or 2 days and still won't sync. Previous to the last 2 weeks it was what I used for my email accounts. Now I have to think about finding another email program. Is this a known issue that you are fixing? What has happened in the last 2 weeks that is causing the app to become useless? Please reply thanks.

I used to use search a lot ( in my iPhone mail) . But in Samsung Email the Search is poor. It seems I cant search for text in emails? ( I can only search by email addresses (?) ) Also why is the search option buried? I have to open the side menu then scroll down to search. Email Search is probably the most important thing in an email client (after sending and receiving emails) It needs a one click or swipe nav option from the front screen of any email client.

This app was great. It's the only one I have found that I can sort my email. It has so many options to choose from to keep your email the way you want. Unfortunately it will not sync my emails anymore. This started happening weeks ago.. I would have to turn off sync and turn it back on and restart my phone, it would update my email. But not anymore. It has not updated in 3 days. Is there a fix to this?

Takes forever to find old emails. When searching it first gives an option to search 6 months, once it starts you cannot do anything until it has completed the search. Once finished it will then begin to load the content of each email. Even if i can see the email i want listed, i cant access it until the entire search has been completed!! Why not have a stop searching button so i can get on with what i need!!!

I like the convenience of the app. Only wish it recognized spam mail more better. Other than that I'm very pleased with the app. Not having to go to several emails saves a lot time. Honestly I've tried this with another app and it was absolutely awful and didn't receive all of my mail. I've doubled checked and I receive everything. Highly recommend.

title: Netflix
description:
Looking for the most talked about TV shows and movies from the around the world? They‚Äôre all on Netflix.

We‚Äôve got award-winning series, movies, documentaries, and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute, or just take a break.

What you‚Äôll love about Netflix:

‚Ä¢ We add TV shows and movies all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favorites, and stream videos right on your device.
‚Ä¢ The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV shows and movies you‚Äôll love.
‚Ä¢ Create up to five profiles for an account. Profiles give different members of your household their own personalized Netflix.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy a safe watching experience just for kids with family-friendly entertainment.
‚Ä¢ Preview quick videos of our series and movies and get notifications for new episodes and releases.
‚Ä¢ Save your data. Download titles to your mobile device and watch offline, wherever you are.

For complete terms and conditions, please visit http://www.netflix.com/termsofuse
For privacy statement, please visit http://www.netflix.com/privacy

recentChanges: You worry about what to watch next, we‚Äôre busy making that experience even better.
comments: I can switch between my phone and the TV, and it's great. There are recommendations, which I usually like. If you are watching on a phone, you can minimise the screen and have it playing in a small box which you can move around, so you can play games or text at the same time as watching something. It so good, I completely recommend it, get it now! No ads disturb your watching experience either, and I really like that. You can also have multiple accounts for different people.

Netflix has recently started to be a lil buggy The first issues I am having is, As I am watching my show, all of the sudden it just freezes. Second issues is that it once in a while their is a minor lagg. . I think it had started about a week or two ago. But other than that, it perfect. I hope that they fix it ASAP.

This used to work fine on my phone but now for some reason the audio in some movies stops working as the video plays, video stops and audio plays, or even sometimes both audio and video stop. I try skipping ahead and going back to my spot but it rarely fixes the problem, and if it does, its only fixed for a few moments. This has happened in numerous movies ive tried to watch so i try a different movie and the same problem keeps occuring. Its getting on my nerves. Please fix it quickly.

Only thing I wish you guys implement is to add a proper video resolution selection option for both streaming and downloading. Just let us control the resolution that we need. You can definitely add an algorithm to reduce the selected resolution if the network doesn't support it. Apart from that everything is great. Just look at prime video. Their app is so good. This rating will change when a proper resolution selection tool gets implemented.

My only complaint is the subtitle size. I switch between my phone and TV. I like small subs on phone and normal on the TV. It doesn't make sense that I can only change subtitle size through the web and not the app itself. It should be a basic function within the app. It's very annoying that everytime I want to switch devices I have to go through the web, which takes ages to reflect. Take some inspiration from Amazon Prime app. They let you change anything about the subs. Improve please.

title: Photomath
description:
Learn math, check homework and study for upcoming tests and ACTs/SATs with the most used math learning app in the world! Got tricky homework or class assignments? Get unstuck ASAP with our step-by-step explanations and animations.  

Photomath is free and works without wi-fi or data. Whether you‚Äôre on the bus, in a cave, or just offline, core Photomath is always available. 

We‚Äôve got you covered from basic arithmetic to advanced calculus and geometry. You CAN do math! 

KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Word problem explanations!
‚Ä¢ No internet or data required for equation-based problems 
‚Ä¢ Free to use
‚Ä¢ Step-by-step explanations for every solution 
‚Ä¢ Exclusive how-to animations
‚Ä¢ Scroll through multiple solving methods per problem
‚Ä¢ Multi-functional scientific calculator 
‚Ä¢ Interactive graphs

MATH TOPICS COVERED
‚Ä¢ Basic Math/Pre-Algebra: arithmetic, integers, fractions, decimal numbers, powers, roots, factors da
‚Ä¢ Algebra: linear equations/inequalities, quadratic equations, systems of equations, logarithms, functions, matrices, graphing, polynomials 
‚Ä¢ Geometry (specific textbooks only)
‚Ä¢ Trigonometry/Precalculus: identities, conic sections, vectors, sequences and series, logarithmic functions
‚Ä¢ Calculus: limits, derivatives, integrals, curve sketching
‚Ä¢ Statistics: combinations, factorials

‚ÄúAn answer isn‚Äôt all you‚Äôll get from this free app. Photomath also provides a step-by-step guide of how each problem is solved.‚Äù ‚Äî Huffington Post

‚ÄúThe step-by-step guide is beneficial to students that do not have access to a tutor and struggle with solving math problems.‚Äù ‚Äî Forbes

‚ÄúA viral video about a new app looks like a dream come true for anyone who struggles with math.‚Äù ‚Äî Time
___________________________________________

Want to boost your learning experience? With Photomath Plus, you get:

EXPERT EXPLANATIONS
High-quality teacher-approved explanations for every problem in select textbooks, including word and geometry problems! Learn or repeat math concepts at your own pace.

ANIMATIONS
Detailed animations that help you visualize and understand each math step.

TIPS & HINTS
Level up your learning by understanding ‚Äúhow‚Äù and ‚Äúwhy‚Äù math problems are solved, or remember forgotten terms and concepts with our embedded glossary. 

‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the confirmation of purchase. 
‚Ä¢ A subscription automatically renews unless it‚Äôs canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. 
‚Ä¢ Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. 
‚Ä¢ Manage or cancel your subscription in your account settings on the Google Play after purchase. 
‚Ä¢ Offers and pricing subject to change without notice. 

Suggestions or questions? Email us at support@photomath.app

Website: www.photomath.app 
Facebook: @Photomathapp 
Twitter: @Photomath 

Terms of Use: https://photomath.app/en/termsofuse 
Privacy Policy: https://photomath.app/en/privacypolicy

comments: It is absolutely really helpful. It helped me with alot of things like my module, homework, math, measuring, etc. I love this app and it's completely free! So what are you waiting for? Download now! This is probably the most awesome math problem solving app ever! #1 the best calculation app ever! I can't stop using it! This app is awesome and what i like about it is that it knows how to multiply and calculate everything which is awesome!

It's the best maths solving app I have ever seen. I am not a premium user but I am happy with my experience with this app. It is not necessary to buy premium because an average math student can understand the steps provided by non premium photomath.I don't know how much the premium is good but if the non premium is this much good then premium will be outstanding. And the best way to get rid of ADS for a non premium user is don't turn on internet while using this app. But there's no deceptive ADS

For me, personally, the app used to be better when explaining solutions, but it's still very good. I wish it would explain graphs however. There's no ads, however you have to pay for some features, but it's not bad to the point that the app loses value if you don't buy premium, personally, I haven't. Highly suggest

Brilliant! This app is very helpful and useful! I used this to check my answers to math problems and equations and it showed me the correct answers as well as the solution too! Not only that, most of the features we all need in solving mathematics is in the app for FREE. Now I understand Math even better without the feeling the uneasiness of solving math problems and equations. I really love it.

I liked the app ever since. It really helps me solve my math problems that gives specific and understandable solution. I deleted the app years ago, and now I installed it again. Ot surprised me knowing now, you will have to pay in order to access such as show specific steps. I'm kinda disappointed at the same sad. It does give you 7 days trial, but really I was expecting more.

title: QR & Barcode Reader
description:
QR & Barcode Reader is a modern QR code scanner and barcode scanner with all the features you need.

Scan any QR code or barcode to get additional information including results from popular online services; Amazon, eBay and Google - 100% FREE!

ALL COMMON FORMATS
Scan all common barcode formats: QR, Data Matrix, Aztec, UPC, EAN, Code 39 and many more.

RELEVANT ACTIONS
Open URLs, connect to WiFi hotspots, add calendar events, read VCards, find product and price information, etc.

SECURITY AND PERFORMANCE
Protect yourself from malicious links with Chrome Custom Tabs featuring Google Safe Browsing technology and profit from shorter loading times.

MINIMAL PERMISSIONS
Scan an image without giving access to your device storage. Even share contact data as QR code without giving access to your address book!

SCAN FROM IMAGES
Detect codes within picture files or scan directly using the camera.

FLASHLIGHT AND ZOOM
Activate the flashlight for reliable scans in dark environments and use pinch-to-zoom to read barcodes even from far distances.

CREATE AND SHARE
Share arbitrary data such as website links with the built-in QR code generator by displaying them on your screen as a QR code and scanning them with another device.

CUSTOM SEARCH OPTIONS
Get specific information by adding custom websites into the barcode search (i.e. your favorite shopping website).

CSV EXPORT AND ANNOTATIONS
Manage unlimited history and export it (as CSV file). Import it to Excel or save it to any cloud storage such as Google Drive. Annotate your scans and manage product inventory or implement quality assurance in your small business!

Enjoy one of the best QR code reader apps available for smartphones and tablets running Android 6.0 or higher.

Supported QR codes:
‚Ä¢ website links (URL)
‚Ä¢ contact data (MeCard, vCard, vcf)
‚Ä¢ calendar events
‚Ä¢ WiFi hotspot access information
‚Ä¢ geo locations
‚Ä¢ phone call information
‚Ä¢ email, SMS and MATMSG

Barcodes and two-dimensional codes:
‚Ä¢ article numbers (EAN, UPC, JAN, GTIN, ISBN)
‚Ä¢ Codabar or Codeabar
‚Ä¢ Code 39, Code 93 and Code 128
‚Ä¢ Interleaved 2 of 5 (ITF)
‚Ä¢ PDF417
‚Ä¢ GS1 DataBar (RSS-14)
‚Ä¢ Aztec Code
‚Ä¢ Data Matrix

comments: The game itself is actually amazing. Well was. Since the last update there is that issue. Im dealing with the problem in launching as many other people do. App cannot launch properly so it closes. I try to launch again but theres the same scenario all time. Im on Huawei P30 Lite. Message to developers: please undo last update if you can. Now many people cant even open the app. I was on level 1410, its a pity to lose all this progress. This game is so cool and I dont wanna put it in the garbage.

I loved the game until the new update, I was at level 1171. The new update made it so I can't even open the app anymore! I may never play again because I don't want to loose my levels. Brilliant gameplay, my go to game. I was on level 482 before I updated. Now, the app won't even bloody open. I have been trying to open it for the last week or so but still no hope. This game was my favorite game but after its latest update(the change of the icon of the game) the game had stopped working and is just taking my phone's storage and whenever I try to open this app it does not open and it shows that color fill 3D is not responding or it shows that color fill 3D keeps stopping and we always get 3 options 1. title: Google Play Music
description:
Google Play Music provides free, ad-supported radio for what you‚Äôre doing, how you‚Äôre feeling, or what you want to hear. Instantly start radio stations based on songs, artists, or albums, or browse by genre, mood, activity, decade, and more. Bring your own music collection with you by uploading 50,000 of your own songs; then listen to them across Android, iOS, and the web, for free.

Subscribe to get on-demand access to millions of songs and download anything to listen even when you‚Äôre not connected - or sign up for the family plan on Android to provide access for up to six family members for one low price. Plus, subscriptions come with YouTube Music Premium membership, so you can enjoy YouTube Music ad-free, in the background, and offline.

Free features:
*Radio curated by experts for anything you want to hear
*Store up to 50,000 songs from your personal music collection
*Discover and subscribe to podcasts
*Smart recommendations based on your taste

Subscription-only features:

recentChanges: YouTube Music is replacing Google Play Music! Don‚Äôt worry, this change won‚Äôt happen overnight. But you can transfer your library to YouTube Music now. Download the YouTube Music app to switch over today.
comments: It was all fine until I had to transfer to YouTube Music, which to listen to music properly, requires a subscription. But YouTube didn't transfer my music, it just didn't work, which is frustrating. They don't care about people's satisfaction in listening to music, they only care about gaining money through subscriptions. Google Play Music was good, see that key word, was. YouTube Music doesn't need my money so I could listen to my music. It needs better function.

It was working fine. I could happily listen to music offline. I honestly think that YouTube Music is really pointless since there's already a bunch of songs, covers, and instrumentals on YouTube itself. This is only getting a 1 star review and I have no actual regrets. Honestly who was dense enough to think of this idea, they should've known that no one would like this idea, it's such a fraud. If we now need internet to listen to music then that's really dumb. Have fun reading all the reviews

Used the app a lot from the get go. Worked perfectly. I put all of my purchased/downloaded music on it for about 3-4 years. Then, the app was "moved".... along with all of my music. 3 years worth of music erased completely. I'm pretty disgusted.... so much, that I don't even want to give YouTube music a chance once I saw that my music wouldn't transfer. Not one song. All of my playlist titles are there... but no songs. I've tried multiple times and searched extensively. It's a complete RIP off.

I have been using this app for years, even I changed phones. And I am happy to use it even when offline. The last time I used this app was yesterday before updating. Then I realized the app is discontinued and becomes Youtube Music. The wonderful memories and arranged music just gone. Well, it is nice while it lasted and it's time to move on. Goodbye.

This app was perfect. Loved the format. Very user friendly. Love the fact that I could play music on my phone while phone was asleep or when using other apps. YouTube music sucks . I have to keep my phone awake while using. Also I can't easily play my personal music downloaded to my phone. Ill pay for Google music if I have to. How can I get it back? F your commercials, F your format, change something that was flawless. I will never listen to any music on YouTube music.

title: Google Podcasts: Discover free & trending podcasts
description:
With Google Podcasts, you can play the latest episodes from your favorite shows, explore podcast recommendations just for you, and manage your listening activity.

Discover podcasts you'll love 
‚Ä¢ Subscribe and listen to all your favorite podcasts for free. 
‚Ä¢ Explore show and episode recommendations just for you. 
‚Ä¢ Browse popular and trending shows in comedy, news, history, music, business, TV & film, education, health & fitness, technology, arts, science, sports, and more. 

Customize your listening experience
‚Ä¢ Listen at faster playback speeds or skip over silences. 
‚Ä¢ Queue up episodes for a seamless listening experience. 
‚Ä¢ Easily keep track of your listening history, downloads, and subscriptions.

Listen wherever you are

summary: A podcast player, from Google. Listen and subscribe to the world‚Äôs podcasts.
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: This was a great app. I used to be able to navigate through my downloaded episodes in a single swipe. Now it takes a couple taps to get to my downloads... Annoying, but I can live with it. More recently, the app won't download new episodes of my favorite podcasts. It churns and churns, and eventually shows an error. I've tried clearing the cache and force stopping the app, but no improvement.

At first, I didn't think I would like the change over. But so far I am loving it!‚ù§ These are the things I like: Being able to see other podcasts that interest me, with this Covid 19 many of my subscribed podcasts are not able to broadcasts regularly, so now I have my regulars and new ones.ü§£ Having watched podcasts automatically deleted after a period of time. This is what can be done in the Settings section. üòçNow I am loaded with great podcasts!

Pretty decent. Navigation and appeal would be greatly improved by implementing simple colored and semi transparent boxes/containers. With the current b&w layout the look and feel is muddy and immediately makes you want to look for other options. If you stick around to play with it, you get yourself used to it. No good reason why it needs to turn you off before you even give it a chance.

The app is currently unusable. It won't update available podcast episodes with new releases, and I know others having the same problem. This isn't the first major problem I've had with the app either. In the past, there were serious audio issues, which were eventually resolved. Overall it's poorly maintained, and I'll be moving on permanently to other apps.

I was going to raise my rating when I figured out there was a "sleep" function, but I really dislike the new home page layout. I liked the grid and ability to order podcasts. One line bar across the top is a pain to scroll through since it appears to go in I assume newest update order (which is not how I choose what to listen to). Edit:Getting used to the crappy layout but until there is the ability to add an rss feed I will not change my rating. Also the ability to rate podcasts would be nice.

title: Digital Secure
description:
Protect your private information from digital threats. 
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and home computers. Safeguard your internet connection and personal data with antivirus, anti-malware and identity theft protection so you can browse with peace of mind. 

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.
You‚Äôll get free security and privacy tools, plus you can get advanced protection for $5/mo per line or $10/mo per account.

1. Security and Privacy
Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind. 
Get warnings when connecting to an unsecure network, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads. Plus, you‚Äôll be able to see how installed apps are currently using your personal information. 

2. Safe Wi-Fi 
Connect with confidence to any public Wi-Fi. 
With Digital Secure, it‚Äôs easy to make any Wi-Fi connection private. You‚Äôll get an on-the-go secure VPN connection so you‚Äôll be able to keep personal data and online activities to yourself. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (IDTP)
Take control with always-on IDTP and social media monitoring, dark web surveillance and theft alerts.
24/7 cyber monitoring means you can be notified if we detect any personal information you‚Äôve asked us to monitor is shared online. You‚Äôll also get step-by-step guidance from recovery and replacement specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: Last update on Google play was sept 16, and today Oct 10 I am told my app is out of date. This is a security app, not tetris. Also, won't start automatically after restart sometimes. I have to manually start it (if I notice it's not running).

Hello, my phone has been spammed. I thought this app is supposed to protect against that. Now I don't know how to stop the spamming. I keep getting messages that my phone will be locked if I don't install and pay for Spam protection.

I haven't done the September update. I've read many customer comments and notice that the one common aspect to each one is the canned set of replies from the Verizon Care correspondent. Notably, that in each instance, the tone and tenor of the reply is condescending in a passive-aggressive manner. For example, inviting the dissatisfied customer to take yet another step, reaching out to customer care, to describe "your problem", again? It's a Verizon or digital secure problem. Start there eh?
Still kinda on the fence with this app since switching over from a very corrupt AT&T. I can say that because I've been with them for over 20 years. They went bad about 4 years ago. Thank you Verizon.
App doesn't allow Web security. You turn on 2 seconds later the app crashes I have no idea if I'm safe browsing on the Web > latest version 9/16 Issue still a problem !!!

title: StubHub - Live Event Tickets
description:
StubHub is the top destination for buying and selling tickets to the world's best events. Ticket prices may be higher or lower than face value.

MLB, NBA, NHL, and concert tickets at your favorite venue and more ‚Äì StubHub has your tickets for amazing experiences! Over 10 million upcoming live sports events, concerts, theater shows, gigs and tours are available. 

StubHub recently ranked #1 in Newsweek‚Äôs America‚Äôs Best Customer Service in 2019. Tickets orders are 100% guaranteed, with customer service all the way to your seat. Get a coupon worth 120% of your original order if an event is cancelled.

Get tickets for your favorite MLB, NBA, NHL team, theater show or music concert from the day they go on sale to the day of the event. See the venue and find out which artists are performing from your phone.

Buy event tickets using the largest ticket selection with StubHub! Concerts, MLB, NBA, NHL tickets, local shows and more.

Sell tickets easily right from the StubHub app if you have a change of plans. 
STUBHUB FEATURES

‚Ä¢ Event Recommendations: Let the fun find you with event recommendations based on your Spotify account, downloaded music, and favorite artists and teams
‚Ä¢ Friends: Find out what your friends are into and which events they‚Äôre going to
‚Ä¢ Interactive venue maps: See the view before you buy on selected maps

‚Ä¢ Google Pay: Speed through checkout with Google Pay (US events only)
‚Ä¢ Mobile tickets: Get in with your phone ‚Äì no need to print!*

‚Ä¢ Venue and artist info: Check on upcoming events and discover similar artists
‚Ä¢ Ticket price alerts: Tell us what you want to pay and get notified when there‚Äôs a match
‚Ä¢ My tickets: Track your orders, view your mobile tickets and get ready for your next event
‚Ä¢ Sell tickets: List tickets, manage your listings and view your sales
‚Ä¢ Event categories: View events by category to discover events based on your interests or mood. Concerts, NBA games, comedy shows and more.
‚Ä¢ Barcode scanning: Attract more buyers and keep tickets you're selling listed for longer by scanning ticket barcodes*

Buy and resell tickets for local events with StubHub. Download now!

*Available for selected teams and venues

title: Telegram
description:
Pure instant messaging ‚Äî simple, fast, secure, and synced across all your devices. Over 400 million active users.

FAST: Telegram is the fastest messaging app on the market, connecting people via a unique, distributed network of data centers around the globe.

SYNCED: You can access your messages from all your devices at once. Start typing on your phone and finish the message from your tablet or laptop. Never lose your data again.

UNLIMITED: You can send media and files, without any limits on their type and size. Your entire chat history will require no disk space on your device, and will be securely stored in the Telegram cloud for as long as you need it.

SECURE: We made it our mission to provide the best security combined with ease of use. Everything on Telegram, including chats, groups, media, etc. is encrypted using a combination of 256-bit symmetric AES encryption, 2048-bit RSA encryption, and Diffie‚ÄìHellman secure key exchange.

POWERFUL: You can create group chats for up to 200,000 members, share large videos, documents of any type (.DOCX, .MP3, .ZIP, etc.), and even set up bots for specific tasks. It's the perfect tool for hosting online communities and coordinating teamwork.

RELIABLE: Built to deliver your messages in the minimum bytes possible, Telegram is the most reliable messaging system ever made. It works even on the weakest mobile connections. 

FUN: Telegram has powerful photo and video editing tools and an open sticker/GIF platform to cater to all your expressive needs.

SIMPLE: While providing an unprecedented array of features, we are taking great care to keep the interface clean. With its minimalist design, Telegram is lean and easy to use.

100% FREE & NO ADS: Telegram is free and will always be free. We are not going to sell ads or introduce subscription fees. 

PRIVATE: We take your privacy seriously and will never give third parties access to your data.

For those interested in maximum privacy, Telegram offers Secret Chats. Secret Chat messages can be programmed to self-destruct automatically from both participating devices. This way you can send all types of disappearing content ‚Äî messages, photos, videos, and even files. Secret Chats use end-to-end encryption to ensure that a message can only be read by its intended recipient.

We keep expanding the boundaries of what you can do with a messaging app. Don‚Äôt wait years for older messengers to catch up with Telegram ‚Äî join the revolution today.

comments: I installed a new update of Telegram, but I still want the ability to folder the messages stored in this good program to be created and come. Well, we save hundreds of messages every day, which are separate topics such as science sports and even lessons for students. If this content can be separated, it will be very good because it will take less time for us to find the content. Thanks to you.

I love this app but after the latest update it has so many bugs! I see latest updates in channels and chats but after I close the app and open it again, it send me notifications for that seen messages again and again! And the other problem is that I get the notifications for new messages but they don't load in chats and channels!!! It's so annoying... Please fix it .

No way to delete my info. Installed to find no way to make calls. Very unclear about why the selected only 3 contacts to sync out of my list. Was hoping to be able to make voip calls but this does not replace a conventional messenger and phone. No dial pad. No video calls like I was under the impression were here. Just really unsure what the point of the AP is all together. Like is this just for messeging strangers? I don't want that at all.

i updated the app last night and since then it doesn't shows the last message in some channels and groups. you can see the last message from chat list but when you open the channel it's not there. and it skips some messages in channels or groups. it also doesn't show the source channel when i forward a message to my own channel.

I would give it a 5 star rating. The animation are great and the fact that I have been told that I can send file/s up to 2gb in size is great (Not done so as yet) The problem ‚ö†Ô∏è I am having is I receive no notification sounds. Just vibration. I have looked up and down on how to change it, but no joyüòê

title: Google Go: A lighter, faster way to search
description:
Google Go is a lighter, faster way to search, with search results optimised to save up to 40% data.

Get answers quickly and reliably with Google Go, even on slow connections and smartphones with low space. At 7MB in size, it‚Äôs fast to download and saves space on your phone.

Type less, discover more. Save time by tapping your way through trending queries and topics, or by using your voice to say what you‚Äôre looking for.

Make Google read it. Point your camera at text or listen to any web page. Words are highlighted as they are read, so you can easily follow along.

Search and translate with your camera. See a word you don‚Äôt understand on a sign, form, or product? With Google Lens, just point your camera to translate or search for it.

Everything you need in one app. Easily and quickly access your favorite apps and websites, as well as images, videos and information on the things you care about - all from Google Go.

Don‚Äôt miss out on what‚Äôs popular and trending. Explore the latest trending topics just by tapping Search.

Find the perfect greetings to share with loved ones. Tap on ‚ÄúImages‚Äù or ‚ÄúGIFs‚Äù to find the best photos and animated greetings to liven up your chats.

Easily switch between languages. Set a second language to switch your search results to or from at any time.

Whatever you are looking for on the internet, Google Go makes it fast and easy for you to find!

comments: Once I catch on how to maneuver within this app just maybe I'll be able to say it's a good one. One thing I can say is there's too many changes all at one time. Instructions are not always comprehendable. Some of us need " Google Go for Dummies"... I like this app, but it's appears when using other apps. Otherwise, interference, unpredictable behavior and isn't stable.

The app is pretty good. As it says it's fun to search and it's life too? The only issue I have is with downloads. We can't download pages like we can in chrome. Since there is no multiple tabs option there should atleast be an option where I can save some sites I wanna read later. If this is the only browser app a person uses like me then it's not so efficient. Coz I disabled chrome since it takes up a lot of space. Please do something about this. Else it's a great app. No complaints. üòÑ

This app is great, and a great alternative to Chrome and Google. It is very easy to use and it has Google Assistant built into it when you voice search. It has a lite, incognito, and normal. It is very nice how you do not have to download two apps to get lite versions of the whistle your need. It is an all in one app, ready for use I'm ready for improvement. for me it is very good I don't think it needs much

Excellent for many features, 1. Multiple sessions, each search in a separate window. 2. Lite mode, pages load faster and easier to read 3. More convenient search box location. 4. Opens some of the blocked sites in some countries. 5. Has bookmarks to open frequently visited pages. And more... The bad: if you left the app to another app then back, the page reloads again, very annoying when you read and compare two pages.

This is a very good light browser. Very fast, always loads practically instantly even on my 4 year old s7. Very helpful side features; though I dont use them very much personally, I can see that many people would. It gives relevant search suggestions. Some features such as advanced searches are missing, but I have found that I mainly use this for finding a fact or an image quickly. Then, if I need more information, I switch to my normal browser, firefox.

title: Carrom Pool: Disc Game
description:
Carrom Disc Pool is an easy-to-play multiplayer board game. Pot all your pieces before your opponent. Can you become the best at this Carrom Board game?

With simple gameplay, smooth controls and great physics, travel around the world and play against worthy opponents. Are you up for the challenge?

This game has multiple popular variants across the globe. Some to the most famous ones are Korona, Couronne, Bob, Crokinole, Pichenotte and Pitchnut. 

Customise your pieces with a huge variety of unlock-able items! Show off your style to players from all over the world!

Features:
‚ñ∫Play multiplayer matches in 2 game modes: Carrom and Disc Pool
‚ñ∫Play with your friends.
‚ñ∫Compete with top players.
‚ñ∫Try your luck at free daily golden shot and win big prizes.
‚ñ∫Play around the world in glorious arenas.
‚ñ∫Smooth controls and realistic physics.
‚ñ∫Unlock a wide range of strikers and pucks.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: I mostly play free style but one problem is there that player there are coward, means either they left their chance of strike and wasting time by fearing that they may open the beat so opponent get advantage. Please do something player like this. Better you implement overall game time system eg. 5 mins or 10 mins per match max so that atleast time will not be wasted.

A good game. However, it encourages cheating rather than sportsmanship. Why different strikers. A person looking for another person to make game for him. Sometimes if you are given the striker to start never starts. No fine and he still wins. This game favours who make purchases. Total cheating and nothing. All matches are fixed. Had suggested times and again but no hearing from your team. It seems above facts are correct. Encourages fixing and cheating. Worst game ever i played.

Good to play in spare time but few of the things are not that great about the game.. 1. You need a very good internet connection. 2. Rules should have been same as Carrom. There are certain scenarios which are not counted as a foul. E.g. Directly hittting opponen's puck and not hitting any of your pucks etc. 3. Another turn should be given in case of double fine. 4. No sportamanship at all. Players can have different strickers with more abilities. 5. 2/2 matches will be great if provided.

It is a awesome game I would like to give more than 5 stars but still there are some issues in it. I think there are some hackers. After the time ran out the opponent can still operate and control striker and they pot a coin this is unfair and I also tried one time but for me it is not working after the time runs out. So please notice my issue

The game is very good and it is good for time pass. I loved the concept of variour strikers and powers. It has made the look of the struke phenomenal. However, like the last month the season should be carrom pass event there for each month. So, that one should get some rewards after completing each level in the carrom pass whether they have purchased it or not. That promotes the players to play this game. I hope we will receive similar kind of update soon.

title: Taps to Riches
description:
Build your empire one city at a time in this new tap idler sure to make you money hungry! Tap to make money, tap to upgrade your city‚Äôs business buildings, and tap some more! Unlock, hire, and collect as many Advisors and Bizbots as you can to upgrade your business value, build your cities faster, and earn a stash of cash as you rise from rags to riches! Valuable Adviser bonuses will have you tapping even faster! Can you become a billionaire business tycoon or will you fail as a capitalist?

From the creators of Coin Dozer and Brick Breaker Hero, Taps to Riches will have you tapping everywhere you go!

- Expand your empire into multiple cities with unique challenges
- Hundreds of hilarious Advisers who add valuable business bonuses! Collect them all!
- Dare to reset your progress and take advantage of Bizbots, a precious resource that give you even more money bonuses per tap!
- Buy and upgrade your businesses to see them evolve into architectural masterpieces!
- Tons of Bonuses and Achievements for you to discover with all of your tapping frenzy!
- More features to come!

Taps to Riches is a unique city building simulation game with tap and click mechanics. Upgrade businesses in game to make money and earn extra cash as you venture into new cities.   

Start from the bottom as a newly freed villain with big dreams of once again achieving world domination. Tap your way into riches and money by upgrading buildings and investing in your city. The more cash you invest in businesses the more money they produce for you. Hire valuable Advisors to unlock special business bonuses, and use Bizbot resources for even more cash bonuses!

Taps to Riches is a free game that is supported by the ads we and others display. To do this, we work with a variety of online advertising partners who collect data from users of our games and other games to show you ads that are relevant to your interests. Do not install or launch our games unless you consent to this use and sharing of data, as further explained in our Privacy Policy (http://gamecircus.com/privacy-policy/).

recentChanges: Bug Fixes and Improvements!
comments: This games is very fast paced and keeps you moving, moving, moving. I end up losing track of time because of the fun I'm having.

I HATE games that force you through an extremely slow tutorial without the option to open settings. I'm listening to my audiobook and have been tapping for 20 minutes and still there is no option to turn off the sound. It's also incredibly dumb that you can't tap tap and upgrade at the same time, and there is no "buy max" button. This tutorial is going on forever, I hate being railroaded by a game Edit: apparently the railroading never stops. Uninstalling

It keeps you busy at night and it's just a game to keep you distracted when you need it in the game you save up money and you tap to Rainbow and the more you tap the more buildings you can buy the house gets upgraded it's really fun and I've already playing it for 2 hours

Wants to give us random ads during play but when it comes time for ads to double prizes like being offline for 9 hours and double that income suddenly ads no longer will load and you lose the double income. Had daily reward and went to watch ad to exchange only to get no reward at all

I don't know why there's no close button after spinning for an advisor. I tapped all over the screen and nothing happens and basically you're forced to close the app and restart after every spin because there's nothing else you could do.

Poor search experience, write a very specific item but ,the app shows different item , shoppe did much better in searching item then you , shame. very shame , if feels like searching for gold but you get only dirt ,waste my time to check the store one by one just to find what i really want, this app management person, i bet he or she doesn't even install this app ,that why it become suck at the first place , KEEP THIS PROBLEM AND YOU WILL ALWAYS BE NO. 2 !!!!

title: Google Classroom
description:
Classroom is a free service for schools, non-profits, and anyone with a personal Google account. Classroom makes it easy for learners and instructors to connect‚Äîinside and outside of schools. Classroom saves time and paper, and makes it easy to create classes, distribute assignments, communicate, and stay organized. 

There are many benefits to using Classroom:
‚Ä¢ Easy to set up ‚Äì Teachers can add students directly or share a code with their class to join. It takes just minutes to set up.
‚Ä¢ Saves time ‚Äì The simple, paperless assignment workflow allows teachers to create, review and mark assignments quickly, all in one place.
‚Ä¢ Improves organization ‚Äì Students can see all of their assignments on an assignments page, and all class materials (e.g., documents, photos, and videos) are automatically filed into folders in Google Drive.
‚Ä¢ Enhances communication ‚Äì Classroom allows teachers to send announcements and start class discussions instantly. Students can share resources with each other or provide answers to questions on the stream.
‚Ä¢ Affordable and secure ‚Äì Like the rest of G Suite for Education services, Classroom contains no ads, never uses your content or student data for advertising purposes, and is free.


Permissions Notice:
Camera: Needed to allow the user to take photos or videos and post them to Classroom.
Storage: Needed to allow the user to attach photos, videos, and local files to Classroom. It's also needed to enable offline support.
Accounts: Needed to allow the user to choose which account to use in Classroom.

summary: Connect with your classes and do assignments on the go.
comments: Well, these are some ideas for this app to become better: 1. Add a chat room for the respective people in that classroom, so the communication between student-teacher is a lot easier. 2. The teachers should a notification when we turned in a homework and see how many of them we turned in. 3. You should be able to select multiple files, not only one by one. I think that's all for now, but I think I'll find more issues ASAP. Please start add more QoL.

The app is great but got worse after the new updates. The to do list keep on refreshing but nothing popped up, the notification section complete got removed and this made navigating the app much more difficult. If these problems are resolved, I will change the rating. Thanks.

this app is very great but I am experiencing some issues. my school provided a school account to us and i logged in to that account in google classroom on my laptop and it worked really well but when I downloaded Google Classroom on my mobile and when i tried to login through my school account it said that i have no permission to login into google classroom when clearly I was using google classroom on my laptop I hope this would be fixed soon please consider my concern and help me out on my problem hope this info was helpful

Google Classroom works fine for the most part. Everything seems to be working fine and I can access all my classes easily. However, there is one annoying issue I am experiencing. The app stopped sending mobile notifications a while ago and I can't tell whenever an assignment is posted. The whole point of me downloading this app was to receive mobile notifications. Please fix this issue. Also, a dark mode would be nice.

I request the respected developer team to kindly change the layout completely...üôèüèªüôèüèªüôèüèªüôèüèª ...as whenever i use to open Google classroom its a boring layout .... Just try to make it attractive so that whoever goes to use it become mentally active and be happy ..... Also please try to add more functions to it .... Its a request to the developer team ...... Kindly read my review and try to do whatever you can do..... Full respect to your work....üôèüèªüôèüèª

title: Kill Shot Bravo: Free 3D FPS Shooting Sniper Game
description:
Welcome to Kill Shot Bravo! Free online FPS sniper shooting game on mobile! 
Go to war online and prove your sniper shooting skills in the king of multiplayer 3D sniper games.

Arm yourself with deadly sniper weapons, machine guns and the latest military gear to complete covert missions! All of this in a free online FPS multiplayer action shooting game. In Kill Shot Bravo, it‚Äôs your duty to save the world. That means hunting terrorists, killing zombies and waging war on evil armies. 

Call yourself a sharp shooter with pixel precision? Then put your skills to the test in the top free online multiplayer sniper game on mobile.  

*OVER 2400 MISSIONS*
As a Special Forces soldier your duty will be to navigate secret missions across the globe, shooting hostile army forces that stand in the way of a peaceful world.
If you love FPS sniper 3D killing games you'll love this.
‚Ä¢ From guerrilla combat in jungle mountain ranges, to recon missions on Mediterranean islands, to modern warfare in city streets you‚Äôll travel the world to gun down terror threats as an elite sniper. 
‚Ä¢ Commandeer vehicles to turn the tide of battle! Navigate close quarter combat down narrow alleys in the back of a jeep, or take out hostile threats by air in hazardous helicopter missions! 
‚Ä¢ Complete breach missions to enter occupied buildings and clear them of any threat! Survive a full on enemy attack in multiplayer assault games and shoot more enemies than your opponent. 
‚Ä¢ Move through stunning 3D environments to find the best sniper vantage points and take the all-important Kill Shot! 

Download the app now for free and enjoy regular updates with new regions and missions. This is one fps game you won‚Äôt get bored of. 

*GO TO WAR WITH THE ENEMY*
‚Ä¢ Shoot different enemy types each with their own strengths and combat objectives. Prove you can adapt to different shooting game styles. 
‚Ä¢ Unleash your fury and shoot down Flying Drones, Exo-Suit Soldiers, Zombies, Mechs, Heavy Gunners, sniper assassin Enemy RPGs, Marksmen, Riflemen, Commando Bombers and finally kill the boss.

*LIVE PVP SNIPER DUELS*
‚Ä¢ Clash against snipers in live online multiplayer Player Verses Player shooting matches in PVP mode!  
‚Ä¢ Be the hunter before you are the hunted!
‚Ä¢ Use your heat meter to zone in on the enemy threat. 
‚Ä¢ Find your target. Take aim. Shoot!
‚Ä¢ Online Multiplayer shooting games have never felt this real.

*JOIN ALLIANCES AND BOUNTY EVENTS*
‚Ä¢ This time you won't be fighting alone! Build powerful alliances with other shooters and help each other to complete the high-risk missions. 
‚Ä¢ Hunt and collect bounties from enemies.
‚Ä¢ Take out hordes of zombies in exclusive events. Work with your alliance to stop the Virus and start killing some zombies. New Zombie Shooter Game modes!
‚Ä¢ Friends can join you in multiplayer missions, spotting the targets and assisting you to shoot enemies.
‚Ä¢ Full Chat function in game to allow tactical discussions with other snipers.

*CUSTOMIZE*
‚Ä¢ Customize your avatar and get Perks to help in the battle! 
‚Ä¢ Unlock and equip cool army gear, including helmets, military uniforms, body armor, goggles, facemasks, gloves, boots, and more.
‚Ä¢ Get a fresh Kill Shot moment with every victory! Now YOU get to control the Kill Shot. This is a free online multiplayer fps sniper game with premium customized content. 

* GOOGLE PLAY SERVICES LEADERBOARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS*
‚Ä¢ Compete for high scores alone or with your Alliance against opposing Alliances.
‚Ä¢ Earn Achievements for showing off your deadly sniper skills.
‚Ä¢ Take on weekly Quests to win additional prizes and achievements

OTHER FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Free online multiplayer games and offline single player experience
‚Ä¢ 3D Guns, tons of sniper weapons

Play the Best Fun free FPS Sniper 3D Shooting Game on Mobile for Free!

¬©2020 Hothead Games Inc., Hothead, and Kill Shot are trademarks or registered trademarks of Hothead Games Inc., all rights reserved.

comments: SUPPORT experience is horrible. Search and browse:
- Nearby shops and restaurants

- Movies times, casts, and reviews

- News, stock information, and more

comments: Only one problem, 3 days ago, I could still search things, but whenever I tap to go on a website, it acts like its disconnected even if my tablet is connected to the Wi-Fi. If you don't have the answer, I'll be bored forever without going to any websites! üò°üò°üò° I hate this app sometimes because of this problem, but it only happened there.

About 1 out of every 4 searches won't go through. They'll load for a second before the bar gets stuck at the end, and no search results populate the screen. Nothing is wrong with my phone or internet. Chrome app searches work 100% of the time. Google app is the issue, its been like this off and on for years, but recently has been acting up constantly.

I am using a oneplus nord and whenever i search, this kept showing me ' check your internet connection' even when my connection is fast. Now, after the recent update, it is not even showing that, its just a blank white screen and nothing else. Sometimes it's working when i try again after reopening the app. Most of the time its not. Hope you'll fix this problem ASAP.

So actually, i like google since years ago. But 3 days ago or 1 week ago, i can't translate. It's maybe not like i need to update it, beacuse it only said "UNINSTALL OPEN".
