I'm honestly going to switch to another app. Google has been ok with simple searches. However with the election coming up I've been trying to search up different facts and information on Biden and Trump, only to find rather biased results. I can even look up specific dates, name, and even addresses. The results are the same, many articles on things Trump has done wrong, or praise articles on Biden. It's not because of my search relevance either, I had all of that reset. Very disappointed.

title: Snapseed
description:
Snapseed is a complete and professional photo editor developed by Google.



== KEY FEATURES==

‚Ä¢ 29 Tools and Filters, including: Healing, Brush, Structure, HDR, Perspective (see list below)

‚Ä¢ Opens JPG and RAW files

‚Ä¢ Save your personal looks and apply them to new photos later

‚Ä¢ Selective filter brush

‚Ä¢ All styles can be tweaked with fine, precise control



== TOOLS, FILTERS AND FACE ==

‚Ä¢ RAW Develop ‚Äì open and tweak RAW DNG files; save non-destructively or export as JPG

‚Ä¢ Tune image ‚Äì adjust exposure and color automatically or manually with fine, precise control

‚Ä¢ Details ‚Äì magically brings out surface structures in images

‚Ä¢ Crop ‚Äì crop to standard sizes or freely

‚Ä¢ Rotate ‚Äì rotate by 90¬∞, or straighten a skewed horizon

‚Ä¢ Perspective ‚Äì fix skewed lines and perfect the geometry of horizons or buildings

‚Ä¢ White Balance ‚Äì adjust the colors so that the image looks more natural

‚Ä¢ Brush ‚Äì selectively retouch exposure, saturation, brightness or warmth

‚Ä¢ Selective ‚Äì the renown ‚ÄúControl Point‚Äù technology: Position up to 8 points on the image and assign enhancements, the algorithm does the rest magically

‚Ä¢ Healing ‚Äì remove the uninvited neighbor from a group picture

‚Ä¢ Vignette ‚Äì add a soft darkness around the corners like a beautiful, wide-aperture would do

‚Ä¢ Text ‚Äì add both stylized or plain text

‚Ä¢ Curves - have precise control over the brightness levels in your photos

‚Ä¢ Expand -  increase the size of your canvas and fill up the new space in smart ways with content of your image

‚Ä¢ Lens Blur ‚Äì add a beautiful Bokeh to images (background softening), ideal for photographic portraits

‚Ä¢ Glamour Glow ‚Äì add a fine glow to images, great for fashion or portraits

‚Ä¢ Tonal Contrast ‚Äì boost details selectively in the shadows, midtones and highlights

‚Ä¢ HDR Scape ‚Äì bring a stunning look to your images by creating the effect of multiple exposures

‚Ä¢ Drama ‚Äì add a hint of doomsday to your images (6 styles)

‚Ä¢ Grunge ‚Äì an edgy look with strong styles and texture overlays

‚Ä¢ Grainy Film ‚Äì get modern film looks with realistic grain

‚Ä¢ Vintage ‚Äì the style of color film photo from the 50‚Äôs, 60‚Äôs or 70‚Äôs

‚Ä¢ Retrolux ‚Äì go retro with light leaks, scratches, film styles

‚Ä¢ Noir ‚Äì Black and White film looks with realistic grain and the ‚Äúwash‚Äù effect

‚Ä¢ Black & White ‚Äì classic Black and White look straight out of the darkroom

‚Ä¢ Frames ‚Äì add frames with adjustable size

‚Ä¢ Double Exposure - blend two photos, choosing from blend modes that are inspired by shooting on film and by digital image processing

‚Ä¢ Face Enhance ‚Äì add focus to the eyes, add face-specific lighting, or smoothen skin

‚Ä¢ Face Pose - correct the pose of portraits based on three dimensional models

comments: Amazing. You can edit photos so easily. My favourite feature is Perspective. There are a lot more features. And the tutorials are also nice! Great app, google. When I also understood that review your edits and use the brush for Double Exposure, I was so stoked because the only problem I had with this app was that the image does not get inside properly and when I try to darken the added image, the 1st one gets lighter and then gets beneath. Although now I have no problems.

Amazing. You can edit photos so easily. My favourite feature is Perspective. There are a lot more features. And the tutorials are also nice! Great app, google. When I also understood that review your edits and use the brush for Double Exposure, I was so stoked because the only problem I had with this app was that the image does not get inside properly and when I try to darken the added image, the 1st one gets lighter and then gets beneath. Although now I have no problems.

A very user friendly app and exceptionally efficient. I've been using Snapseed for quite sometime now. However, over the last one month, I've been encountering an issue, whereby I'm unable to add borders to photos using the 'EXPAND' option. This issue didn't exist earlier. Please look into the bug, it would be really helpful. Otherwise, Snapseed is my favourite photo editing app!

The experience of working with snapseed is really good. But I would like to share something with snapseed creator's. I think snapseed should add a feature like remembering the last edits for a long period like for a month or two. It would give a better experience to the user's. Her in this update it's like if you have edited a pic then again you come you'll have that Last edit but if you have edited it in the new way you'll not be able to use the last edit again,it will no longer be available.

Overall the app is great, however I noticed that average ratings don't really draw developers attention, hence the 1*. Some basic tools like invert colour are highly desirable, but missing. This is the main image editor that i am using and i'd love it to be more complete, to eliminate the need of another one.

title: Gmail
description:
Gmail is an easy to use email app that saves you time and keeps your messages safe. Get your messages instantly via push notifications, read and respond online & offline, and find any message quickly.
With the Gmail app you get:
‚Ä¢ An organized inbox - Social and promotional messages are sorted into categories so you can read messages from friends and family first.
‚Ä¢ Less spam - Gmail blocks spam before it hits your inbox to keep your account safe and clutter free.
‚Ä¢ 15GB of free storage - You won‚Äôt need to delete messages to save space.
‚Ä¢ Multiple account support - Use both Gmail and non-Gmail addresses (Outlook.com, Yahoo Mail, or any other IMAP/POP email) right from the app.

comments: I've been using Gmail for years and have always been happy. The last few days I have not been able to send out emails from my android tablet, they sit in que for days. My android cell phone had an update recently, the app icon has changed and e mail works fine from my phone but not my tablet. I've looked for an update but nothing so far. I've uninstalled and reinstalled but to no avail.

Please make a simple way to delete in bulk. Ie, create a check-box to select multiple email at once. (Be sure to advise everyone that they'll have to change sync settings in all Google apps and devices. (Make that easy to do as well!) Or perhaps create a simpler way to check all settings that need apply. *Ease of access is key* It's annoying and is the reason I had to create 25 different Gmail accounts bc we don't have money to purchase any extra storage features. Please and thanks!

Edit: the update got a new logo and now my emails take 30 minutes or more to send. Nice. Very nice. üôÑ This app is very behind compared to other apps. Where is the "select all" option? This app will only work with its limited features for those who dont have a lot of emails.For someone like me this isnt a possibility so this will no longer be my main emailing app.

Just like all of Google's other products, this too does not work as expected. All of Google's products are failing lately. I have emails sitting there waiting to be read, but I rarely get a notification of them. And I am talking about the emails in my inbox, not the ads or subscription emails. That part of gmail actually still works quite well with those being separated into separate folders. I'm looking for apps that replace all of Google's apos... might even consider (gasp!) Apple's iPhone!

Updates? Practically every other day but out of 15 emails I had today not one was in primary list. Every day I move them between primary; updates and promotions and still not one in the right place. You work on it every day but as far as I can see not one useful thing comes out of it. Oh yeah!! Beautiful new logo (how long did you work on it?) We really needed that?!?!

title: PayPal Mobile Cash: Send and Request Money Fast
description:
Our new PayPal app is a simple and secure way to get paid back for last night‚Äôs takeaway, send money to friends who have an account with PayPal  , check PayPal activity, choose currencies to send around the world and more. Plus, we‚Äôve added some new features we think you‚Äôll love‚Ä¶

*NEW* A TOUCH-FREE WAY TO PAY OR BE PAID
‚Ä¢	If you‚Äôre buying, simply scan the QR code to pay securely with your PayPal app.
‚Ä¢	Whatever you‚Äôre selling, now you can quickly set up a QR code and get paid in person, all with just your phone. 

SEND AND REQUEST MONEY FOR FREE 
‚Ä¢	When funded by a bank account or balance, it‚Äôs free and secure to send money or ask for it back from friends and family in the US.
‚Ä¢	All you need is an email address, mobile number, bank account, cash pick up service point or mobile top up details. *An account with PayPal is required to send and receive money. If you don‚Äôt have an account with PayPal, you can sign up for free quickly and easily.
‚Ä¢	NEW FEATURE: just type a name, email or phone number and PayPal will find the right person for you. 
‚Ä¢	Request money quickly and securely from friends or family with just a few taps.

GET INSTANT SPENDING NOTIFICATIONS 
‚Ä¢	Never miss a thing ‚Äì keep on top of payments and sending or receiving money, with instant push notifications.
‚Ä¢	Check out all your latest PayPal activity, by just logging in. 

ACCESS YOUR BALANCE INSTANTLY WITH THE PAYPAL CASH CARD
‚Ä¢	Easily transfer funds from your bank balance to your account with PayPal. 
‚Ä¢	Shop in-store, online or everywhere Mastercard¬Æ is accepted and withdraw cash at ATMs worldwide.  
‚Ä¢	PayPal Cash Plus account required to get the card.

TRUST PAYPAL SECURE TRANSACTIONS

Not all features may be available in your market.

¬∑ We've added an extra layer of security allowing you to confirm your identity without having to make a purchase.
¬∑ Let's keep it simple. Add your favorite loyalty reward cards to PayPal for an even faster checkout.
comments: This is one of the best apps I use. Makes paying friends, storing rent money, and buying things online way easier and more convenient. Edit: I have LastPass and I've noticed this may be the only app where I can't get the password to copy over after I've pushed the autofill button for my password app. I have to manually copy and paste my password. For that reason I had to downgrade. Still a necessary app for me, and I like having it.

This is a great app. Very simple, you really don't need a bank account linked to it and still use basically anywhere for anything. I would and do recommend this app to anyone trying to purchase on line, transfering/recieving money to someone, even getting paid from jobs on line I know this is the safest and fastest way to keep track of my money.

I haven't used PayPal in a while, and I recall why. When the money is received it gets stuck for another 24h, sending error message with no explanation if you try to get it before. The fees are awfully high, to receive and transfer. It takes 10 DAYS to transfer the money from PayPal to you bank accounts. I do not recommend that app for money transferred

Needs to support Face unlock, still unsupported as of October 2020. Update: It's not possible to log in when trying to auto fill the password as it auto closes the pop up and the password does not get to be filled in the field. Haven't seen it happen in any of my other apps, only in PayPal. I am now forced to sign in via the web version which actually works.

I like the app, however, it would be nice if it would save my preferred login method, such as Fingerprint scan, because everytime I open the app, it asks me if I want to set up fingerprint scanning, which I do, but it asks every single time to set it up, even though I have it saved in my account login and security preferences. Also, this is more of a wish and not an bug/glitch it would be cool if we could pay on the PayPal mastercard balance before the statement is sent in the app. :Fixed now:

title: Hill Climb Racing
description:
Play the original classic Hill Climb Racing! Race your way up hill in this physics based driving game! Play for free!
 
Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon! 
 
Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. Watch out though - Bill's stout neck is not what it used to be when he was a kid! And his good old gasoline crematorium will easily run out of fuel.
 
Features:
‚Ä¢ ‚ö° Offline Play - Play whenever & wherever!
‚Ä¢ üöó Vehicles - Unlock 29+ vehicles and choose the best one for your playstyle
‚Ä¢ üîß Upgrade - Improve the engine, suspension, tires & 4WD of your vehicles
‚Ä¢ ‚õ∞Ô∏è Drive - 28+ stages that are literally endless
‚Ä¢ üëç Optimized - Plays well on high and low resolution devices
‚Ä¢ üõ† Garage mode - build and drive your dream vehicle with custom parts!
 
Vehicles: Hill Climber, motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, hippie van, onewheeler, quad bike, tourist bus, race car, police car, ambulance, fire truck, snow mobile, super offroad, and many more!
  
Hill Climb Racing is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.
 
Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are hard at work creating new vehicles, levels, features and of course fixing any issues you may find. So we'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game to support@fingersoft.com and please include your device make and model.

* Discord: https://discord.com/invite/fingersoft

 
Terms of Use: https://fingersoft.com/eula-web/

comments: I love this app. There is nothing like it! However, there is a problem. The . . ? Daily challenges arent working properly. I acheived the 20 fuel tanks & got reward. Next one, back flips. I did several back flips & only one was counted. Did it again & still, only one had been counted. Repeated the process again & same result. Hope I have helped in some way to resolve the problem. Thank you & have a great day

I started playing this years ago only because my friends were playing it in high school and I remembered it being really fun. Especially just trying to beat each others highscores and trying different cars to comeplete stages. Its so nice to see that the game still has so many downloads and still has its charm as it did back then. Addictive gameplay, smooth, simple but yet beautiful graphics (looks and feels good on a bigger screen device), fun progression and also completely free to play.

This is a really nice game. But the idea of havingbto start from the beginning every time is really bad. There should be lives or check points. If you die,you start where you died. You can do this maybe only twice,then from there you have to start from the beginning again. Starting over n over makes me not wanna play anymore

Great app with a great features there are. So much entertainment in it it is the one of the great feature of this game. This game is good no ads in it is also a good feature in the game new cars are good and improved . That is why I love the game there are new and entertaining paths and ways I like the game very much thee are no glitches in the game ( app. ) . This is also quite funny when the man sitting in the car dies this is a great app. I have a great experience.

Overall i love this game. The graphics, and ease of play is relsly good. Ive been playing it for ages and i did get really far at one point until i lost all my data before saving it. Onky problem i have with this game is the amount of time it takes to save up the coins to upgrade and unlock things.

title: Tomb of the Mask: Color
description:
This time the mystic mask and your passion for adventure led you into a new kind of maze. 

Moving from wall to wall, you need to paint over every corner of the labyrinth to make your way to the next one. But beware: some of them are not as safe as they seem to be...

We Love You. Enjoy.

comments: There are so many ads. And there a impossible levels so that you have to watch ads manually to skip the level. They also need to add more stages because once you get far enough into the game you just repeat previous levels. I have seen every level at least 3 times each. But the overall gameplay and idea is amazing, and the repeating levels dont bother me much, which is why i am 2000 levels into the game. 3/5

TOO MANY ADS. I like the gameplay but an ad every 10 secs (some even un-skippable) kind of breaks the flow and makes a good game disengaging. I think it would be better to decrease the frequency of the advertisements and let the user immerse more in the game than the advertisements...
This game is great I love the modern pixel graphics that is my favorite part and who ever doesnt like this game probably didnt try it yet because they would love it right from the start.
This game is amazing the vibrations, the colors, the way it's designed. It's amazing
Sometimes the tap to next does'n show up fix it so that I will give it five star.

title: ZOOM Cloud Meetings
description:
Stay connected wherever you go ‚Äì start or join a secure meeting with flawless video and audio, instant screen sharing, and cross-platform instant messaging - for free! 

Zoom is #1 in customer satisfaction and the best unified communication experience on mobile.

It's super easy! Install the free Zoom app, click on "New Meeting," and invite up to 100 people to join you on video! Connect with anyone on Android based phones and tablets, other mobile devices, Windows, Mac, Zoom Rooms, H.323/SIP room systems, and telephones.

VIDEO MEETINGS FROM ANYWHERE
-Best  video meeting quality
-Easily join a meeting or start an instant meeting with phone, email, or company contacts

COLLABORATE ON-THE-GO
-Best Android device content and mobile screen sharing quality
-Co-annotate over shared content
-Real-time whiteboard collaboration on Android tablets

UNLIMITED MESSAGING (WITH PHOTOS, FILES, AND MORE)
-Reach people instantly to easily send messages, files, images, links, and gifs
-Quickly respond or react to threaded conversations with emojis
-Create or join public and private chat channels

MAKE, RECEIVE, AND MANAGE PHONE CALLS
-Effortlessly make or receive calls with your business number
-Get voicemail and call recording with transcripts
-Use call delegation to make/receive calls on behalf of others
-Setup auto-receptionists to autonomously answer and route calls

AND MORE‚Ä¶.
-Safe driving mode while on the road
-Use your Android app to start your meeting or for direct share in Zoom Rooms
-Join Zoom Webinars 
-Works over WiFi, 5G, 4G/LTE, and 3G networks

ZOOM LICENSE INFORMATION:
-Any free or paid license can be used with the app
-Zoom Phone is an add-on to paid Zoom licenses
-A paid Zoom subscription is required for certain product features

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/zoom-video-communications
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zoomvideocommunications/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zoom/

Have a question? Contact us at support@zoom.us.

comments: Though the features of zoom is really awesome. I am unhappy to give it 4 stars due to the same video issue. Many people are facing the same problem like me I guess. When my video is on and I go to the participants list, it shows that my video is off. Even the other people cant see my video. That creates a great problem to me during online classes. Please find out a solution to solve this problem. I hope the next updates will make me rate zoom 5 starts.

So yeah, I've facing this problem for 1 month or 2. First it worked good both in mobile and in laptop/computer but now, mobile is facing problem. However, there are 2 problems. 1. It lags so much when my network is excellent and it lags the other apps too. 2. When I switch tabs on my mobile during a meeting, the camera automatically gets switched off and I've been facing this problem from a month or 2. Please fix these problems and I can have a peaceful meeting.

It's a nice app üôÇ it works nicely but the video camera settings is worst . Whenever I use zoom I always turn up my brightness full but this app always show my video null .So I want you to try to fix it . And then zoom is perfect for getting 5 stars. Try to fix it as soon as possible. I hope so you can do it.

This is one of the worst apps. I have used this app for online classes. There are many problems during online classes. The voice of the other participants does not come through clearly in the entire meeting. This app drains the battery very fast. It takes a lot of internet to work. If the network is good even then it does not work perfectly. If I want to open my front camera and unmute myself then I am unable to do these things. The functions in this app are good but the performance is worst

Worked great until for some reason my password was no longer accepted and regarded as invalid. I clicked on "Forgot Password" to receive an email that would let me change the password to a new one, but it sent me useless links that lead me to practically nowhere as it says, "log in to access this page". Seriously? I clicked "Forgot Password" for a reason. If I ask for a password reset, send me what I ask for and not links that lead me to practically nowhere. I missed a lot of important meetings

title: Flipkart Online Shopping App
description:
Flipkart Online Shopping App - Download app for a delightful shopping experience 

Online shopping with Flipkart is very easy as you get to shop from the comfort of your home and get products delivered at your doorstep. By downloading the Flipkart free online shopping app on your Android phone or tablet, you can effortlessly browse our massive collection of more than 80 crore products from multiple categories including mobile phones, fashion wear, electronic devices, videos, accessories and consumer durables.
_____________________________________


The products you can find on Flipkart shopping app are: 

‚Ä¢Mobile Phones
‚Ä¢Mobile accessories
‚Ä¢Laptops, Computer Accessories & Tablets
‚Ä¢Electronic gadgets
‚Ä¢Games & Gaming Console
‚Ä¢Home & Kitchen Appliances
‚Ä¢Women‚Äôs Clothing
‚Ä¢Men‚Äôs Clothing
‚Ä¢Women‚Äôs & Men‚Äôs footwear
‚Ä¢Sports, gym & fitness products
‚Ä¢Travel, luggage & handbags
‚Ä¢Personal care appliances
‚Ä¢Home & Furniture
‚Ä¢Grocery
‚Ä¢Flipkart Video

_____________________________________

 Install Flipkart app for unique benefits 

Simply download the Android  shopping app on your device (phone or tablet) and create an account for yourself. Now, you will be taken to the Home screen where you will find links to all the category products, along with amazing offers, deals and discounts under the 'Offer Zone' and 'Deals of the day'. 

1. Easily type in the product you are looking for in the ‚ÄòSearch‚Äô tab and find it instantly
2. Narrow down your search using filters like price, color, style, pattern, brand to find your desired product
3. Check ratings and reviews given by other customers along with seller ratings, price and description of the product while buying the product
4. You can also add products to your wishlist with a single tap
5. To place the order, choose among easy payment options like Flipkart Pay Later, Cardless Credit, Cash on Delivery (COD), debit card, credit card, net banking or UPI enabled PhonePe
6. Track your orders inside the app, get notifications on personalized offers, price drops, order status, exclusive launches and upcoming sale events
_____________________________________

 Permissions  

In addition to basic permissions, the Flipkart shopping app needs access to other functions on your device for it to support the above features -
‚Ä¢ Device and App History: To detect critical crashes and recover the app state
‚Ä¢ Identity: For native login functionality with your Google account
‚Ä¢ Phone: Read call logs to check eligibility for Buy Now Pay Later option
‚Ä¢ SMS: To auto-verify OTPs and determine your eligibility for Flipkart Pay Later, Cardless Credit
_____________________________________

You can contact our 24x7 customer support for any product or delivery related issues. Download Flipkart app now and start shopping!

title: Brainly ‚Äì The Homework App
description:

‚Ä¢ 250M+ unique users monthly
‚Ä¢ Experts providing explanation
‚Ä¢ thousands of moderators
‚Ä¢ 35+ countries

‚Ä¢ Free Homework Help - Brainly Basic is 100% free of charge!

‚Ä¢ Superfast, Homework Answers and Explanations - Questions are answered within minutes & monitored by moderators.

This app is amazing. From the time that I had downloaded it , I cannot stop using it . It has provided me all the answers that I have ever searched (even maths with proper explanation) . You might not get ur answer some times so u can post a question and get an answer from other users. So you should definitely try this app. It will really help you alotüèÜüìñüìöüìëüéí

The old version was very useful. But this one is not user friendly. Audio questions are only in hindi, if i ask in english it started to type in Hindi . And also the scan and solve option is also not working correctly, if i ask a question, it is diverting to other questions. The old version was very useful. I don't know what is happening in the new version.

The app is awesome. The problem is with the latest version of android. There is a bug. Eveytime i work with formula tab, the app crashes. Also you can make improvements towards making inserting formulas much more easily and conveniently. The idea of app is good . I myself contributed answers. Please fix this issue as soon as possible in next update at earliest.

This is a really great app! Ever since my modules came, I had trouble answering them. When I searched on Google for one of my questions, I found this app. I downloaded it and it is amazing! Random people started answering my questions, not only have I got my answers, but new friends as well. I hope this app wouldn't have any problems in the future. Thanks!

title: Samsung Music
description:
Samsung Music is optimized for Samsung android device and provides a powerful music play functionality and the best user interface.

Key Features

1. Supports playback of various sound formats such as MP3, WMA, AAC, FLAC.
2. Helps to effectively manage song lists by categories.(Track,Album,Artist,Genre,Folder,Composer)
3. Supports a new user experience that easily interact with Samsung smart devices like Tablet,TV(DLNA,Screen mirroring),Wearable.
4. Provides a clean and intuitive user interface.
5. The Samsung music shows recommendation of playlists from Spotify. You can find Spotify recommendation music by Spotify tab and search Spotify music you‚Äôll love.
(The Spotify tab is only available in countries where Spotify is on service.)

What is FLAC?
FLAC is an audio coding format similar to MP3 & AAC, but lossless, meaning that audio is compressed in FLAC without any loss in quality.


*** Required App Permissions ***
Below mandatory permission is required for basic features of Samsung Music.
Even if optional permission are denied, basic features may work properly.

[Mandatory Permission]
1. STORAGE permission :
   - Allows the player to write,modify,delete to SD card.
   - Allows the player to read data from SD card.

[Optional Permission]
2. MICROPHONE permission : Galaxy S4, Note3, Note4 only
   - Allows to control the player with voice commands which are listening, not recording.
     ex : PLAY,PAUSE,NEXT,PREVIOUS,VOLUME UP,VOLUME DOWN

3. PHONE permission : Korean devices only.
   - Verify your phone when using the music service.

recentChanges:
[16.2.22.20]
- Add more menu for each song
- Add Hide folder menu in View as all folder state.
- Add Dark mode settings in P OS or later
- Go to album detail page when selecting album image in track list
- Add Folder in Android Auto

comments: It's a great app so far but I have run into a slight issue with renaming songs. It seems like if you rename any songs you have downloaded with apps other than samsung music, it doesn't pick up on it. For example, if I have songnameA and I rename it to songnameB, it shows songnameB in the folder but in the app it doesn't change and is still songnameA. In the recently added section however, it shows songnameB, but as soon as I add it to a playlist it changes back to songnameA.

This really is a good music app. It's simple, clean (mostly), user friendly, and not glitchy. I'd only change 2 things, but they bug me enough to drop rating 1 star each. #1 PLEASE add the option to list multiple, separate, Artists and Genres in 'edit Track Details'?! There is one line to list any & all, but if I add 2(+) names or a 'feat', the track won't show up under each artist, only the 2(+) names together. #2 NEED 'Do Not Show Again' box on irritating SiriusXM ad when app starts up.

I have championed this app along with the very polished Internet and email apps Samsung makes. It is smooth, snappy, has good sound, is simple and light. But... Ads... They bothered me for a while, but I'm just learning to suck it up and deal with it. It's a couple of clicks every now and again. It's still the best in terms of functionality playing my local files. I like it's dark theme and generally feels intuitive. One star off because it would still be better without ads.

As of the last three updates this app has been the bug central. The worst of any music apps I've used. The welcome ads; freezing before playing a song; long pauses before deleting a playlist or removing a song from a playlist. What gives? It was never like this before. I wish there was an option to reset it to factory settings. I'll be looking for a new app today.

I had to move to this app because Google play shut down & YouTube music is garbage. It's alright. I can add music to some magical queue but somehow cannot look to see what's in said queue. It's good to make playlists & listen to music on random. However, unlike google play, when I put all my music on random I cant see a queue so I have no clue what's next, cant change my queue, and I dont like that. Unlike google play I cant swipe to the next song, I have to hit next, so in the car is not good.

title: Wolf Tales - Online Animal Sim
description:
The Animal wildlands is a dangerous RPG world, where the forest animals guard their territory while hunting and surviving off the land. For centuries, the wolf packs have remained at the top of the food chain, maintaining the natural order, led by their alpha, the last remaining dire wolf. When the dire wolf goes missing, you must lead your pack to greatness. Select a gray wolf or a black wolf, and start building your ultimate wolfpack. A wild life simulation adventure awaits!

WORLDWIDE MULTIPLAYER BATTLES - PVP

Fight for dominance in the virtual world! Take on the world in online real-time multiplayer PvP battles. Hunt together with your team in co-op and battle enemy clans to control the most territory. Will you be the hunter or the hunted?

UPGRADE YOUR BATTLE SKILLS

Create your ultimate RPG hero - you can choose which skills to learn and upgrade. Unique skills range from basic MMORPG abilities to fantasy elemental attacks - and even stealth skills which allow you to hide in the forest and become the ultimate predator!

BREED & RAISE CUBS

Build a family and role play! A realistic breeding sim gives cubs stronger fighting attributes compared to their parents. Take your pups out with you as you raid other clans and hunt your prey. Your pups will watch your every move, learning important survival and life skills. Trail your pup well, else they will not stand a chance in the online multiplayer PvP battle arena.

COLLECT ANIMALS

The alpha is the hero of each pack. You can duel enemy clans and recruit their alpha to your den. Collect wolves, foxes, bears and other wild animals, each with realistic and fantasy evolution skins. Each creature is rendered in stunning 3D graphics.

LIVE THE STORY OF A WOLF CLAN

A true survival simulator. When nature‚Äôs balance is threatened as the Great River has become contaminated, competition between the animals over the remaining spring water has begun. Even foreign tigers have been spotted far outside of their borders, causing concern amongst the rest of the animals.

There have also been rumours of ancient reptiles, rising to the surface from centuries of slumber, claiming the mountains and caves as their own. The gray wolves are now called upon to craft a solution in these troubled times.

A MASSIVE OPEN WORLD

Explore a huge, unbroken open MMO world teeming with wild life, from the dense forest, mountains to the freezing arctic. You can fight in online multiplayer PvP areas, tackle quests, role play, gather resources or raid enemy clans and take over their home. You might even encounter the tiger king on your adventure (a superior evolution of the natural tiger), who has been spotted in the forest for the first time in centuries!  

GROUNDBREAKING 3D GRAPHICS

Experience never before seen 3D graphics quality in a wildlife simulation MMO, with dynamic lighting and time of day cycles which bring the virtual world to life! Start your day at the mountain peaks, watching the sunrise with your pack before embarking on your adventure for survival and territory dominance.

BUILD & DECORATE YOUR DEN

Craft a home! Dig tunnels and secret passageways to expand your virtual family. Craft the best environment for your cubs, and raise a family to tackle the strongest predators in the forest. The realistic breeding simulator allows you to breed your animals and watch them grow to adults in real time.

MORE THAN JUST A SIMULATOR

Foxie Ventures would like to welcome you to the Wolf Tales MMORPG family!


By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service which can be found at: https://www.foxieventures.com/terms

Our privacy policy can be found at:
https://www.foxieventures.com/privacy

This app offers optional in-app purchases that cost real money. You can disable the in-app purchasing functionality by adjusting your device settings.

A network connection is required to play. Data fees may apply if WiFi isn‚Äôt connected.

Website: https://www.foxieventures.com

title: Opera Mini - fast web browser
description:
Opera Mini is all about speed and comfort, but is more than just a web browser! It‚Äôs lightweight and respects your privacy while allowing you to surf the internet faster, even on slow or congested networks. Our Smart Browsing selects the optimal data-saving mode for you so you can browse longer with your data plan.

It blocks annoying ads and includes a powerful download manager with offline file sharing. It‚Äôs convenient media player has a one-handed mode so you can listen to music and watch videos smoothly, all while providing you AI-powered personalised news. 
 
Top features

‚Ä¢ Save Data 

Save up to 90% of your data and browse faster, even on slow networks, without disrupting your browsing experience. Easily check the status of your daily data savings while Opera Mini's Smart Browsing automatically selects the browsing mode for your optimal experience.

‚Ä¢ Smart Downloading 

Automatically scan sites for downloadable video and music files, and download them in the background. Easily locate all your previous downloads and any other files on your device ‚Äì no more digging around in folders. Smart Downloading is integrated with Opera Mini‚Äôs video player and Offline File Sharing, so you can download and share files with friends easily!

‚Ä¢ Offline File Sharing 

Send and receive files securely without an internet connection or any data usage. Offline File Sharing can transfer images or any other files at high speed, up to 300MB/s, making it the ideal solution for sharing files anywhere! Scan the QR code and share with any other Opera Mini users in seconds. 
 
‚Ä¢ Block Ads 

Opera Mini has a native built-in ad blocker so you can surf the web without annoying ads, bringing you a completely smooth web browsing experience!

‚Ä¢ Customise Your Browser 

YOU are the Master of Opera Mini! Customise your browser by choosing your favourite layout, theme, news categories and more. Make your Opera Mini stand out!

‚Ä¢ Personalised News 

Catch up on both local and global trending news specially tailored for your interests. The rebooted news feed within the Opera Mini browser is powered by our powerful AI news engine. Follow your favourite channels to see topics personalised for you.

‚Ä¢ Video Player 

Watch & listen live, or download for later. Mini‚Äôs video player has a one-handed mode for easy operations on mobile, and is integrated with your Download Manager.

‚Ä¢ Offline Reading 

Easily save news stories and any webpages to your phone while connected to Wi-Fi and read them later offline without using data. You can also choose to automatically refresh news whenever you are on Wi-Fi and easily manage the saved files. Access them quickly by adding a shortcut to Offline Reading in your navigation bar.

‚Ä¢ Browse Privately

Opera Mini provides you with great privacy protection on the web. Use private tabs to browse incognito without leaving a trace on your device or being tracked. 

‚Ä¢ Night Mode

Dim the screen to protect your eyes when reading in the dark.
 
‚Ä¢ Choose your Search Engine

Switch up the way you search or assign your favorite search engine as default.

To learn more about the specific permissions Opera Mini uses, please visit: http://www.opera.com/help/mini/android/permissions

Do more with Opera: https://www.opera.com/mobile/android

Opera may show ads from Facebook. To learn more, see: https://m.facebook.com/ads/ad_choices

Keep in touch:
Twitter ‚Äì http://twitter.com/opera/
Facebook ‚Äì http://www.facebook.com/opera/
Instagram ‚Äì http://www.instagram.com/opera

Terms & Conditions:
By downloading this application, you are agreeing to the End User Licence Agreement at https://www.opera.com/eula/mobile. Also, you can learn how Opera handles and protects your data in our Privacy Statement at https://www.opera.com/privacy.

comments: OM used to be the go to web browser for low end phones. It made my Nokia 3110c a smartphone, it made my Sony Ericsson W200i a smartphone, it made my Samsung Corby II a smartphone. Today I use a low end Android phone with Android 8.1 Go edition. Unfortunately I don't get the reliable experience I got from the above mentioned phones. I think OM is trying to fix something that is not broken and got everything messed up in the process. I would like to have the old reliable OM back. Thank you

Also when I start to download a file chrome don't show any download progress, in fact it doesn't even show if the file is being downloaded or not. Very frustrating. So I went on to play store in search of another browser and stumbled upon opera browser. Downloaded it and what do you know, first time lucky. Love it.

The app is good but it usually gives me many inconveniences for instance it offers free browsing but yet whenever I try it,it doesn't work. I must have data before mine works.please help fix it,,am so disappointed right now!!

When text is highlighted to be selected the area where "Search" and "copy" appear at the top is all white. Can't tell where the options are as they're not visible. The texts are the same colour as the background. Please, fix it. Nice app.

Ludo King‚Ñ¢ is a classic board game played between friends and family. Play the dice game of kings! Recall your childhood!

Ludo King is a cross platform multiplayer game that supports Desktop, Android, iOS and Windows mobile platform at same time. This game also support offline mode, where player can play with Computer or, Local multiplayer (play and pass mode). Ludo King is also a favorite game of Bollywood superstar. Play this dice game Ludo King. Best casual game in board games.

Nature Theme

What's new:
* Voice Chat available

* Real chat with friends and buddies
* Make buddies worldwide
* Challenge Facebook friends/buddies
* Save/Load Ludo game option
* Player statistics with XP and level up system
* More user-friendly UI
* Support extended to low end devices

Ludo King is the modern version of the royal game of Pachisi. A Ludo game which was played between Indian kings and queens in ancient times. Roll the Ludo dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board. Beat other players, become the Ludo King.

Ludo King follows the traditional rules and the old school look of the Ludo game. Just like the kings and queens of India's golden age, your fate depends on the roll of the Ludo's dice and your strategy of moving the tokens effectively. 

Features of Ludo King:
* No internet connection required! Play against the computer.
* Play with your family and friends through Local and Online Multiplayer.
* Play 2 to 6 Player Local Multiplayer Mode.
* Invite and challenge your Facebook Friends in a private game room and beat them to become Ludo King.
* Play with world players and make them your buddies.
* Private chat with your Facebook friends & Buddies.
* Express yourself by sending emojis to your opponents. 
* Play Snake and Ladders on 7 different gameboard variations.
* Graphics with a classic look and the feel of a dice game.

Ludo King is a friends and family game that was once played by kings and now it can be enjoyed by you and your family and friends. You'll be playing this Ludo for hours and its fun for the whole family.

Ludo King is a perfect time pass game of Ludo board game. You played Ludo in your childhood, now play on your phone and tablet.

Another nostalgic game similar in structure is Snakes and Ladders. Like Ludo, you may have played this board game when you were young. Ludo King now incorporates this classic game as a whole new level. The objective of the game is simple: you start on 1 and you have to be the first one to make it to 100. However, you can only move the same number of tiles as the number you roll on a die. As the name suggests, the board is also littered with snakes and ladders. If you land on the same tile as the beginning of a ladder, then you can take the ladder as a shortcut and move on up. A game of ups and down, Snakes and Ladders has been a favorite for generations; and now you can play it too, with Ludo King. 

Ludo has different names in different regions and countries like Fia, Fia-spel (Fia the game), Le Jeu de Dada (The Game of Dada), Non t'arrabbiare, Fia med knuff (Fia with push), C·ªù c√° ng·ª±a, Uckers, Griniaris, Petits Chevaux (Little Horses), Ki nevet a v√©g√©n, ÿ®ÿ±ÿ≥Ÿä (Barjis/Barjees). People also misspell Ludo as Loodo, Chakka, Lido, Lado, Ledo, Leedo, Laado, or Lodo.

* Twitter: https://twitter.com/Ludo_King_Game
* Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/LudoKing
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ludo_king_game
* https://ludoking.com

comments: My favourite game for best time - pass, all things is good but one thing make me very sad, I had purchased a Product from the given add in Ludo King that's become fraud.. There was options only to online tv payment that's why bi credited, more than 15 days over but not till one Email/Sms/Call not Came.. till I was watching , i wase also email the company but not responded... If i don't get the product i will Record a FIR in the police station in the name if Ludo King.. Why u promote like this..

I've been getting kicked out of games left, right and center. When I go back it sets me up with a new game and doesn't let me in on the one that I had started playing. I end up losing coins like crazy. I was upto almost a 950k and now I'm down to almost 800k. Also, the ads that should show up in order to earn coins never show up (this is for the button on the left bottom corner). Please resolve these issues ASAP.

Update: my phone isn't heating up now. Why is my phone heating up? My phone gets hot when I play and my battery drains a lot. This is not a game that needs lot of processing or graphics like a car race or a first person shooter game. Something is fishy. Are the phones resources used for something else in the background? I also noticed my battery draining when I opened the app but not started a game yet. Waiting for your reply.

The dice rolled by script not randomized. You will never have 6 for three times consecutively. In reality it should be possible! The other one is, your token will never occupy the same position together in the same cell except in the safe place (starred or coloured). Based on that, I assume that you will be majority lost except you do some in-game purchasing. The more money you put in the game,the more probability that you will win the game. Deserve 1 star only!

This app is fixed. If it is random, why would first you lose 5 matches and then win 5. Please don't believe them. Even if you mail them, they won't reply. Ultimately you will win 10 matches but you will lose 100 matches. They are making fool of you because money is involved here and they also know it. Don't download. Sorry but there is not a option for 0 star.

title: Survival Island 1&2
description:
"Survival Island !" is a free escape RPG game that anyone can enjoy playing.
Your goal is to escape from the desert island by solving problems with retro style pixel-art like old console games.

*Can you escape from the desert island?
A luxury cruise liner sank!
You woke up on a little desert island...!
Can you escape from the island?!

*Find the hidden items on the island!
You are stuck there with no food and tools.
Cut down trees or hunt for fish...
Explore the desert island and look for the hidden items!
Collect materials, create tools, and you may be able to find the way out!

*Plenty to solve! Can you figure out?
Items may be found in unexpected places!
Can you find your way out?
This escape RPG game provides you plenty of problems to solve!

comments: This app is very nice! I just got to know about it from an advertisement, and I'm not dissapointed at all. All the filters are very realistic and amazing! This app definitely deserves more hype. Does not take as much storage as other apps and, whenever you click a pic or take a video, it saves it directly to your gallery, so you don't have to export it. I am very satisfied. Would recommend this app!

B612 is really an awesome app for filters, photos, video shoots, and everything.... it has the best filters.... It is not less than "tiktok"... I like shooting videos but no posting... so I just shoot them on B612, with the awesome filters and music... the only think that must be improved is that the music search must be there..... And everything is really awesome... üòçüòç

Full support excellent application for photos and videos. A Minor thing I downloaded all the stuff in this app like effects,stickers,make ups and what not everything went good until last update. I updated B612 and guess what everything I had downloaded was gone and has to be downloaded again.And sometimes when I open the app it presents me with a blank screen and I have to restart.One more thing there are bugs and several options which wouldnt work.Like the hair colour changer for instance.

I am very happy after using this app but i have rated it 4 stars cuz i got one problem. I do some editings with this app. It would have been better if there was video merging option and text writing in videos. I will rate 5 stars if this problem is fixed in the next update.

Plz add separate slides for makeup..means it must be separate for lipsticks,highlight your face,blush on...when I want to highlight only MN face ,to look natural,dark coloured lipstick has been applied which is so so irritating.please consider that...if we want to only highlight face but don't want any lipstick,than what will we do? And also add good highlighters for face!

title: Contacts
description:
Back up your contacts and sync them across all  your devices
‚Ä¢ Safely back up the contacts in your Google Account to the cloud
‚Ä¢ Access the contacts in your Google Account from any device

Keep your contacts organized and up to date
‚Ä¢ View your contacts by account (e.g., work vs. personal)
‚Ä¢ Easily add contacts and edit information like phone numbers, emails, and photos
‚Ä¢ Get suggestions for adding new contacts, merging duplicates, and more

Contacts is currently only supported on devices running Android Marshmallow and above

summary: Back up your contacts & access them anywhere
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ "Suggestions" has been renamed "Merge & fix"
comments: Google Back Ups doesn't work at all. I Definitely had it on! I lost all my contact when my screen broke. My last back up was way back in April. And I've barely use 2% of my storage. I tried everything. But with a broken screen, there was just no way for me to back up my phone or retrieve my contacts from my phone.

I love using this app for contact back up only thing is I just got a new phone and added a new contact to device. The app didn't back it up automatically so I had to add it manually. When I assigned a number to speed dial my phone shows multiple numbers for the same person. Most of which were the samw number. I'd love for the app to tell me if there are miultiple numbers for contacts on my phone and have the app merge the contacts on my phone.

I've been using Google Contacts on my Samsung Note 20 Ultra. Contacts just disappear! Where are they going? This problem Google, has been ongoing now for awhile. The same with Google Mesaages. Problems with messages not sending unless you go into Messages to turn Chat off. What the heck?? Who is ruining these Google Apps?? My Pixelbook with Google Contacts as defult, the same contact as on my Samsung, just disappears...

Syncing works fine for me. However I'm annoyed that I can't view a contact's details beyond name and photo without using the "edit" function. I can't be the only person out there who occasionally needs to look at a contact's mailing address. To do this from the contact detail screen you must use the "edit" button. So weird.

It is OK ish, with basic functions available to phones for years missing. Speed dial contacts on home screen. Once a norm, now hard to find. Google contacts will give option to add a contact to home screen, but it omits the option to make it a speed / direct dial action. It only opens that contact in the app... The whole point of sending a contact to home page is for this reason, to be able to directly dial key contacts. Please implement this feature. Now that google contacts for various reasons are becoming the default app, instead of an option, with native contact apps missing (like in recent Xiaomi phones which did have this feature) there is even more urge to add this functionality

title: BACKTRACKIT: Musicians' Player
description:
Plenty of features to help you play music and grow as a Musician. From shifting the key, slowing down the tempo, looping parts of your songs to jamming to HQ backing tracks of different genres!

Features: 

- Access to backing tracks (jam tracks) of different genres and see their chord progression while playing! Limited number of tracks is available for FREE while the rest can be unlocked by upgrading to the Premium version.
- Detect and shift the key and tempo of any of your songs!
- Reduce the leading instrument volume in the song.
- Advanced Equalizer for a great audio experience. Save up to 5 custom presets.
- Advanced Looping, precise selection and capability to save loops. 
- Save the song with your changes: new tempo, key and EQ settings!  
- Metronome of any time signature and tempo.
- Singing Exercises: the App will play random notes that you have to sing correctly. The App will show you if you're hitting the note perfectly or not!
- The App will sort all of your songs according to their key or tempo.
- Guitar/Piano display of 32 musical scales (Major, Dorian, Hungarian Gypsy...)
- Guitar/Piano display of 30 types of chords.
- Fret Zealot is supported: live chord progressions will be reflected on your guitar fretboard directly! 

Backtrackit's original backing tracks is helping thousands of musicians improve their improvisation skills through its unique "Live Chord Progression" mode. You can see the chord progression outlined on the guitar fretboard or piano where the notes of the current chord are highlighted. If you're a beginner or an advanced player, jamming to these tracks will help you develop a greater sense of music and improvisation skills.

Backing Tracks Genres:
- Rock
- Blues
- Jazz
- Metal
- Pop
- Ambient
- Classical
- EDM
- Hip Hop
- Tanpura
- Drums
- No-Drums
- No-Bass

The music notations that are supported in the App are:
- English: C D E
- French: Do R√© Mi
- Russian: –î–æ –†–µ –ú–∏

Backtrackit gives you the best audio quality when the pitch is shifted or the tempo is changed. When the pitch is changed, the tempo remains the same due to time-stretching technique. 

Backtrackit is Superpowered.

If you have any feedback or face any issue, please don't hesitate to reach out at backtrack.it.app@gmail.com. I'll be happy to help.

If you have any feedback or face any issue, please don't hesitate to reach out at backtrack.it.app@gmail.com. I'll be happy to help.
summary: Play, Practice, Rock!
developerAddress:
Street 3, Building 1255.
Bsalim, El Metn.
Lebanon
recentChanges:
- More Premium content can be unlocked for free
- Added support for Fret Zealot. Connect your Fret Zealot and start jamming with the backing tracks. The chords' notes will be displayed on your guitar fretboard!

This integration requires giving permission to Bluetooth and Location in order to connect to the device. The permissions will be asked when connecting to Fret Zealot. However, if you're on an old Android version, then you need to accept these permissions in order to update.
comments: I've been searching for an app that gives me the key and bpm of a song and be consistently reliable and easy to use and this app is the closest I've found. However it doesn't detect the key correctly on most of the minor songs even after buying the upgrade. So until this is fixed it's only getting 2 stars from me.

It doesn't completely mute the lead solo, the only option is to reduce the lead sound which affects almost everything. I really don't know what this app is for but I thought I can create backing track from the original music. It's not usefull

No minor scales! I wish this would read minor scales. Instead it only gives the major options to find you key. This is an incomplete app. 2 stars off. Now I need to go find a real app. It works great, but missing a whole half of the program.
Very well laid out. All of the features I want are on the main play screen and are easily found and used.
Great app; for transposing songs, changing tempos, plus other nice added features, including vocal exercises.

title: Push'em all
description:
Trace your way to the end of the level and push the enemies with your stick on the way! 
Move your character and make all the ennemies fall down (and maybe you will learn how to use traps?!)

Be careful with giant ennemies and the fast ones, It's their turn to try to take you down!

One-tap easy-to-learn controls with stunning visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics!
descriptionHTML:
Trace your way to the end of the level and push the enemies with your stick on the way!
Move your character and make all the ennemies fall down (and maybe you will learn how to use traps?!)

Be careful with giant ennemies and the fast ones, It's their turn to try to take you down!

One-tap easy-to-learn controls with stunning visual effects and addictive gameplay mechanics!
summary: Will you rush to the end or will you prefer to clean everything up on your way?
recentChanges: Overall performance optimizations.
comments: If your looking for a good time killer this is a great game. Im at level around 3800 and nothing has changed. Same weapons and same levels over and over again. Ads around every corner. Whats worse all the coins you collect to optimize the weapons have zero effect on the weapons. Ill tell you now, anything you do in this game wont count for anything! Levels just go higher, but not harder. Coins mean nothing, points you get for pushing people off mean nothing, achievements mean nothing.
I paid to remove ads and get a special skin. I'm still getting a ton of ads and received nothing. There's no help menu.
Don't spend money thinking there won't be add like it advertises, i paid and still see tons of ads. Its fun, but with SOOOOOO many ads I'm on the edge of uninstalling it.
It's super fun and it's super time consuming I love it it's free and I love it not too many ads but and I'm fine with that because I hate ads
I LOVE THIS GAME, BUT. YOU GUYS NEED TO ADD MORE STUFF QUICKLY. I'M ON LEVEL 1200, AND NOTHING NEW YET. I'VE UNLOCKED EVERYTHING. PLEASR ADD NEW STUFF, AND MAYBE MAKE IT A LITTLE HARDER.

title: Subway Princess Runner
description:
Subway princess runner, Bus run, forest rush with addictive endless running game!
Rush as fast as you can, dodge the oncoming trains and buses. Careful the rolling wood in the forest! Intuitive controls to run left or right, jump in the sky to obtain more coins, excited slide to safety!

Help your loved beautiful princess to escape the police! Use skateboard after double tapping, experience the unique board in the subway. Challenge the highest score of the rank with the world players or share scores in friend list.
Unlock level to get more score multiple.Gain experience to unlock your level by complete missions or boxes. the more score multiplier you are, the higher score you get.

comments: I like play these games for only killing time but, this game is irritating me. These ads,more coins for buying some thing like a new character. It is a very nice game!! I like running games because they are fun and joyful and I love the scoreboards and in 5 mins only I get high score and I get money very quickly and I love the concept and everything about this it is very interesting and I love the tracks and when it jumps it jumps higher and higher and I love the character which you have made and we can also change clothes I ‚ù§ this game so muchhhh!!!

I like this game.. but some thing missing..ü§îü§î first the man was running slow.... after some time's it was running fast. but I like this game .many gifts..üòçüòç and. first üöÜ second road .third some thing some thing else.. but i like this game... some time's when I'm stress i want to play this game.. that stress will gone.. this is my opinion to this game..

It was very very very nice game it has many adventure features and lollipops and it has sundenlly changed into golden ring it was very nice game very nice princesses but one problem only for ViP your giving 3 more characters and for becoming ViP we should subscribe for money and please keep the 3 characters in normal and please all install this app thank you so much for giving this opportunity to me

I like it a lot awesome game never forgot it all the features are amazing I like all the roads I like all these levels but you know there are some challenges like some names came for example nono prashali etc but I have never given up I won all the challenges there are lots of gifts missions are there but all these are very brilliant I like this game very much no complaint from me when I am getting stressed I play this game and my all stress gone always I don't know no how much good it is üíñüíó‚ù§‚ò∫

comments: I appreciate it and I would like to give a little tip, it could give us a better message when there is a intern problem and we can't open the application, today the generic message is something that we've a internet connection problem but it's not true.

Not the worst app. Caixa is not the easiest bank to work with, so at least it's good to be able to access the account with the app. On the not so good side, sometimes the access by fingerprint is disabled for no apparent reason and when I enter the password, it returns an error message saying that the password is wrong. Then I have to reset the whole thing. This happens more frequently than I'd like it to. Other than that, it's not bad.

Right now, I can't see my receipt of my TEVs! All the time says that I have to clic in a kind of link, in order to sign in to the app again, all the time!! This never happened before and also says that I have to give permissions for the cookies again!!

After informing my email and password the app get stuck all the time and says there is something wrong with my internet connection. But my internet is fine. Also after filling in endless long bill numbers and finaly finalizing a payment, the inlog time expired and you have to sign in again and fill it in all over again, if you even can log in again.

When I inform my password and try to log in the app shows a message saying that I may not be connected to the internet but I am. I can't access my account. It's very difficult to use this app without having a problem. Sometimes I can access the app, but when logged in I try to do some operations and the system fails :(

title: Google TV (previously Play Movies & TV)
description:
Note: Google TV app is only available on Android mobile and tablet devices in the U.S.

Google TV app, previously Play Movies & TV, makes it easy to find and enjoy the entertainment you love in one place. With Google TV, you'll be able to: 

Find what to watch next
Browse 700,000+ movies and TV episodes from across your streaming apps, all in one place and organized into topics and genres. Discover new things with recommendations based on what you love and what‚Äôs trending across the services you already have access to. Search for titles to see which streaming apps offer them.

See the latest releases
Buy or rent the newest movies and shows right in the Shop tab. Purchases are stored in your Library and can be downloaded to watch when you're not connected. Watch instantly on your laptop, Android phone or tablet, or on your TV with Google TV or on Play Movies & TV where available. 

One list for all your discoveries
Add interesting shows and movies to your Watchlist to keep track of your new discoveries and view them later. The Watchlist is shared between all your devices, so you can even add to your Watchlist from your TV or phone and laptop through Search on any browser.


Learn more about Google TV: tv.google
Learn more about app updates: support.google.com/googleplay/community

Find where your favorite shows and movies are streaming
* Discover something new in just a few taps
* Add thumbs up or down to get personal recommendations based on what you like to watch

comments: Full of bugs, why replace a working app with this? Too many bugs to cover. Volume drops until the app decides to randomly pause. When expanding from letterbox to fullscreen, the aspect stays in full screen untill it pauses randomly, then, when play is pressed it stretches across the x axis, leaving the black border of letterbox while stretching horizontally. On top of that, I have never had a smooth experience trying to download and of my 250+ purchases.... Wifi or cellular

Just installed itself one day. I can't uninstall and if I try and put it in a folder the next time I open my phone it always reappears somewhere else on my screen. I don't need ANOTHER streaming service. Y'all already rich, you don't need another app, especially since I didnt want the app to begin with, nor did I approve its download.

One thing that I like about it is that I can limit my searches to only "free" movies, so it limits it to my current subsctriptions, but it would be nice if you could do that same limitation when browsing by genre. I have so many subscriptions, I'd like to limit my browsing to those subscriptions. Also, how is YouTube TV not one of the supported services? You're literally the same company!

Disappointed! This review is for the Google TV dongle. I was excited about it. But it hasn't lived up to expectations. My biggest drawback is the lack of "Continue watching" on most apps. This device was supposed to consolidate all of my contents in one place but it doesn't. I hope an update can rectify it. The outlay and ability to disable contents from apps one doesn't use will be great.

I like the upgrade, but when I'm offline, it doesn't want to show my TV show library. Instead, it says "Start your own collection". I already have a collection. It can show me my movie library, but not my TV show library. It doesnt even show the content I've already downloaded to watch offline, unless I get connected to the internet to do so.

title: Google Play Games
description:
Games are more fun with the Google Play Games app. We'll help you find your next favorite game ‚Äì from action to puzzles. And with "Instant play," many games require no installation. Really. Save your progress and track your achievements as you level up. Plus, you can pick up where you left off from any device.

KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Instant play: There‚Äôs no installation needed ‚Äì look for the "Instant play" button to instantly play full games.
‚Ä¢ Built-in Google games: Play Solitaire, Minesweeper, Snake, PAC-MAN, Cricket, and Whirlybird ‚Äì even when you‚Äôre offline.
‚Ä¢ Save your progress: Your progress is automatically saved to the cloud when you see "Progress saved by Play Games."
‚Ä¢ Gamer profile: Create a custom gamer ID, unlock achievements, earn XP, and level up.
‚Ä¢ Gameplay recording: Easily record and share your best gameplay moments.

comments: Terrible, every through a new android update, I can't play my games without re-enabling google play games even though I had it disabled for the past two years and I could play my games perfectly fine. Honestly screw google play games forcing me to re-enable it even though I didn't need before and to update it on the little space I have left on my phone. You're a waste of time and stop me from playing the games I love.

I liked it until today. Today I found some sort of glitch that some of the games I played, it said that they were played 1st January 1970 for some reason AND NO MATTER WHAT I DID IT STAYED LIKE THAT!!!! I found it absolutely ANNOYING and I need you to know about it and fix it, GOOGLE!!!!! >:(|

Google Play games helps to save your progress in each game and when you uninstall and reinstall it, you can again play the game from where you left. But even after enabling automatic sign-in to the supported games, it's not connecting sometimes. We have to connect from the game. In the achievement section for each game, my achievements are not showing. Sometimes I am not able to connect with the supported games, I don't know why. Please fix this problems, also I'm finding bugs in the app.

Actually way better than I expected, I thought at first it was only an app where you make an account and can play offline games. But now in this update you can play MORE different games, ADD friends, EARN achievements ( that was old lol) but still. Look how much it offers you! It's incredible, It's one of the apps that you can actually never get bored of. Good job developers, I'm more than surprised!! :))

Loved what this app was doing until I had to get a new phone. Now some of the games I've played lost all the progress I made in them because my profile no longer exists even though I never deleted it and its under the same Gmail. It wants me to create a new one and doesn't offer a way to try and recover my original one. Typically would care but I invested a lot of time and a little money in marvels contest of champions and now its all gone.

title: Samsung Calculator
description:
[Key features]
Perform four fundamental operations and engineering calculations.

To start the engineering calculator, tap the engineering calculator icon.

To check the calculation history, tap the calculation history icon. To close the calculation history panel, tap the keypad icon.

You can use the previously inputted formulas. Tap the formula you need from the calculation history.

[Additional features]
To convert units, tap the unit calculator button. You can easily convert various types of units, such as area, length, and temperature.

This software uses the Apache License 2.0. The details can be found at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.

comments: This app is better than any other calculator app. I've never had issues with this app. Its big buttons and visual makes it easy on the eyes and fun, doesn't glitch, and it does exactly what I need it to do with no bells and whistles. Though as of today 10/08/2020 I went to use it to work on some things and noticed it has mysteriously uninstalled itself. But guess what - I installed it RIGHT back lolüòÑ.

Try to make the UI simple instead of going here and there or copy the MI calculator app.Try to provide the calculation history in the entry field itself. So we can easily check the correctness of the calculation without going to the history window. Also while using scientific calculator I have to rotate the mobile. It is annoying and it is very difficult in field condition.

Samsung this is a request to please make more user friendly ui of calculator app. To open the trigonometric and other functions, we need to rotate the mobile. Just a suggestion that it would be great if there can be a slide(swap from right to left) feature which can open those functions in portrait mode only. Thanks n regards

It's a very good app, it calculate very accurately, it's very easy to use( just press the numbers like the real calculator and then press = to get your results) or tilt your phone to go to crazy super nerdy mode. Thank you Samsung for making calculations so easy.
There is no innovation in this app, I could not see and user friendly approach here. I expect real time innovative and creative approach from Samsung. Greetings !
